11.content: So the Masked Maiden needs to pack on a few pounds? Well which Batgirl should it be?
11.title: Batgirl

choices: Later that evening...
Plenty of rest and relaxation later...
111.content:
Saturday night is always hectic in Gotham City. You can take in a show, visit a nightclub, dine out at the many high quality restaurants...

Or, if you're Barbara Gordon, you can spend your evening staking out an abandoned warehouse in the danker part of the city, on one of the coldest nights of the year, wearing what amounted to a skimpy pair of long johns.

The call had gone out just a few hours ago. Mr. Freeze had escaped from a supposedly high security convoy, and was up to his old tricks. There had already been a spate of ice themed robberies across the city, and Bruce had called her up to stakeout a potential hideout.

Stakeout involved sitting on top of a dilapidated apartment building for hours on end, just in case the bad guy showed up. Even with the intel of Wayne Enterprises, it usually turned out to be a bust.

'Is it just me', Barbara thought bitterly, wrapping her cape around herself in a vain attempt to keep out the cold, ' or does someone escape from Arkham almost every week?'

There were a few reasons the masked maiden was in such a foul mood. The cold was obviously a factor, but as well as that, tonight was supposed to be her first night off in weeks. She'd been looking forward to kicking back, taking a load off... but try explaining the concept of taking it easy to a man who hasn't taken a night off in a decade. Also she was starving. She skipped lunch, planning to order in and pig out, but that was before the jailbreak. And then there was...

"Perimeter's still all clear chief!"

Tim Drake, the third and current Robin. Barbara wouldn't have believed it, but he was actually more annoying than Dick Grayson.

"That's great Tim. Maybe you should check again. Y'know, just to be sure?" Barbara replied, trying to keep the sarcasm out of her voice.

"Hey, all I know is I've gone on patrol six times since we got here and all you've done is sit on your fat butt!"

"Listen here 'Boy Wonder', I've been on more stakeouts than you've had hot dinners!"

"Yeah, looks like you've been having plenty of those too 'Fatgirl!' "

Barbara flushed scarlet. "Why you little..."

But Barbara's retort would have to wait, as suddenly Mr. Freeze and a mob of what looked like eskimos came running down the alley below them.

Barbara quickly assessed the situation and turned to Robin. "Okay Tim, here's what we'll..."

But he was already gone, swinging down from the fire escape, before landing squarely on top of two goons, knocking them out.

"ICE to see you again Freezy. Hope you don't mind me DROPPING in."

Barbara groaned at the lame bravado before jumping down into the fray.

Even in the middle of a fight, it still seemed to Barbara like she was just going through the motions.

Punch goon, spinning kick, dodge ice blast, witty repartee, kick, punch, seemingly lose, suddenly turn it around, say clever pun...

Before she knew it the fight was over, Freeze was unconscious and Tim was giving a play by play.

"Did you see when I dodged that last ice blast? It was like 'WHOOSH' and I was like 'ICE try!' and Freeze was all 'Curse you Boy Wonder! Curse you!' And then..."

Barbara wasn't really listening. She was just imagining sinking her teeth into that doubled stuffed pepperoni pizza with extra cheese that she'd been craving all night.

Suddenly a cry from Tim, pointing at one of Freeze's henchmen who was trying to make his escape.

"I got it." said Barbara casually.

She could have just bataranged him, but then she decided a little showmanship would remind the kid who was the senior partner around here.

A little swing on the fire escape, a flip and she'd land precisely on the bad guy's shoulders. Piece a cake, sort of thing she'd done a thousand times before.

Just up and...

******************************************************************************** ************************************

"What on earth happened?" asked Alfred, as Barbara hobbled into the Batcave, supported by Tim.

"Just a little accident, y' know, momentary lapse of..."

"She slipped and fell right on her ass!" exclaimed Tim, a beaming grin on his face.

Alfred grimaced "Language Timothy. Now then let's get you up here Ms. Gordon, and see what the damage is."

As well as a butler, Alfred was also a trained soldier, actor and medic, and. after a perfunctory examination, diagnosed a sprained ankle, and prescribed plenty of rest and relaxation.

Hearing this Barbara smiled. Could be worse, she thought.
111.title: Barbara Gordon

choices: Barbara gets comfortable...and hungry
A few days later
1111.content:
"Well Ms. Gordon, I've finished setting the splint" Alfred explained to his master's young protege, "It's not a terribly serious sprain, but I'm afraid you won't be doing any costumed crime for some time now."

Barbara smiled. "It's not so bad Alfred, after tonight, I really could use a bit of a break. How long do you think I'll be out for?"

"Hmmm, well it depends Ms. Gordon. With plenty of rest, I don't see it taking more than maybe 4 to 6 weeks to heal"

"Well I better call the Library and tell them I won't be in for a few weeks..." Barbara sighed dejectedly. She loved her job as Gotham City's head librarian, and was a little disappointed to hear that she would be confined to sitting on her butt for a month and a half. But, still, she had been firing on all cylinders for the past few months, trying to juggle between her life as a librarian and her life as a crime fighter. A small vacation was starting to sound better and better now. At least she could finally get that pig-out that she had been planning.

**************************************************************************** ****************************************

When Bruce had finally arrived home, (At around 7 in the morning no less. Being Batman took nothing less than a full commitment from him), he was mortified to hear from Alfred that one of his partners had been hurt in the line of work. Though Batman had always been painted by the public as a lone stalwart dark avenger, the truth was that he cared deeply for his partners. There was always a part of him that was terrified that one night, he would lose one of his partners, just like he had lost Jason Todd, his previous Robin, before Tim.

“Barbara, please tell me you are alright” Bruce asked worriedly. He would never have been forgive himself if he allowed one of his partners to get hurt again.

“Oh, I’m fine. It was really my fault anyway.”

“No. I was the one who called you and asked you to do a stake-out on your night out. This is my fault. I asked you to patrol that night even though this was your one-night off in some time. I want to make it up to you, while you recuperate, why don’t you stay here at Wayne Manor? Just so Alfred can keep an eye on you, and help you with anything you need”

“Oh, I don’t want to be a bother to him” Barbara said shyly.

“Nonsense Ms. Gordon, it would be my pleasure”

“Well…if you insist!” Barbara exclaimed. A whole month and a half at the most luxurious mansion in Gotham, being waited on hand and foot? Spraining her ankle was looking more and more like the best thing she had done in years!
1111.title: Later that evening...

choices: The next morning Barbara is suddenly hungry again
11111.content:
"Now Ms Gordon, like I've said your sprain was not serious, but for it to properly heal you're going to have to keep off your feet for a few weeks. So until you have made a full recovery, I just want you to sit here and relax. I'm here to take care of any of your needs." Barbara had been situated in Wayne Manor's posh parlor, plopped in a deliciously recliner in front of one of the largest televisions she had ever seen.

"Master Bruce seldom uses this room, he keeps it mostly for show. The life of a playboy is one of frivoulous luxury, and it wouldn't be a very convincing guise if he didn't live the cliche. Now then Ms Gordon, if you need anything, just anything, just ring this buzzer and I'll be there in a bustle"

"Aw Alfred, you sure know how to treat a girl." Barbara paused as a hunger pang tore through her stomach, emitting a loud groan that begged for to eat. She had almost forgotten how hungry she was."Erm, Alfred before you leave, would you mind making me something to eat? I seriously haven't eaten all day and I'm just starving right now"

"Certainly. And what can I get for you?"

"Well, I've been just craving a deep dish pepperoni pizza today. Do you think you could whip me up one?"

"Absolutely. Anything you desire."

"Oh, and do you think you could make me some hot wings? I'm really hungry. Oh and do you think you can make me some ribs as well? And maybe a few chili cheeseburgers! Oh and maybe some cookie dough ice cream, that just sounds heavenly" Barbara salivated at the thought of so much delicious food. She wanted a pig-out and by god she was going to have one, she had already made the decision that tonight was going to be about one thing. Stuffing herself to the gills.

"Very well, Ms Gordon. I'll have your dinner out as quickly as possible."

**************************************************************************** ****************************************

Barabra's meal had taken nearly 2 hours to cook, but dinner was finally served. Babs had spent the last few hours virtually motionless, lazily watching TV in an attempt to curb her hunger pangs. When the dinner carts had finally begun being rolled into the master living room, she nearly squealed in delight. She was starving, and god damn it she needed to eat! The first course to be served to her was the deep dish pizza she had been craving all night, she had been craving it so deeply in fact, that when Alfred brought it over to her, she ripped it from his hands, just so she could dig in faster.

She took her first bite, savoring the taste as best she could, before finally inhaling the greasy treat in a matter of mere seconds. The rest of her meal fell almost as quickly. She greedily stripped the wings and ribs of their flesh, not even caring that her face and fingers were covered with the delicious sauce. When she finally came to the burgers, she was absolutely thrilled to find that her plate was just filled with the scrumptous burgers. Almost 11 total just crowding the plate, Alfred must have known that she would devour the rest of her meal, and had made her a little extra. But, the sheer amount of burgers weren't enough to slow Barbara down, taking a burger in each hand and cramming them into her face as quickly as she could. It took only a few minutes for those burgers to find themselves disappear down her widening maw, the chili finding it's way onto her sweater and jeans, but she didn't care. The food stupor had already taken complete control of her. Barbara's stomach groaned in protest, it's capacity having already been filled several times over, but she still had one more obstacle to conqueror. Dessert. Unlike the rest of her meal, Barbara decided that she would rather savor her ice cream, rather than just inhaling it. Spoonful after spoonful of the ice cream found it's way to her mouth, her stomach screaming for her to stop at every step of the way, but she prevailed, and before long the sundae had met the same fate as the rest of her feast.

"Ughhhhh..." was the only word that could come to mind. Her stuffed belly had swollen to that of a pregnant woman, still firm from the feast it had just undergone. Her stomach moaned and groaned as she finally released it from it's denim cage, her swelled stomach sighing in relief. Barbara's feeding frenzy had left her in a complete stupor, she had not even noticed that Alfred had seen the entire ordeal.

"My Goodness Ms Gordon, I've never seen such a display of gluttony..." Alfred muttered, as he was slightly disgusted by the whole affair.

Barbara just craned her neck towards Alfred, let out an enormous belch, and quickly drifted off into her food induced coma.
11111.title: Barbara gets comfortable...and hungry

choices: Barbara finishes her donuts
Barbara finishes off half of the donuts before getting stuffed
111111.content:
Barbara had fallen into a deep last night after her pig out and had slept well. It was the best night's sleep she had gotten in awhile. She moaned softly as she slowly opened her eyes after feeling the sunlight him. She glanced over at the clock and saw that it was 10am. It was then that she noticed that she wasn't in her home but then quickly remembered that she was staying at Wayne Manor while she recovered from her leg injury. All off a sudden she heard her stomach grumble loudly and she felt very hungry. Well since I am recoopering from an injury I think I deserve a big breakfast. I need to recover after all she reasoned and reached over to the buzzer, ringing it.

"Yes Miss Gordon?" Alfred replied. "Could you bring me a plate of chocolate chip pancakes with butter and maple syrup, a bowl of cinnamon toast crunch, a box of donuts, and a glass of milk and orange juice please?" Barbara requested sweetly. She had seen how disgusted Alfred was after seeing her pig out last night so she figured it wouldn't be a bad idea to lay on the sweetness when she asked him for more food today. "Of course, it will be right up Miss" Alfred replied. Barbara was relieved that Alfred wasn't still upset about last night.

While Afred had been disgusted by Barbara's pig out last night, he was glad to finally have someone in the house who would eat what he prepared them. So for that reason he was not going to complain or make a big deal about Barbara making a pig of herself. After preparing her food and drinks, he placed them on a tray, and carried them up to her. "Thank you Alfred" Barbara replied sweetly with her best smile as she slowly sat up in bed, leaning against her pillow. Alfred sat the tray down on her lap. "Bon Appetite and call me if you need anything else" Alfred said before leaving to attend to other duties around the house.

"Thank you Alfred, I will" Barbara called back to Alfred's retreating figure. All the food in front of her looked so good that she didn't know which to start with. She finally decided on the pancakes since they were warm. She quickly cut herself a big bite and took a bite. "Mm, so good" she moaned softly before helping herself to another bite, and another. The pancakes were so good that she could not stop eating them until she had eaten them all. To wash them down she took a couple sips of her orange juice. She next decided to have her milk. She poured the separate milk Alfread had left for her cereal into the bowl and quickly ate her cereal. She had always loved cereal. She was a big cereal girl. She then washed the cereal down with the rest of her orange juice.

Barbara was pleasantly surprised with the big box of donuts Alfred had left for her. She was not sure she would be able to eat the whole box now but decided to just eat as much as she could now and save the rest for later. She opened the box, pulled out the first donut, and took a bite. "Mm, so good" she moaned softly before taking another bite and another until she had finished it. Already hungry for more, she grabbed a second donut and quickly consumed it. Starting to feel a little thristy again, she picked up her glass of milk and took a couple of sips. She then grabbed another donut and quickly began to eat it. She had always loved donuts. They were always so sweet and tasty. She had never allowed herself to really indulge in them before but she figured that now would be the time to since she was injured. After she finished third donut, she quickly ate a fourth before washing them both down with a couple more sips of her milk. She then began to repeat this process of having two donuts and then washing them with a couples sips of milk over and over again.
111111.title: The next morning Barbara is suddenly hungry again

choices: Later that day...
A few weeks later, Barbara's fully recovered—and sporting quite the potbelly!
1111111.content:
"Mmm..." Barbara moaned, sucking the last of the sugar and frosting off of her fingers. Grabbing her glass of milk, Barbara tilted the glass into her mouth and downed the last sips of her milk, smacking her lips in satisfaction.

At that moment, the button of her jeans burst off, flying a few inches away from her seat. Barbara's belly burgeoned out, unzipping her jeans to accommodate its larger size.

"Oh!" she exclaimed, placing a hand on her belly. "Seems like I ate a bit too much, huh?" she said, rubbing the overstuffed orb soothingly. Can't say it wasn't worth it, though... Barbara mused to herself. She burped softly, using her other hand to cover her mouth. Barbara lifted up her sweater a bit to expose her belly, then proceeded to massage her massive food baby.

"Is everything alright, Ms. Gordon?" Alfred's voice called out from behind the door, startling Barbara. "I heard something fall."

"Yeah, Alfred, everything's fine. I just... dropped a spoon, that's all!" Barbara replied.

"... Alright, Ms. Gordon." Barbara heard Alfred's footsteps as he left the hallway.

"... Phew," Barbara gasped, continuing to massage her stuffed stomach. "I really shouldn't be eating like this, or it won't just be my jeans that I don't fit into."
1111111.title: Barbara finishes her donuts

choices: Barbara has a light meal—she needs to watch her figure, after all.
Barbara has a large meal—screw it, she's on break. She can fatten up a bit.
11111111.content:
Barbara turned up the volume of the TV. For the entirety of the day, Barbara had done little more than lounge around and stuff herself. Her breakfast was large enough, but compounded with a lunch of—not one, not two—THREE large pizzas, Barbara had made a bit of a glutton out of herself.

The sun was setting when Barbara finished all 10 episodes of Master of None. She rather enjoyed sitting around doing nothing, but she longed to go back out on the streets of Gotham.

Can't really go anywhere with this leg, though... she mused to herself.

Barbara was about to find another show to binge-watch when her stomach grumbled noisily. She looked down at it and placed a hand on it. It was still a bit bloated from her earlier meals, but Barbara knew that it wasn't the only reason it was so big.

Tim was right. I have put on a few, Barbara admitted to herself.

In the weeks before her injury, there really had not been that much activity in Gotham. Which was good for Barbara's academics, as it allowed her to catch up on her coursework before finals. However, as far as keeping her waistline trim, there was a little left to be desired. While she normally would cook her own meals, late-night study sessions meant that Barbara would end up skipping meals and ordering fast food more often than she normally would. By the time finals were over, the results were a slightly slower metabolism, a soft layer of belly pudge, and a very tired Barbara.

Barbara's stomach growled again, demanding to be fed.

It is almost dinner time, Barbara thought to herself. And I am hungry. I should get something to eat.

Barbara called Alfred.

"Hungry, Ms. Gordon?" Alfred asked, teasing the young redhead lightly. "What can I get for you."

"Barbara thought for a bit. "Well..."
11111111.title: Later that day...

choices: Barbara decides to rest a bit more.
Meet the newer, bulgier Batgirl!
Something else.
1112.content:
Barbara adjusted herself in her seat, reaching over for a slice of pizza.

It had been two weeks since Barbara sprained her ankle. Truth be told, she had been feeling better for a few days now, but the streets of Gotham were surprisingly inactive these days. Besides, Batman did owe her a day off.

With not much to do, Barbara spent most of her recovery time eating and lounging around her home. She gained an affinity for a nearby pizza parlor, and her waistline was beginning to show it. And really, why wouldn't it? She was ordering pizza a lot more often than she really should have, even ordering pizza for all of her meals at one point. But with nowhere for the calories to be used, it would be logical for her fat mass to increase a total of 10 pounds. Most of it went to her belly and waist, but it wasn't that noticeable to Barbara.

Barbara felt a great pressure on her midriff and unbuttoned her jeans. From behind her shirt emerged a distended and pudgier stomach. Barbara examined it curiously.

I can work it off, she thought, absent-mindedly eating another slice. She returned her attention to Eat, Pray, Love—the movie that she was watching.
1112.title: A Pizza or Four Overboard.

choices: Alfred at the door with her pizza
A call coming through on her cellphone
11121.content:
Another few days went by since Barbra’s little inspection in regards to her new pudgy midsection, and those days were spent doing three main things; eating, watching TV, and resting.

Alfred Pennyworth, Bruce Wayne’s always loyal butler, walked toward the room Ms. Gordon took in while she heals her broken bones; and upon reaching the door, she could hear Barbra laughing, the shuffling of a pizza box, and to the englishman’s slight disgust, a slightly loud belch.

Putting the noises behind him, he knocked on the door. He heard the TV go mute a second later.

“Yes?” Barbra said from the door.

“It’s me. Ms. Gordon. I just wanted to ask what you wanted for dinner, given that pizza hasn’t filled you.”

“Oh, no I’m starving.” Barbra responded, in a slightly dramatic tone. “But I don’t want to put you through any trouble; think you could order another….er, make it two large pepperoni pizzas.”

A slight look of shock came across the butlers face for two reasons: 1. Ms. Gordon must know how unhealthy this is, what it will do to her later on. And 2. How is she not full yet?

“Err, of course, Ms. Gordon. I’ll be right on it.”

“Thanks.” Barbra replied kindly.

After the englishman walked away, Barbra turned her TV volume back up just in time for the news. She was resting in her queen sized bed that she rarely left while laid up (half because of her leg; the other half simply because of laziness) and was clad in her favorite purple PJs which “ironically” had Bats on them (She grew to have a fondness for the animals; as long as they weren’t half man). Despite just requesting her dinner, she had a bag of chips resting comfortably on her side, her slightly wider side.

All the eating and lazing around continued to add up on her body, mostly in her belly area; which was now poking through her PJs, revealing her snow white skin and tiny innie belly button. Beyond that, her face and cheeks had gotten slightly plumper (not to the point where her cowl would fit uncomfortably tight, but still plumper) and her breasts and butt were ever so slightly expanded. All together, since she was laid up, she must’ve gained at least 25 pounds.

“Man. This is the life.” Barbra moaned as she absent mind-idly stared at the TV, which seemed to be focusing on an annual singing contest, and the current first place contender, a man clad in purple with odd looking goggles and orange, bushy hair. “Yummy food, comfy bed; no school, and the freedom to be lazy without Bruce tiring me out.” She continued shoving more chips in her gaping mouth, resting her hands behind her head giggling.

it was during a commercial when Barbra’s eyes moved down to her slightly protruding stomach. She knew she had put on a few, but she was slightly taken aback by the size of her gut.

“I wish junk food didn’t make you fat.” She said placing a hand on her stomach, beginning to rub it in a small circle, “If that were the case, then I’d be a selfish pig forever.” She continued toe rub her little belly, causing her to giggle over how ticklish her midsection was and oddly enough…how good it felt.

“Then again-“ she thought, “this feels…kinda nice. I mean, my skin is as soft as a babies, minus some cuts and sores from crime fighting, and a layer of chub makes it feel….sooooo goooood.” She hit a sweet spot of pleasure on her belly, now only rubbing in that area as her head fell back on her pillow, slight drool coming from her mouth. She originally intended to work off the weight she was gaining, but now, she thought she could keep a few pounds.

For the next few minutes, she happily played with her belly, rubbing it, shaking it, jiggling it, all making her feel so good; she even began to blush as she lifted her shirt slightly to continue her belly play.

Three more minutes went by, when her playtime was interrupted by…
11121.title: A few days later.

choices: An endless buffet
Dick Grayson reacting to her weight gain
111211.content:
“Ms. Gordon? Are you awake? Your pizza has arrived.”

Barbra immediately put her shirt back down and her blush intensified by the sudden voice at her door. “Thank God he’s a gentlemen, or else he might have walked in on me.” She thought.

Her mind then quickly travelled to the food Alfred had. “Yes, Yes! Come in!” She said trying to hide her excitement and hunger.

The butler opened the door, holding the pizza boxes like a platter neatly and well-balanced, walking over and setting them on the bed next to Barbra. Alfred was always good at hiding his looks of digest or fear over the years of taking care of Bruce and three generations of Robin’s, but it took all his might not to cringe at Barbra.

While it wasn’t a lot of weight, it was definitely noticeable, mostly in the young girls belly, which was ever so slightly peeking through her PJs. He knows that if she keeps eating like this, she’ll slow down and get tiered too easily, a dangerous thing for someone with her “job”. Not to mention no doubt being mocked by her peers because of her weight.

“Let me know if there’s anything else you want.” Alfred said beginning to walk out.

“Um, actually one quick thing.” Barbra said quickly. Alfred turned his head to her.

“Could you, uh, lock the door on your way out? I’ll be heading to bed soon so, just don’t want to make you do the trip later.” She said smiling shyly.

Alfred smiled back calmly. “Of course, goodnight Ms. Gordon.” Alfred said locking up and walking out.

“Good night, Alfred.”

Once the door was shut and Barbra was sure Alfred was gone. She proceeded to lift her shirt back up, revealing her pale pudge once again, before staring at her pizzas in awe and excitement.

“ Time for a good meal.” She said rubbing her belly and opening the box; the smell hit her nose and she smiled wider. “Smells delicious.” She thought.

Barbra grabbed a plate Alfred brought in with the boxes and grabbed a slice, laying it in her lap as she went back to her TV, turning on a cooking show, which only made her hungrier. She then grabbed the pizza slice in her hands and began to munch on it, groaning in delight. “Yummy.” She said between bites.

The first slice was gone in 40 seconds, and a new slice took its place. Barbra felt the soft dough, the gooy cheese, and the tender pepperoni move through her tounge, down her throat and in her gut, which she was still rubbing slowly. Every bite was followed by a groan in delight, it sounded as if Barbra hadn’t eaten in days, when in reality she last ate ten minutes ago. But that didn’t stop her from eating a box and a half of pizza!

After shoving the last bit of her last slice, she put her other hand on her stomach, which was now protruding farther than it ever has before.

“ooooohhhhh.” Barbra moaned her head slowly moving to the side, her eyeslids drooping, cheese covering the area around her lips. “*Hic!* So much….*Hic* pizza……..So…*Hic* full.” She continued pressing her fingertips against her belly, which was no less soft and jiggly than before.

“I’m such…..a pig.” She groaned slowly lifting her head upwards to get a good look at the damage. Her belly was resting on her upper legs, noticeably larger and emitting slight groans and gurgles. Despite the pain she was in, she couldn’t stop touching and rubbing it and noticing it still felt good. In fact, it felt much better when full. She couldn’t stop the smile on her face and warm feeling inside her. Why did she feel like this?

“Wow….this is so….weird….but, I kinda like it. I mean, what is it about having a belly that’s full that feels SO GOOD!” She said jiggling it as hard as she could, letting her belly bounce all over the place.

“Ya know what? Who cares! It feels good, and I like it!” She said lifting her shirt up to her chest and continuing to play with her belly like a child with play dough. She couldn’t believe how fun being a little chubby was and how fulfilling it is. Being able to eat as she pleased and stuffing herself until she was ready to pop was the best feeling she ever felt, and she wasn’t about to stop eating if this was what resulted from it.

She continued to play with her belly until she fell asleep, happy and full and hands on her belly, which was digesting the food into fat, spreading a thick layer of chub through her body and weighing her down further.

She continued to sleep, and started to dream about…
111211.title: Alfred at the door with her pizza

choices: The next day...
The next week...
1112111.content:
Batgirl was on a grassy hill. On this hill there was a tree, and underneath the tree was a table. Batgirl took off her cowl, revealing Barbara Gordon's face, and walked towards the table. Barbara felt her flat, toned stomach grumble hungrily. She pulled up a chair and sat down. Before her was a hamburger. Barbara picked it up and quickly ate it. She leaned back in her chair, stuffed.

"Man... I wish I could eat some more," she said aloud, cradling her stomach. "But I'm so STUFFED." On the table appeared cake. A delicious, double-chocolate layer cake.

"Well... Who am I to say no to dessert?" Barbara reasoned. She tucked in, not even bothering to cut out a slice and just eating the cake itself. Soon enough, she was done, and her belly was quite bloated. "Man.... That hit the spot... Still wish I had room for more, though."

Barbara noticed that the table was loaded with all kinds of food. Pizzas, burgers, ice cream, pies, donuts—all of Barbara's favorites, right before her.

"Well... It'd be a shame to have all of this food go to waste," Barbara mused. She pulled up a box of donuts and dug in, finishing off each glazed confectionary with gusto. Barbara felt a great pressure on her midriff.

Barbara unbuckled her utility belt. "Don't want you bursting on me, now." Setting it down beside her, Barbara clasped her hands together and resumed her feast, pulling up a large pizza.

"Oh this is going to be fun," she said before devouring the pizza. Barbara felt her belly tighten, expand, then soften and shrink. Her legs became a tad thicker, her hips a little wider, her bosom a bit fuller, her derriere a bit softer. Her costume expanded to fit her growth.

"Man, this is really fattening," Barbara observed, jiggling her belly. "But I don't care—I LOVE IT!" And with that, Barbara dove in, inhaling plate after plate of food and adding pound after pound to her frame. She went from 126 pounds to 146 after a few plates. By the time she reached 160 pounds, Barbara was making her way through a tub of ice cream.

"I could do this all day," she said. "I really could. Now let's see if I can get to 180..."

***

Alfred quietly unlocked the door. It was midnight, and Ms. Gordon's room had been quiet for a few hours, meaning that she had fallen asleep. And that meant that there time to clean up the food scraps Ms. Gordon had left behind.

Alfred walked in and picked up the empty pizza boxes. There were many, quite a few more than he would have thought. There was a slight disgust that he felt when picked up the boxes. He knew Barbara had gained weight, but the sheer gluttony involved... Alfred shook his head.

Before he left the room, Alfred heard a moan from behind. He turned to see Barbara reposition herself in bed. Her hands rested on her newly developed potbelly, which she rubbed in contentment. But the most interesting thing about it was the smile she had on her face. More than anyone else in the Bat-Family (aside from maybe Dick), Barbara was the one who had suffered the most and had come out the happiest. It was an admirable quality that even Superman respected. And while many in Barbara's position would be disappointed or saddened by a widening waistline, Barbara seemed... Content. Happy, even.

Suddenly, all traces of disgust vanished from Alfred's mind. Perhaps her job would be a bit more difficult. Perhaps she would have to deal with jeers and insults. But if anyone could conquer those challenges with a smile on her face, it was Barbara Gordon.
1112111.title: An endless buffet

choices: Supergirl
Dick Grayson
11121111.content:
*RING,RING,RING,RING*

“Ugh”. Barbra groaned as she clenched her eyes and covered her ears, still desiring to sleep after her long night. But as the alarm drowned on, Barbra decided it was impossible for her to go to sleep now. She uncovered her blanket, sat up, and turned off the alarm on the clock on the side table, all before feeling…something soft resting on her upper legs, the young ginger smiled.

“Wow, you feel a lot softer now.” She said rubbing her belly, feeling the new fat shift around when her fingers pushed into her pudge; and sighing in a great sense of pleasure. “hehehe” She giggled reaching that pleasure center on her belly again.

As she had her fun, Barbra had one thought course through her mind, “How much do I weigh now?” She knew the obvious side effect to this gluttony was weight gain, and being the slightly OCD, little geek she was, Barbra wanted a number to work of off. She knew before all this she was 125 pounds.

“Maybe I’ll check…after breakfast.” She said grinning like she had a shot of Joker Gas.

She then grabbed the main service phone in Wayne manor, a direct hot line to Alfred, “Bet there’s one of these in the bat cave” Barbra thought as she picked up the phone.

“Alfred? You there?”

“Would I be anywhere else, Ms. Gordon?” Came the voice of the Englishman. “I’m sure your calling for breakfast?”

“Yup, and I’m feeling like…cereal and bacon…mmmm, maybe some juice on the side.”

“Now that’s too simple for me, Mrs. Gordon; I’ll add pancakes on top of it, given your sudden appetite.” The Butler said smiling slightly.

Barbra meanwhile, had her eyes wide in wonder, mouth drooling in hunger, and free hand on her belly. “Yes please! Thanks Alfred.” She said excitedly. “Oh, and thanks for cleaning up for me last night.” She said looking around her clean bedroom.

“Anything for a guest, Ms. Gordon.” Alfred said hanging up, and readying the baking pan.

Barbra licked her lips and rubbed her belly in excitement for her coming breakfast. She could practically feel the taste of pancakes running through her taste buds and into her gut.

Her food filled daydream was interrupted by her cell phone ring. Barbra reached over and grabbed the phone, seeing that it was…
11121111.title: The next day...

choices: Barbra finishes her breakfast, and attempts to wiegh herself.
Barbra can't finish her breakfast, and deals with a bad tummy ache.
111211111.content:
“Hey there, Bat-bud.” Came the friendly voice of Kara Kent (or Zor-el if you want to go for her alien heritage) A.K.A Supergirl over Barbra’s cellphone. “How you feeling?”

“My leg’s on its road to recovery, it’s a little weird and tiresome to walk on it, though. Not to mention it’s taking a lot longer to heal than it should.” Barbra spoke to her friend as she did wonder why her healing process was taking so long.

“I bet it’s taking a while cause you haven’t relaxed since you got hurt, right? Never letting anything keep you down like Bruce?”

“Oh, god no.” Barbra snorted at the possibility she’d be as crucial about her little ‘side-job’ as Bruce. “Quite the opposite really, I’ve been taking this as both a healing process and a full fledged vacation at Wayne Manor.”

“Well lucky you.” Supergirl smirk almost carried over the phone to the chubby ginger as she giggled. “In fact, I might even say Ive…put on a few.” Barbra said trying her hardest not to sound as happy as she was about it as she looked down and rubbed her chub.

“So you’re too relaxed then.” Kara said slightly confused, cocking an eyebrow. “And you don’t sound too upset considering ow hard it must be for you to stay the shape you’ve been.”

“I guess I’m just going to enjoy this relaxation and all its effects and worry about the problems after I’m up and going again.” Barbra said rubbing her pale pudge.

“If you think that’s the best idea.” Kara said. “To me, that honestly sounds like me taking a break in a kryptonite based hot tub and saying I’ll deal with the kryptonite stuff afterwards.”

“Don’t worry, Kara, I got this all figured out, I even got a plan B now that I think about it.”

Suddenly, Barbra was interrupted by a knock at her door, she grinned like a Cheshire cat. “Sorry, Kar, my breakfast is here. Talk to ya later.” Barbra said taking her phone from her shoulder to her hand.

“Feel better, Babs.” Kara said, hanging up.

“If I didn’t know any better.” Kara said to herself. “I’d think she’s actually enjoying the idea of gaining weight.”

“Your breakfast, Ms. Gordon. Fit for a queen.”

“Yaaay!” Barbra squealed as her foot and a half stack of pancakes, cereal, and orange juice was placed at her lap. “Thank you, Alfred. Your so kind.”

Alfred nodded before beginning to leave. “Enjoy.” He said softly, shutting the door.
Barbra immediately started digging into her breakfast, moaning as the syrupy, buttery, fluffy goodness filled her taste-buds. “Maybe Plan B should be my Plan A instead:” Barbra thought. “Give up the superhero gig and eat for a living.” She continued rubbing her belly with one hand and nabbing another pancake with her fork.

“I think I’ve got what it takes to be a food critic.” She said out loud, smiling a syrupy grin.
111211111.title: Supergirl's Call

111211112.content:
"And how's my favorite Masked Maiden doing today?" asked a charming voice that made Barbara's heart skip a beat.

"Hey, hunk wonder," she answered, a warm smile spreading across her face. "Where've you been?"

"Oh, you know how it is. Some idiot decides to attack a traveling circus, you gotta leave town for a bit and make sure they don't kill anyone. Just the usual brand of crazy."

Barbara laughed. "Yeah, you're telling me."

"I heard about your accident. You doing okay?"

"Oh, yeah, totally. Although..."

"... Although what?" Dick asked, quizzical.

Barbara hesitated. She was about to tell Dick about her recent weight gain, but did she really want him to know that? She might like it, sure, but there was no guarantee that Dick would feel the same way.

"... Although I might've put on a teensy bit of weight," Barbara said.

Dick chuckled. "I'm not surprised. You'll take any excuse to pig out. And since you haven't really been on your feet a whole lot..."

"Hey!" Barbara chided him teasingly. "I'm allowed to fatten up a bit! I'm in holiday!"

"Heh. Yeah, I guess. Besides—you probably look great."

Barbara blushed. "You should drop by sometime."

"I'll see what I can do. Anyway, I gotta go. Stay out of trouble!"

"Right back at'ya, hunk wonder. Bye." And with that, Barbara hung up.

11121112.content:
“Ooh, man.” Barbra Gordon huffed as she hobbled her still casted foot down the extravagant halls of Wayne Manor on crutches. Her recovery has been even slower than she could have imagined, and only just now has she been able to get up and around a little bit more without waddling like The Penguin. But now that was she was up, after so much time sitting and eating without much movement, Barbra’s new weight was showing it’s effects.

After all this time, Barbra had ballooned up to about 155 pounds, a thirty pound weight gain in inly a few weeks (a feat she secretly congratulated herself on last night with a “belly party” for herself), and now, those pounds put her to the text as she made her way to the bathroom. Sweating a river, heaving and huffing, and constant breaking for breaths, one would think Barbra would now see this weight gain idea as backfiring, but…

“This is….so hard.” She thought to herself during another breathe break. “But it…actually feels oddly good. All the sweating, that tired feeling, the knowledge that my awesome belly is doing this, meaning it’s getting bigger and heavier.” She was actually shaking at her own inner monologue turning her on, wanting nothing more to lay back down in her bed and enjoy her unfit body, but she really had to do her business before calling in a snack form Alfred.

“Come on, Barb.” She said slowly and softly. “You can do this, you fat pig.” She smiled at her self-mocking as she gripped her crutches and set off to the bathroom, her belly bouncing freely in her tight PJ's.
11121112.title: Unhealthy & Happy

choices: She makes short work of her brunch.

111211121.content:
Having finally freshened up, Barbara hobbled back to her room as fast as her crutches could carry her, and practically jumped onto her bed when she did. She giggled at the sensation of her big belly jiggling with the force of impact, before giving it a good, wobble-inducing smack.

"You just can't stop jiggling, can you?" she taunted herself, an electric shiver coursing through her spine with every word. She kneaded her belly in circles. "Not with all this soft, gluttonous, bulging fat." Barbara lifted up her shirt and began to rub her belly--slowly, methodically, feeling every ounce of newly grown pudge weighing down and rounding out her midriff. Her hands made her way to that pleasure spot she'd grown so fond of since gaining weight, and soon she was in absolute bliss.

"Ohhh, man," she moaned, panting. "That was intense." She laid there for a bit, lazily running her hand down her thick tummy. Occasionally, she'd give it a good wiggle or a jiggle, but at the moment, she was waiting for her personal favorite method of belly play--

"Ms. Gordon!"

--stuffing herself to the brim with rich, delicious food.

"It's open!" she called back.

She sat up in her bed and pulled her shirt down to cover her belly (a sliver of which bulged out nevertheless) just as Alfred wheeled in a cart of food. She clapped in delight as he entered, getting a good whiff of all the delicious aromas now wafting through her room--pancakes and pizza and so many snacks, all for Barbara and her burgeoning belly.

"Brunch, Ms. Gordon, as requested," said Alfred. "I've taken the liberty of also including a few treats I know you'll enjoy."

"You sure know how to treat a girl, Alfred," Barbara purred.

The kindly butler smiled. He brought the cart closer to her bed and handed Barbara a tray with a plate of pancakes.

"I'll leave you to it, then. Ring if you need anything." And with that, Alfred made his exit, leaving Barbara, as he had so often before, alone with her meal.

12.title: Supergirl's frantic dash

choices: The orange Kryptonite causes Supergirl to start slowly gaining weight.
The orange Kryptonite makes all the females around her gain weight.
The orange Kryptonite does something else completely.
121.content:
"Luthor! When will you ever learn!" Supergirl shouted as she arrived on the scene taking in the carnage and destruction sprawled out over the small industrial park Lex was currently tearing through. Lex was ripping through the chunks of wall inside one of the rounded buildings. Piping and concrete were being thrown around as if they were nothing. Behind the building Lex was currently uprooting bit by bit, was a row of devastated, and now twisted remains of buildings clearly showcasing his destructive path. Supergirl gasped and quickly maneuvered herself out of the way a large chunk of concrete spiraling quickly at her. She sighed at the close one and regained her focus on the emerald suited Lex getting into a fighting stance after that close one. "This ends now!"

Supergirl used her heat vision to burn through some pipes located directly behind Lex, which once hit, burst creating a small series of explosions behind the armor-clad villain. It momentarily distracted him, and shifted his balance causing him to break his stance, which was just the distraction Supergirl was hoping for. With her arms out she sped downward creating a path heading straight for Luthor who didn't see what was coming. Tackling him with a force that slammed him through the ground several meters, she floated backwards to regain her momentum and to gather a better visual of her surroundings. Lex was sprawled out in the crated that the impact of Supergirl's heroic tackle had left and was slowly easing himself up.

Seeing the villainous, bald billionaire that had caused her and Clark so much trouble in the past, start to rise to continue the fight, Supergirl was wise off to know her work wasn't done yet. "Luthor, whatever it is you're doing it stops now."

Luthor smirked at the blonde's persistence, "Yes, and you're threatening impositions would indeed be more imposing if Superman were here to have your back. You...heh, you I can handle." Luthor was now back in a standing position and cracked his knuckles, which were also armored up and covered in the metal that adorned the rest of his suit. Pulling his hands back revealed pneumatic hisses as small metallic plates started to shift around his knuckles revealing a dastardly version of brass knuckles, only Luthor's came equipped with eight different pieces of molded Kryptonite, one for each knuckle. Supergirl's eyes widened as she saw the various pieces of alien rock decorating Lex's fists. All of a sudden the tables had shifted and she realized she was going to be in for one of the toughest fights of her life. She couldn't give up though, it just wasn't in her to tuck and run when up against a larger, stronger, and more dangerous foe.

Supergirl grunted and screamed out as she flew downward as fast as could at Lex, all while rearing her fist back to get ready to land a heavy blow to Lex's exposed face. What Supergirl wasn't expecting was Lex was rearing back to land an equally devastating hit. The two were seconds away from impact and both simultaneously let loose with their swings. Supergirl landed her hit full impact into Lex practically breaking his jaw, she could feel the shattering of his jaw and even heard the fractures with her super hearing, but she wasn't quick enough to dodge or defer Lex's blow. His powerful blow to her gut managed to send her reeling backwards into one of the walls Luthor had yet demolished. Supergirl's momentum from Lex's swing was enough to the trick, however, and Supergirl was sent plowing through it leaving only a puff of smoke and rubble. Supergirl felt every bit of force from the punch and the painful throbbing in her stomach wasn't getting any better, most likely due to the green Kryptonite within such close proximity. She slowly stood to her feet, holding her pained midsection and looked at Lex who too was slowly rising to his feet, massaging his jaw. He began to laugh a slow and deep chuckle.

"You hit like a girl," he muffled, blood slowly starting to stream down his chin. Lex quickly cracked his chin and practically leaped at Supergirl, who at the moment wasn't expecting any quick movements from her enemy. She tried to move out of the way but Luthor was just too fast for her this time and pinned the lithe vixen to the ground. Luthor could say her writhing in pain from the green Kryptonite and knew she was going to be mostly powerless to what he was going to do next. He pulled back his right hand, complete with the practical rainbow display of Kryptonite and punched the helpless superhero in her rock hard stomach as hard as he possibly could.

"They say hitting girls is somewhat of a faux pas..." Luthor reared back and slammed his fist into Supergirl's side once more, this time creating a piercing cracking sound. Lex pulled his hand back and examined the Kryptonite adorning his knuckles. It seemed like a piece of the orange Kryponite had shattered and was left sticking inside Supergirl's abdomen. He just shrugged it off, and prepared to strike the heroine once more, but not before finishing his rhetort. "...So I'm just going to have to pretend you're Superman and enjoy this."

"Then I guess you'll just have to settle for us." Luthor's attention was broken and he looked up to see who dared to speak to him like that. Zatanna and Black Canary were standing off to the distance poised and ready for battle.

"I don't usually enjoy beating women, but for you three...I think I can make an exception." Luthor said standing and shifting his focus from Supergirl to the female duo standing to his side.

"I'd like to see you try that. I'd like to see you TRY!" Canary's sentence ended with a loud scream which caused a huge surge of sonar energy to send Luthor flying backwards only to be hurled through another one of the remaining walls of the building the four of them occupied. With that last wall crumbling, a loud rumble and quake was sent through the building, which was losing the support it needed to remain standing. Zatanna looked at Canary signaling her over to Supergirl. Black Canary nodded and ran over and inched the nearly unconscious heroine over her shoulders. Zatanna floated over to where Lex had landed and looked down at the balding millionaire struggling to his feet. A few loose hoses and some steam momentarily blowing out of openings indicated his suit was starting to fail him. Zatanna smirked to herself seeing this.

"Ezeerf sxeL teeF!" The sorceress said as ice started forming around Luthor's feet holding him in place despite his struggling. "You wanted destruction Lex...you got it. Gnirb Eht Gnidliub Nwod!" The last remaining support keeping the broken and twisted building standing upright started buckling into itself. The entire area began furiously shaking and Luthor looked around helplessly knowing what was going to happen.

"You're just going to leave me here to die? Isn't that against the 'Superhero' way?" Lex asked hurriedly.

Zatanna started floating away backwards. "We both know you'll find a way to survive this. If and when you do we'll be waiting...if you're lucky you won't make it." Zatanna let out before disappearing from Lex's sight. All he could do was scream and thrash his arms around as the building came down upon him. The three heroines outside watched as the building fell and just stood there once all that was left was a huge pile of concrete, pipes, dirt, and a large cloud of dust encircling the area.

Supergirl sighed as she knew she was going to be okay. She looked down at her stomach which was starting to heal over now that she wasn't in the immediate presence of the green Kryptonite. The cuts and scrapes from the hits from Lex started sealing up, and unbeknown to her a sliver of the orange Kryptonite was now completely embedded in her stomach. Little did she know the effects that the orange Kryptonite would now have buried inside herself.
121.title: Supergirl squares off against Lex Luthor

choices: Unfortunately, the calories still count...

124.content:
"Help! Help! There's... there's too much chocolate!"

Now that was a mysterious call for help, all right. Kara's ears pricked up. It was still hard for her to pick out individual sentences sometimes out of the constant thunderous din...she usually just had to tune them all out. But ever since Siobhan had introduced her to the strange brown earth mineral "chocolate", she'd been in love. It must be the most delicious substance in the universe! How could anyone ever have too much of it?

It was a mystery, all right, and it's one that Kara intended to solve. She banked right, headed for the outskirts of the city, and swooped low over a crowd of people gather in a large, open area filled with strange smells and odd, colorful machines. Metropolis County Fair, read a banner near the entrance.

"What's going on?" she asked. "Is someone in danger?"

A boy clutching a huge stuffed Gorilla Grodd plushie in one arm pointed with the other. Supergirl turned to see what looked like a castle made out of brown clay. She looked closer. No--not clay. Ice cream. Another wonderful Earth substance. And by the look of it, chocolate ice cream.

"You can go on a tour," the boy said, "but I think it melted or something and there's people trapped in there--"

Supergirl launched herself into action, trying to activate her x-ray vision. Hold on--almost got--there we go! Sure enough, five people were trapped near the edge of the structure, with the walls oozing in on them. Eventually, a way to the outside would open, but they would be buried under ice cream before that happened--she had to get them out of there, now.

And then a wicked little thought struck her.

She'd always been kind of curious about how much she could eat now. She didn't need to eat at all anymore, or breathe, or sleep unless she really wore herself out. She didn't seem to have many physical limits at all. She could probably eat anything she wanted, but you had to exchange paper for food on this planet, and she was a little short on paper, so she'd never really tried. Well, what better chance than now? That ice cream castle was coming down anyway, and it's not like she'd get in trouble for eating it if she saved lives in the process.

At lightning speed, she whipped through the castle, burying herself in the walls and burrowing through, slurping down the delicious frozen dairy goodness by the gallon. It took her less than five seconds to gulp down the entire structure, countless tons of ice cream. She touched down next to the shocked, suddenly-freed tourists.

"Mmm," she said, licking her lips and patting her belly. She was pleasantly stuffed--that had taken less than a millisecond, at the rate she was going--but after a certain point, she just stopped feeling fuller. Her stomach was a little distended, but nothing to reflect the amazing amount of internal pressure it must be under.

She'd downed the castle so fast most people hadn't even seen what happened. As world spread, the crowed burst into applause, claps, and cheers.

"Thanks, Supergirl!" one of the tourists said, wiping a little sweat off of his brow. "Gee whiz, you're amazing!"

"Wish I could eat like that and look like you!" his wife added.

Kara smiled stickily.

13.content:
Wonder Woman lay in the lounge of the Justice League's moonbase, sighing to herself. She wished she could go off and help on a mission or something, but she was banned. She'd been cursed by some damned warlock, and now she had to wait three months before it would wear off. No one on the Justice League could figure out a way of removing the curse with one hundred per cent safety and Batman had refused to let anyone try, reasoning that it was safer to do without Wonder Woman on active duty for the next three months, rather than try a risky curse removal ritual and possibly kill her.

Doctor Fate could possibly have removed it, but he was off in another dimension for four months. Luckily for Diana, the curse was a relatively harmless one, and she would still be able to perform monitor duty. However, Batman did insist that she should stay in the moonbase for the duration, since the process of becoming obese could possibly leave her vulnerable. So here she was. Gorging on chocolate pudding, since she decided to take advantage of the fact that she was going to become obese soon anyway, whether she ate anything or not.

So she'd 'replicated' a gallon of chilled chocolate pudding and started eating it, lying on a couch in the lounge area, watching an American movie. She'd even replicated an ice-cream milkshake to complement the pudding.

133.content:
Diana felt her costume tighten around her midsection. Momentarily pausing the movie, the Amazing Amazon put her pudding off to the side and looked down at her belly.

While normally flat against her body, Diana's midsection had begun to pooch, creating a little bump against the red material of her costume. It wasn't much, but it was intriguing to Diana. Bloating wasn't something she had to deal with very often. Diana poked her belly. It was firm, filled with food, but she could detect a faint softness to it.

Diana rose from the couch and walked back to her quarters. She went into her closet and inspected her wardrobe.

I just got this costume, Diana thought to herself, referring to the navy, red, and gold armor she had recently received as a gift from Hephaestus after the Donna Troy incident. I don't want to ruin it yet. Picking out a pair of comfortable blue sweats, a white T-shirt, and a red jacket emblazoned with her logo, Diana wrapped the clothes up in her magic lasso. The clothes disappeared, having been absorbed into the lasso. Diana stepped away from her closet, raised her lasso over her head, and began to twirl. As she did so, her costume faded away, the clothes that her lasso absorbed taking their place. Soon, Diana had changed completely out of her Wonder Woman costume and into her civilian outfit.

"There we go. Now," Diana said, pulling the waistband of her sweats out in front of her, "you have room to grow." She patted her belly, which seemed to have softened up a bit in the intervening minutes.

Satisfied with her outfit, Diana returned to the lounge. She sat down on the couch, unpaused the movie, and placed the pudding in her lap, tucking in quietly and resuming her feast.

More chocolate pudding was calling Diana’s name,” time for some more pudding” Wonder Woman said as got up to get her some more chocolate pudding. As she walked her butt jiggled, she hadn’t noticed it yet. She had got back and sat down and started eating on her pudding......

1333.content:
"Honestly, Bruce, you should've just called me first," Zatanna said, teasing the Caped Crusader. "Doctor Fate is basically always busy."

Batman was silent, but Diana was able to see the faintest hint of a smile on his face.

Two days had passed since Diana had been cursed. Since then, Diana had done little more than sit around, watch monitors, watch TV, and eat. In conjunction with the fattening nature of the curse, this meant that Diana had gained about 7-10 pounds in the intervening time. It wasn't very noticeable, especially in the sweats that Diana was wearing. Her legs were a bit thicker, her hips were a bit wider, her derriere was a bit softer, her bosom was a bit fuller. Most of the added weight settled in a soft little paunch that was quickly on its way to becoming a big, round potbelly.

Zatanna Zatara, sorceress extraordinaire, had found out about Diana's condition and, after a bit of research, contacted Batman with the possibility of having found something that could at the very least ease Diana's predicament.

The three heroes were walking down the hall to a safe room on the JLA moonbase. Knowing that they would have to deal with threats and situations of a more supernatural variety with decent regularity, Batman, with the help of the Justice League's magic-based members, built a room that would allow the Justice League not only a safe zone against magical threats, but also potentially solve them. Diana's curse fell within those guidelines.

"Now," Zatanna said as she drew a magic circle on the floor beneath Diana in the safe room, "I can't promise that this will work. At the very least, it will depower the curse. If we're lucky, it'll completely remove it."

"Just do whatever you can," Diana said encouragingly. "Thank you for your help."

"Oh, my pleasure. Though I wish tall, dark, and brooding over there would've thought to call me earlier," Zatanna replied, winking.

"Just get it over with," Batman retorted. While his voice was quite gruff, both Diana and Zatanna could tell that he was trying to hide his amusement.

Zatanna smirked. "Ready?" she asked Diana, pulling out her magic wand.

Diana nodded. "I'm ready."
1333.title: Dr. Fate is still otherwise occupied, but Zatan...

choices: Zatanna and Diana go back for seconds.
One week later, Diana and Zatanna have eaten their way up a dress size.
13333.content:
"!anaiD morf esruc eht evomeR" Zatanna incanted. Magical energies lit up the safe room, illuminating the magic circle, Zatanna's hands and eyes, and Diana herself. The room reverberated with power, the colors shifting from red to purple to green to yellow. Batman was knocked off his feet as the ground beneath him shook.

Diana could hear Zatanna struggle to maintain the spell. It was incredibly powerful magic, given the fact that Zatanna had to recite the incantation completely in reverse.

Diana herself felt a strange warmth. A purple mist silhouette of Diana rose out of her body, swirling up and around to the middle of the circle before exploding away, knocking the two superheroines down. The lights went out, and the room and dark.

Batman stood up steadily. "Backup generator," he commanded. The lights turned on in the room.

Diana picked herself up off of the floor. Almost immediately, she noticed a change: her sweats were looser. Sure, she still had a bit of belly pooch and hadn't quite gotten her muscles definition back, but she was thinner.

"Ooh..." Zatanna groaned, sitting up slowly. "Did... Did it work?"

Diana beamed. "I think it did."

Zatanna sighed. "That's good." Shakily, she lifted herself off of the floor. "I am BEAT," she said, stretching a kink out of her back. "And kinda hungry, actually."

"We still need to make sure that it worked properly," Batman said.

"Can't it wait until after lunch?" Zatanna complained.

Diana looked at Batman. "It was quite an effort, Bruce. Besides, iI could go for a snack, myself."

Batman sighed. "Fine. But I still want to be sure." There was a beeping, and Batman pulled out a communicator. "I have to go. There's trouble in Gotham," Batman explained before leaving. "Make sure it worked."

Zatanna and Diana nodded happily. "Done," Zatanna said, although she and Diana both knew that they had no intention of coming back to go through Batman's tests. Without further delay, the two superheroines made their way to the mess hall.

"This is a lot tighter than I remember," Diana heard Zatanna whisper under her breath. Diana turned around to see the young enchantress fiddling around with a button on her vest.

Diana hadn't noticed it before, but Zatanna seemed to have put on some weight. It wasn't very noticeable, but her belly and waist seemed to be a bit thicker and softer, straining against the tight fabric of her costume.

Diana shrugged. Poor thing. Her stress eating must have made a comeback. I'll have to ask her about it later.

The two arrived at the mess hall and grabbed trays. Zatanna immediately started piling platefuls of food onto her tray. A couple of burgers, a large serving of fries, and a generous number of chocolate cake slices.

The spell must have taken a lot out of her, Diana thought pityingly, unconscious of just how much food she put on her own tray.

Zatanna and Diana found a table and sat down. Zatanna started devouring her food almost as soon as her tray hit the tabletop. She couldn't explain it, but she was REALLY hungry. She wanted food, and she wanted a lot of it. She felt her belly strain against the button of her vest. Zatanna paused in her meal.

"Dnapxe tsev," she said quietly. Her vest grew around her belly. With no other noticeable hindrances, Zatanna proceeded along with her feast.

Diana watched Zatanna while absentmindedly eating her own food.Poor thing, she thought sympathetically.

After a half-hour or so, the two superheroines were finished with their food. Zatanna lay back in her seat, soothingly nursing a food baby. Diana felt rather stuffed, herself. Her belly was rather bloated, though not quite as much as Zatanna's. Strangely, though, she didn't feel full. Physically, she was stuffed, but she wasn't satisfied. It was more as though her hunger was abated.

"Oh, man," Zatanna moaned. "I needed that."

"You deserved it," Diana said. "You put in a lot of hard work today."

Zatanna smiled. "Thanks, Diana. I can always count on you for not making me feel badly about eating like a cow."

"But of course, my friend," Diana replied.
13333.title: Zatanna depowers the curse, but she gets affect...

choices: Later that night, Diana is hungry again and goes to a buffet.
Diana returns home for the first time in weeks—and heads straight to the fridge.
133331.content:
The two superheroines sat in their seats for a few minutes. Eventually, Diana felt a craving for chocolate pudding. She stood up and grabbed her plate.

"I don't know about you," she said, "but I could go for some pudding."

Zatanna looked up from her food baby at Diana, then looked at the buffet line.

"I think I've got more room in the tank," she said, giving her belly a pat.

The two women made their way to the dessert table. Zatanna scooped a heaping serving of chocolate pudding onto her plate—an amount Diana doubled for herself. And what was supposed to only be a plate of pudding was soon joined by a few cookies, a slice of cake, and a bowl of ice cream. Diana was hungry, and she wanted to splurge a bit just this once. Zatanna, for her part, stuck to the pudding. She was hungry, sure, but the pudding was enough for her.

Upon returning to their table, Diana sat down and dug in.

The pudding was the first to go. Sweet, savory, and delectable—Diana finished it in minutes, dipping cookies in it along the way to enhance the experience. The cookies that she didn't eat with the pudding were used to scoop morsels of ice cream into her mouth and down to her gullet. When she ran out of cookies, she proceeded to demolish the rest of the ice cream with a spoon. She then moved on to the cake. The first slice was so good, she had to get another. And another. And another and another...

By the time she was done, Diana's belly had bloated out to about the same size it had been before Zatanna depowered the curse—if not bigger. Yet Diana didn't mind—she was too stuffed to care.

Zatanna, for her part, had stuck to her plate of pudding. While she was quite h hungry, she also needed to cut back on sweets—it seemed as though she was putting on weight.

"Ooh..." Diana moaned. "That was wonderful."

"Couldn't have said it better myself," said Zatanna. After a few minutes, Zatanna stood up.

"Well. I should probably get home. If I stay here any longer, I might clean out the buffet," Zatanna joked.

"Thank you again for all your help."

"It was my pleasure, Diana," Zatanna said, smiling. She waved. "Goodbye, Diana." And with an incantation of "emoh," Zatanna disappeared in a cloud of purple smoke.

Diana leaned back in her chair. I can probably go home now, too, she thought to herself. Her stomach grumbled, and she looked back at the dessert line.

... After I have some more cake, of course.

1411.content:
Oracle rubbed her stomach. She'd been gaining a little bit, sitting in her wheelchair, doing no more exercise than using a computer with a keyboard, mouse and voice recognition. She had been arranging ops all through these last four months, and she'd actually started to lose tone in her abs. Of course, she hadn't needed to keep in shape as much since becoming Oracle but Batman's training was hard to get out of your head. It was a very strong voice telling her to be ready for anything.

...Of course, he also said, make sure your enemy doesn't know what you are capable of. She knew being in a wheelchair would put her firmly in the 'not a threat' category for most of your average dumb mooks. But maybe being a little less toned would put her in the 'no threat whatsoever' category for a lot more criminals. Maybe chubby even - with a small potbelly, she would look like a simple computer nerd, with just a hint of 'cripple' as well.

Now, she'd need someway to compensate for being fat. Otherwise, there'd be no point in the gain. She had been offered cybernetics by Steel to fix her spinal injury and give her superpowered legs, so maybe that subtle kind of prosthetic was the answer here. A hidden last resort. On the other hand, Batman was one of the world's leading experts on magic, as well as everything else, and he specialised in rituals. Maybe he could teach more than he already had on the subject? Maybe magic was the answer.

On the other hand, in a world of Green Lanterns, Kryptonian DNA manipulation and other wonders, maybe there was an idea she hadn't considered yet.

145.content:
Gotham: Midnight

The Calculator. One of the world’s most intelligent criminals and one of the few who could ever hope to rival Oracle in computer expertise. One of the world's most intelligent men, and he's a complete wreck. Collapsed on the ground of his dark apartment, his thoughts had been completely hi-jacked by one singular thought, the one riddle he could not solve, the query that kept him up at night, that had left him a broken nervous man, “Who is Oracle?” The question had plagued his thoughts ever since she had locked him out of Luthor’s spy satellites, and continued to viciously consume his subconscious ever since. “I haven’t been able to focus in 2 years,” he whispered to himself, “You’re all I can ever think about, when I sleep all I can ever see is the green mask you hide behind... taunting me, laughing at me, mocking me…”

“I swear to God I will find out who you are Oracle, and when I do I swear I will…” he cut himself off. It had finally dawned on him the toll that his actions were taking on him Revelation struck, and he had finally accepted that he had lost this particular fight. Noah Kuttler slowly rose to his feet, and a devious smile spread across his face. “It seems I have been bested.” He had finally realized that the countless hours he had spent trying to uncover the identity of his archrival had been wasted, hours that he could have spent destroying her rather than revealing her. “I may not be able to figure out who you are or where you operate from, but I will destroy you. And not only will you die by my hand, but it will be in the most humiliating way fathomable. You will pay for what you've done to me... ” Kuttler's grin began to grow into a wide pitched smile as he erupted into a maniacal laughter, whilst the vast array of computers behind him slowly booted up, illuminating the pitch black room. “Time to get to work…”

1513121.content:
Who are you?

The voice resounded from everywhere and nowhere

Who are you?

The dark-haired woman opened her eyes. She was curled into a ball floating through an empty void, not quite substantial and not quite nonexistent.

Who are you?

The woman straightened herself out, and soon found herself standing on solid ground. Around her, millions of stars swarmed around her.

Who are you?

The woman found herself flooded with memories, each contradicting the other. She was a clay statue brought to life... No, she was an orphan rescued by... Who? She was a duplicate... No, a sister... She was a Titan... Teen Titan?

"I... I'm not sure."

You've lived quite a life, my child, the voice boomed. It seemed much kinder, now. Warmer.

"Am... Am I dead?"

Not if you do not wish it.

The woman was confused.

On another world, you have lived many a life with many a story. You were Diana of Themyscira, but you were also her sister. You were a Titan, but you spent most of your life as a Teen Titan. You were an orphan, but your mother still lived. You were all of these things, my child. And you could be so much more.

The woman felt herself shift. She was a young girl on Paradise Island. She was an orphan rescued by the Amazon Princess. She was a Titan Seed, destined to save the universe. She was a duplicate created to play with the Themysciran Queen's daughter. She was a friend. A lover. A mother. A hero. So many lives, so many stories...

But one name stuck with her through all of these lives:

"... Donna Troy."

It is good to see you again, my child.

"I've been here before?"

Ever since the first time your story was rewritten.

"What?"

Your universe has a habit of altering and changing its own nature. Its history, its continuity—everything about it. But every time it does, some souls are left behind, waiting to find a place in its new world. Yours is often one of them.

"So... I don't exist?"

Not yet. But you can, if you wish it. You can be whoever you want, my child. And you can take as long as you need—everything will be provided for you. But the question remains, my child—who is Donna Troy?

Donna thought for a minute. "I am..."

155331.content:
Gotham City, often regarded as the dark incarnation of Metropolis; is home to many of this world's villains.

From the notorious plights of the Penguin, the nearly spherical aristocrat with a strange bird fixation, the glamorous schemes of Maxie Zues, dilusional multi-million dollar CEO with a severe olympian complex, to the pyro-centric plundering of Posphorus, once simply an arsonist for hire turned monster.

It seemed that every Joe Sixpack had it out to either be Gotham's newest hero or it's aspiring worst threat. The sad part of it is that it takes a special kind of criminal mind, or a sociopath with enough money or gumption, to come to caliber with the likes of Two-Face, Zsasz, the Joker, ect.

However malevolent these so called "Glam Villains" of Gotham may be, most of them (with certain obvious exceptions) are still people; attempting to hold down a secret identity or a civilian life when not plotting their latest scheme. It just so happens that some of these villains keep within friendly quarters of eachother long enough to refrain from killing eachother...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------------
Harleen Quinzell, or better known to the Crime Underground as Harley Quinn, sat at one end of the booth, the tacky flourescent lighting flickered over her jester themed hood and irritated her greatly. She didn't have much tolerence for annoying buzzing unless it came from a joy buzzer

On the other side, there was Poison Ivy, street name Pamela Isely, stuffing her face like she hadn't eaten in weeks.

She wasn't bothered at all by Harley's whining, the stares she had acquired throughout the Zero Hour (a local bar set up for supervillains and their ilk), or the surely substantial bill that was sure to follow her feasting. All Ivy cared about right now was satiating her monsterous hunger.

"Gee Red, ya sure are packin' it away t'night..." Harley Quinn commented from her side of the table, "You skip breakfast?"

Poison Ivy let out the smallest, most ladylike burp she could muster. "Sorry Harley, I just can't seem to stop eating lately." the green skinned chloropath apologized awkwardly, "You can head back to my place if you want, wait for me there?"

The bubbly blonde shook her head, "Nah, you ain't hooked for cable, what's the point of goin' back to your hotel room if I can't catch up on Tiny Toons?"

Ivy shook her head, disrupting her leafy red locks, "You and your cartoons, Harl..." she mumbled through a forkful of lasagnia. A dribble of sauce fell on one of her green tinted breasts. Without hesitation, she wiped it off with a slender finger and plopped the remains in her mouth.

"You sure you're alright, Red?" Harley asked, watching the odd show that was sitting in front of her, "I mean, I don' think I've ever seen you eat this much before..."

Ivy blushed (if one could call turning a slightly darker shade of green blushing) "Of course I'm alright, I'm just a little hungry is all."

"Yeah, a little..." Harley parroted as she put a lithe chin in her palm, examining her floral friend's figure. While still a downright sexy member of the B-Man's Rouge's Gallery, Harley couldn't ignore that her redheaded friend seemed to be spread out a little. She couldn't see any pudge on Ivy, she just seemed to be getting... wider.

But then again, it may have just been Harley's imagination, being a homicidal clown-themed supervillain tended to give a girl a wild imagination.

Harleen stole one last look at Ivy, "Yeah... jus' my imagination..." she said quietly

15533111.content:
Harley sat on the apartment's couch, fiddling with some GameBoy that she had hocked from some kid during some heist some few odd days ago. "Yeah, stupid little-- Oh sweet!" she grunted as she repeatedly pressed the buttons. Never having owned many as a child, Harley had a natural tendency to explore the world of toys and electronics; not just for criminal purposes, they were a true hobby of the ex-psychiatrist nowadays. She was dressed and ready to go, her checkered jester suit form fitting as always and her clown makeup was applied neatly, domino mask in place; the only thing left to do was put on her hood and walk out the door. Of course she would have to wait on 'Red' to get ready.

Her innocent face squinched up in dissappointment, her pixilated avatar had just gotten attacked by some weird, floaty, sucky octopus. "Why I aughtta..." she mumbled, trying her best to get the beast from her suited friend's helmet. However, not officially knowing the controls, she was pretty much just lost in the dark. "Damn!" she whined, defiantly pushing the off switch

And just like that, Harley was bored again. Ivy hadn't gotten around to 'convincing' the Gotham Electric Company to taking a swing by her place; so she couldn't watch TV, get on the computer (not that she was technically allowed on a computer, as far as the law was concerned) or even plug up the blasted hair straightener, it'd give her something to do, after all.

Barely able to take it, the insane clown villain sprawled out on the couch, arm drooped lazilly over the couch's shoulder. And, after repositioning herself several times in less that a few seconds, her hyperactivity couldn't take it.

"Hey Red?!" she whined from the living room

She could hear the thumps from their shared bedroom, "-ugh- Hold on a second, Harl!" Ivy grunted. Ivy tilted her head, dazed and confused (well, no more than usual) at her friend's strange behavior lately. "Weird..." she said to herself, "Usually Red prac'ticly hastah drag me out on a job, what's up with 'er?"

However hard she tried to wrap her thoughts around Pamela's strange behavior, she practically had ADHD, and soon found herself looking at Gotham by Moonlight. Late; it seemed to be an unspoken tradition that all of Gotham's Criminals struck while the iron was figuratively hot and the sky was literally dark. You'd think that the criminal population would learn eventually, down in Metropolis they robbed day and night and things were a lot more successful down there.

She had a nice view of Crime Alley, where everyone said that the Waynes were shot. On the left, she could see the Zero Hour, "Prob'ly why Red chose this place..." Harley mused

In the window, Harley saw Ivy's reflection staring her down coldly. "You ready to go Harl?" she asked, obviously perturbed. Harley may be a sick, hyperactive, sociopathic clown, but she could still tell that her friend was upset about something. "You alright, Ivy?" she snatched the hood from the couch, starting towards the door energeticly. "Nothing at all." Ivy sighed, following her friend and making sure to lock the door behind her.

In their room, in the trashcan neatly placed in the corner, was a pair of ripped pantyhose that Ivy's legs had grown too wide to fit in....
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------
Harley and Ivy could practically walk down the streets of Gotham. No one was stupid enough to come out after three a.m. whether it be the civilians too afraid of the criminals, the criminals too afraid of the cops, or everyone just a little bit too afraid of the Batman; things were calm and easy for the devilish duo.
