But experience teaches even the slowest subject, and these two supervillainesses were far from the slowest. Had they merely strolled the concrete jungle of Gotham, Batsy was sure to catch them and throw them right back into Arkham, ending their fun for, more than likely, quite some time. This meant that they had to be sneaky about their prowl.

Every ATM in Gotham was a target; half the time Ivy would wrap a few roots around the housing of the machine, and get them to destroy the device from the inside, leaving the sweet currency inside ripe for the picking. Should that fail, or on an odd turn, Harley would just smash the machine with her overly sized mallet, her signature.

Harley Quinn giggling delightfully as she rubbed the money all over her face, "Ooh!" she squealed, quite satisfied with their recent plight, "Ain't this just great Red?"

Ivy wheezed, "Yeah, you're -pant- you're telling me!"

The redhead bent over, hands on her thighs to help keep her balance. "You alright Red?" Harley folded up her winnings and placed them back underneath the breasts of her costume, "Ya need to lie down or som'thin?"

Quite simply put, Ivy was exasperated. Having to sneak around all night with a jittery jester under her thumb was quite the challenge. It was never easy, but it just seemed so much harder on her lately. "Nah, No I'm fine..." she gasped.

There was a long, almost comical silence. "You sure?" Harley finally asked
15533111.title: The Prowl (or: What's the Pudge on Poison Ivy?)

choices: Harley agrees to go to Zero Hour
Harley suggusts Taco Bell instead
155331111.content:
"Yeah, I am sure" Ivy said in a tone that said she didn't want to talk about this anymore. The last thing she wanted Harley to know was that she had gained a little weight lately and was a little out of shape. It was embarassing for any female to admit that she had gained but especially for Ivy because she was known for her good looks and perfect body. In her mind though, she still had the perfect body and hoped others thought so too. Ivy then began to quickly lead the way down the street, heading for the next atm. Harley picked up their sack of money and her mallet and happily bounced along with her friend.

The two villinesses repeated this process of extracting money from atm with Ivy's roots while Harley grabbed the money and put it into their bag. After about 4 more atm attacks like this, Ivy was feeling really tired and worn out. While this was a little embarassing for her, she decided not to think about it. She rather think about how successful they were tonight, hitting up 5 atms and getting a bunch of money from all 5 of them. She was grateful that had gotten enough money from those 5 atms that Harley wouldn't be suspcious if she called it quits for the night.

"I think we got enough money for tonight Harley, Let's head home" Ivy said to her friend with a smile. "Great! Say since we are all finished and everything, how about we stop for a bite ta eat? Carrying this bag will cause a girl to work up an appetite" Harley said. Ivy was secretly glad that Harley had suggusted they get a bite to eat. She was feeling really hungry but didn't want to suggust they get something to eat as she had been suggusting that alot lately and had noticed Harley getting suspicious. With Harley being a former psychologist, Ivy knew that she was smart and not much got past her.

"Sure, that sounds good to me" Ivy agreed with a smile and a nod. "How about we back to Zero hour?" she suggusted.
155331111.title: Ivy lies, the two go on looting

choices: Harley and Ivy agree, they have to fix up their place with their money
Harley wants to fix up the place, but Ivy has other plans... possibley malicious
1553311111.content:
"Sure, that sounds good to me" Ivy agreed with a smile and a nod. "How about we back to Zero hour?" she suggusted.

"Yeah, sure Red." Harley tossed the sack of money over her shoulder. "Ya seem ta like that place an awful lot lately, i's been there for..." she paused, "Gee, I dunno how long!"

Ivy grunted slightly as she hefted her own bag, "I'm very much aware of that, it's just convenient, what with my place being right next to it and whatnot..." Ivy's viridian lips smiled somewhat bashfully, "That's all."

Harley couldn't help but notice Ivy's green-tinted rump, it seemed a little bit bigger since her wandering eyes had caught sight of it.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------
The Zero Hour's lights hadn't gotten any brighter or less flickery, the seemingly permenant layer of smoke that loomed above the lone ceiling fan hadn't cleared much (if at all), and the tacky linoleum floor hadn't gotten any less sticky. It never seemed to change much, except maybe the amount of elbow room at nearly 6 in the morning. Most sane people (using that term loosely here, it is Gotham City) were in bed by now, even most super criminals were safely tucked away under their bedsheets.

Even Harley Quinn, noted for her hyperactivity and seemingly endless energy, was half asleep on her end of their usual booth. Her chin nestled weakly in her gloved hands, resting her head limply in her fingers. Harley's painted lids were only just barely open, her beautiful blue eyes were hazy, and her mouth agape; allowing a small trickle of drool to roll down the corner of her mouth.

Poison Ivy, however, was only just now beginning to feel the effects of sleep deprivation. For nearly an hour, Ivy had stuffed herself silly with the most appetizing courses on the menu (nothing too meaty, of course) Since the girls' spending range had just increased by a good three thousand dollars, Ivy didn't have to worry near as much about running up a huge bill.

But every stomach had their limits, and just because Pamela was part plant didn't make her an exception.

She was beginning to feel drowzy, whether it was just plain lack of sleep or a miniature food coma, she hadn't decided. Ivy was somewhat embarassed, she had never felt the need to indulge so much as she had these past few weeks. And normally, she and Harley would have kept on looting the ATMs long into daylight, probably getting caught by Batman in the process.

Across the table, Harley let out a tiny yawn, "Gee Red..." she bat the sleep from her eyes futilely, "Can we go yet, I'm startin' to drool over here..."

Ivy grunted through food (it was either a philly cheese steak or a sub sandwich, she was too tired to really notice) "Mur, just a minute, Harl." she forced the rest of the meal into her mouth, causing her cheeks to bulge outward. Even sleep deprived, Harley had to laugh at that, "You look like a green chipmunk." she managed, fading deeper and deeper into her slumber.

The floral female huffed, swallowing defiantly, "Let's go Harl." she said, slamming the bill back down to the table. They grabbed their illgotten goods and headed out the door, Harley nearly passing out in Crime Alley.

Eventually though, the two stumbled home either half asleep or so bloated they could barely move. And almost immediately, each villainess proceeded to pass out. It was a job well done, they had avoided etting caught by certain big Bat or any of his playmates, and they had rewarded themselves with a feast fit for a queen.
1553311111.title: Harley agrees to go to Zero Hour

choices: Ivy agrees, they clean up, and go shopping
Ivy suggusts they get breakfast first
15533111111.content:
Harley woke up first the next morning. After washing all the makeup off her face and freshning up a bit, she changed into a pair of jeans and a yellow t-shirt before heading out of her bedroom and down the stairs. She then went into the kitchen, poured her babies a bowl of food each and carried it outside. "Come and get it babies" she called to her animals before returning inside the house. She went into the living room where they had left their bags of ill gotten money. She sat down by one of the bags, reached her hands into the bag, and tossed it into the air, screaming for joy like a kid at christmas. Her celebration of tossing money up in the air was a tribue to her puddin the Joker who did the same thing after a successful money heist.

Ivy was awakened from her slumber by Harley's shouts for joy and moaned. She rolled over and tired to fall back asleep, placing the pillows over her ears but she could still hear Harley. After a couple of minutes, she sighed and gave up. When Harley was excited, no one around her was going to be getting any peace and quite. She slowly got up and padded into the bathroom. She went pee, washed her fans, and then washed her face. After combing her hair, she headed back into her bedroom where she changed into a pair of sweats that said juicy on the back and a white t-shirt. Since she was at home she didn't feel like dressing up all nice. Even a woman with green skin and supernatural powers didn't always want to go into the trouble of getting all glammed up.

Ivy headed into the living room and found Harley, predictably sitting by one of the bags of money, tossing it into the air much like the Joker had done. While she shook her head, she was smiling a little to herself as it was a little amusing how much like a little kid Harley could be. "I hope you are planning on picking that all up as I most certainly am not" Ivy said as she placed her hands on her hips. "Aw, c'mon on red, can't a girl celebrate?" Harley asked with a cute little pout. "It's fine if you celebrate, I just want you to clean up your celebration" Ivy replied with a soft laugh.

"Thanks Red" Harley replied. She then turned thoughtful for a moment before asking, "Say Red, how should we spend this money?" she asked her friend. "Isn't it obvious? Let's use it to get some furniture and other things for our apartment. We can even get a tv and a computer" Ivy said, knowing just how much Harley wanted both of those items. Ivy wanted them as well as they were nice amenties to have. "Great, let's do some shopping today" Harley shouted as she jumped up.

"Shall we clean up and go?" Harley asked.
15533111111.title: Harley and Ivy agree, they have to fix up their...

choices: Harley and Ivy take advantage of their new appliances...mostly Ivy...
That shopping spree ate up a good bit of the girl's ill gotten goods...
155331111111.content:
Ivy smiled, even when she didn't have on her makeup, Isely's lips still looked like they were painted green extreme precision. "Sure, let's go shopping." she said, a distinct tone of excitement in her voice. She was never one to adopt too many electronics, but a modern girl like herself required a little bit of technology.

"Yippee!!" Harley squealed, bounding up from the floor to hug her friend, "Thanks Red!"

Ivy was a little preturbed at the younger girl leaping up and wrapping her arms around her, and almost pushed her aside. But even Ivy's heart was touched at Harley's obvious joy. She merely pat her on the shoulder and eased her off gentley.

"Yeah, sure Harl, right after we hit up the Electric Company..." she smiled akwardly, realizing that Harley hadn't unclenched herself from Ivy's form, "I got it Harl, I got it... let go, Harl."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------
Dressing casually was an easy task for Harley, she was a naturally good looking girl with a body to be proud of. Unlike many of the supervillains of Gotham City, she had no distinguishing features outside of her jester getup. Underneath that spandex outfit, Harley Quinn still looked exactly like Harleen Quinnzel.

She dressed psuedo-formally, her best clothes piled on in a very tasteful, if not somewhat drab fashion. As usual, she tried her best to stay away from too much red and black, someone might get suspicious. So today, she put on a purple zip-up hoodie, which was open enough to reveal a white top under it with matching hair bows to hold up her blonde pigtails, all held up by a simple pair of nothing-special jeans.

Ivy's disguise wasn't exactly as inconspicious. She didn't exactly go out into public light dressed as Poison IVy, world famous eco-terrorist. But she definately had a certain challenge to her civilian disguise.

First of all, she was green. And with the small cash flow she and Harley had come into recently, there wasn't enough blush or base in the whole apartment to cover all of Pamela Isely, not that she wanted to go that route anyway ("Don't you know what that crap does to plants?!") But another challenge was that a good bit of her out-on-the-town clothes decided to get sufficatingly tight all at once.

But Pamela managed; she had found a white blouse, a pair of heels, a halfjacket with the matching skirt that she hadn't outgrown, and to top it all off she had the classic 'blonde wig with sunglasses' disguise among the rubbish in the apartment. All in all, Ivy looked like a normal, somewhat distinguished woman on a budget, albeit with a slight skin condition... who had enjoyed just a few too many sweets lately...

Harley kept up with her friend's pace, "Come on Ivy, you're walkin' so slow!"

Ivy snorted, "You're just too wired, everything seems slow to you."

"Maybe if you hadn't guzzled down breakfast t'is mornin'..." Harley trailed off, only halted by a quick yet lethal glare from her cohort. There was a silence between the two, until Ivy composed herself long enough to respond with a simple, "What, I was hungry."

The bubbley blonde girl's attention was elsewhere, long bored of Ivy's short steps through the parking lot and had bounded up to the biggest department store they could find. Poison Ivy gazed upward at the sign, "Seriously, here?" Pamela queried, pushing the sunglasses down the bridge of her nose, "This place is such a shill!"

"Do ya have ta protest everything, Red?" Harley asked sarcastically, already waiting for her friend at the entrance.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------
"Alright, so we got tha computer, tha microwave, tha toasta'..." Harley continued to mark off the household appliances with a comicly oversized pen that wrote in pink. Ivy, who had not only been dragged all over the blasted store due to Harley's lack of navigational skills, was also talked into lugging all of these items into the shopping cart, let out a single puff.

"So...So how much more?" she wheezed, her face heavy with a green blush of exasperation. Harley mulled over the list, tapping each item with her large pen. "Only tha TV and we're good to go!" she said, clicking the pen triumphantly.

Ivy drooped over the cart, "Oh thank God..." she gasped. Pamela Isely, the woman who had singlehandedly scared so many citizens all over the world, the woman who had spent probably millions in schemes to sent plant life to the top of the food chain, the woman who had eluded Batman so many times, was tired from a simple walk around her local department store.

"Gee Red, I nevah knew you were such a lightweight." Harley ribbed her redheaded roomie. "Shut up..." Ivy narrowed her eyes in aggrivation, "Whatever, I've got to use the bathroom." she huffed, walking off.
-------
Leaned up in the corner, a stiff body of some creep who had followed her into the lady's bathroom. He wasn't stealthy and certainly didn't sneak up on Ivy; she was completely aware that she had been followed into the lavatory. She just let him think he was cool for his last few seconds of conciousness.

And then she zapped him with one of her toxic kisses, sending him into a very painful paralysis.

Ivy washed her hands casually nevertheless, being careful to get the foam soap instead of the typical oily stuff ("That oil gets under the plant's skin you know, it's really bad for it.") Suddenly, something that Ivy had been trying to hide all morning sprang up on her once again; her stomach let out a growl; she was still hungry.

She cradled her poor stomach. "I guess breakfast didn't exactly fill me up..." Ivy patronized herself inwardly, "Hope Harl picked up those Fig Newtons I asked for..." she couldn't help but pat her poor stomach. "Hope she didn't drop that TV either..."
155331111111.title: Gotham City Department Store (GCDS?)

choices: Ivy is still hungry and gets something else to eat
Ivy finally gets to take her nap
1553311111111.content:
Predictably, Harley had forgotten all about the Fig Newtons that Ivy requested. While sure it was a little annoying to Ivy, she wasn't that upset about it either though as it was something had come to except from Harley. Also playing a role in Ivy not being upset was the fact that she was in the mood for something more tasty then Fig Newtons. She was so glad they had done a food shopping spree earlier and now their place was stocked with food. Ivy was pleased that Harley had flirted with one of the teenagers working at the store to put the tv into their cart. After they had paid for their items, Harley got the same guy to load their purchases into the car. After the car was all loaded up, Harley blew the guy a kiss before they drove off. "Wow, today is the first day in a long time that I have paid for anything legitly, No wonder that I got away from it, so boring" she commented with a giggle. Ivy could only smile and shake her head.

Before long they arrived back at their place. Ivy was still feeling tired, having done more heavy lifting today then she had in recent memory, so she had her plants bring in all of their items and set them up. Ivy walked over to the couch, laid down on it, and relaxed as she watched her plants bring in the appliances, directing them to where to put things, and watching as they put in some things. Harley bounched into the kitchen, grabbed some food, and then headed outside to feed her animals. When she returned a couple of minutes later, she saw that the computer had put set up. "I call dibs on the computer" she called before racing over to the computer and logging off. Yes she was not supposed to be online but this was probably the least of the crimes she had ever commited or ever well. Plus she had been legit enough for the day.

Ivy had actually made sure that her plants had set up the computer first. She knew that the computer would keep Harley preoccupied and thus quiet for awhile. After seeing everything was set up, she sent her plants back to their places and was able to fall asleep when her stomach grumbled in hunger. It was louder this time and she blushed for a second, but heard nothing. Never had she been more happy to see Harley wearing headphones to listen to music on her computer then now. She gently patted her belly while telling it silently, okay, momma is going to feed you. She then got up and walked into the kitchen. Now that she had a toaster, she could make some poptarts. She opened a packet of cinnamon sugar poptarts, put them in the toaster, and started warming them up. She then got out a carton of 2% percent milk and poured herself a big glass which she set down on the table. She then grabbed a plate when she heard the toaster ding. She used her hands to pick up the poptarts, place them on the table, and return to the table.

Ivy sat down at the table, picked up one of the poptarts and eagerly took a bite. Mm so good she thought to herself. She took another bite and then another until she had finished the first pop tart. She then drank some of her milk before starting on her second poptart. Before long she had finished her second poptart as well and washed it down with the rest of her milk before letting out a girly burp causing her to blush slightly. She was glad Harley was not in the room to hear it after all of the times she had harped on Harley for her lack of manners. She knew that Harley would never let her live it down.
1553311111111.title: Harley and Ivy take advantage of their new appl...

choices: After a few weeks of laying low, Harley and Ivy have to perform another heist
Free Choice
15533111111112.content:
And then; Ivy collapsed onto the somewhat lumpy bed that had been left in the apartment.

She closed her eyes, content to catch up with the few hours that Harley had robbed from her. While she wasn't angry in the slightest with her peppy roomie, Ivy couldn't help but think of how many Z's she could have caught since early this morning. 'This is truely a lazy saturday morning...' Poison Ivy mumbled to herself as she nestled further into the covers, too tired to even pull the quilt over her form.

In the next room over, Harley was taking full advantage of the new services that had been bestowed upon her, simultaniously ceasing the apartment's silence in a matter of seconds. With full electricity, some awesome headphones, a new computer, and a good sized television, Harley's attention was completely occupied for the first time in weeks.

Mad beats flowed from her earbuds and the TV blared just as loud, tooned to whatever station she could pick up with basic cable that broadcasted cartoons. Her eyes were lit not only with a child-like excitement, but also with the incandesence that FaceBook gave off. Harley slurped her soda and munched on a candy bar, completely lost in a technological daze.

"I's been so long since I updated t'is thing..." she said aloud, her fingers clicking away at the keys rapidly. Harley couldn't even remember everything that had happened since... "April 23rd?" she said aloud, doing her best to recall everything that had happened since then. "Ah well, I'll fix it later." she clicked to her messages, unaware that that was exactly what she said on April 23'rd. She clicked on the next song, all prepackaged stuff that came with the computer, but still pretty listenable.

Harley skimmed over her messages, mostly from either her fellow inmates at Arkham or cohorts in the Crime Underground. "Hey Harley, here's hoping you get ou--" Harley stopped herself, Matches Malone? Who was that? She deleted it. "I hate creepers." she said, a little disturbed. But then again, she couldn't blame them. Harley knew she wasn't exactly bad looking. 'Harleen Quinnzel would you like to sign out?'

"A'course I would, ya stupid... why else would I click the link?" her slender fingers guided the mouse as it rolled over the screen to 'YES'. She gave a rare scowl, she hadn't been able to go online for pleasure in the longest time, and now she had already done everything she had set out to do. She sighed, clicking off the music and removing her headphones. She decided to retreat to the couch to enjoy their brand new television.

Brand new TV, lots of food, and a nice computer; things were really looking up for Harley lately. Since she unwedged herself from under the Joker's thumb, she had discovered a lot about herself. Mostly that she was bad at money management, but also that she rather enjoyed to act like a normal girl her age.

With the Joker it was all business, Batman, and gut busters (both jokes and literally busting some guts), and she never realized just how much she enjoyed to just pull off a simple heist. No intricate plots, not having to listen to a sociopathic clown make morbid jokes, and most importantly she could fly under the radar to avoid the Big Bad Bat.

She flipped the channel, she didn't get that many since Ivy hadn't gotten the place hooked up for anything other than basic cable. BASIC cable. That severely limited her programming to anything other than saturday morning cartoons and the news. Harley took another bite of her candy bar, finishing the chocolatey morsel off. She settled on the one channel that was clear as a bell; the news.

She slumped, "Great." she whined. The news was never Harley's favorite programming block, it was what seemed to be an eternity of pointless, depressing stories that didn't concern her in the slightest (unless it actually DID concern her, as it usually does with super criminals...)

"Superman halted yet another failed robbery attempt by local metahuman Livewire, who will be transported to..." Harley mocked the anchorman, moving her thumb and forefinger to mimic the anchorman. "Blah blah, blah blah..." she faced the hand with a displeased and bored look on her face. But then something caught her attention. "Speaking of robberies, Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy were spotted looting from local ATMs last night, hitting up at least five around what has been dubbed 'Crime Alley', anyone who sees these two should report the proper authorities immediately..."

Normally, most people go into a panic after a crime that they've committed gets let loose to the public; but Harley was absolutely giddy. She grinned like the true psychopath that she was. "Wow!" she was already on heels, "I'm on TV!"

Believe it or not, this was the first time (As far back as she could remember) that Harley had been on the boob tube without either being confined via straight jacket, restrained via Batman, or tackled via policemen. She immediately burst into Ivy's quarters, "Hey Red!" she said loudly.

But then, she stopped. Ivy was sound asleep. Even the outspoken Harley Quinn couldn't bring herself to wake up her cyan colored cohort from the deep sleep that she had fallen into. Plus, she was really cute with her full lips open just enough to allow a little bit of saliva to peek out of her mouth. "Aww... she looks like a li'l green angel..." Harley cooed.

Quinn noticed that Ivy wasn't covered up, so she draped her hoodie over the chloropath's frame. Harley giggled, still giddy that she and Ivy had scored some minutes on prime time. The blonde tiptoed out of the room, shutting the door behind her ever so quietly with an unavoidable creak; just quiet enough to let Ivy remain sound asleep.

Thankfully, Harley wasn't present for Poison Ivy's pale green stomach to give out a faint gurgle of digestion.
15533111111112.title: CrimeTime Television

choices: Agreeing to hitting up the atms again
Suggusts another heist
155331111111121.content:
Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy enjoyed a couple weeks of laying low. Harley spent her time mostly on the computer and watching tv though the computer mostly. She would snack occasionally but nothing major. She had really gotten behind in all of her online activies like social networking with all of her friends and fans, playing some games, and of course doing online shopping. She now had some money so of course she wanted to spend it. Whenever Harley got money, she spent it as fast as she could, not unlike the Joker. Her fans by the way were a mix of guys and girls. Poison Ivy had spent the past couple of weeks, watching tv, laying out in the sun (she was part plant so she needed the sun), and indulging in more sweet and fatty foods. She had lost touch with how much she was starting to eat even though she realized that she had put on a little weight and had already ripped a pair of stockings. She felt like she hadn't gained that much which was true but she also didn't think that she was eating that much more and that it would case a problem.

Realizing that they were low on money one morning, Poison Ivy realized that another heist was in order. She was in the living room looking over the last a couple bags that contained money and not much was left in either of them. "Harl, get in here" she called. Harley who wasn't hearing headphones at the time quickly bounced from the computer room into the living room. "Here" she announed giddly with a smile. "What's up red?" Harley asked. "Low money, we need to do another heist" Ivy explained as she showed Harley the bags. "Oops, I guess I went through the money a little quickly" Harley admitted. "Well it's not all your fualt, I did too. We are girls though so it's okay" Ivy replied with a smile. "We need more money now though so lets get started planning our next heist" Ivy said.

Ivy was feeling even lazier then she was two weeks ago when they did their previous heist. She had also put on a little more weight since then as well though she hadn't realized it yet. Still not wanting to do another elaborate heist, Ivy suggusted, "I think we should hit up the atms again. They were so sucessful the last time it should be the same this time as well. Of course I think they will be a little more guarded with some more policemen around them since the police are aware that atms are our next target but that shouldn't be a problem. I have a way with men after all and will easily be able to take care of them" she said as she pushed back a few loose strands of her red hair.

Harley thought about this before...
155331111111121.title: After a few weeks of laying low, Harley and Ivy...

choices: Breakfast at Zero Hour?
"Aw come on, Red, just ONE more atm?"
1553311111111211.content:
The streets of Gotham City always seemed dark, no matter what time of day it was. It was a gloomy city by nature, if not downright shady. Unlike the stark white buildings of Metropolis, the general color scheme of Gotham rarely strayed from shades of gray; this meant that even by daylight, Gotham City seemed cold and unfeeling.

On said streets, Poison Ivy tailed behind the comedy capering criminal, struggling to keep up with Harley's pace. She lugged the heavy sacks of money at her sides, poor muscles who had been underworked these past few weeks were certainly not used to the burden of lifting money bags. She wheezed, her green face flushed with exertion. "Phew... we must've hit, what, seven ATM's Harl?" she kneeled over, dropping the bags at her heels, "What do you say we.... we call it a night?"

Harley, who was casually manhandling bags even heavier than 'Red' (and even her mallet) turned around. "Why Red?" she asked, reluctance clearly present in her voice, "Don't tell me yer t'red already?"

Ivy's face scrunched up, expressing that her cheeks had gotten ever so much fuller in the past couple of days. "No I'm not... tired!" she managed, "It's just... I think we've pretty much emptied out every machine in this part of town..." the plant woman trailed off slightly. "No way, Ivy!" Harley said, energetic as usual, "We've still got a few left, gotta keep up wit' th' 'lectric bill, y'know, can't hit up Facebook wit' no powe'!"

Ivy grumbled, "Of course not..."

The UV-soaking supervillain stood up straight, stretching her stiffened muscles, and inadvertantly revealing the few extra pounds that she had picked up. Her stamin-thin body had certainly rounded out; her stomach didn't quite bulge, due to her spandex, although where her bikini line had been very definate before, her abdomen had swelled to meet that old line. Whenever her stomach wasn't forced behind the strict confines of her 'uniform', Ivy's belly looked quite soft and inviting. Her breasts had swelled outward, made obvious as a bit of her boob spilled just slightly over the cup. And Ivy was supported by new, fuller legs.

She brushed herself off, she hadn't really collected much filth while scouring the streets, she just wanted an excuse to give her stinging fingers a rest. Cracking her knuckles, Ivy grumbled again, noticing that Harley hadn't stopped for her "Geez..."

Meanwhile, above the streets and a good number of buildings, the pointy-eared gaurdian of Gotham stood, ever viligant in his quest to rid his city of crime. Behind the lenses, his eyes scanned the labyrinth that was made up of Gotham's streets. Recently, Oracle had informed him that Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn had restablished their long-term alliance and were hitting up ATM machines all over town.

"Too simple, Harley must be calling the shots." his deep voice rumbled.

Bingo, his eyes caught sight of Harley and Ivy making their way down main street. Immediately, he released a Bat-Grappling Hook onto a nearby skyscraper. He swung into action, as his intensive training dictated him via muscle memory.

Ivy struggled to keep up, Harley had really picked up the pace. "H...Harl!" she did her best to remain quiet, lest you-know-who catch wind of her sultry pipes. The only response was a shrill scream, "Harl?!" Ivy snapped to attention, running somewhat akwardly towards her friend's cry. And what else did she see; Batman.

It was always Batman.

Not that Ivy wasn't exactly happy to see Batman, he sounded like a handsome man and certainly had the body to be one. It was what Batman did that cured the fire that he struck in Ivy's belly. Always ruining her ecosphere-based schemes and almost always roughing her up a bit certainly caused Ivy to lose a lot of interest in the caped crusader.

Luckilly, Batman was too preoccupied with Harley to hear Ivy's trodding, 'Must be a long night, he's usually much more aware than this.' she told herself. From around the corner, she watched as Harley ran away from Batsy, who skimmed through the air easilly due to his para-cape, frightened like a child. She couldn't tell if she was playing it up for a laugh or if she was really this scared of Gotham's Dark Knight.

Around the corner, Harley led her pursuer down an alley. The very alleyway that Ivy was hiding out on. "Harley!" she hissed, instinctively trying to focus the botanical toxins in her body to her fingernails, ready to strike at Batman. Or maybe she'd try the lips, plant a big wet one on the only unprotected part of Batman's battle tank of a body. Or maybe--

It was too late, a large mallet whack to the head on a weak point in his cowl proved to upset Batman's balance long enough for Harley to regain hers. It was quite a show, watching the extremely acrobatic Harley Quinn battle the hardhitting Batman. He landed one good punch, but the Princess of Punchlines wrapped her legs around his neck. She then proceeded to launch herself from Batman's chest with a power kick.

"Wow..." Ivy whispered, completely star struck by Harl's killer moves

Harley dashed to the money bags, grabbing them without losing momentum. "GO! GO! GO!" she chanted, Harley had a strong sense of fear in her voice, she knew she got lucky; and in a few seconds Batsy would be up and on the prowl. It was best to get out now. Needless to say, Ivy's accumulated pudge slowed her down.
1553311111111211.title: Wrath of the Bat (Prowl of the Cape and Cowl)

choices: Harley makes a comment on Ivy's eating
Some villains come over to hit on them
15533111111112111.content:
After their encouter with Batman, Harley was ready to call it quits for tonight. With Batman now on the prowl for me once he woke up and it going to be daylight soon, Harley realized it was time to end for tonight. They had made a good haul so she was feeling good overall about the night with the exemption of the Bat interference. In a way, Ivy was kinda grateful that Batman showed up so they could quit for the night. She was really feeling tired and so now that Batman was on the prowl for them, she now had a good excuse for quitting for the evening. Like Harley, she didn't want to be caught by Batman. She could just say that Batman was on their tail and so they should quit tonight while they were ahead. Also she was aware it would be daylight soon and knew it wouldn't be wise to still be committing their crimes then.

Of course Ivy didn't need to say anything because Harley said, "Okay Red, you win, we've robbed enough for tanight". Ivy breathed a sigh of relief. "Let's head home" Harley said. "No, after lugging all of this money I am starving. Let's go to Zero Hour" Ivy said. "Okay, I am feeling kinda hungry too" agreed Harley. They two villanesses started to head towards Zero Hour. Both were musing two different things. Ivy was thinking that they should use her car for their upcoming heists as it was just getting too hard for her to carry all the bags. Harley was starting to wonder why Ivy was getting more easily and often. They arrived at Zero Hour about 10 minutes later and took their usual booth.

Both girls knew the menu by heart and didn't need to look at the meanu so when their server came over they promptly ordered. Ivy ordered the chocolate chip pancakes with butter and maple syurp with a glass of both milk and orange juice. Harley ordered a bowl of oatmeal with some buttered toast and a glass of milk. Their food was brought out shortly and they both dug in. Ivy though dug in with more gusto. She was really feeling hungry from carrying all those moneybags. She greedily dug into her pancakes, cutting up bite after bite and stuffing it down her throat. She moaned a couple of times in between bites as they were so good. She did pause occasionally for sips of milk and orange juice. Harley ate at a normal speed and enjoyed her meal as well. Though she was enjoying her meal, Harley couldn't take her eyes off of Ivy as she (Ivy) continued to pig out. She had never seen her eat like this before. It was kinda surprising to her but she didn't have a problem with it.
15533111111112111.title: Breakfast at Zero Hour?

choices: Back at home...
...Or maybe the next morning?
155331111111121112.content:
Ivy downed another pancake, syrup spilling over her lips and dribbling down her chin slightly. She rather enjoyed chocolate chip pancakes, she would be sure to ask the bartender for the chef's recipe. She dabbed her mouth with a napkin to get the unsightly syrup off of her mouth. She then proceeded to lean back, hands resting on a full stomach, and gave a satiated sigh. Ivy was full for now. Although, she couldn't help but think that she'd just be hungry again in a few hours, that seemed to be happening a lot lately.

Harley Quinn had gotten used watching Ivy stuff her kraut by now, it didn't come as that much of a shock when Ivy pat her stomach lightly. "Ya full?" she asked, a hint of sarcasm in her thick accent. She had long since finished her meal and only had the common curtousy to wait for her green friend.

"Ha ha, Harl." Ivy quipped back, "I was just hungry."

The clown themed villainess giggled a little and immediately sat up, eager to get home and update her blog. She couldn't believe that she'd gone so long without so much as a Dail-Up connection, how had she made it through her days without the internet?!

Ivy however, was not so easy to spring up and took just a few more precious seconds to lift her softer frame from the seat; Harley couldn't help but notice that as Ivy stood up, the motion made her boobs jiggle as they spilled from her outfit. "You seem happy to get out of here..." Isely finally managed to grumble.

Just as Ivy dropped the check on the table, she heard the bell above the door chime. It was no one special, he looked just like an ordinary thug. A local wannabe henchman-for-hire who just about everyone was familiar with, since he came down to the bar every night to boast about his ametuer crimes; when no one listened or cared, he got violent. Though he was no big shot in the crime underworld, a few of the criminals actually booed and hissed the young man as he strut his way into the bar. "Get outta here!" even kind old Mr. Dini, the barkeep, shouted.

Harley wretched, "Ew, gross."

Poison Ivy had to agree, "What a twerp, he could at least pull his pants up around his underwear..."

The scrawny white boy had a cocky stride, which he rode all the way to the counter. "'Ey Mistah Dini, just got back from mah latest heist."

The portly, balding man snorted. "No seriously, I just hit major payday!" he flashed an obviously fake grill. "Go siddown, Johnie." Dini grumbled. He turned away indignantly, "Pssh, man, no one listens." But then his eyes caught sight of Poison Ivy, her tight outfit driving him wild. He smacked her behind, "Hey Baby, you'll listen to my stories, won'tcha?"

Ivy felt her stomach churn. "I'll give you five seconds to apologize." she narrowed her eyes at the young man, "Before I feed that hand to my plants." 'Johnie' wasn't daunted, "Aw shoot Baby, you know I couldn't resist dat ass." he took a better look at it, "Maybe instead'a jus' my hand, you could take th' rest'a me back to yo' place."

Harley tugged at Ivy's hand, "Let's go Red, he ain't worth it." Harley knew when she was pushing her luck, there was no way that she'd escape Batman and the cops in one night, if this got violent, someone was sure to call the police. "Why don't you just get your food and go choke on that ridiculous grill, do everyone here a favor." Ivy ignored her clown-clad friend

Johnie was either stupid or persistant, "I'm just sayin' Baby, I'm into th' green chicks." he flashed another dopey grin, "And maybe after I put you on a li'l diet, we could get bu-"

Ivy snapped, "DIET?!" she hollered throughout the bar. Everyone got silent, except for Harley Quinn who let out a giddy "Oooooh." Poison Ivy and Harley were the biggest villains that ever came into the Zero Hour, they were already a little afraid of what they could do. Let alone when a low-life thug wannabe had just called Poison Ivy, Queen of Plants, fat. She clenched her fists, clenched her teeth. Ivy was ready to explode.

"Woah, woah Baby, don--"

Ivy slapped him across the face, the echo reverberated for a few seconds throughout the silent tavern. Then, while he was dazed, Ivy locked him into one of her deadly kisses. Everyone whispered, everyone knew about Ivy's Kisses of Death, even newbies to the Gotham Underground. After a few seconds, Ivy broke away, and the thug fell over, dead.

Dini broke it up, emerging from behind the counter. "Hey, hey, come on Ivy." he grabbed the body, "I can't have you comin' in here and killin' off my regulars." he shooed both the redhead and her jester companion out the door. "Aw come on Mistah Dini!" Harley pleaded, she really did like the food here, "We can't come back?"

Dini always had a soft spot for Harley and she knew exactly how to tug at his heartstrings. The three grew deathly silent, until finally, the kindly old man gave into Harley's big blue eyes. "Alright, alright, but only because Johnnie was a pain in th' ass." he tossed them a doggy bag, "Here, free biscuits on the house."

Ivy smiled, showing off small dimples. "Thanks Paul." she caught the bag. Harley sniffed it, "Smells good as always, Mistah Dini!" she playfully blew the old man a kiss.
155331111111121112.title: Tavern Obituaries (How to kill a moron)

choices: Get some dessert
Take a nap
1553311111111211122.content:
Both Ivy and Harley went straight to bed when they got home as it had been a long night. They ended up sleeping most of the day. They woke up in the evening and shared the biscuts along with a dinner of macaroni and cheese with soda which of course was Harley's choice but Ivy had to admit that she really enjoyed it. They then watched the 11 o clock news to see if there was any more news on them either for their robberies or the kiss of death that Ivy had delivered to that annoying thug. Harley got all excited seeing their pictures on the screen as she loved the attention. "We are celebrities! Everyone is scared of us now that you killed that guy so I think our robberies will be ever easier" Harley said excitedly as Ivy shut off the tv. "Well good, I hope so. I am all for anything that makes our robbieres easier. Unfortunately Batman and the cops will be after us more but luckily we know how to handle them" Ivy said before yawning. Since yawns were contagious, Harley yawned too and both girls headed to bed.

Harley woke up about ten the next morning. She made herself a bowl of luck charms and toasted a strawberry pop-tart and then took her breakfast over to the tv. She sat down on the couch in front of the tv, turned on the tv, and began watching her favorite saturday morning cartoons while eating her breakfast. When all of her shows were done, she took her empty dishes to the kitchen, rinsed them out, and went over to her computer. She got online and started facebooking and chatting with her friends. Ivy on the other hand slept in till 1. She was sleeping now more so with her getting so tired from the heist night she really slept alot over the next 24 hours. She woke up at 1am to hear her stomach grumbling. Knowing that Harley and her planned to stay in today and take it easy, she decided to stay in her silly black nightgown. It hadn't fully dawned on her that it was much tighter on her and revealing a little bit more of her then usual. After freshing up a bit, Ivy headed into the kitchen. Since it was 1pm, she decided to skip breakfast and go straight to lunch. She warmed up the rest of the macaroni and cheese which there was a good amout left of, cut some slices of white bread, and got out a soda.

As soon as Ivy sat down at the table, she eagerly dug in. She began stuffing bite after bite of the creamy rich delicious macaroni and cheese down her throat. It was so good and she was so hungry that she couldn't get enough of it. She only paused occasioanally to dunk the bread in the sauce and take a couple of bites of it before washing it down with sips of soda after every couple of bites. It didn't take her too long to finish her meal and patted her full belly gently. She could tell that her belly was bloated but she wasn't concerned since she knew it was only temporary. It didn't seem to register with her that her belly was even softer then before. She rested at the table for a few minutes as she felt kinda full before getting up, and washing her plates. She then headed out into the backyard to attend to her plans. She nursed them with some water, food, and of course some motherly love that only she could provide with her special powers as their creator. It was after they had beed fed and watered, the plants began to show off their talents to Ivy. Since she was their mother, they could read her thoughts. They showed her how along with her, they had evolved and now could do whatever not only what she told them but imagined. This made her smile as it opened up a new possiblity. For their upcoming heists, she could just wait in the car and let her plants do all the heavy work along with Harley. This would definitely make things alot easier for her. "Thank you my babies, I will be sure to let you fully show off what you can do when Harley and I do our next heist" she said to them all as she gently patted them on their heads.

Ivy next decided too..
1553311111111211122.title: ...Or maybe the next morning?

choices: Over the coming weeks, Ivy gets more and more lethargic, and hungrier too...
The next robbery, Harley takes the plants along with her, leaving Ivy home alone
15533111111112111221.content:
Ivy started back towards her room, fully intent on resuming her snooze, when a sudden craving hit her. Underneath the silky black lingerie, Ivy's soft stomach gave a yearning rumble for something sweet. She looked down to face her gullet, a dissapporoving look on her face. "Now now, I already fed you." she teased, fondling her belly lightly. It gurgled again, still begging for a snack.

Ivy gave a mischevious smirk, a single red eyebrow raised as her eyes travelled slowly to the fridge. She knew that there was a little bit of cake left in there that Harley had stashed away, wary of Isely's new eating habits and wanted to save it for later. Ivy moved her hand to her hip, letting the other one hang limply at her side. She gave let out a devious, sultry purr; Ivy wanted that cake.

She elegantly lifted her hand to pull the refridgerator door open, it's light much brighter than the single hanging flourescent bulb. The chilly air wafted slightly outside the confines of the fridge, brushing against Ivy's stomach and stiffening her nipples slightly. Quickly, she moved the apple juice, the milk, the thing that LOOKED like milk but was actually a deadly toxin that needed to be refridgerated, assorted sandwich meats, and whatever remained of the twelve pack of soda to reach her prize; Harley's last slice of chocolate cake.

Her green fingers wrapped around the edge of the paper plate and pulled it out, setting it on the nearby countertop. Ivy quickly, yet quietly rummaged through the silverware drawer to pull out a single fork. She placed her untensil and her winnings on the small, circular dining table. Her barely covered legs resumed their seat on the still-warm plastic chair, spreading out slightly as Ivy's accumulated weight pushed her fat out slightly.

Immediately, she began her work. She cut the first chunk of cake off of the main body, getting both the chocolate and the icing on a good forkful. She popped it into her mouth. She could see why Harley was saving this; It was wonderful. She didn't even bother to savor it, she swallowed and went in for another bite. She got another forkful, inhaling the pleasant morsel like oxygen (or carbon dioxide?) Again and again, she took off large bites of food that was only her's through the law of 'finders-keepers'

And soon, long before she wished it so, Ivy was done. The plate was empty and her belly had been satisfied. Her lower lip formed a scowl, dissapointed not that she had given into her appetite yet again, but that there wasn't any more cake left to eat. It was probably best, Ivy's stomach was actually pretty stuffed. She leaned back further in her seat, a recoil from her appetite, and then placed her hand back onto her belly. She belched ever so slightly, a sign that Ivy's tank was filled.

She made sure to get rid of the evidence, recycling her plate ("Better than ending up in a landfill") and washing off her fork diligently, making sure not to leave a single trace of her betrayal visible to Harley's eye. With that done, it was time to get back to bed. Ivy gave one last pat to the closest one of her botanical buddies, and made her way down the hall, back to her room.

She climbed back under the covers, rested her lovely red locks on the goosedown pillow, and quickly fell back to sleep; dreaming of a world that was a better place for all of her plants.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
Harley was up for a full four hours before Ivy, not doing anything productive. As usual, Harley's schedule for Sunday was very much like her schedule for Saturday (Friday and Monday too, for that matter), eat brekkie, watch TV, scour the web, download a few songs, etc. All in all, Harley had settled into a rather lethargic lifestyle, no one suspected the ONE abandoned apartment in the middle of Gotham's biggest apartment complex, so the two didn't have to relocate as much as Harley was used to. She definately liked that.

At around two in the afternoon, Harley sat on the couch, fondling Bud while Lou watched his hyena brother, eyes filled with envy at being stroked. She heard a few footsteps reverberating through the cheap apartment flooring; Red was finally awake.

She watched as the green pigmented redhead stretched her arms, making her way slothfully down the hallway. She had terrible bedhead, and her nightgown so tight that Ivy's belly could be seen clearly stretching the black fabric, if there was a pattern on her nightie it would definately been distorted by that green pudge.

Ivy smacked her lips letting out a sleepy, "Good morning, Harley."

"Mornin' Red!" she smiled at her cohort, unsettling her hyena, "Sleep well?"

She plopped down on the armchair, resting her lips in a very seductive pose by instinct. "Like a baby, that bed has gotten so comfortable." she cooed, stroking Lou's furry head as he grunted in delight. Harley squealed, "Aww, you always said my babies wer' gross, slobberin' monstahs!!" Ivy snorted, "Pheh, they rubbed off on me." she narrowed her eyes and raised an eyebrow coyly, "And speaking of babies, I had a great idea for our little ATM scam, Harl."

And so Poison Ivy explained her plan; Harley could take her plants out into the city and guide them to the nearest target. They would destroy it, Harley would take the money, next target, repeat. All the while, Ivy would stay at the 'base' and 'hold the fort' in case anyone caught onto their scheme.

Harley was quiet for a little while. "Aww Red, it won't be any fun without you!" she whined, her baby blue eyes welling up, "Do ya not like pullin' jobs wit me?" Ivy sighed, "Of course not Harl, but we'll get a lot more done without me slowing you down..."

Suddenly, Harley sniffled. "I need comfort food!" she cried, rushing to the refriderator. Ivy blushed, remembering her little slip last night. She covered her ears for the upcoming shriek...

"WHO ATE MY CAKE?!!"
15533111111112111221.title: Harley's Cake

choices: A couple weeks pass of Harley and plants robbing and Ivy staying home
Harley and the plants return with the day's spoils
155331111111121112212.content:
Harley had definitely been upset about Ivy eating her slice of cake but she quickly got over it. Ivy was her best friend afterall and had saved her life once. She couldn't get another best friend but she could get another chocolate cake. She eventually did get another chocolate cake but this time divided up evenly between them so they would each get a fair share. After a couple of days of lounging around, Harley was getting bored and ready for some action while Ivy was perfectly content the way things were. Harley had thought more about the idea of her and Ivy's plants comitting the crimes and it had grown on her. Ivy had been getting slower and not like she enjoyed comitting the crimes as much, she just wanted and needed the money, maybe it was better for her and the plants to commit the crimes.

Ivy was laying out in the sun as was per usual of her afternoon now, relaxing, and working on her tan as the plant that she had made her personal attendant fanned her. She was enjoying a snack of choocolate chip cookies and a glass of milk as she tanned. She was always feeling like snacking these days it seemed. "Hey Red" Harley came as she bounched over to her friend. Ivy sat up a little, causing her shirt to ride up to reveal her soft tummy, and she pulled her sunglasses up over her head. "Yeah Harl? she asked her friend. "I'm getting bored so I ws wondering if I could take some of your plants and try a heist with them?" Harley asked her. Ivy thought about this for a second. They still had some money left but she saw no harm in finding out now if this new system would work. Plus they had lyed low for the past couple of days which was okay. "Sure Harl, that actually sounds like a good idea" Ivy said. "Yay!" Harley shouted.

Then Ivy called her plants over. She instruced them go to with Harley to complete some atm robberies. The plants were too happy and excited to serve their queen and headed out with Harley. They all got into Ivy's car and drove to the first atm on their list. Harley was quickly able to see how perfect Ivy's plans was. The plants were very easily able to get the money out and put it into Harley's bag which she held for them. They were able to get through robbing each atm quicker then ever before. This is going to work well Harley thought to herself. Back at home, Ivy finished off the rest of the cookies which she could not get enough of and then washed them down with some sips of milk before falling asleep as her plant attendant continued to fan her.
155331111111121112212.title: The next robbery, Harley takes the plants along...

choices: Harley suggests that they move into a nicer place
Ivy concocts a bigger, better scheme for their money
1553311111111211122121.content:
Ivy lay in bed, the silence in the room only broken by her occasional snore. Her pretty red hair spread over the sheets and flopped lazilly over the pillows, some of which were cast aside because of an earlier insomnia. On the dresser, one could see her old sweatpants, a giant rip down the right thigh that extended through the crotch, courtesy of her fattened thighs, evidence that Ivy truely had been growing wider these past few weeks.

Ivy incoherently mumbled something in her sleep, her hand travelling down to her stomach. She was so lost in her slumber, she didn't notice the footsteps rapidly approaching her door...

"HEY RED!!" Harley excitedly burst into her roomie's quarters, landing on her bed. Isely woke up quickly, needless to say.

"Wha-?" she looked around, still quite far off in the land of Nod. "WE HIT THE JACKPOT!!" Harley wrapped her arms around Ivy's plump frame, "YER A GENIUS!!" While Harley bounced around, Ivy just sat in place, obviously perterubed at being woken up so prematurely. "Slow down, Harl." she growled, forcing the jaded jester back onto the bed, "Now, repeat slowly."

"It's these plants!" Harley was still quite excited, "I told 'em to go afta an ATM, an' whadda they do, they go afta ALL of them at once!"

Outside, Ivy could see her precious babies hauling sacks of stolen money into the apartment, she had only assigned three plants to Harley's group, and even she had to admit that they were bringing in a lot more than she ever did. Ivy smirked proudly, "And you expected anything less?" she haughtilly gestured towards herself, "These are my plants after all."

"And that's not even all of it!" Harley continued to rave, "I brought in, like, five'a them myself!"

For a while, Harley kept giving more and more (mostly unwanted) details about how well her heist had gone; but Ivy had just been awoken from another fit of sleep. She calmed her friend down one last time, "Harley, Harley, Harley." she touched clown's arm, "I'd love to hear how well you did with my babies, and I'm very proud of you; but I have to get back to bed."

She frowned, "Fine, lazybones..." Harley couldn't help but giggle herself back to normal, "I'll jus' go give a head count an' head to bed myself."

As soon as Harley had left, Ivy called her back in to turn off the light, and Harley had left again, Ivy rested her head back on the soft pillow and re-adjusted herself within the bed; Ivy was immediately back to sleep.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------
And so, after a month of heisting and hedonism, both Harley's wallet and Ivy's frame began to fatten.

Harley, as per her schedule, was online. She wasn't doing much, just updating her Facebook, checking her MySpace, editing her article on Wikipedia, downloading a few songs, looking up cheatcodes for that blasted game, and watching funny videos on Youtube.

She bit into her breakfast, her last chocolate chip waffle folded up and stuffed into her mouth. She chewed delicately, despite her stuffed cheeks, and swallowed the morsel. "Wish Red hadn'ta eaten all my other ones..." she mused to herself.

She removed her earbuds and pat her Hyenas on the head, swivelling in her chair to face the TV. Another peice on their atm scam. Harley just couldn't believe that the Batman hadn't caught onto their scheme, he must have been out dealing with some big time baddie. But, never the less, Harley was fully content in furthering this plan. However, now Harley was hungry.

'Jus' because Red's hungry all the time doesn' mean she hasta eat my waffles...' she mumbled. She wasn't MAD at Ivy, just a little miffed was all. She'd get over it.

Down the hall, into the kitchen, a vastly different Poison Ivy sat; the fat on her ass completely filling up her chair. She was in a newly purchased but already tight nightie, much tighter after her third pancake, that exaggerated the width of her gullet. Sure, it was big, but black wasn't always slimming.

Her entire frame seemed to swell quickly over the course of this past month. Her pale stomach had grown from simply soft with a bulge to a blown out tummy. It stuck out now, whatever didn't stick to the front went to her lovehandles or her back. Her arms had become jiggly and her wrist less defined. Ivy's breasts swelled just as much, forming much more than a handful as her apidose moved to her bikiniline. Above her swollen sweaterpuppies, Ivy's neckline had puffed out, a second chin quickly blossoming.

"Mornin' Red." Harley greeted the corpulant chloropath, sticking out her behind as she delved in the bottom-most drawer of their fridge.

"Good morning, Harley." Ivy greeted, actually sounding perky for once. She had been getting a lot more sleep lately, so her hours had regulated to almost that of a normal Gothamite's, "Sleep well?"

"Ugh, I wish...tat job took longer than I though it would." Harley popped the tab on her soda, "An' on toppa everythin', Bud and Lou wouldn' leave eachothah alone las' night, they kept wakin' me up!" The jester sat down opposite her friend, "I had tah put my babies outside so I could get some sleep!"

Ivy frowned, "Yeah, I'm quite aware." She pointed outside her bedroom door, where a piddle stain ruined the carpet. "You really need to start taking those... things... outside." she shot a dirty look to the onlooking Bud, who lowered his head knowingly.

"Ah whateva, he'll behave."

Eventually, a certain conversation struck up between these two female furies of Gotham...
1553311111111211122121.title: Corpulance and Abundance (...of cash)

choices: The heists continue and so do Ivy's new lifestyle
Bruce Wayne stops by to welcome them to the condo
15533111111112111221211.content:
Eventually, a certain conversation struck up between the two female furies of Gotham over possibly moving to a new place. The idea had come to Harley recently and with all these sucessful atm robberies lately, it seemed likely they can afford a nice place, not that was opposed to stealing a nicer place as well though if they legally paid for it then Batman would have one less reason to be after them. "So Red I was thinking that with all of this cash we are bringing in we can afford a nice place. Like a luxary condo or something" Harley suggusted. "What do you think?" she asked Ivy.

Having grown up as a rich girl, Ivy had lived in the lap of luxury and loved every minute of it. She had missed those days greatly and had always wanted to get back to that lifestyle. Now she had an opportunity to move one step closer to that goal and in no way was she going to let it pass her by. "Harley, that's a great idea. It's surprising but we have been stealing more money then spending it so we are due for a big purchase. In fact, I just saw an ad for the perfect place for us to move into" she said. She picked up the gossip magazine she was reading and showed Harley the ad for the new Wayne Towers. "I say we buy a condo here" Ivy said with a smile. After seeing the ad, Harley quickly agreed. Since both sirens were hungry, they finished their breakfast before getting ready.

They took turns showering before getting dressed up in their disguises and putting on their makeup. Harley then fed her hyenas and Ivy fed her plants before getting into Ivy's car driving over to the newly opened Wayne Towers. They met with one of the agents and after talking for a bit, they quickly signed the necessary paperwork, made the first payment, and were given the keys to their new condo. A couple days later after spending previous getting ready for the movie, they moved into their new condo. Ivy had gotten a nice greenhouse for her plants installed out on the patio behind their house. Harley of course wasn't supposed to have her hyenas living there with them but she brought them anyway and they just made sure the people working for the building never saw them.
15533111111112111221211.title: Harley suggests that they move into a nicer place

choices: Laying low for a while, Ivy reveals new scheme, Harley plays on computer nonstop
Free Choice
155331111111121112212112.content:
Poison Ivy made her way around the greenhouse, green body wobbling as she casually watered her babies. Today she was dressed in a rather casual sundress that expressed her apple-esque build rather nicely, even her spandex refused to fit around her curves anymore. She walked around the room barefoot, letting her chubby toes sink inbetween the mulch. As she moved the watering can from plant to plant, she hummed a casual tune with a slight smile on her face, watering her plants always made Pamela Isely smile.

She hit the last one, finally. Time for the next row, her carnivorous 'children' stared at her with non-existant eyes, hungry for the special plant food that their mommy had created just for them. "Oh hush, you." she said, tossing an average sized, geneticly modified Pitcher Plant a large chunk of her special organic food. It made an odd sound, like a clicking combined with a hum. Ivy knew that this was a sincere sign of gratitude. The smile spread wider across her rounded face, "I know, babies" she cooed, scratching the underside of a Little-Shop-of-Horrors sized flytrap, "Mama's gonna feed you."

She took a small bit of food from the bag and popped it into her mouth, telling herself she was just testing it. She could almost feel the collective glare of her unfed plants. "Right, sorry, won't happen again." she sheepishly grinned

A few rooms over, Harley Quinn sat at her usual spot, in her own room with the most upgraded technology that came standard in Wayne Towers. She was really enjoying herself, new flatscreen computer moniter, fancy desk, comfy office chair, and a big fluffy bed to fall back on when a hard day of scouring the web was over and done with. The blonde girl took a sip from her straw, icy soda seeping into her mouth and travelling down her throat.

Harley hummed along with the lyrics that blasted from her headphones, eagerly clicking away at the keys. She was so excited to be in Wayne Towers, Wayne Towers of all places! The clowness had hardly left her room, let alone the apartment, this past week; it was just so cool!

Another development that had gone unnoticed this week was that "BatWing" sightings around Wayne Towers had increased somewhat, even Batman's stealthiness had it's limits when in a multi-billion dollar jet. As predicted, the Bat was keeping tabs on these two villainesses, aware that these funds had been acquired illegally. However, Batsy had only seen them do it once, about a month and a half ago. God knows in Gotham how many other crimes could have happened while he was away.

But today, the Dark Knight was going to try a much more different coarse of action...

The doorbell rang on the newly rented apartment, and then again when neither of it's residents answered. It took a third time before Harley finally heard it through her headphones.

"COMIN'!!" she answered, quickly shoving Bud and Lou under the bed. "Hold up!" she called again, making her way around the large apartment, tripping over the couch; another impatient ring. "I SAID I'M--" Harley stopped herself as soon as she opened the door; Bruce Wayne, world renowned billionare playboy, the Prince of Gotham, was standing at her doorstep.

"M-Mistah Wayne?" Harley couldn't help but be a little starstruck, Brucie tended to have that effect on even the psychopaths of Gotham

"Doctor Quinzell." Wayne smiled courtesously to his sociopathic tennant, "May I come in for a second?"

"S-Sure, of course ya can!" Harley gushed a little, "IVY!! WE GOT COMPANY!!"

As the two waited for the pudgy plant woman, Bruce simply stood at the doorway politely, two large boxes gripped under his bulging arm. No one seemed to question why Mr. Wayne worked out so much, and most of the women in Gotham didn't seem to care. "Oh please, why don'tcha siddown?" Harley pleaded the luxurious landlord. "Oh no, I couldn't." Wayne answered modestly, actually a little wary to sit down in a room that could have been modified in any way by these two criminals. Getting out of something like that would surely blow his cover...

Down the hall, from the designated greenhouse, Ivy's footsteps could be heard as she plodded down the hall. "Alright, now who's so important that you-" she herself paused, not quite ready to gush as much as her partner in crime, but still just a little excited to see Bruce Wayne in her apartment.

"Mr. Wanye." Pamela Isely greeted her guest in a rather husky tone. She was sweating a little because of the heat required to keep her plants comfy, persperation dripping down her corpulance.

Bruce himself couldn't help but be a little shocked, "M-Ms. Isely." he greeted just as calmly as he could muster. Granted, he hadn't seen Poison Ivy in quite a while, but Wayne, along with just about every other socialite in town, knew that she was an eco-terrorist who took her looks proudly. To see the mighty Ivy weighing in at about 200 pounds was quite a shocker; even to one so stoic as Batman.

An eerie silence blossomed between the three, until Ivy broke the silence. "You just gonna stand there, Brucie?" she asked, leaning in towards him, "What's in the boxes?"

Wayne regained his composure, "Oh, it's just a little welcoming present for our two... newest guests here at Wayne Towers," he grabbed the packages from his underarm, "Chocolates, for both of you."

Both of the girls eyed their prizes greedilly, if Bruce Wayne had bought these chocolates, they must have been good. Ivy stared hers down, nothing she couldn't eat; that was rare. Harley immediately opened her box up, "Thanks a lot -pop- Mistah Wayne!" she embraced the muscular benefactor in a quick hug of gratitude, "These are -chew- great!"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------
"What a nice guy," Harley mused as she chewed on one of her caramel nouget chocolates, "Makes me wish I hadn't tried tah kill'im a few yea's back."

Ivy slouched on the couch, flipping the channel on the absolutely massive TV that dominated left corner of the apartment. "Meh," she responded, taking a little time to pop another candy into her mouth, "Ew, peanut butter." she wretched.

"Hey, give those tah me!" Harley rubbed her stomach, "I love peanut buttah!"

Ivy mulled it over for a second, but ultimately decided to devour those morsels last. "Aw come on, Red!" Harley whined.

She teased Harley with a long glance, feigning deep thought. She simply fed the chocolate to her mouth much more dramaticly than usual, just to irk Harley, who immediately retreated to pouting on the couch with her hyenas.

"Fine, and I was gonna give you the chocolates that I didn't eat, too." she huffed, pushing a bon bon past her lips
155331111111121112212112.title: A Most Illustrious Guest (or Batsy: Incognito)

choices: They try Ivy's new scheme and it works
They Ivy's new scheme and it doesn't work because of her weight
1553311111111211122121121.content:
While Bruce hadn't give them any reason to be suspicious, both Harley and Ivy agreed to lay low for a bit before committing their next crimes. Bruce was a rich and powerful man so he very concieveable assigned a private detective or one of his works to watch them. In no way did they want their villeness identies to be found out and be kicked out of the apartment. For the next couple of weeks, Harley was pretty much playing on the coputer nonstop while Ivy sat on her fat ass continuing to eat lots and be lazy. It was after a couple of weeks that Ivy fet like it was safe to start commiting crimes again. It was also around this time that she came up with another new scheme. She had been playing around with it in her mind for a bit now but finally felt like it was completed.

After her now typical lunch of two cheeseburgers, fries, and a large chocolate milkshake one day, she decided to reveal her plan to Harley who was on the computer as always. She made her way over to the computer room and smirked as she saw her friend playing games and listing to her music. Knowing that Harley had her music up loud and wouldn't be able to hear her, she stepped over to her and montioned for Harley to take off her clothes. Harley was deep into a game and didn't like to be bothered but pressed stop and took of her headphones. "Okay Red, what's up? This better be good as I was in the middle of a good game and I don't bother you when you are in your snacking trances" Harley said. She instantly felt a little bad about the dig at Ivy's weight but considering how Ivy had been a little rude to her in the past, she didn't feel too bad.

Ivy blushed a little but shook it off. She still hadn't realized how much weight she had actually gained so that is why Harley's comment didn't upset her too much. "Oh it is Harl! I have a brilliant idea for our nest heist" Ivy said with an evil smile. "Well lay it on me, I am all ears" Harley said, perking up considerably. "Well I have been playing around with my powers on the pizza delivery boy and I find that if I give men a kiss on the cheek I can control their minds. Wouldn't it be great if I could just give one little kiss to each of the arourmed truck guards and get them to deliver the money to us. Wouldn't that be just fabulous and so much easier?" Ivy asked. While Harley did love the thrill of robbery, she had become addicted to being online, and so Ivy's new way would allow her to be online more. "Ya know Red that does sound a whole lot easier. We should totally try it. Plus I love seeing what you do to men" Harley said with an evil grin.

"Great! How about we start this afternoon?" Ivy suggusted iwth a grin. "Sure" Harley agreed.
1553311111111211122121121.title: Laying low for a while, Ivy reveals new scheme,...

choices: Success!! Harley and Ivy get rich, Rich, RICH!!
Failure, They don't even get a penny thanks to... Catwoman?
15533111111112111221211211.content:
Another normal day in Gotham City for Mark. The same dark, dreary city that seemed to be eerilly awake at all times, yet with it's eyes closed that it always was. The whole concept was a little new for Mark, who had recently made the shift from Metropolitan to Gothamite just a few months ago. He had scored a sweet job working the armored trucks that transported money back and froth from banks; unaware of the upcoming events (as most unsuspecting victims usually were)

He turned into the docking area, they were literally just supposed to throw the money in the back and he could drive off, back to his stark white home of Metropolis for the night and come back on Friday.

Sighing a little bit, brushing his unkept hair from his eyes, the young man stepped out of the armored car, dropping his keys under the plated vehicle. "Oh geez..." he grumbled, tonight hadn't exactly been the best night of his short career.

Craning his neck to avoid the foot catch, he felt his shoulder brush against the suspension; but there was something else. Something... soft. There was soon a hacking coing from under the car.

"Oh my... -kaff-, " Harley Quinn soon emerged from under the van covered in soot, "That's so -hak- Nasty!"

While he was only a little bit familiar with the scum that scoured around Gotham, Mark knew very well how dangerous a woman who had apparantly been clinging onto the bottom of his company car, that held probably more than a few couple hundred thousand dollars for several miles had the potential to be; very.

"Wh-Who are you, man?"

Harley held up a finger to excuse herself while she coughed, "Ho--Hol up a secon'." she said politely. Oddly enough, Mark didn't take this opportunity to run, probably the testosterone convincing him that this chick was probably good in the sack.

Finally, she stood up and brushed some soot from her spandex getup. "Harley Quinn, suga'." she shook his hand firmly, which he limply reciprocated. Then he felt a few thousand volts surge up his arm, courtesy of Harley's joy buzzer.

"Uh-oh," Harley feigned concern for her shaggy-haired hostage, "Shouldn' be sleepin' on tha job!"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------
Inside the very warehouse that was supposed to house the docking personel, Poison Ivy had several other drivers tied up to chairs; Mark included.

She stood in all her pudgy glory, resorting to covering her more private areas in hand crafted leaves (except her crotch, Ivy's gut made quick work of covering most of that). She applied her special lipstick, designed to release pharamones designed solely for manipulating men to do her bidding, however a single batch was made just in case they ran into the odd female driver (Gotham didn't seem to have many)

She purred, raising up an elderly black driver's head to deliver a quick peck. The man awoke immediately, eyes widened to a very zombie-esque manner. The next was the lanky redhead next to him, nametag reading Paul. She smooched him lightly on the cheek, his demeanor also shifted dramaticlly. And another one, making Mark the odd one out. Who, as of this moment, shifted in his seat. He was waking up.

"Ugh... where..." he looked around through his hair, only to see a heavy-set green chick ready to kiss him on the cheeks. "Woah!" he jumped back as much as his bindings would let him, "What is this, some kinda freakout?!"

Ivy pouted, "Oh come now..." she took a sly glance at his nametag, "Mark, it'll be over in just a second."

Mark realized what was going on quickly; another girl had heard of how much of a football stud he was and she kidnapped him. Granted, none of them had been green before. "Sorry baby," he said nervously, "I think a few other girls gotcha beat." he glanced at her gut, "But you definately hold the heavy weight bel--"

Ivy silenced his impudent mouth with a quick peck, every driver on shift today was under her complete control. She untied her captives, confident in her pharamone manipulation. "So, men," she said, dropping her the sultry demeanor, "Get to work, get down to the warehouse and drop off the money to Harley, you all know Harley, don't you?"

Obediantly, of course, every man in the room nodded.
15533111111112111221211211.title: Pharamone... is that how it's spelled?

choices: Ivy and Harley get the first taste of their newfound wealth!
...but there was one little snag in the proceedings.
155331111111121112212112111.content:
Ivy paced nervously around the apartment, her tummy jiggling with every footstep. Normally she would have felt self-conscious about her portliness being on display, but all thoughts were on the plan. It wasn't foolproof; any one of a number of things could go wrong, but it all depended on those men doing what they were told. How ironic.

Chewing on her lower lip, she nearly jumped when her cellphone started ringing. Taking a deep breath, she checked the phone. It was Harley. Here's hoping...

"Harley?"

"IVY! HOLY CRUD, IT'S WORKIN', THEY'RE ALL COMIN' BACK WITH CASH!"

Ivy's heart soared into her throat, but she kept her composure. "All of them, Harl? We can't let anyone slip by."

"Uh, two...three...five...yeah, they're all here!" Harley said excitedly. "Holy crap, Red, we gotta get ourselves a money vault like Scrooge McDuck!"

"All in good time, Harl. Keep things safe, I'll be sending over some help."

"Ooh, more of your plants?"

"Not quite, I'll text you and let you know," Ivy said as she hung up the phone. Almost immediately afterwards, it buzzed again, and a selfie of Harley in front of bags and bags of money popped up on the screen. Ivy rolled her eyes and pocketed the phone. Stomach rumbling, she retrieved a pint of ice cream from the freezer and a large spoon to bide the time, rewarding herself for the flawless execution of the plan. Perhaps she didn't realize how hungry she had been, because before she knew it her spoon scraped the bottom of the carton. Letting out a little moan of disappointment, she patted her ice-cream stuffed tummy and set the empty carton aside. Before she could open another carton, there was a sharp knock on the door and Ivy crossed the room to open it, revealing a short, portly man in a top hat and tuxedo, adjusting his monocle to glare at a golden pocket-watch.

"Good evening, Mr. Cobblepot." Ivy said in a sultry tone.

"This had better be worth my time, Ms. Isley," the Penguin said tersely. "I risk missing Mefistofele to see you over this matter."

"Oh, I'm sure this will be worth your while." Ivy replied warmly.
