The Penguin scoffed, his good eye glancing at Ivy's portly figure before he shuffled off to take a seat at the table, Ivy sitting across from him. "I will be brief for your sake, Mr. Cobblepot. Me and an associate have come into a substantial amount of money."

"I take it through less then legal means? I'm aware of your recent ATM tomfoolery with that dreadful Clown's lady companion." Penguin's face twisted in disgust at the very thought of the Joker.

"Indeed," Ivy continued. "And I was hoping we could use some of your contacts to help us out with our sudden wealth. Make sure we're all set up for the foreseeable future."

"Exactly how much are we talking, Miss Isley?" Ivy quietly slid her phone over to him, showing the selfie that Harley took with the cash. Penguin's monocle fell with a clatter to the table as his eyebrows shot up.

"My, my," he said, a hint of bluster in his tone as he retrieved his eyepiece and returned the phone. "That's quite a haul, as you say. But sadly, I do not think I will be of much use, considering my current financial predicament..."

"Ah, yes," Ivy said with a wide smile. "The DA investigating your activities, are they?"

"Their accusations of embezzlement and fraud are spurious!" the Penguin squawked. "When my lawyers finish clearing up this matter I intend to counter-sue them for besmirching my good name!"

"Ah, that's what I was getting to," Ivy said, glancing down as her phone buzzed again. "The DA has been trying to get the Gotham National Bank to surrender their financial records regarding your businesses right?"

"And what of it?" Cobblepot sneered. Again, without a word, Ivy slid the phone towards the diminutive villain. This time, Harley had sent a photo of herself smashing up a computer server with her mallet, her pet hyenas in the background devouring a stack of documents. Cobblepot glanced at Ivy suspiciously.

"I'm afraid the DA's office is going to have a hard time doing that," Ivy explained. "It seems all records of your financial activities were...misplaced. Quite a shame, really." The Penguin's eyes darted back and forth as he pondered.

"All my records?" Penguin asked.

"All your records," Ivy confirmed. "I imagine the DA is going to catch a lot of fire for harassing an upstanding citizen of Gotham with false charges, don't you?"

The Penguin thought for a moment, then laughed, a sharp squawking laugh not unlike his shout of anger.

"Oho, you are a crafty one, Miss Isley!" he said delightedly. "I think we could work together on your finances from your sudden windfall after all!"

"I'm pleased to hear that," Ivy said.

"I believe I can send some men to help your clown friend," the Penguin said, getting up to leave. "Then we can begin to look over your financial straits, yes?"

Ivy smiled as the portly criminal walked out the door. It was all going perfectly; Harley had the money and in return for her record vandalism the Penguin would help cover their tracks. At last, it was the perfect crime, and she and Harley were going to be up to their eyeballs in green. So to say.

This, Ivy decided, calls for another carton of ice cream!
155331111111121112212112111.title: A High Society Helping Hand

choices: "I have plans for this city, Harl...BIG plans..."
"There is going to be a special party this evening. Perhaps we could go...?"
1553311111111211122121121111.content:
Sadly Harley's desire for a swimming pool of money wasn't feasible even with the haul they had, but besides that the heist had gone about as brilliantly as the two criminals could have hoped for. The guards had no memories of their mind control once Ivy's toxins wore off, and by sabotaging the bank records to muddy the waters, Gotham PD couldn't hope to track the heists back to Ivy and Harley. It really was the perfect crime, and thanks to the Penguin's connections all that money was just going to keep making more money for the girls, meaning they wouldn't need to knock over another ATM ever again. And while the world's greatest detective might have been able to connect the dots, Gotham headlines were abuzz with news that their resident Dark Knight was spotted in Kahndaq with the rest of the Justice League, so by the time he was reported to be back home fighting Two-Face's goons, there was no longer really a case to solve; the Federal Reserve kicked in to replace the stolen funds and although Batman had his suspicions regarding the two, there was nothing he could do except watch them until they slipped up.

Months later, the Dark Knight sat at his hi-tech computer, glaring at the side-by-side files of Pamela Isley and Harleen Quinzel. "What about offshore enterprises," he pondered. "Isley has funded Eco-terrorists before, have any groups gotten an influx of cash."

"No Bruce, none that I can find," Oracle responded over the secure comm channel. "I can try to breach the Unternet and see if any of the other villains are talking about them?"

"I see we're persistent as ever, Master Wayne?" Alfred remarked coolly as he strode up behind Batman's seat. "How many months has it been now, since you've returned from Khandaq? Two, maybe three?"

"Pretty sure it's three," Oracle answered. Bruce rubbed his temples, frustrated at the appalling lack of evidence in front of him. "Bruce, are you sure these two are worth the trouble right now?"

"They committed a crime," Batman said flatly. "And knowing Isley, she has to be planning something." Alfred gave a little sigh as he read over the criminal records.

"I'm not so sure, Bruce," Oracle said. "I didn't find anything incriminating, but I have found something that could be relevant." Immediately, news headlines filled the screen on the Batcomputer filling up the space around the two villains.

GOTHAM BOTANICAL GARDEN PLANS MILLION DOLLAR EXPANSION

ENVIRONMENTALIST GROUP SCORES BIG LEGAL VICTORY AGAINST POWERS TECHNOLOGY

GOTHAM GREATLY EXPANDS FUNDING FOR ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION

"I sense a bit of a pattern," Alfred said with a hint of sarcasm.

"This is the only stuff I've been finding related to these two," Oracle explained. "I don't know what Harley is up to, but I can tell you that someone has been super active in giving donations to environmental groups. If that's not Isley at work I'll eat the Batmobile's tire."

"I take it you haven't found anything suspect..." Batman said.

"Not a thing. The money came from reputable sources, and everything is documented and perfectly legal. And not even the shady kind of questionable legality we deal with, whoever's doing this is being downright charitable."

"If I may be so bold, Master Wayne," Alfred interjected. "Perhaps so long as Miss Isley is doing some good, it would be prudent to let her keep doing what she is currently doing?" Batman frowned, but he had to admit, Alfred had a point. Perhaps for now it would be best to take a step back and let the charity work continue if only because there were other matters that needed his attention.

"Whoop, someone just turned the bat signal on Bruce, I can see it from the tower," Oracle announced.

"Thanks Oracle," Batman said, standing to head for the Batmobile. "I'll be in touch. Keep your ear to the ground for these two."

---

"Thank you so much Miss Isley! With your donation we'll be able to keep the Arboretum funded for the next five years, how could we ever repay you?"

"It is enough to know your darling plants are cared for," Ivy said with a smile. "I'll make sure your organization receives the money by the end of the week." The intern on the other end of the phone squealed with delight before hanging up, leaving Ivy to bask in yet another wonderful cause supported. Perhaps the Pamela Isley of several months prior would have been appalled to see her doing anything less then wiping out humanity to save her precious plants, but even she would have to admit it was worth not getting pummeled by Batman. Yes that was it, she was being smart about it. Certainly not being lazy, right?

Of course she had every right to be in the opulent new penthouse she rented with her partner in crime. Designed in elegant marble and gold highlights, the new location was practically a mansion, complete with a kitchen fit for a platoon of chefs and several bedrooms with the biggest beds you could ask for, to say nothing of the brand new perfectly built greenhouse she kept her darlings in. Yes, Ivy was living the high life, with every luxury and elegant offering a girl could hope for.

And some she could have done without, Ivy grumbled as she waddled into the hallway outside the bedrooms.

Yes, waddled. Already portly pre-heist, her newfound extravagant wealth did nothing to slow down her weight gain; if anything, it accelerated it. Her blown out tummy blew out even more now, swaying back and forth with each ponderous step and hanging over her waistband when it wasn't stuffed taut, and even its impressive girth couldn't hide Pamela's thunder thighs and wide rear end, which needed two of the old chairs she had to sit comfortably (Ivy had upgraded her furniture to double wide and reinforced, just in case). That was to say nothing of her impressive knockers, which had swollen close to the size of her own head, including the thick double chin quickly being chased by a third. Despite her impressive size though, Ivy was still dressed in a pretty black nightgown that looked close to snapping off her corpulent form, perhaps a last ditch effort to convince herself that she had self-control that hadn't been sapped away by her partner.

In any case, Ivy still had some work to run by Harley, and she wanted it done so she could go eat. Making her way to one of the bedrooms, Ivy hip checked the door and walked in.

Harley had little interest in the luxuries and charitable foundations that Ivy did, so she had used the new money mostly for one purpose; updating her computer system from a high-tech gaming rig to a state of the art system. Nowadays she spent all day in the bedroom she converted to a PC room, playing games and surfing the web in between snooping around security systems to hone her tech skills, and the last few months have been good to her in that regard. Harley could be the villain equivalent of Oracle if she wanted to, if only she could tear herself away from Runescape to do anything productive.

"Harley, there you are!"

"Where else would ah be, Red?" Harley quipped, slurping her soda and letting out a belch before turning around in her chair. All that computer time had taken a toll on Harley as well, taking her from a little tubby to properly fat; the belly that once poked out of her shirt when she stretched did it all the time now, growing so wide that it filled her chair when she sat down. That feat was also accomplished by her butt and thighs, straining to be contained by her tight shorts, the whole effect making her look like she was fitted into her seat like play-doh. Ivy still had a hundred pounds or so on the tubby little jester, but she was rapidly catching up.

"You needed somethin'?" she said innocently, resting her burgeoning second chin in her hands.

"Yes..."
1553311111111211122121121111.title: Ivy and Harley Living Large

choices: It takes time, but Harley manages to snag a meeting with a corporate fatcat.
No big fish bite; Ivy considers a backup plan.
15533111111112111221211211111.content:
"I have plans for this city, Harl...BIG plans..."

Harley raised a curious eyebrow. "Isn't that what I've been helpin' you with the whole time, Pam? The investments and the eco-stuff?"

"And you've been wonderful at that, darling," cooed Ivy. "But as much as I enjoy funding those who care for plants, I think it's time we put our vast fortune to a much more noble cause; winning the war between man and nature."

"Aw, shucks," Harley moped, sinking a little into her chair. "Can't the destruction of mankind wait? I don't wanna rob another ATM or somethin'..."

"Oh no Harley, I don't intend to interrupt our lavish lifestyle for this endeavor," Ivy explained. "I have a more...subtle approach. Come, let me show you."

Ivy tugged herself out from between the arms of her chair and bounced on her heels in excited interest, her belly bouncing up and down with her movement. Pamela led the jester through the foyer and out to the greenhouse, a new addition to the suite and quite an elaborate one at that, with so much plant life that you couldn't see in from the outside. Just as Ivy liked it.

Harley looked around at the plants with growing curiosity before the portly plant lady stopped in front of a large bush, dotted with bulky looking mustard yellow flowers. Upon seeing Ivy approach, the plants shook off some of their green and yellow splotched leaves, letting Ivy collect them and bring the plant material to a work bench, where a plate of cookies was stacked high alongside her chemistry equipment.

"Mmm!" Harley said, reaching towards the tray of cookies, only to yelp and withdraw her hand when Ivy smacked it.

"Not yet Harl, patience," Ivy explained, turning back to her chemistry setup. Harley eyed the plate of cookies as she waited for Ivy to finish turning the leaves of the weird bush into a bright yellow tincture.

"Ooh, whatcha got there Ivy? Another hypo potion?"

"Why don't you try it and find out?" Ivy encouraged, getting a triumphant look on her face as Harley, being the ditz that she was, guzzled down the chemical without a second thought. Hiccuping softly, she placed a hand over her stomach and pondered the sensation.

"Mmm, tangy and sweet!" Harley said approvingly. "Now I wish I had something to go with it though..."

"Help yourself, then!" Ivy said, pushing the tray slightly towards her.

"Cookies!" Harley exclaimed before grabbing onto stray baked goods with both hands and beginning to feast. "Man, if that's a mind control formula, I'm glad it goes great with meals now, haha!"

"Not merely mind control Harl. Addiction. An addiction that will finally end man's crusade against Mother Earth." Ivy explained as Harley kept eating. "Give this compound to a human and they will be too busy stuffing their face with processed foods to try and cut down trees or murder the flora with their polluting habits. But they will need to consume this formula first, and for that I need your help."

"Hrmf?" Harley said through a mouthful of cookies.

"What we need to do is buy our way into the corporate offices in Gotham and get everyone who serves food to prepare meals with this compound," Ivy explained. "One dose is enough for the addiction to take hold, and from there it will do all the work." Ivy grabbed onto Harley's hand gently, who whimpered as the cookie she was trying to eat was delayed. "Do you think you can do that for me, Harley?"

Harley gave a salute. "You can count on me Red!"
15533111111112111221211211111.title: Ivy's Big Plan

choices: Karen Starr, Secret Identity of Power girl
Veronica Cale, Wonder Woman's enemy.
155331111111121112212112111111.content:
Harley put in an astounding level of work for being a ditzy airhead.

It turned out no one in Gotham wanted to work with Ivy. Supposedly reformed or not, few of the corporate fat cats wanted to work with someone who had mind controlled large parts of the city, repeatedly broken out of Arkham and once turned the botanical garden into a carnivorous nightmare during a gala. Those few who did were eager to get green PR points working with the photogenic botanist until they say they once dainty woman in the flesh. Once a short, svelte hour glass able to get the attention of most men and women, Pamela Isling was now head turningly fat, blitzing towards 300 lbs with the drive of the Red Army closing in on Berlin. Her fat habits were putting her into a new dress size every new Sunday and given that meetings were on Fridays, the potential sponsors sat through her food pitch watching green tinged belly flesh quiver through the gaps of her stretched buttons and her leg fat pour through unnoticed stocking runs. She rarely stopped eating during the pitch, twice she and Harley ate their own product before she could even offer a sample, not that anyone took it.

"That Wayne is a swine! I tell you a swine," Ivy fumed as she and Harley rode the elevator down from Wayne tower, "back in the day when I dated Harvey he couldn't keep his eyes off me! The nerve to say my product is unmarketable, just due to my past!"

"But Red, he said it was because of yer fat! Not yer past!" The chunky ex-clown said beside her, poking a finger into Ivys jello gut

"Please Harley, it's five pounds max," the obese villain denied, swatting away her hand, totally unable to fully admit her stunning expansion, convince a pair of spanx would hide her hundred pound weight gain.

The motion caused a rip to run up the side of her skin tight grey dress, from hip to breast. Ivy was wearing a size twenty gown totally inappropriate for a business meeting even if it hasn't been skin tight. Although it did flatter her pale breasts, it also had been stretched over her gut.

"Ugh! I just bought this! Goes to show you why mankind needs to change, lest cheap crap like this fills up the dumps!" Ivy ranted.

The two waddled out of the elevator, drawing a few snickers from onlookers at Ivy's wardrobe malfunction. Once they'd been figures of fear, but now? Both had employed acrobatic fighting styles, now ones that they were obviously incapable of even attempting. Ivy's ferocious plant powers were still at play and Harely might have a gun, but to see the one agile sirens huff, puff and waddle across the streets of a city they'd terrorized was beyond cathartic. Especially as Ivy was ranting about the flimsiness of modern disposable clothing while trying to hold her ripping dress together, until the coat department gave them both their outer garments, out grown suit jackets tat couldn't fit if their lives depended on it.

'And that is why hemp is a preferable alternative to cotton,' Ivy finished as they left through the turning doors, their atrophied muscles having to push pretty damn hard against its weight.

Harely wasn't paying attention but knew her friend's ranting time down pat. As Ivy finished, suddenly woozy on her feet from the effort, Harely pulled a king sized candy bar out of her purse and handed it over. Ivy started Kuching immediately, while the psychiatrist stuck out a thick, but curvy leg for a cab. A faint buzzing was heard as they shoved their tubby bulks into the cab and Harley managed to pull her cellphone out of her breast pocket just before the call ended.

Ivy glared at her as the conversation took the entire ride home, less than half a mile. It was as sin to use so much fossil fuel, but the distance was beyond the uber zaftig redhead's wind. After laboriously hauling tier weak, heavy bodies from the car (which involved several more rips to form on Ivy's dissenting rating dress, the two managed to get inside their building and into the elevator where Harley hung up.

'Great news Red, we've got a buyer who's real interested in your pitch,' Harley squealed.

'Who? We've tried every legitimate businessman and most illigetimate ones in Gotham,' Ivy huffed, trying to hold her clothes together.

'Oh not in Gotham, across the river in NYC,' Harley quivered, 'a big female head honcho wants to try your health food.'

'Don't leave me hanging here Harley,' Ivy demanded, even though her left breast literally was hanging out now, 'who is it?'
155331111111121112212112111111.title: It takes time, but Harley manages to snag a mee...

Harley recognizes Karen as Power Girl
1553311111111211122121121111111.content:
'So, who is this fat cat?' Ivy asked Harley in the back of an electric, self driving limousine on the way to meet Karen Starr, in between chocolates.

It was perhaps a little late to ask such questions, but Ivy had been preoccupied finding a dress that fit her ballooning, gut heavy form. Nothing she had did, her hunt resulting in a dozen trash bags of clothes to donate to good will, and all she could find was a size eighteen pants suit that had been nearly outgrown two weeks ago. Two pairs of spanx and an honest to god corset used when the two super criminals felt amorous were required to squeeze the obese vixen into her dress. They gave her waist an odd, overly smooth shape that was still well into the overweight range and pushed her green tinted tits up to her budding third chin. As her gain was Apple shaped her pants kind of fit, if one assumed she chose to wear slacks tight as leggings. Still the seams were only on the verge of breaking and the rubber band holding its flaps together wasn't even that stretched, so she might as well treat herself to some chocolate for going down a size.

'Oh, she's not exactly a fat cat,' Harley told her, flicking through her phone, 'she's in as good a shape as I used to be!'

'Harley, you're not fat. I keep telling you, you're body is just detoxing from all of that consumerist crap,' Ivy lied.

'Ya keep saying that Red, but when we met I was a size two and yesterday my ass ripped out the seat of pair of size ten sweats when I was picking up a controller!,' Harley whined, 'I'm pretty chunky nowadays.'

The once energetic clown had developed a bad case of screen addiction, be it to phones or video games her ADD couldn't pull itself away. A case of carpal tunnel was coming with it, and she winced as she flipped the screen and adjusted the brace on her right arm. Harley was only kind of fat, a toneless and flabby 165 lbs, dumpy with a chunky ass and a floppy lower belly not flattered by her snug size twelve pant suit. Her blonde hair was drawn back in a bun, which didn't do much but show off her double chin.

How the once athletic crown princess of crime had gotten her was an easy store. Her new legal but unhealthy video game habits had robbed her muscles of any tone prior to her addiction and put the foundation of her gain across her plump butt, but thirty of that had come in the last month since getting addicted to Ivy's substance. For every pound the ballooning redhead put on, Harley had put on two. She ate all the time now, even when she was asleep sometimes she'd wake up in front of an empty. The only exception was when she had sometime to work on, some attention to focus her snack grabbing fingers upon. If it hadn't been for the mission from her green girlfriend Harley would have surely been even porkier!

'It's all for the greater good Harley, just imagine all those green house gases stored safely inside your body,' Ivy reassure her, trying to grab another box of chocolates but stymied by being unable to bend, 'but go on about the fat cat.'

'She's a big up and comer in the tech industry, quantum computing, green energy, electric cars, you name it her company is into it,' Harley said, flipping through her phone as the car pulled up.

'Good she'll be easy to win over then,' Ivy laughed, 'help me out of the car.'

It took a minute. Harley's arms, once strong enough to punch out a bat brat with one swing of a hammer were now more suited to using a joystick. Everyday they got weaker and Ivy got heavier, making hauling the increasingly rotund plant hybrid from the car a growing struggle. A couple pops sounded faintly from Ivy's restraining garments, but she managed to get out of the car with her dignity intactish and Harley was only mildly sweaty when they were ushered into the stylish sky scraper by a waiting intern and guided to an express elevator.

'So, I'm guessing we're going to see a frumpy, nerdy tech geek,' Ivy preened on the elevator ride up, 'easy to over awe for someone of my stature?'

'Yeah, if she's awed of green marshmellows' Harley grunted.

Having become a frumpy, video game playing nerd who's 20/20 vision had been ruined By screens to the point of needing coke-bottle frames, the once agile gymnast didn't like the second hand dig. Especially as she was usually awed by Ivy's increasingly spherical physique. Only 5'1, the pixish Eco terrorist was a gross parody of corporate greed, stuffed inside a far too tight red and white pantsuit like a ripe tomato. Harley loved how funny her huffing and puffing sounded, as well as how soft, squishy and sensitive Ivy was getting in the sack.

'And I keep telling ya,' Harley said as the express elevator slowed, 'she's not fat she's...'

The doors dinged open, into the executive office.

"Dr. Isley, Dr. Quinzel, I'm Pleased to meet you," their host greeted standing up from behind a desk and offering a hand shake, 'Karne Starr.'

"Hot as shit," Harley whispered unnecessarily.

Ivys third impression was of well muscled curves, perfectly balanced. By her corded legs and sinewy arms, shown by a short skirt and tight blouse, the woman she'd derided as a fat cat must live in the gym's weight room and sprint track. By her rounded hips though she didn't seem to miss a meal, but the way her skirt sat against her hard stomach suggested there weren't a lot of deserts in them. Both were an expert in getting punched by very fit people and both agreed that a punch from Karen Starr would fucking hurt.

Ivy's second impression was of height. Most people were taller than the short bio botanist, even Harley's blonde curls were six inches above Ivys red hair, but Starrware's CEO had a foot on her. She was taller than almost any woman she'd seen in Gotham and most men would look up to see her ivory face, big green eyes behind stylish but thick glasses and curly red hair.

Ivy's third impression was tits. Tatas. Boobs. Bazookas. Cantaloupes. Melons. Hooters. Mammary mounds. Bounce meat. Jugs. Front butt. In a word, Breasts.

The villains weren't flat chested by any means after all their poundage: Harley had gone from a firm B to a floppy C and Ivy had inflated from a trim C to a pillowy set of sensitive F cups. But the CEO had as much cleavage on her chest as both chunky sirens did together! Ivy consoled herself by thinking that there was no way those could be real, they had to be silicone!

A nudge from Harley made Ivy take the hand, which was like a vice grip.

"So pleased to meet you," Ivy stammered.

The motion caused a lot of bouncy. Gaia, they were real. Crap, how could one woman be so perfect? This wasn't fair in Ivys mind, not with her getting a 'little' chubby! Seeing those hard bodied bimbo blow up would be sweet vengeance!

Especially as the tall CEO was eyeing Ivy up like a lioness watches a chubby gazelle.

'So Drs, your email claimed you had a new miracle, women's health food to pitch to me,' Starr said, patting her flat belly, 'As I have worked up an appetite this morning, I'll eat while you fill me in!"

Harley handed her the cooler, filled with carefully packaged cupcakes, cookies and streusel and the women retreated to a set of couches. Karen had opened and examined one excellently crafted cupcake on the way.

"Good presentation ladies, whose work?' She asked.

"That'd be me,' Harley beamed, 'well, the packaging actually. Dumplin here came up with the food.'

Which puzzled the beefy psychologist criminal. Ivy couldn't boil water, yet where had she gotten so many and so many high quality baked goods without

'You should be proud of yourself for your dedication, I've always thought you were creative,' Karen said.

Harley's brow crinkled, why did this woman sound familiar? Other thoughts were banished as Starr inhaled the cupcake. It was like a magic trick, in her hand one moment and then she was swallowing the next.

'Hmmm, these are excellent. Real sugar, real butter cream, yum. Let me order something for you,' the CEO smiled, wolfing down another cupcake and tapping her smart watch.

As Karen kept eating from the rapidly dwindling box, a door opened and a white plastic android rolled out on tracks, bearing a tray with a steaming basket of truffle fries and two very large sodas which it sat down in front of the two sirens. Ivy started eating right away but Harley's attention was on the bombshell across from them. She looked back and forth, amazed that the hoggish botanist and the ripped CEO were eating at the same rate.

Karen sighed and sat back as the last cupcake disappeared. She undid her belt and unsnapped her button, letting the zipper slide down under a small food baby. Her smile was for a moment perfectly content, then she sat up, predatory and business like again. Ivy had mostly finished the fries and her quart of soda and fraying sounds were emerging from her dress.

'Those were excellent and I'm going to need either a longer workout session or much bigger skirts,' the CEO joshed, 'now ladies, these cupcakes are a bit too good to be true. So I've got some questions for you...'

Ivy frowned, shoveling in fries. The formula was supposed to make anyone who ate it an obedient slave to her, dumb and pliable. What was this?

'I ran a diagnostic on the sample you'd sent earlier,' Karen went on, pulling out a folder, 'and the frosting on these contains several compounds not known to science but that appear to be more addictive than crack cocaine and meth combined.'

'You sent a sample?' Ivy huffed at Harley.

'Seemed like a good idea...' The clown quivered.

'And there are approximately 2000 calories per cupcake, unlike the twenty calories you claimed,' the CEO went on, 'and your sole residence doesn't have the energy usage indicating baking.'

'I can explain,' Ivy stammered, angry to be removed from her post meal euphoria...
1553311111111211122121121111111.title: Karen Starr, Secret Identity of Power girl

choices: Starfire, alien super model and kind of a ditz
Zatanna Zataran, famous stage magician and hotty.
15533111111112111221211211111111.content:
'Explain how you're trying to market an addictive cupcake of pure calories as a health food?' Starr put in, jabbing a finger into Ivy's constrained midsection.

'Its' that we have,' Ivy began, shoving another handful of truffle fries in to give herself time to think.

'Plans about body positivity?' Harley tried to finish.

'Right,' Ivy' said swallowing, interrupted by a long rip of fabric.

The rotund botanist looked down, trying to crane past her swollen cleavage to see anything and feeling the first layer of spanx go completely. With a glurge, her contained stomach expanded out and further strained the remaining spanx and corset.

'Body positivity?' the CEO huffed, 'you can't sell with that when you've gained two hundred pounds!'

'Listen you! You and your plastic, gym honed body,' the once nymphish woman hissed, waving an arm, 'you don't have any idea what real woman put up with!'

The motion caused another long rip as the second layer of spanx failed. Ivy winced as her gut rammed into the steel rods of her corset, which began to groan as its ties frayed. Gaps formed on the buttons of her shirt and suit jacket, spreading apart with tectonic pressure.

'I have an idea that no one will buy food made by someone who's as fat as you are,' Starr countered, poking at Ivy's belly button.

'I will not sit here and listen to someone so crazy as to say I'm fat!' the plant hybrid spat.

Ivy went to stand up, to indignantly declare they were leaving, but the small motion of rolling her hips forwards and letting the inertia of her gut carry her off the couch destroyed the sole restraining garment's desperate holding action. Laces failed in ten places, the corset snapped apart and for one horrible second Ivy's pale, slightly green stomach was tight against a dress shirt and jacket four sizes too small. The three women stared in blank eyed astonishment as Ivy's horribly atrophied stomach muscles tried to suck in the mound of fat but they failed and shirt buttons shot across the room like the opening bombardment of an amphibious landing. Karen's wine glass shattered, a snow globe cracked and Harley was saved from an eye injury only by the thickness of her coke bottle eye glasses.

'Now this is what I was referring to,' the CEO said, leaning over and kneading the mound of greenish lard spilling over Ivy's lap, 'its too obvious you're trying to fatten people up with these things when you're carrying around all of this. Your plan needs refinement, so its a good thing you came to me before trying it yourself.'

'You...you knew what we're planning to do?' Ivy asked in amazement.

'Yeah, what are we trying to do?' Harley asked, never having been fully told, 'how are these gonna save the world like you said Red?'

'Simple, Ivy makes plants that suck green house gas out of the atmosphere at an extreme rate, turning them into junk food,' Karen explained, picking up a triple stack of cookies, 'people eat the junk food, which gets stored as fat. A chemical Ivy put in them makes them addicted, they eat more of the junk food and don't spend money on anything else, all while getting fatter and fatter, storing more and more pollution. People get too fat to have kids or drive cars, there's no more fuel or land being used for agriculture, the amount of pollution falls etc etc the world is saved and humanity is too fat and happy to know the difference.'

This knowledge did not stop Karen from eating the treats, moaning aloud as she did so, 'Holy shit these are good.'

'Um, if you knew that, then why are you eating them?' Harley asked,a bit indignantly, 'if I'd known I wouldn't have eaten them!'

'Because I want to help you, I'm an environmentalist and electric cars alone can't save the environment, humans should carry some of their polluting sins with them and I've always wanted to get fat,' the CEO groaned, shoving more of the treats into her mouth, 'but before these there was never any thing dense enough energy wise. Now I can finally retire from the superheroing circuit without feeling guilty.'

The two sirens looked alarmed at each other as their host polished off the last of their samples.A heroine in front of them, with full knowledge of Ivy's plans? Neither knew they were in any condition to fight even the weakest super hero and going by her height and muscles whoever Starr really was could easily kick their ass. Hell, the CEO without being a heroine could do it given her muscles. Yes her belly appeared to contain a small bowling ball now and her fascinating cleavage looked ready to pop her top, but Ivy and Harley were in far worse condition while being full themselves. She was like Christina Hendricks, but younger and with an address inside a gym.

'Hehe, kinda funny,' Harley ventured, 'almost sounded like ya said...super hero...'

'I'm Power Girl, Harley,' the tech CEO groaned, polishing off the last of the baked goods and rising up in the air, several feet off the ground, 'were the tits not enough of a hint?'

Ivy almost shit herself. Power Girl was an all star in terms of physical prowess, some sort of relation to superman via some weird quantum mumbo jumbo, she was essentially invincible, faster than speeding bullets and capable of punching a train into Lunar orbit. If she wanted them in jail or defeated both she and Harley would be down for the count no matter their fatness. And how did she know Harley?

Beside the mushy botanist, Harley shook her head (second chin wobbling), unable to believe her eyes which was true of most things anymore for the near-sighted former gangster.

'But, Power Girl doesn't have red hair!' the clown gasped.

The red headed tycoon took off her wig, revealing short blonde hair.

'And she's tan!' the clown objected.

With a sigh, Power Girl wiped a hand across her forehead, smearing away makeup to show tan skin.

'But Power Girl doesn't wear glasses!' Harley objected, causing the tall woman to remove her specs, revealing her eyes to truly be a brilliant blue.

'How do you see without those?' the now short sighted villainess gasped.

'I see that you haven't changed one bit since we last hung out,' Power Girl sighed, pinching the bridge of her nose.

'You know her, Harley?' Ivy asked, feeling jealous of the much taller, fitter, more powerful woman.

'Yeah! She got hit in the head and got amnesia, so I made her my side kick! Then we got sucked through a portal at a mall and into space where I fought a robot that sewed up people's buttholes, then we got high and fought Sean Connery in a speedo! Before a bird pooped on her head, she got her memory back she left me tied naked in france!' the ditzy blonde explained.

Ivy blinked her eyes, knowing she'd never get the truth, 'Alright, Ms...Girl I assume, what can you do to help us?'

'Well, I can use the full infrastructure of my company to help create nationwide production chains and carbon neutral distribution services to feed 300 million people nothing but your food, state of the art labs to help you perfect your formulas and avoid the FDA,' Power Girl explained, 'as well as access to professional marketing teams.'

'Okay, that's a fair amount,' Ivy shrugged.

'I can also make sure the league is off our back,' the flying woman said, 'some of the vainer leaguers might object to gaining weight for the good of the planet. When Hawkgirl or Wonder Woman get big, they are not going to be happy.'

'I suppose that's agreeable,' Isley agreed, shuddering at having to go up against angry heroines in her current condition.

'And i can give you advice on these. For one thing, you've gotta tone down the calorie amount, if people double in weigh the first month its going to be noticed,' Power Girl advised, patting her own hefty temporary belly for emphasis, 'its gotta be gradual. If people see someone looking like me after one meal they won't buy.'

'And what do you want in return?' Ivy asked.

'Besides a new skirt,' Harley chimed in.

'Unfettered access to this stuff. Unadulterated, original formula, pure and uncut,' Power Girl said, pointing at the empty boxes, 'Like I said, I want to get fat. You're making it look good Ivy and I want to get up to your size.'

Ivy flushed, both at the compliment and being called fat.

'I think we can agree on those terms,' Ivy said, 'right Harley?'

'Oh yeah,' Harley said to the fuzzy blob in her blurry vision, trying to get the button out of her glasses lens, 'sure.'

'Great then,' Power Girl smiled, putting her wig back on and fixing her makeup, 'Let's sign some legal documents and get started on the marketing push. We can't have anyone link it to you, your past and new fat would drive people away. And once I start getting noticably fat we can't use me as a model either, but we want someone famous though, probably a super, we're trying to sell an image of unbelievable food.'

'I've got a few ideas,' Ivy offered.

155331111111121112212112111111111.content:
'That alien slut who bangs night wing,' Ivy said, 'I hate to be catty, but I can't stand a red head who's hotter than me. If I'm going to be be a little plump, she's going to be damn huge.'

'Ah pudding, no ginger could ever be hotter than you,' Harley soothed, patting a thick thigh, 'even if she is taller and thinner and younger and has bigger bazookas.'

'Great, I'll get on the horn and call her,' Power Girl told them both, 'I'll arrange everything, what I need from you two is to move your operation here to NY where I can get set up a full production site. We'll want a full marketing blitz and an initial run of actual diet food.'

'Actual diet food?' Ivy scoffed, 'there's no point if they're not bulking up!'

'And if people start ballooning at the first bite no one will eat it,' Karen reminded, patting her now protruding stomach, 'what we need is an addictive food that helps people lose a little weight at first. Most woman have an extra five pounds they'd want to drop, even the thinnest. Get them hooked and thinking they're healthy and only then hit them with the full weight gain when they're too focused on getting another hit to worry about their cellulite.'

Power Girl's stomach let out a vast, dangerous sounding groan.

'Oh, and I'm going to need a lot more of the full fat stuff in the mean time,' Karen smiled evilly, looking over Ivy's pile of fat rolls, 'gotta say Ivy, you make obesity look good...'

The evil plant hybrid went as red as her hair, 'Um, I should get going...'

'Oh, not yet,' Power Girl said, 'I'm still hungry...Harley, get us some chow...'

She eats it herself.
1553311111111211122121121111111111.content:
The day of the shoot dawned, finding one of Starware's office space fitted out with as a modeled apartment building and gym. In the background the photographer was testing out the lighting while assistants got the lighting right, while off to the side the make up technician powdered the nose of a somewhat orange woman.

'Friend Pow-er, er, Ms Starr,' the alien model said, almost spoiling the secret identity, 'there are a few things I don't understand.'

'Oh? What, *crunch*, what do you mean?' Power Girl said through a full mouth.

'You said this is for food? Right?' Koriand'r asked.

'Oh yeah, the best diet food in the country,' the CEO said, while pulling out another cookie from a paper bag, 'trust me.'

'Um, well it seems to be not much the food and much more the sex,' the red haired woman brought up, looking at the notes, 'It says here I deep throat a cone of creamy ice? And flick my tongue through a doughnut's hole? Why so much of sex in a food ad?'

'Uh...,' Karen thought for a minute.

An obvious answer would have been: because you're sexy as fuck.

The Teen Titan was an almost impossibly gorgeous specimen of her near human species. Impossibly long graceful legs, each flawlessly tan and perfectly shaped, went up to a vavoom hour glass figure with womanly hips, a washboard waist and spectacular DD cup breasts. Her face had a pointy chin, blindingly white teeth and insanely green eyes that lacked whites. Her curly red hair hung down to her ankles and at the bottom seemed to flutter as if on fire. The tamaranian super hero/model lacked any sort of modesty, she wore instead a miniscule black miniskirt and a white blouse that seemed to have been vacuumed onto her torso, showing off the deep valley of her cleavage.

'Uh...so people know eating the food will make them sexy?' Power Girl dodged, shoving another cookie into her mouth.

'Oh! Sense is made by that!,' Kori smiled, 'That is why I get into a bikini?'

'Yep, we've got to show out what the food does to you,' Karen nodded slowly, hoping starfire would buy her idiotic explanation.

'Oh good!' Kori nodded, 'but I have another of the questions. Why are you all bulgy?'

The Tamaranian puncutated the question by poking a finger into Karen's stomach, where rippling muscles used to bulge beneath the flat surface. Kori's fingertip met flesh four inches past where Power Girl's stomach used to be and instead of hard muscle her finger touched soft, buttery pudge peek-a-booing out over Karen's waistband.

'Just some ...well, you know you get near thirty and uh...' Power Girl tried deflecting, filling her mouth with cookies that made her cheeks bulge, 'you know...'

'Because you look like the fat has gotten to you...,' Kori mentioned, fingers idly pinching Karen's now doughy midsection.

Two weeks of constantly shotgunning Ivy's calorie laden miracle food had laid low the Kryptonian's magnificent figure. All of her shocking, impossible muscle tone had been disappeared as she chubbed up, minute by minute, snack by snack. When she'd met Ivy Karen had been in a size six skirt suit that had been tailored to her busty, muscular physique but now she was pouring out of a size ten pant suit that was coming apart at the seams.

'Okay, I've put on a few,' Power Girl admitted, 'five or six pounds...'

Sky blue polyester pants were stretched to the absolute limit by newly chunked thighs, the fabric badly chafed where Karen's thigh gap had filled in by lazy bulk. Her steely superhero butt now sagged heavily, having lost its heart shape as it dissolved into the doughy buns of an office worker seated ten feet from the vending machine and Karen's svelte hips had become messily wide and child bearing. Distinctly beefy ankles were seen above her pumps, which were stretched by her puffed up feet. Flawless abs had been the first to go, layered over with fat taken from twinkies and ho hos and ding dongs and donuts and cookies and pies and all the other chemically altered goodies Ivy's plants could cook up. Karen now sported an incredibly sloppy beer belly, several inches of sloppy dough coating her rapidly atrophying abs whose raw mass had declined alarmingly, and a meaty set of love handles that formed her ultra fluffy muffin top. Power Girl's blubbery midriff had bulked out so big two inches of pale fluff were visible between skin tight slacks and overloaded blouse. So outsized were her clothes that her button hung undone, supported only by her dress belt which was running out of holes.

'Did five or six mean something different on Krypton?' Kori asked, taking in all of the flab coating the Kryptonian, who seemed to have put on at least ten times that amount in a few weeks.

'Uh...let's get you onto set,' Karen said, filling her mouth with cookies and gesturing, grabbing the redhead by the arm and leading Kori over to the set, 'times a wasting!'

Kori noticed that something seemed to be wrong with Power Girl's stride, realizing her legs were too thick to walk past each other. And the seam across her butt was straining and groaning with every step.

The gesture was made with a very soft looking hand and the small flick led to a wave of little jiggles that traveled up her completely untoned arm and made a few seams pop in her sleeve. The big gunned blonde had always been tough on shirts but her once dazzling guns had been thoroughly beaten into plow shares. Once spectacular muscle had completely evaporated over the past weeks as the heaviest weight Karen lifted was a pound cake. Although their diameter was noticably bigger, her biceps had totally deflated, when Karen flexed literally nothing happened beyond fat bunching. Even more shocking, her strikingly cut triceps now hung deflated, having become a nascent set of lunch lady arms.

'Uf, and here...here we are...,' Karen sighed, 'get the photos started up!'

As the vivacious model began...well, modeling highly suggestively, Karen took a seat. Standing up for long periods of time was getting tiring these days, it wasn't that she was that out of shape, she was a measly 213 pounds, but her tits...

Power Girl had always had the immense pair. She'd been famous for it, more than her immense strength, invulnerability or impossible speed, she'd been known for those monster boobs. And they were truly monsters now, having plumped up so much they'd outgrown every bra in Karen's extensive collection. A free hanging grand canyon of cleavage that prevented the buttoning of her top three blouse buttons and top suit jacket button, they had to have found at least three new cup sizes even as they'd dropped four inches of perk. High pointing nipples were pointing at the ground now and had stretched significantly, even as stretch marks collected on their sides. She looked sloppy enough to have had at least three kids and looked like she was on the verge of surrendering to the baby weight.

'Craft services, get me a new plate,' Karen sighed, new triple chin starting to show, rubbing a sore set of boobs and finding that lefty was pulling ahead of righty by a cup size.

It would be hours until she could get more of Ivy's food, until then she'd just have to sit here, eat craft services bare and watch Starfire deep throat an ice cream cone while wearing a bikini.

Truly it was a horrible fate...

Karen looked over at one of the mirrors, seeing a soft faced woman looking back. Her cheekbones had vanished, replaced with apple cheeks and a set of dimples now. A meaty second chin was at its peak growth, tomorrow would see a third crease start to form...unless she had a big midnight snack.

She was only dimly recognizable now, her employees frequently did double takes to see her rapid transformation caused by the constant over eating. Karen woke up fatter than she went to bed, went to work fatter than when she got up, got to work fatter than when her growing butt had settled into her car, got into the elevator fatter than whens he'd gotten into the car and left her office fatter than when she'd sat at her desk. With the red wig on she no longer resembled a Christina Hendricks who lived at the gym, but a Christina Hendricks doing oscar worthy method acting on a role as a desert chef. Her skin tight Power Girl leotard would have ripped apart if she could even get it fastened up, it had survived so many villains to be destroyed by snacks.

And speaking of snacks, she had one AAA, full calorie, hyper addictive cookie left until she had to get refills...

At Titans tower, people are noticing Starfire's new additions...
15533111111112111221211211111111111.content:
Karen really wanted that cookie.

A perfect mix of sugar and butter and flour, studded with a constellation of white chocolate chips and macadamia nuts. It made her mouth water just looking at it, even before she thought about the unique mix of retroviruses, power suppressants, appetite stimulants and mind soothers Ivy had filled it with that would make her gain weight just like a regular human woman and not an invincible alien powerhouse. Cookies and treats like this (sixty or so of them that day) had taken her from having a rippling, gym honed six pack to a doughy beer belly that rested in her lap and she wanted more of them and more of them. She wanted her already chunky body to grow bigger and bigger,into an enormous pile of fat rolls too big to leave the house even if she could still walk, so big that she needed dedicated feeders to keep her belly sated just because her arms would be unable to reach past the swollen mass of her body.

Also it would help the world and what not.

But looking over at Starfire doing the shoot made Karen reconsider. The Tamaranian read head looked so miserable in that tight bikini working that stair master, her scrawny smooth ass bouncing up and down with each step and her pitifully small DDs barely jiggling. And her stomach, it wasn't as bad as Karen's had been, a revolting mess of abdominal definition but it was almost as bad. Flat as a board and just as hard, K'ori's waistline didn't even have an inch to pinch. Even her legs were awful, so long and smooth and firm, they glided past each other without even touching! How miserable she must be, she had to be freezing without any insulation and feel so exhausted all the time.

She needed to gain weight, to see that tiny body bloat up with protective, warming fat. Of course K'ori might object to that, she was likely brainwashed by the western fashion industry, but once she hit three hundred she'd surely thank Power Girl. Karen would have to trick her friend into being what she really didn't know she wanted. What the flabby blonde was about to do wasn't wrong or lying or insane, no she was helping her really. She'd just have to ...bend the truth a bit...

Using her admin access, Peej grabbed one of the photos being sent to the photographer's computer. It showed the pathetic roundness of Star's rear, the ass shot that would leave straight men and a good chunk of women comatose. A moment or two in photoshop using some skills honed in lonely hours on the computer and Karen was ready to help her friend see the light of immobility. Two plates from craftservices that required her belt being let out another hole sated her, the siren song of the Anonymous cookie dimmed a little, until the shoot was at a pause point.

'Great job Kori,' Karen told the svelte Tamaranian, who was stretching her back in a way that caused several accidents among the crew, 'you look like you're having a blast out here.'

'The thanks is yours friend Po--friend Karen Starr!' the modelesque heroine smiled, 'I've always liked the bi-kini, it makes me feel full of power and quite sexy! I feel so free and happy and confident.'

Oh the poor thing, she must not realize how starved she looked. Karen would fix that.

'That's the the thing, well...maybe I shouldn't mention it...but...nah, I wouldn't want to ruin your day...,' the disguised Power Girl dragged out, 'best not to bother you...'

'Oh, is the matter something?' the english challenged alien asked.

'Well...I know I'm not one to talk about this sort of thing but you're looking a little...well...,' Karen hesitated, 'I know being the den mother to the next gen of Titans is stressful but...have you been slacking working out lately?'

'Oh, no I do the same sparring every day!' the perfectly fit red head said, 'what the getting are you at?'

'Well...and its fine really, only someone with super vision would notice, but you're looking a little...big in the back,' Karen hinted.

'What?' K'ori asked.

'You've got some junk in the trunk,' the blonde said.

'I don't understand,' Starfire said in confusion.

'You're looking less Tamaranian and more Kardassian,' the frustrated Power Girl said, wiping some sweat off her fore head.

'From the trek through the stars?' the red head asked.

'No, its ...your ass has gotten fatter,' Karen said in frustration.

'Oh? Really?' Star said, trying to look at it and endlessly circling in the air in a fashion that made her tits nearly fall out of their top.

'Yeah, not too much but I started the same way and then I got way bigger than this before I knew it,' Power Girl said, gesturing at her disintegrating wardrobe and flabby curves, 'and I know how important your figure is for a model, I'm sure your agency pressures you to stay thin...'

'Oh no, they say that they want to encourage healthy life styles so I do not have to maintain a set weight,' Kori explained.

'Uh...well I know that you don't want to slow down when flying,' Karen said, holding up the cookie, 'so eat this.'

'But, does not fat come in cookies?' Kori asked.

Come on, just eat the damn thing!

'Not this kind, its a special diet cookie. Within a couple months this thing changed me in ways you wouldn't believe,' Power Girl didn't quite lie, 'trust me, your figure will be absolutely ideal.'

'Oh, okay. You must have been quite the fat,' Starfire said, taking the cookie at last.

The green eyed woman's face lit up like a lamp with joy as she bit into the cookie. She gobbled it down and let out a happy, almost orgasmic sigh, while her stomach let out a painful gurgle.

'Oof, I am the hungry now,' Star stated, 'ow, why does the diet cookie make me want to eat so much?'

'Because its raising your metabolism higher,' the portly power girl lied, 'you need to feed it though. Eat as much as you can as quickly as you can and you'll be skinny again in no time!'

Smiling, Karen watched the slender heroine go over to the craft services table, fill her plate with food and then rapidly demolish it, 'Hooked you.'

The rest of the shoot didn't go as well. For one thing, Starfire kept eating all of the prop food as fast as it could be given to her. For a while her bizarre nine stomachs handled it but after a couple hours her washboard stomach began to bulge with a food baby that sloshed as it advanced across her lap. Four hours in and the shoot had to end, because the model looked ready to give birth, her glutted waist sticking out past her breasts.

'Great job Kori, that cookie is already changing you,' Karen promised, rising out of her chair with a fat girl grunt and walking over as fast as her tubby thighs coudl take her without her skirt disintegrating, 'soon there'll be no going back!'

'But my stomach is so big, I do not feel very sexy,' the sick looking red head groaned, 'and I am still having the hunger...'

'Oh that means you've got to feed it,' Power Girl lied, 'you need to eat as much as possible for the diet to work. I'll have some more diet food shipped over to you but for now you need to eat as much high calorie, high carb and high fat food as possible to stay fueled. There might be a little bloating in your stomach and hips and thighs and chin but its all just temporary.'

'Oh, okay and I will do the exercise more too!' the red head promised, one hand behind her back and the other supporting her gut, 'thank you Karen, I would have become the ass fat for sure without you!'

'No problem K'ori,' Karen promised, 'don't do any unnecessary exercise though, once you've eaten Anonymous food, you never need to exercise again to get into perfect shape...'

The overfed heroine collapsed back into her directors chair, smiling as she watched Starfire try and button a skirt that had fit perfectly that morning but was now hopelessly unable to fasten around her food gut. In the end, the redhead had to wear her bikini bottoms out, still firm orange ass peeking out beneath her blouse.The blouse had been tight to start off with, but now none of the buttons up to her chest could be fastened.

Karen smiled as her super vision took in the slowly softening cheeks and knew it was going to be a wonderful future ahead...

155331111111121112212112111111111111.content:
Harley popped out of the water with a gasping wheeze.

The clown princess of crime had been swimming laps in her new penthouse' salt water pool for the last twenty minutes and while she hadn't exactly been shooting through the water like a shark (more like a bloated pale whale) it had been more than enough to put her horribly out of shape body into the red zone of its endurance. Atrophied muscles trembling with effort, Harley pulled herself out of the pool and flopped onto the paving as she desperately tried to suck in air. Recovery took nearly as long as her work out did and the former jester winced slightly as a pang of hunger hit her belly.

'Damn, I'm turning into a regular lardass!' the pear shaped ex-supervillain whined to herself as she sat up, floppy belly forming into sloppy rolls.

Harley's hard, agile body had won her a full ride gymnastics scholarship and made her one of the most feared criminals in Gotham but being reformed had rendered her out of shape and chunky before Ivy's superfood completed her transformation. Sloppy saggy C cups trembled in the too tight bikini top with her still gasping breath, a size the normally petite topped psychiatrist would have loved if they'd still been remotely pert. Beneath them was an equally droopy gut earned from bags of doritos, bottles of gamer fuel and three breakfasts of Ivy's goodies a day, a cute little pooch she'd honestly preferred to her old four pack that was now turning into a big old gut.

'Geeze, why'd I ever bother with all those damn sit ups,' Harley grunted, giving her grumbling stomach a pat and pushing herself up with her soft, puffing arms, always irritated wrists giving a twinge of pain.

Playing video games sixteen hours a day had wrecked her wrists just as it had blown up the rest of her body. She waddled over to a pool chair beneath the trees, the whole deck wrapped round in beautifully maintained plants Ivy had grown, and bent down to pick up her coke bottle frames, the world getting far less blurry as her vision was corrected sixty points. A small pop sounded as the porcine woman did and she rolled her eyes to feel that her bikini bottom had come undone.

'What the hell Harley, this is a size eighteen!' she grunted, pulling the string back together and hastily hauling them up, 'ya used to be a regular stunner! Only way your stunning people now is with the size of your ass.'

Harley had always had a big butt and all of her outfits were crafted to show off the steely buns. Now of course instead of steel they were bags of pure, drooping fat studded with cellulite and completely swallowing the thong she wore. The once graceful woman was now clumsy as a clown trying to be humorously clumsy, immense ass knocking things off tables every day as she waddled along. The lithe woman had blown up into a full on pear, her fat clumping to thigh and cankle while she crashed on the couch and played video games all day, her cellulite covered legs flopping and wobbling whenever she waddled along. She'd been getting soft over the past months and knew she'd never do an acrobatic flip again but hadn't thought of herself as being that fat until a chance snack run had shown a wobbling, red faced, panting fat woman with coke bottle frames and a forty eight inch ass waddle in dressed in Harley's clothes. The clown princess had hurriedly weighed herself to find that her just fat 170 lb body had blown up with an extra seventy pounds in only a few weeks, something that explained the underwear and t shirts that ripped off herself with frightening regularity. Knowing that a drastic change was needed, and that dieting was as impossible as gymnastics or running, the horizontally challenged woman had started taking up swimming once she'd found a nice plus sized thong. The week of swimming hadn't really made a dent in her spectacular gain but at least she felt better about it, even if she'd outgrown her swim suit.

'That swim had to burn what, twenty thousand calories?" Harley wildly over estimated as she reached up to one of the special fruit trees, ripping down a steaming fresh twinky and munching down on it as she waddled in to the main apartment to find Ivy.

Geeze, did Peeg have to give them so a long apartment?

A few minutes later Harley was panting again as she waddled into Harley's laboratory, plopping her ass onto a groaning school as she watched her girlfriend stare painstakingly into a microscope. Ivy was doing that 'paying attention' thing she did, totally focused and it gave Harley a good view of her own growing body. The photosynthetic woman's gain had slowed a bit as she was working on new strains of her food, letting Harley close in. But she was still a waddling whale of a plant hybrid who'd just cleared three hundred pounds.

Already somewhat sloppy Fs had expanded out into G cups that were really starting to droop, especially after the hippie scientist had gone on a diatribe about how bras were a way to reduce and control femininity after a Victoria's Secret store had said they didn't have her size anymore. Her belly was so big it had split into upper and lower halves when sitting and Harley could barely remember when Ivy had been a size zero. Although her hips didn't have the same womanly girth as Harley's and her legs weren't disproportionately fat, her lower body wasn't exactly slim either. The only thing besides panties she was wearing was a lab coat of sustainable hemp, that was too small to button up.

Harley waddled up stealthily and then as Ivy went to write her notes, leaned in and grabbed Ivy's immense gut, flopping it up and down like a mouth.

'Heya Red, how about we go stuff?' Harley said in a gruff voice.

'Ugh, not now Harley,' Ivy said, 'I'm at a crucial point for these.'

She waved her hand at a collection of flowers, mutli-colored and beautiful.

'Ooh, what they do?' Harley asked.

'Well, these might be my master piece,' Ivy smiled, 'you see their pollen...'

'Will make every woman who breathes it in want to get fat,' Ivy said with a grin, 'its our insurance policy prevent any meddling supers come for us. They'll soon all be fattening up and loving us for it.'

Harley nodded, breathing in the scent, 'but uh, won't it make us get, well, fatter?'

'Please Harley, we're not fat,' the morbidly obese Ivy grunted, sliding off of her groaning stool with a huff.

Ivy had a BMI of nearly 59 and a body made out of lime pudding. She was so fat that Harley was fairly certain her friend had gotten shorter as her joints compressed, Ivy was now only above 5' by a hair. By the end of the year she expected her to be wider than she was tall.

'I've gained ten pounds or so but its just vanity weight,' the immense, nearly three times as fat as she'd been red head grunting as she waddled, 'and you...'

Ivy looked over at Harley's sausage thighs and swollen ankles, at her squelchy pot belly and saggy boobs and the little double chin.

'...are just shaking off unrealistic societal standards,' Ivy decided, 'no I've made myself immune and it only affects meta humans and a few species of aliens, a cocktail of crispr genes and metamagic and synthetic kryptonite that'll change sexual preferences.'

'Your saying it'll give em a fat fetish?' Harley asked, eyes beaming, 'you're gonna turn all the supers into chubby chasers?'

'Well yes, Power Girl is going to deliver it...,' Ivy said with a smile, 'she'll carry the flowers up to the JL watch tower and unleash a plague of fat fetishes.'

'She's gonna deliver it?' Harley asked, 'aren't they gonna notice her getting fat? She was eating fit to beat the band when we had that meeting last month and I doubt she was working out setting up that shoot.'

'Please Harley its been a month, maybe she'll have to suck her stomach a little bit but on her frame it won't be that noticeable yet,' Ivy said with annoyance.

The pure muscular gorgeousness of the Kryptonian got on the short stack botanist's chlorophyll. It wasn't fair that another woman could look like that, much less have super human powers. Tall, ripped, stacked and bullet proof? It wasn't fair!

At that moment, the door to the apartment was thrown open and heeled foot steps clicked on the tile, followed by the pop of a champagne cork.

'Where's my partners in crime at?' Karen Starr yelled at them from across the hall, 'because our sales figures are in and they are sky high!'

The Kryptonian CEO burst into Ivy's lab for the first time in weeks, having been otherwise too busy and the two ex-criminals saw she was...

15533111111112111221211211111111111121.content:
Karen Star's stylish skirt suit strutted into Ivy's lab, a designer, mid thigh black skirt stitched perfectly to show off long legs, a red jacket that showed her supple waist and strong shoulders and a tantalizing white blouse that hinted at her delightful cleavage. The whole ensemble was a size eight with a slightly relaxed waistline, an item made for the CEO who's had a few too many power lunches and too few gym sessions, but who's slight padding would go all but unnoticed. Especially as Karen's red wig was already off and her glasses set aside, showing PGs golden mane and dazzling, inhuman blue eyes.

'I'm thinking a five star restaurant with ten courses each, ending with one of those gold leaf cakes,' Karen declared to the agape Harley and Ivy, popping open another bottle of champagne, 'and then this rather...exclusive ladies club down town. What do you think?'

Unfortunately for Karen Star's size eight outfit, Power Girls size twelve body had been shoved into it. Some false tone was lent to her chubby legs by her high heels, but nothing could hide how her plump thighs rubbed together. The black skirt was so stretched it had become a mini-skirt and its side button was a gaping hole bridged by a rubber band and a paper clip, the squishy pot belly that had been frighteningly ripped abs oozing over it. Diamonds of soft tan flesh puffed through the gap in her dangerously tight blouse, buttons a single box of chocolates away from becoming a danger to everyone in front of her.The top three buttons would never close even in dreams, showing that her phenomenal cleavage had entered the realm of unreality. Twin peach, head sized orbs of jiggling glory split with bright blue veins, the lacy white bra that cradled them starting to come apart at the seams, never designed to handle tits of that size.

'Cat woman got your tongue, ladies?' Karen asked, rubbing her back as even a kryptonian's back got sore from hauling around G cups.

'You...you...you're fat!' Ivy stammered, seeing her plan to infect the justice league with a fat fetish go up in chubby smoke.

'Well, only a little bit by BMI. You can't trust that though, it doesn't count for muscle,' the well fed, gorgeous alien laughed, patting her fluffy tum as if there were still a six pack on it, 'so are you thinking steak or salad? Actually, for you is it wrong to eat plants?'

'You...this was just in a month! You were in perfect shape, no one would have suspected anything!' Ivy gasped, 'how did you get so fat so fast?'

'Ivy, we've both been getting a little bit uh, voluptuous,' the pear shaped Ivy pointed out, patting the cellulite stuffed bean bags she hauled behind her while prodding Ivy's beach ball belly, 'one month on this shit does a number on ya. I'm surprised she ain't bigger!'

'Well I tried but I ran out of your food around the time of the commercial and between getting this whole hyper addictive, super illegal, quasi ethical obesity pandemic causing super food blitz thing going and a few heroing things here and there, I kind ran out of time to gain more than forty pounds or so. You should be proud of me for gaining so much so quickly and keeping it on,' PG bragged, jiggling her own gut with pride, 'oh this fat feels great. You've got no idea how awful it felt having a body like that. My tits were always surging out of bras and if I flexed too hard I'd rip jacket sleeves or pant legs, it was awful.'

'I'm sure,' Ivy said with an eye roll, 'but I only expected you to get a little starter belly at best from the five bags Harley was supposed to give you.'

'Oh, five bags. Right,' the pear shaped, 98% naked clown blushed, 'that's what I gave her...'

'Well they were bags. If you count a shipping crate as a bag...,' the overweight heroine giggled, shirt button flying off and getting lost in Ivy's own green tinted boobs, 'but come on girls. This is what we want! Look at me, trapping fossil fuels inside myself. I already feel myself getting lazier and less polluting.'

Poison Ivy growled in annoyance. Having to deal with Harley's ADHD was annoying enough, if tempered by the mild tranquilizers in the food that were making the hyper active clown into a stark white couch potato most of the day. She'd expected an entrepreneur like Karen Star, or Power Girl which when she thought about it should have been obvious, to have been a fellow professional with her head in the game. A little over eating and a couple pounds of vanity weight like Ivy had gained was understandable, although the 300 lb hybrid botanist was sure hers was mostly water weight, but the other two couldn't hold onto their own appetites at all.

'This is a disaster Karen,' Ivy lectured, clumsily hauling her morbidly obese bulk from the stool and waddling over to poke Power Girl's bullet proof gut, 'because you still have to take the fat fetish pollen up to the watch tower to turn the Justice league to our side.'

'Not a problem, that's a one minute flight at minimum power,' Karen said, 'we can order at the restaurant and I'll be back before the appetizers are served.'

'And if someone asks why Power Girl, the buffest heroine on the planet has suddenly become the chubbiest in less than a month?' Ivy asked, drawing herself up to her full height of 5'0.

'Well, Starfire bought it,' Karen said lamely.

'Starfire is the byword for ditzy dumb heroines. She'd believe anything!' Ivy told her, 'what if you run into someone with brains like Wonder Woman or Zatanna or God forbid the Bat?'

Harley, who'd been munching fresh caramel pop corn from a modified ear began coughing at the last word. She hadn't thought of the Bat since she'd gone straight. Well sort of straight. In terms of criminality straight. Kind of. Not really. But the last time she'd fought a bat or a bat brat she'd been a 120 lb acrobat with a six pack who could do a triple back flip from standing.

Now she couldn't stand up without using her hands!

'Red, ya said the word! We don't say that word here!,' Harley choked, spitting and gasping for air.

Ivy stammered, trying to help but unable to even get her arms around her friend.

'Don't worry, JSA and JL policy means i have to know how to do this,' PG informed her, picking her up and squeezing.

Harley found her face being swallowed up from behind by the comfiest pair of pillows on the planet, the cuddly boobs and comfy gut pressing into her upper back making her feel warm and cozy while the mighty arms pressing into her chest made her feel utterly safe. If her swimsuit hadn't already been damp it would have been soaked by the time she coughed up the pop corn and PG gracefully set her down, plump paunch rubbing into her back. Harley quivered, the bisexual clown had always had a bit of a thing for the alien blonde but now that she was all cuddly she found herself head over heels.

'You okay there?' Power Girl asked, patting the flabby clown's soft shoulder.

'Ya ya saved me...,' Harley asked, eyes metaphorically turning into hearts and noticing that all of Karen's buttons had come undone, showing off her softened torso to the fullest.

'And we still haven't solved this little 'our mole is too fat to ever be believed to be innocent' problem,' Ivy reminded, own heart thundering in shock at the close call and angry that power girl had saved the day when she couldn't, 'can you even shove this gut into your costume?'

'Maybe if I suck in?' Karen offered, sucking her stomach in as far as she could, still looking a little pudgy, her barely hidden stomach quivering for a few seconds.

'oh you look great, fantastic even Betty!' Harley swooned, using the fake name she'd dubbed PG a few years earlier, 'I mean you look better with some more to love but...'

'Maybe if they don't notice your thigh fat or double chin,' Ivy huffed, 'either you go in claiming ...I don't know, a wizard puffed you up or there was a lab explosion...'

'A lab explosion?' Karen asked with disbelief.

'That happens to people all the time, I wasn't always lime and Harley wasn't always...Harley,' Ivy explained, 'either that or we find someone else to help us.'

'Unfortunately there is no one else to help us,' Power Girl countered, 'world's not exactly full of super heroines with fat fetishes. Believe me I checked twice.'

'Maybe not a heroine, just someone who can get in there undetected and sneak around,' Ivy mused, tapping her stylish nails against her lips, 'who can sneak in through the air vents, get in and out without anyone noticing...'

'Ooh, I'll do it!' Harley volunteered, 'Betty and I can go up together and she'll be a distraction.'

Ivy blinked, feeling a head ache, 'Harley you can go if you can touch your toes.'

While Harley tried that Sisyphean task, gold medalist body now stiff as a 2X4, Ivy and Karen thought.

'We'd need someone who'd work with you,' Karen pointed out.

'But who can risk getting caught by the league,' Ivy brought up.

'And is sneaky,' PG added.

'And is okay with becoming obese most importantly,' Ivy ended.

'So...cat woman then?' Karen said, 'I still think I could do it. Its not that big of a deal.'

She took a step forwards, skirt getting caught on a piece of heavy lab equipment and ripping right off to display her ripe lower half: meaty FUPA, buttery stuffed thighs and plump packed navel, all wrapped in a disintegrating pair of lacy white underwear that was two sizes too small at best. Only the blind would think them the same as the toned thighs complete with wide thigh gap, verging on eight pack abs that began right above her pelvis and tight, firm navel. Ivy dope slapped her forehead while Harley began drooling.

'Might need to let my costume out a bit,' she giggled nervously, pinching her FUPA, 'I'm just a bit bloated right now. Been eating a lot of dairy...'
