155331111111121112212112111111111111212.content:
Heads turned when Selina Kyle entered the room and in a good way.

The catburglar was tall drink of cold water. 5'10 without her high heels, more of it graceful, agile leg than could be believed. Strong ankles, shapely calves, smooth knees and long, perfected thighs leading up to spectacular back side, her round hips and full chest the only fat on her graceful body at the moment. Although she'd been raised on the streets, her delicate facial features and vivid green eyes seemed to reek of old money and elegance, fitting for the wife of Bruce Wayne. Every step of her stilletos was perfectly placed, making the black fabric of her dress shimmy and shake.

The garcon of the restaurant, a high end gotham one that was mostly empty at the early hour, was skilled enough to not give her a once over. Taking in the diamond ring on her finger and jewels on her neck rather than her figure.

'I'm meeting some people here,' the now retired Catwoman purred, 'a hyper skinny blonde and a curvy little red head. Trust me, you'd know em if you saw em.'

'There's no one of that description here, please give me a name,' the host asked.

That raised an eyebrow. Even out of their crime costumes Harley and Ivy were noticeably stunning. Could they be in disguise?

'Either Isley or Quinzel,' Catwoman offered.

'Oh, they have a private room,' the garcon nodded, 'right this way.'

Selina prowled after him, eyes flitting over the diners: wallet loaded up with gambling cash right there, engagement ring on a second wife there and an heirloom necklace there. Catwoman stopped herself from looking, now that she was engaged to a billionaire vigilante she had no need to steal anything ever again. Still, her kleptomania wasn't just a funny quirk and a small fortune in looted jewelry was in her purse by the time before she could realize it.

'Um, hold on,' Selina said when they reached the door, sounds of smacking and chewing from the other side, 'thank you for this but I need to powder my nose....'

Putting the jewelry back in the right place without being noticed was harder than snagging it. Selina welcomed the challenge, for though she loved Bruce fighting crime was far more boring than doing crime. While she was a dangerous fighter, stronger than her slim body looked, she preferred infiltrating to fighting and bluntly busting up mobsters and supervillains bored the shit out of her. Bruce had a flood of orphans to do that alongside and to be honest she wasn't sure what to do with the rest of her life. Enjoy being impossibly rich? Become an alcoholic? Get pregnant and breed a few more Waynes?

What she really wanted was to steal something. Something no one else could steal. If she could do that, just once, then she could retire in peace. But what could you steal when you had everything?

She was still thinking when she opened the door, seeing a tall plump, blonde haired woman in business attire over eating next to a fat blonde woman gorging next to a spherical red haired woman glutting herself. Selina balked, clearly this was the wrong room.

'Oh pardon me,' Catwoman said, going to close the door.

'Oh Selina, come on in,' the blob said in Ivy's voice, waving over a sausage fingered hand that was on close examination, lime green, 'we ordered a few appetizers without you.'

Catwoman's eyes widened until her pupils disappeared, 'Ivy? Harley? You're....you're...looking ...swell...'

She'd seen a picture of Ivy at her parole meeting when the mad botanist had been teeny, a hundred pounds soaking wet. She had to be triple that now...

'Oh, thank you. New diet and all that,' Ivy said, with difficulty rolling to her feet and standing up by pressing both hands on the thankfully well made table, waddling over, 'come on and sit down!'

Shell shocked, Selina let herself be guided to the last seat at the table which was groaning under bread baskets, shrimp cocktails, mussels, cheese trays, game sausage samplers, friend mushrooms, onion rings and one tiny, untouched side salad sat next to Ivy, hidden in the shadow of her swollen tits.

'You're looking so good Selina. Married life is doing good for you, eh?' Ivy asked, 'you looked so radiant as a bride, you must have dieted so much to fit into that dress.'

'Well, just a few pounds,' Selina told her, putting her hand to her stomach which, wasn't quite as flat as it'd been then.

When Wonder Woman is one of the brides maids, you go on a crash diet.

'Oh, probably real easy to stay skinny doing all that cat burglaring,' Harley spoke up from her shrimp, 'running around on them buildings. Say, what ya stolen lately?'

'well, nothing,' Selina admitted, 'girls, what this obviously isn't just a friendly meeting, what's going on?'

'Well, we're trying to save the world and want you to be part of it,' Ivy explained, going into her turn everyone fat plan.

'...well, that is... a plan,' Catwoman blinked, 'so why am I part of this?'

She was debating either calling Bruce, kicking their asses herself or just letting them fail.

'Well, I've put on some appreciable weight,' the tall blonde woman admitted, patting a fully belly, 'so I can't exactly get into the watch tower unquestioned. Power Girl by the way, so great to finally meet you. Wedding looked lovely.'

'Uh, charmed,' Catwoman blinked.

She'd never met Power Girl but would have struggled to connect this plumper to the woman who's heavy boobs and ripped waist graced so many dorm rooms. Her pants were fully opened to allow her gut to pool out and the main courses hadn't even arrived.

'And you are the best infiltrator we know,' Power Girl kept going, 'so, we need you to bring some pollen into the watch tower that will make everyone inside prefer...larger women.'

'And why exactly would I want to do this? I'm not really large,' Catwoman observed, pointing at her flat waist.

'Well, now you're not,' Ivy said, 'but come on Selina, you're spectacular but for how much longer? We're all on the wrong side of thirty dear.'

'I'm only 29 red,' Harley pointed out.

'And I'm twenty eight,' power girl offered, 'and i don't really age after adulthood so...'

Ivy's eyes quivered with the hate of a 32 year old but she kept going.

'But the point is, it gets harder and harder to keep a heart breakers figure every year, right, especially when you can't exercise. All three of us have put on the Arkham 15 before and had to lose it before we could get back in the game,' Ivy went on, 'we both know they make newer, younger and thinner villainesses every year to catch the paper's attention. And now that you're not thieving every night and surely going to have a few litters of bat kittens...well, how long can you stay at the peak of your game?'

'Its not that important,' Selina denied, crossing her perfect legs but feeling a bit of insecurity.

How much longer could she stay this fit? She and Bruce had talked about having kids, could she really squeeze into the old cat suit after that?

'But what is important is that while you're getting older and heavier, there'll be ageless size 2 airheads like Wonder Woman or super girl zipping around for you to compete with after the old middle aged spread hits,' Ivy explained, 'wouldn't it be nice to knock em down a peg like our friend here?'

Power Girl looked up from a pile of impossible ribs, not a heart throb but a slob. She could compete with that...

'And really you should think of this like a job,' Harley pipped up from her pre-meal ice cream sundae, 'but instead of stealing money, you're stealing Wonder Woman's waist measurements. Whenever you see the big amazon balloon floating around, you can know that you did it.'

Wonder Woman's waist line. The theft of the millennium...

'And this powder, will it affect me any?' Selina asked Ivy with a purr, hesitation forgotten.

'I can tweak it to prevent it from working on you,' Ivy bragged.

'Then I'm in,' Selina purred, standing up, 'I've already got the blue prints, call me when you've got the formula ready.'

She strutted out, pointedly not eating any of the food.

'I still think I could do it,' Power Girl muttered as she began cutting into a mountain of boneless wings.

...

Back at Wayne Manor, empty given its inhabitants crime fighting focus, Selina started researching.

Robbing a space station on the Moon was difficult. Just getting there would mean either a space walk or a teleportation, then she'd have to infiltrate a place filled with mind readers and supers, some of which knew her. The way she saw it there were two ways, an easy way and a hard one.

The hard one was disguising herself as a worker, one of the faceless drones who kept the machinery of justice running.

The easy one was dosing someone who was going there. She looked down at her phone, turning it on to show the background of herself and Lois Lane. She hadn't expected to become best friends with the ace reporter, but the street kid and the army brat, the jewel thief and the reporter had a similar mentality. While Lane hunted stories and Selina hunted valuables, both were after prey.

And both were also mortal, if gorgeous women. She couldn't believe Lois was 35 with her figure, but she knew her friend had been fighting the battle of the bulge for a while. Really it would be inevitable, she'd be doing Lois a favor putting her ahead of the curve....
155331111111121112212112111111111111212.title: Cat woman is recruited.

choices: Lois infects Supergirl...and stops for food.
Cassandra Cain's nose itches that night.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Although she was still in spectacular shape, Selina decided to not go into orbit and sneak through laser trip wires and meta humans. Dosing a friend seemed much, much easier. A simple phone call to Ivy to whip up her little plague and then another one to Lois to schedule a lunch date and things were already half way done.

One easy week later and on Monday morning, when Bruce was still sleeping off a night of punching clowns, Selina stopped her morning jog along the misty perimeter of Wayne Manor as a well fed shape dipped out of the sky.

'Is that costume...wise?' the woman who wore a skin tight cat themed body suit asked.

'Wise? No, but I like staying on brand,' Power Girl told her, breathing heavily despite the short flight from NYC to Gotham.

The perfectly muscled, dare say rippling, woman was red faced and sweaty in her attire. Apart from being a size twelve-Long instead of a size six, the costume was PGs classic long sleeved white one piece with a boob window, expose hips and red cape. It's cut hadn't been altered to take in account her now over rounded hips extending to the sides or over beefy FUPA bulge sagging out on each side of her panty strap.

'I'm not one to judge, but are you comfortable wearing that?' Selina asked, taking in meringue hard thighs squishing together, their cellulite on full display.

'It is a bit...snugger than I'd expected,' the double chinned Kryptonian admitted, lowering herself shakily down to the ground and plopping her butt on a bench, 'but I was thinner when I ordered it. Maybe I shouldn't have eaten so much after the product launch.'

PG was still panting, famous chest rising and falling with piston-like rapidity. Her breasts were swollen and in the early stage of settling, no longer standing tall and proud in her bra cups but beginning to hang. Beneath them her rounded gut, slightly swollen beyond its new roundness, was going in and out as well, each breath drawing a sighing *creak* from the skin tight white fabric. Fat mushroomed around her far too tight red belt, which cruelly pinched the invulnerable blonde until Selina's nimble fingers undid the clasp.

'Ohhh thank Rao,' the sweaty super moaned, 'man, that'll teach me to try and deliver this after second breakfast.'

'Second, it's only six forty five...never mind. Where's the package?' she asked.

'Hold on,' Karen muttered, beginning to dig around through her boob window with one hand, 'its in here somewhere.'

'You put it in your boobs?' Selina asked incredulously.

'Where'd you store stuff when you were stealing?' Power Girl returned, finally hauling a small packet of sugar from the mushroom hell.

'In my pockets,' Cat woman told her, looking at the slightly damp packet, 'so what's the instructions on this?'

'Its a crystallized retro virus. Just dump it in her drink and in a few hours she'll have a cold. Anyone she comes in contact with, or came into a person who came in contact with her, will contract a retro virus that'll rewrite their minds to like fat girls and if they're a woman, want to get fat. As well as boosting their appetites, lowering their metabolism etc,' PG explained.

'Huh, is it supposed to be sweaty?' Cat woman, who'd run three miles and was barely sweating.

'Probably not, but I didn't expect to get so out of shape,' the very plump, very sweaty blonde admitted with a pat on her gut.

The paragon of muscle looked like she needed a cold drink and a long rest. She was still breathing a bit fast and her sleeves were loose, as her mighty biceps had completely deflated under the influence of Ivy's food and hadn't yet been replaced with muscle.

'And you still like this?' Selina asked her, 'Like, you wanted to look this way but you were so strong and fast and now you're...'

'Happy. Trust me, I've always wanted to be like this. Soft, decadent, lazy, relaxed, heck, hedonistic,' Karen smiled, 'being fat and out of shape is amazing.

With a hop she took off into the air, turning and letting see Selina see the heavy marshmallow cheeks hanging out of her outfit. Selina had already buckled on the belt.

'This is crazy,' Selina muttered as she looked at the packet,'but at least I won't have to worry about eyes wandering after all this. My ass will be the smallest in town.'

Later, she was at a dinn er half way between Metropolis and Gotham, setting her designer jean clad buns into a booth and looking through the menu, mostly fried egg, pork or carbs.

'Selina!' Lois chirped and the slightly retired thief grinned as she looked up.

Lois Lane was one of those women who seemed to spit in the face of aging. Guessing she was thirty seven and a mom would have been difficult, she had a thirty year olds face and a 20 year old's figure. Only the faintest lines were around her big purple eyes and her black hair still sparkled, even put in a pony tail, while her white mini skirt showed off slim, fit legs that were a testament to skilled running. Her torso was a perfect hour glass, 34x23x34 and a skillfully chosen bra hid any sag in her Cs. Selina almost regretted ruining it, but given how hard she knew Lois worked to stay skinny it would be easier in the long run...

'Lois, oh its so great to see you!' Catwoman grinned back, easily rising and hugging her.

At first things turned to married life, discussing the stresses of a husband who dressed up in a suit to punch people, even though Lois' was bullet proof and of having kids who did the same. Selina had found herself step-mom to a brood of adopted children, ranging from 13 to 25, all of whom were dedicated crime fighters of one stripe or another ranging from Bruce's biological son Damien, a stubborn, over weening ass with a heart of gold, to Cassandra Cain, a mute super fighter who'd always made Selina uneasy, to Nightwing who seemed waaaayyy to old and waaaayyyy too hot to technically be her step son. Lois was struggling to reach Clark's adopted cousin, a fellow survivor of Krypton who wasn't adapting easily to earth life yet. Gradually, the two fell into conversation, focusing mostly on Lois' journalistic work as the prize winner was going through an important story.

'Talking about work makes me feel weird, being part of the idle rich now,' Selina admitted as Lois finished off her coffee and asked for another.

Selina had had a whole pot ready and knew the snoop would soon have to use the powder room.

'You don't look like your laying around,' Lois told her, eyebrow at Selina's prima ballerina physique.

'I climb a few walls every once in a while, but mostly I'm just bored. Before long I'll be one of those society lushes with a big gut, I'm already getting rusty,' she said, handing back Lois' watch.

'I doubt it, seriously though you look great,' Lois said.

'Hey, takes one to know one. You look twenty,' Selina told her, 'what's your secret?'

'Well, I've gotta admit this isn't all me. Since Jon started joining his dad crime fighting I've been stress eating some and started growing the hips Lane women traditionally get pining for their husbands to come back from war. I'd started wearing spanx to stay in single digit sizes, until...,' Lois grinned conspiratorially, pulling a small box of cookies out of her purse, marked with a red A, 'these things. They taste amazing and they super charge your metabolism to the point you can eat anything else you want and still lose weight as long as you have a pack a day, I've lost almost twenty pounds since I started eating them and haven't had to change any thing else. I feel twenty years younger and I haven't been this skinny since college! And my sex life...its never been better, I'm horny as a teenager anymore.'

'Wow, I'll keep their name in mind,' Selina promised, making sure she'd never, ever eat any of them.

Ivy had said that there was less than a week until they switched the formulas out for the full fat, hyper addictive, laziness inducing variety. In a few days Lois' metabolism would slow to a crawl, she'd be constantly hungry and lethargic. Strangely enough it made Selina feel better about it, at least now Lois would enjoy it all.

'Pardon me, I've gotta go powder my nose,' the coffee addict said, getting up and letting Selina see her hard, firm butt.

Selina knew women in her family tended towards heavy asses as they got older and her own butt, even at maximum tone, was always on the large size. She was a little jealous of how trim Lois looked, even if it was temporary. She pulled the fake sugar out of her purse and paused, feeling a tickle on her nose that made the stealthy cat burgler sniffle, blink and then give a cute kitty sneeze into her elbow.

Ugh, getting sick was the last thing she needed, then sneezed again.

Still, Selina got the fake sugar mixed in before Lane returned. The reporter looked extremely thin, maybe too thin on further reflection. Women were supposed to pad out as they got older, not cling to being skinny. Lois could do with a burger or four...

The food had arrived and the two talked over a long, well fed brunch. Eggs, an omelet, toast, bacon, sausage, waffles and french toast went down each of the gorgeous brunette's mouths. Lois was always hungry thanks to the diet food and thanks to it she never worried about her weight anymore. Selina was feeling herself get congested, while her forehead burned with a low fever. She sneezed several times into her arm, the fits growing worse.

'You okay?' Lois asked her with concern in her purple eyes.

'Yeah, think its just a cold. Ugh, should probably get home,' the bleary eyed thief said nasally, 'we should do this again soon.'

'Totally,' Lois smiled and the two parted ways.

Feeling like shit, Selina went to Wayne Manor, bathed and passed out, by accident sneezing on several door knobs.

Feeling refreshed, Lois went to pick up her new adopted daughter from school. As her car pulled up, she sneezed.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: The easy way: Lois is getting dosed.

choices: A week later at the planet, Lois is thick.
At school, Kara feels weird.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
'ACHOO!' Lois sneezed.

'Ugh, hope I'm not catching what ever gotham crud Selina had,' Lois prayed.

Selina had had red eyes and an immensely bloated belly, stylish red belt unclipped as she'd left. Maybe the other brunette wouldn't be pulling off any heists anymore, Lois thought, if she keeps eating like that that catsuit is gonna bust. Sneezing again, she pulled a tissue out of her purse.

She had tissues in her purse. Along with painkillers and bandaids and spare head phones. God when had she become such a mom? Well she knew that answer: March 3rd, 11 years ago, the first time they'd had sex after Clark had admitted the secret identity she was 99% sure of and decided that condoms weren't needed given being different species. Somehow they'd made it work, despite her mortification at being a hurried bride like every girl on the army bases she'd grown up on.

As the blonde alien walked to the car, posture slumped and head wrapped in immense head phones, Lois felt a little pang of hunger despite her heavy meal, one that had left Selina looking ready to birth a litter. Her own had already digested and she was a little concerned at just how fast her metabolism was getting. The twenty pounds she'd gained since thirty had all been evaporated off, now that her target of her high school size 2 was attainable. She had a washboard stomach and a thigh gap again, maybe it was time to slow down, skip a few workouts and have a few beers after work.

'Can I quit?' Kara asked.

'We talked about this Kara, not until after the season ends,' Lois sighed, munching on a diet cookie to calm her stomach and sniffling, 'you made a committment to your team.'

'I didn't make it wantingly,' the blonde girl huffed, scrambling the English again.

Clark's cousin had arrived on earth at the start of the summer and despite already having a kid, Lois and Clark had done the right thing and adopted her on the spot. With league help she'd had a fake identity set up and been enrolled in a magnet high school for exceptional students, where most teen heroes were being steered. On paper things should be easy street but Kara was proving....unhappy.

'Well...you wanted to do something to make friends and you still quite aren't able to control your powers enough for sports,' Lois reminded, 'maybe in a few months...'

'Its just standing around, cheering leads!' the alien said in her new language, 'and the learning, its like small childrens learning!'

'We know you already know it Kara, this is all about socializing,' Lois went on, pulling onto the high way.

Kara crossed her arms, looking out the window.

The eighteen year old Kryptonian had arrived fresh from Krypton's destruction and was still understandably upset about it. Lois had to remind herself that earth was strange and primitive to her niece, everything was like the stone age for her, but the Kryptonian was...much more alien than Clark. She might have the rail thin, little above short body of the girl next door, but Kara was from a very long way away, in a world where most of the inhabitants only met in small groups amid glittering crystals and wore hermetical body suits. Regular clothes were annoying to her, evidence by how her size zeros had been worn backwards for a two weeks.

Lois sneezed while she thought, feeling congestion build in her sinuses.

'Are you sick?' Kara asked in disgust, germs having not been a thing on Krypton.

'Just a cold, don't worry you can't catch it,' Lois told her, '...I think. How's the powers today?'

'Here and there,' Kara admitted.

The supergirl had made her public debut without permission, kicking the shit out of a rogue government robot in a display of glorious ultra violence. However her solar based powers were still coming in at fits and spurts. It'd taken two weeks for her to start demonstrating super human abilities and even now they vacillated between 'strong for a string bean' to 'lift a 777' Whenever she grabbed something Kara didn't know how strong the hand that picked it up was, hence Lois driving after Kara had put her foot all the way through the floor at one point.

'Well, I know its tough but you can...ugh...,' Lois sneezed again, feeling hungry and put a hand to her stomach.

Damn, was her belly really that flat? Maybe she should ease back on the diet, this wasn't healthy to be so skinny. What example was she setting for Kara? This was a sensitive time in her life and Lois was fretting about her own weight! What if she gave the girl an eating disorder?

A signal flashed and the car was suddenly at the back of a long line at a fast food chain, Lois' purple eyes peering over the display hungrily.

'Why are we stopping? Bad for us you said it was when Jon asked,' Kara asked, looking past her, 'made you... fat?'

'Kara, a little weight is a good thing,' Lois said sagely, then sneezed.

Unluckily for Kara, her super reflexes weren't on that afternoon and a little spray landed on her nose. Ivy had engineered the retrovirus to work especially on Kryptonians and the busy little microbes were already going to work, invulnerability or not.

'A good thing?' Kara asked, unconvinced for it seemed every girl in her school was on a diet, most of them munching on those red cookies her adopted mother ate religiously.

She found it baffling, it was easy for her to balance her diet out with her Kryptonian science academy training. Could humans not count calories? Even without a super metabolism Kara wouldn't have gotten fat easily.

'Yes, a little bit of roundness is good,' Lois told her as the car inched forwards, 'honestly I was at my best a few months into my pregnancy. I was all soft and round and sensitive...but that's neither here nor there.'

The ace reporter was feeling worse and worse, but also hungrier and hungrier. Ignoring Kara's mortified expression, she ordered an immense array of disgusting junk and topped it off with two heavy milk shakes with extra whip cream.

'I'm not hungry,' Kara denied, electric blue eyes wide as the figure conscious reporter tore into her first triple.

'At least take this, you'll thank me later,' Lois insisted, forcing the whip cream heavy shake into her hands.

Kara found her super strength unfortunately absent and couldn't deny the taller woman, still she pouted, 'I don't like ice cream, its cow sweat...'

'Its not real ice cream anyway, its made from eggs or something. I did a story about it a while ago,' Lois told her, burger tasting better every minute, 'Oh wow, they changed the sauce on these...'

Kara frowned and the skinny blonde took a sip, nose wrinkling in disgust. But it was interesting enough she tried another and found it tasted better. The next one was amazing and soon Kara was sucking in just air, the whole shake gone.

'Can...can I try a burger?' Kara asked, not even noticing her sniffles.

'Try five,' Lois insisted with a ketchup stained grin.

When they reached home, both women were feeling like shit and divine simultaneously. Nose and food baby stuffed. Kara's size zeroes were unbuttoned, 20 inch waist bulging out an extra half foot of turgid, groaning mass, while Lois' skirt was unzipped down to the hip and still snug. The virus had lowered her metabolism down to normal and she groaned at the unaccustomed consequence of over eating after a month of eating whatever she wanted without bloating or weight gain. Still, despite the discomfort and stuffy noses each wore a secret smile.

'That might have been my favorite thing about earth,' Kara smiled, patting her stomach, 'although some people might not like seeing me like this.'

'Forget them, a real men like a woman with curves. I can promise you that,' Lois grinned, thinking of some plans tonight a mere cold couldn't hope to derail.

Much later that night, after a late dinner of oven baked pizza and garlic bread and soda and some more garlic bread, Kara snoozed the sleep of the dead, her first cold wiping her out. She didn't hear her cousin sweep back in, rubbing his jaw after a hard fight over the south china sea. Clark hovered silently upstairs so as not to wake anyone, only to hear the bed room door close behind him. The superman, 6'4 of sculpted muscle and pure 100% goodness turned to see his wife standing gorgeous and proud.

Lois' nose might have been a little bit red, but even super senses wouldn't notice that past what Lois was wearing. The city slicker reporter had finagled her way into a pair of size 2 cut offs confiscated from Kara, the ultra short shorts just barely fitting over her hips and fully unbuttoned, no x-ray vision needed to show she wasn't wearing underwear. A plaid shirt had been turned into a tube top, showing firm cleavage and a strangely swollen belly, while Lois' long hair had been worked into pig tails. The stylish reporter looked very much a young hay seed just starting to show.

'Hey city slicker, you said you couldn't knock me up,' Lois cooed in a bad rural accent, 'but I'm two months late and getting fat! You dun knocked me up!'

Clark blinked at the role play, able to hear Lois' heart thunder with anticipation, 'Oh ma'am, let me make that good to you...'

An hour of hot, sweaty groaning later and Clark was fast asleep. Lois smiled at herself, pregnant drop out hit every one of her kinks, and slid out of bed into a robe to pad down and find a midnight snack. She frowned to find the ice cream and half her frozen snickers gone, grabbing the two that were left. On the stairs she bumped into Kara, hovering down with an empty bowl and looking sheepishly stuffed.

'You know what this means?' Lois asked, grabbing the chocolate sauce and taking a long chug.

'Huh?' Kara asked.

'That you're healthy enough to get into some sweats and buy us some more ice cream,' Lois grinned.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: Lois infects Supergirl...and stops for food.

choices: Wonder Woman is off fighting crime and herself
We cut to Karen Starr's office, where there's a problem.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
At eight in the morning, Lois Lane was back flat on her bed with her hips in the air, zipping her skirt up past her hips and sucking in her stomach mightily.

It was a position familiar to any woman who found herself eating too much and jogging too little, and Lois had certainly been fitting that description. Her tennis shoes were only used to take out the garbage anymore and her running shorts worn only for comfort. What was different was Lois face wore a look of triumph as the skirt felt tight and a look of disappointment when the size six zipper slid closed, followed by the button.

'Damn, it still fits,' Lois glowered, noticing Clark staring at her from the hall again and smiled, 'for now.'

'Its friday, give it the weekend,' the archtype hero grinned, eyes running up his curvy wife.

Two weeks off the diet food had reversed Lois weight loss, ridding Lois of her boniness as she her loose on Monday size fours became well fitted on Tuesday, tight on Wednesday morning, painted on on Thursday and unbuttonable by Friday. A weekend spent in leggings and shorts, eating heavily, had seen her size sixes pulled back out of the closet and the process repeated, until now only her loosest fitting pair could be hauled up her hips. Her size eights were prepped and ready to go, while size tens were already in the mail.

'Its a shame though, I was hoping it wouldn't fit. Give me an excuse to show off in front of you,' Lois grinned, like a teenager instead of a woman in her late thirties as she looked over her husband.

Ditching that diet was the best idea she'd ever had. She didn't have so much annoying energy to burn off, and her horniness was through the roof along with her appetite. Food tasted better and sex felt better, ideas for positions and role play she'd never before thought of coming into her head and she was sending sexts when she should be working. It was like a two week ovulation cycle on turbo mode and it was dollars to doughnuts she was already knocked up considering she'd ditched the pill and had sex to completion fourteen times in the last week. Lois hadn't really wanted kids before their happy accident and not long ago the thought having to grow a big pregnant gut and lose it would be a nightmare, but now she was looking forwards to it. Except the last part.

'You don't need an excuse,' Clark smiled back, eyes drinking her in.

Lois face had filled out a little, cheeks looking healthy. Her hips had a seductive wiggle to them at all times and her chest had puffed up and firmed up, bra needing an upgrade to a D. She had a little venus mound pushing at the front of the snug skirt and her crossed legs were more soft than muscle now. If Clark had any thought worry about Lois putting all her weight back on just as fast, he didn't know it. The extra curves were just what he wanted, after all he'd always liked Lois' fierce drive more than her frankly too skinny body. 36 X 26 X 37 suited her better than her old measurements by far. He could barely keep his hands off her anymore, she was way better at this weight...

He was pretty sure at least. He got odd sensations this was wrong on occasion but mostly was enjoying his wife's new attitude.

'Well, if we did...how about we see if we can feed me out of this skirt,' Lois smiled, tapping the tight button with one purple painted nail, 'kids flew off to school, you can fly me into work in plenty of time...so, how about it?'

It was easier than expected. Well, given how the Kent-Lane freezer was full of ice cream and Clark had heat vision it was easy. Spoonful after spoonful was sucked down, half hot/half cold slurry bloating out Lois faster and faster as she ate and ate. One tub in the trash can, two and three and four...

'More,' Lane groaned, mouth a mess, top a mess, gut stuck out well past her breasts and button hanging on by a thread, 'I'm almost there...'

'We're out of ice cream,' Clark told her, 'and the stores don't open yet.'

'Use the chocolate sauce,' the horribly stuffed Lois demanded, 'do I have to do all the thinking Smallville?'

Something was shoved into her mouth, a funnel? For a minute Lois was horrified at the indignity but then the chocolate sauce hit her tongue and her mind shut the fuck up and left things alone. By 8:45 they were finished with the skirt, the button having popped off half way through the chocolate sauce, and Lois was just plain finished. Purple eyes were painfully crossed and her torn, stained clothes were thrown on the floor as she licked her lips, sweat coating her body.

'Holy shit...,' Lois groaned, trying to sit up and failing, 'holy shit...can you get me some anti-acid?'

'Sure, oh dang,' the never swearing superman noticed the time, 'I've got to get to work...'

In a blur Clark was suddenly dressed and clean in his 'disguise' which Lois still berated herself for not seeing through always. It would clearly take a lot, lot longer for the better reporter to get up and ready...after she managed to get awake.

'Tell Perry I'm sick,' Lois grunted, 'I've got three months of off time saved up before any other leave...and I think I'm gonna need it if sex keeps feeling this good.'

A quick kiss on the lips and Clark was gone, letting Lois sip some stomach soother and snooze, wrapped around her belly. A bit before noon the stunning, super curvy woman managed to get up, drowsily shower and eat a big, big bowl of sugary cereal. It was a beautiful fall day outside, perhaps the last of the high 70s they'd see and it struck Lois that she was a bit more alabaster than she'd prefer. Should she go tanning?

'Well, why not?' she asked, yawning and rubbing her still slightly swollen belly, 'not like I have the energy for anything else after all.'

Lois found to her dismay that she didn't have a bikini at hand. She was a reporter not a beach goer after all, she hadn't taken a day off in years, not even a sick day, having gone in every day during her last round of sniffles. Nor was she going to lay out in her somewhat snug undies either, she might like the knocked up white trash role play but she had class. Snooping around found the daisy dukes used in that role play...which got stuck at mid thigh.

'God, was I really so damn scrawny I could fit into these?' the hour glass woman giggled, sliding the doll clothes off her much healthier legs.

A pair of size six blue jeans were soon found though and guessing she'd never wear them again, Lois cut them so short the pockets hung all the way out and shimmied them on. Occasional tugs got them up her thighs and over her hips, but they were tighter than the size twos had been two weeks earlier and barely hid that Lane wasn't wearing underwear, held up by the fight between wider hips and slightly dipping, heavily swollen gut..

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
There was a small thump on the hood of Wonder Girl's car.

She turned around from the backseat with its load of junk food and rolly polly Super Girl to see her target staring down at her. Cassandra Sandsmark had, in her short couple of years as Wonder Girl, grown into a tough, confident young woman and although her steely abs were getting a layer of rust, she was still a dangerous fighter who could bend steel I beams with her bare hands and fly faster than a bullet.

She still gulped at the Batgirl standing on her hood.

The woman on the other side of the windshield was so spectacularly ripped her six pack showed through her kevlar armor. Usually the Bat clan's uniforms looked ridiculous in the day time, but the blank black eye lenses and stitched shut mouth of the Batgirl's mask were unsettling. Wonder Girl nervously patted down her skirt, seething at the little bounce of her stomach as she did and flexing her arms to reassure herself that although she was losing some definition she was still plenty strong, Cassie did the smart thing.

"Well, there she is," she told Kara, "Go get her Supergirl."

Between the two of them, when Kara's powers were working, the blondes had enough super strength to move the moon out of earth orbit and every bullet in every gunstore in Gotham would bounce off them. But neither of them were about to get out of the car.

"I think, that you should go out there," Kara said, double chin quivering as she fear ate some KFC mashed potatoes and gravy, "and talk her into joining the team, right?"


The silent Batgirl continued staring at them.

"No, no remember the plan was for you to try and fight her and then I'd tell her she could join the team," Sandsmark insisted, "so, go get her..."

"Well I would," Supergirl said, putting up the emptied mass potatoes and pulling out a box of potato wedges, "but I'm kinda full."

She slapped her bulging belly, whose wobbling jello surface bounced, making another stitch in her cheer sweater go.

"Gonna need to nap this off," Kara yawned, shifting her heavy bulk in the seat as her usually low energy levels moved towards a post second lunch nap, "you should handle it."

...

Cassandra Cain, Batgirl, was slightly confused. She'd been bored, having finished her training ahead of schedule and had gone on day time patrol to find some crime, only beating up a few drug carel dens and decided to spy on her team mates at college. Both to look at the life she couldn't have and to spy at the rather succulent female population. Gotham U had once lead the state in girl's athletics but now the only physical competition it could win was a pie eating contest. Big bellies wobbled and jiggled as their owners waddled along, chafing thighs and quivering butts testament to a freshman fifteen that had come earlier and four times more than expected.

That was when she'd seen something strange in Gotham.

Two people on a clear stake out, that were well fed college age blondes. The deliciously plump one in the backseat radiated a mix of grief and satiation as she gorged from a pile of junk food. A cheer leader uniform was disintegrating off her body, the size two clothes clearly unable to contain the size fourteen blubber pouring out of them. She was eating with a veracity that shocked even the fatty obsessed Batgirl. But the one in the drivers seat was thinner practically boiling with anger and envy over a core of ravenous hunger and desperately sucking in an only slightly puffy belly like she was ashamed of it.

That really confused Cass. Every woman she knew except for Starfire was fat, happy and getting fatter and happier. Stephanie might complain about getting slower and slower but she was flaunting her growing belly and surging boobs at every chance, while the recently retired Catwoman's clothes were shrinking with every added pound. And although the former assassin was loving all the growing fat around her, the partially immune girl was getting slightly concerned. Her solitary existence led to a lot of time to think and things were starting to add up in her head that shouldn't.

Starfire would eat like a piglet and complain about growing. Shouldn't she be happy about the growth like everyone else?

Cassandra herself felt no compunction to gain weight. She was proud of her skills and didn't want them to fade, she wanted to protect all of her new friends and family which she couldn't do if fat. But...everyone around her acted like she should be. Suggesting she eat more, suggesting she not train so hard...it was strange...they hadn't always acted that way. She'd realized that no other woman in Gotham seemed to still be thin and for all everyone seemed to love fat women now, that hadn't always been the case, had it?

Batman seemed to love the ex-catwoman's ever inflating curves: her wobbling, globular thighs that smacked and rasped on each other, her door jamming hips, her sagging, near double belly, heavy breasts and doughy chin. But...when they'd fallen in love Selina had been a lean and fit super criminal. And Dick, while he loved feeding Starfire up, had been dating her as a rail thin model, not the chubby woman who's sagging breasts and expanding hips were pushing her towards the plus sized. Then there was Barbara, who Cass always remembered complaining about how hard it was to stay thin in her wheel chair...

Batgirl might not be able to speak more than a few sentences, but she was still a detective. And there were questions piling up that this blonde girl might be able to answer.

"You," she said, pointing a black clad finger at the driver, who in surprise relaxed her stomach, miniscule paunch oozing out in the gap between skirt and sweater, "why aren't you...fatter?"

....

In the car, Cassie Sandsmark felt her blood start to boil.

This crazy, weird costumed batgirl was asking her why she wasn't fatter? Which meant she was saying she was...fat. This skinny bitch was judging her! Did she know hard it was to find a good workout when you could lift a building?

"Are you...saying that I'm fat?" Wonder Girl growled at the ultra ripped Batgirl, who's quivering abs seemed to be mocking her.

"A little?" the other superheroine said, "but why aren't you, fatter?"

Sandsmark's anger burst through her last restraints, the tiny insult to her softening figure setting her off. A tap of her fist sent her car door slamming into the side of the alley and she broke the seat belt into pieces as she stood up, fast enough her head dented the roof of the car. She was so pissed she didn't care what her aunt Diana would say about the loaned vehicle.

"Call me fat, you stupid skinny bitch, I'll show you!" the half olympian growled, floating off the ground, her slight pot belly bulging over her skirt, "you don't even have any powers!"

Batgirl set her feet, reading the rage off the metahuman's body and considering her options. Fighting Metahumans without careful preparations was dangerous but then again...this wasn't just a metahuman. This was a fat girl in the making who was ravenous with hunger. And dealing with that really was her super power....

Wonder Girl's shoulders tensed, giving Batgirl just enough warning to jump out of the way, dodging just in time for the slightly chubby blonde to crush her own car. In the back, the sleeping Super Girl burped, shoved a potato wedge in her mouth and fell asleep. That would be the key, Cain knew, get the girl trying to kill her eating and she'd be down for the count.

"I'll show you who's fat!" the enraged Wonder Girl yelled, whipping a lasso out that Batgirl barely dodged, its looped wrapped around a dumpster and cut it in half, "I'll turn you into the big sack of fat you deserve being!"

If she could stay alive long enough.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: Cassandra Vs Cassandra

choices: Batgirl begins investigating the weight gain epidemic.
Wonder Girl invites her to join the Titans.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
In a straight fight, fist against fist, Batgirl knew she'd lose.

Cain's amazing martial artistry wasn't worth much when her hardest hit would only break her own hand against Sandsmark's jaw. And unlike her big gutted Kryptonian friend already napping off her afternoon binge in the back seat, the demi-Goddess didn't have any exploitable weaknesses. All it would take was one hit for the Wonder Girl to put Batgirl out of the fight permanently...which was why Cain pulled a grapple gun out of her belt.

"Catch me then," Cain growled and shot away towards the nearest roof top.

Cain was running before she landed on the roof, mind finding a way to win. A punch wasn't going to do it and the enraged blonde couldn't be talked out of her anger by anyone. Fortunately, the little paunch hanging over Sandsmark's size four skirt band told Batgirl her enemy was already on the path to obesity. She was a fat girl who just didn't know it yet.

And thank to Catwoman's ravenous reaction to a negative review of one of her soirees in the Gotham Time's high society gossip section a month ago, Batgirl knew exactly what a fat girl needed to calm down. She just needed to find a way to survive the trip.

"I'm gonna tie you to a chair, rip a mouth open on your suit and pump you full of heavy cream!" Wonder Girl promised, shooting after the black clad bat in the air, her rage only going higher as she felt herself breathing heavier after such a short chase, the first hint that she was getting out of shape.

Cain popped a tear gas grenade atop a high roof, jumping down towards the street far below. Sandsmark coughed and spluttered through the fog, losing track of her for a minute as she tried to breathe.

Already on street level, Cain ducked inside a store, with one hand pulling a wad of hundreds from her utility belt and slamming it onto the counter.

"Hide," she ordered the clerk, glad the increasingly rolly polly girl students of Gotham U would be quite a while before they arrived.

With the other, she pulled a smoke grenade and stuck her head outside the door.

Sandsmark was still floating in the air, drawing a few glances as she floated. The short cheer skirt Sandsmark was wearing really showed off how toneless her thighs were getting, enough to distract Batgirl for just a moment. It wasn't that she was unfaithful to her new girlfriend but a plumper thigh was a plumper thigh. Promising herself to keep her eyes on the prize, Batgirl made herself give an unaccustomed shout.

"You've got cellulite!" Cain kind of yelled and tossed the smoke grenade down.

Sandsmark turned around in the air, more paunch oozing out over her waistband. Her breath, already going hard enough to make her bra creak, turned into a shriek of rage and she dived down at her infuriatingly thin target. She burst through the door in a flurry of glass, finding herself floating in the smoky interior of a frozen yogurt shop.

"You dumb bitch, you picked the perfect place to make a real fat ass out of you!" Sandsmark wheezed, watery eyes and stinging lungs ruining her concentration, "Hope you enjoyed walking in because you're never walking again!"

She didn't notice Batgirl move silently behind her and pull the lasso off her belt until the golden rope was looped around Sandsmark's beefy arms. In a moment, Wonder Woman's niece was pulled to the ground by her own unbreakable rope, her super powers neutered. Batgirl expertly knotted the rope around her wrists as the blonde kept struggling...and made her think of trying out the same trick with Stephanie.

"Ugh, you bitch. You won't stop me forever, I'm Wonder Girl, you can't just, ugh, tie me up," Sandsmark snapped, uselessly struggling against the now much stronger Cain, "I'm way stronger than you and faster and this was just a fluke! This lasso doesn't even make people tell the truth!"

"Maybe," Batgirl said, dragging her towards the whirring tanks of soft serve, picking out one that looked like peanut butter cup ice cream.

That was what Selina had gorged on when angry over the gossip column. Cass, her fetishes barely awakening, had marveled at how the still thin Selina had downed bowl after bowl of the stuff, gorging until her clothes had ripped away and she'd been too ill to do anything but be dragged away by her amazed step-daughter. When Bruce had returned from Wayne business well...Cass had had to go on patrol early and alone. Sandsmark though, wouldn't have nearly as much fun.

"Wait, what are you doing?" Sandsmark gasped, mouth watering and slight stomach rumbling as she looked at the ice cream.

Ever since her infection and the destruction of her metabolism, Wonder Girl had been on a diet. There'd been slips and cheat days, the starter belly bulging out of her Metropolis U cheer sweater and her soft thighs bulging out of her cheer skirt hadn't come from nowhere. But she'd been painfully aware of her slow softening, not nearly as much as everyone around her but the loss of her athleticism had made Cassie Sandsmark do the unthinkable: stop eating her favorite comfort food of peanut butter cup ice cream.

"Calming you down," Cass Cain said, easily but gently shoving Wonder Girl's face under the spigot.

She even had the good graces to pull Sandsmark's blonde hair out of the way. Wonder Girl stopped struggling, her hated gluttony taking over and her mouth plopping open the moment Batgirl pulled the switch. A long stream of frozen yogurt fell into her mouth, filling her cheeks wider and wider. The blonde inwardly seethed...but couldn't make herself not groan in pleasure as the beloved taste soothed her anger.

Batgirl released the switch, her keen observational skill letting her guess exactly how much her attacker could hold in her mouth. Smiling inside her mask, Cass let Sandsmark swallow and then pulled the switch again. And again. And again.

"No...more...," Sandsmark groaned.

Her cheeks were stained with partly melted frozen yogurt. Her stomach was swollen with over a gallon of soft serve, pushing out over her cheer uniform. The zipper was down, the button strained.

"Yes, more," Batgirl hissed.

The frozen yogurt machine churned again. Cain watched the stream of frozen deliciousness pour into her attacker's mouth, an almost painfully wide grin stretched across her face. Fighting and feeding were her two joys in life and today had mixed them together.

She let the glutted Sandsmark slide to the ground. Wonder Girl's stomach was immense, a beach ball turning her sweater into a bra. It was taut to the touch and groaned audibly. Once it started digesting, Cass guessed it would go right to her opponent's thighs.

"Zeus, Zeus...I'm gonna get fat," Wonder Girl moaned, unable to remember why that made her angry, "Fat's good right...I need to eat more...why was I angry over that?"

The ice cream machines all bore a large red A for Anonymous.

"Good," Batgirl said, pulling loose the knot on the lasso, "Why are you here?"
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: Skill beats strength: Batgirl Wins, Wonder Girl...

choices: Cass investigates Lois Lane
Cass investigates Cat Woman.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
An hour previous, the gorged Wonder Girl would have set the second part of her plan in motion: getting this infuriatingly ripped Batgirl onto the Teen Titans where she could spend as much time next to the still infectious Super Girl as she could.

But right now, Cassie Sandsmark was tied up with a magic lasso, drunk on a couple gallons of frozen yogurt and and thoroughly sexually confused. Getting her ass so thoroughly and surprisingly kicked and then getting stuffed to the brim had turned her on in ways Super Boy never had. Right now she couldn't tell up from down, much less stick to a lie.

"I was going to get you infected," Wonder Girl groaned, "like me and Kara, so you would get fat too."

Inside her mask, Cass raised an eyebrow. Someone wanting to fatten her up was a strange turn of events, but the word "infected" made wheels turn in her mind. Her mind went back to a couple months earlier, when she'd gotten sick...

"Infected with what?" Bat Girl asked, flicking the turgid dome of Sandsmarks balloon belly.

"What do I look like? Dr. Wonder Girl?" Sandsmark whined, "A few months ago every female hero was skinny, then Super Girl had a cold and started over eating. Every other girl at the college got sick for a couple days and then started over eating too. And no one but me noticed! They just ate and ate, it was like they enjoyed getting fatter and fatter and all the boys and gay girls turned into chubby chasers over night. I was the only one who noticed it! People keep calling me skinny even with this gut!"

Memory flickered in Cass' mind: Damian daring to insult Stephanie in front of her and saying every one but Cass was getting fat. The weeks she'd spent joyfully fattening up Selina and Steph and Barbara. The happy feeling she'd had at seeing flat bellies turn into bulging muffin tops, at seeing toned thighs grow lazy and beefy at breasts drooping far ahead of schedule. It had been so new, so gratifying and she'd thought it had just been a new discovery from within herself.

"When was this?" Cass asked, mouth going dry.

"I don't know, I didn't write it down. A couple months ago," the blonde prisoner grumbled, "Didn't you notice when all the gotham girls but you got fat?"

Batgirl remembered the windy night when she'd felt miserably sick. The night that she'd started seeing Babs and Steph and Selina as scrawny. The night that Stephanie had also gotten sick and started overeating to her and Tim's delight. Cass realized she'd been one of the initial infected. That while she somehow hadn't gotten fat, she turned Stephanie, the girl she'd been crushing on for two years so chubby she could barely fight crime anymore.

Some villain had pulled off a scheme startling in scope. How many heroines could be fat by now? Could she stop this?

Did she even want to stop this?

Apart from crime fighting, Cass had been miserable for years. It was only after she'd started bulking out her girlfriend and adopted mom she'd started feeling happy outside violence. Her days weren't just dull training until it was time for patrol, but had interactions she actually looked forwards to. Without the oomph from her fetish, she'd have never had the courage to kiss Steph. What would it be like if she lost that?

And who would she be if she just let it happen?

"Yes," Batgirl said, "and I'm going to find out why."

Batgirl might primarily be a martial artist, yet she was still a member of the Bat family. Near illiterate she might be, but she was still a detective at heart. She'd find out who'd done this to everyone and stop them!

Even if it meant she had to lose what she enjoyed most...

"Leave the city," she told Wonder Girl, pulling the lasso loose and guessing the stuff woman bulging out of her skirt was no threat, "We'll solve this."

....

Upon finding evidence of the infection, Cassandra went to the best Detective she knew for help.

"Everyone got sick," Cass said awkwardly,trying to explain with her hands as much as she could, "and then, the girls got fat!"

"Batgirl, thank you for bringing this up," Bruce Wayne told her that night in the cave, the impossibly muscular Batman having just finished a particularly violent patrol alongside his proteges, "Now, let's get you examined for a concussion. You must have taken a hit in the fight against those kidnappers."

"What?" the quiet vigilante asked her adoptive father in confusion.

"Cassandra, you must have taken a head injury," Bruce chuckled, "I've always liked fat women, remember? And Selina's always been kinda heavy set."

Batgirl blinked. She could remember when Selina could run up a building instead of getting winded up the stairs and it hadn't been that long ago. If there had been a virus, it must have rewritten everyone else's memory.

"Besides, I'm the Batman, I'm pretty sure I'd notice if I suddenly started liking fat women from nowhere," Bruce said.

"Bruce, we're out of ice cream!" Selina yelled from the top of the stairs, the ultra pear socialite leaning in, creases of hip fat pushing against the door, "Can you get me some more rocky road?"

She'd been immune to this effect too, so she'd have to go find help from somewhere else.

....

"You're saying I used to be *munch* skinny?" Barbara Gordon asked, shoveling a handful of sweet potato fries into her mouth.

The butterball ex-Batgirl filled her chair to the limit, rising higher and higher on her inflating buns. The redhead gave no sign of ever having been an award winning gymnast, her lean face having ground round and chubby while her modest breasts had ballooned into saggers bigger than her head, resting on a newly doubled belly. Totally inactivity and being surrounded by snacks from the brilliant feeder Cass had ballooned Barbara faster than any other heroine.

"Yes!" the frustrated Cass said, pointing at a framed picture of Babs looking athletic and trim by her computer, "you were Batgirl!"

"Yeah, that was before the chair," the nearly obese master hacker shrugged, causing a tidal wave of jiggles to break out beneath her under sized t-shirt, "as soon as I couldn't exercise, all my bad habits caught up to me."

"No, you were skinny," Cass sighed despondently.

"I've got a photographic memory," Barbara insisted, shoving more fries into her mouth, "I think I'd notice getting fat out of nowhere. Now excuse me, Dick wants to ease things over between the three of us at a buffet. You should come, you look thin."

Wait, Dick!

....

"Of course Starfire used to be skinny," Dick Grayson said at the pool behind Wayne Manor, the first lithely muscled Robin flipping a grill full of burgers in his civvies.

"No, she...wait!" Cass yelped in surprise, "You believe me!"

At last, someone listened to her story. Someone believed her! Now with Dick's help, she could trace this back to its source.

"Of course I do," Grayson nodded, "She was always super skinny and fit, but she was always so sweet and fierce that I liked her anyway."

"What," Cass said, "no. She...you liked skinny girls!"

"Personality is what's important when dating," Dick reminded her, flipping another thing of sizzling meat, "I've always liked bigger girls but the way she acted is what drew me to her."

"Dick, is this bikini the flattering?" Starfire asked, walking from the manor in a tiny purple bikini.

Perfect legs rasped together in a sensual promise, jiggles going up them with every step. The floss-like scraps cut deep into her buttery hips, the aliens buns big enough that each sway brought their cellulite studded flanks into view. Despite her daily started diets, the low will powered alien's paunch was large enough it had begun hanging over the front of her panties in a tangerine tide. More australian cleavage poured out of the undersized triangular cups than Cass had and Star's once muscular arms had started to sprout bingo wings.

"You look like a billion bucks, babe!" Dick whistled, "I'll have your burgers up in a minute!"

Part of Cass knew now that she didn't really feel attracted to the plus sized pile of curves almost waddling out of the manor. But she still had to close her mouth and make herself sit down. Star just looked so good, so soft and pampered and lazy and perfect.

"I'm glad she's getting a good figure finally, but I've always loved her," Dick smiled, "I'm glad her agency wants her to go full plus size now!"

Cass rubbed her head trying to get the image of the plus sized tamaranian out of her head. She'd have to do this on her own, a case no one else believed in. Without help she couldn't use any tech, so she'd have to do this with what she knew. She and Supergirl had been infected at the same time but she'd never met Super Girl, wait, Super Girl's step mom and her step mom were best friends...
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: Batgirl begins investigating the weight gain ep...

choices: Harley has some fun.
Ivy is bored
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Karen Starr barely got into work on time.

As CEO that really mattered, especially with all the work they were doing fueling Anonymous' growth. The company was making money hand over fist just from the diet food, having remade its initial investment in marketing and transport in weeks. It helped that Karen had done a lot of the heavy lifting, using her kryptonian super powers and the help of her geomancer friend Atlee to create a vast series of caverns and bunkers filled with Ivy's hungry plants and fueled by solar powered lights 24/7. The quick growing diet food variety were all harvested already, their seeds preserved in case they needed to get thin in an emergency, but they'd been replaced with the full fat versions already. Aside from that, she'd had to sign endless amounts of paper work, under go inspections that had to be dosed with Ivy's mind control serum...which was a bit evil she had to admit...

But it was all worth it: because she was fat.

She entered her building wearing a new size fourteen pant suit that fit her perfectly. Snug across the bulging gut that had covered up her hated abs and was starting to sag over her underwear when standing. Tight enough around her thick, toneless thighs that the red fabric went 'schwish-schwish' with every almost a waddle step. Spread thin over her heavy, sagging, bouncy shelf of an ass, a big addition even though her hips hadn't spread that much unfortunately. Skintight over beefy lunch lady arms that looked pathetic compared to her old cut guns. And of course, cradling her now head sized and very bra dependent I cup gazaongas that would soon be putting her buttons to the test giving that her rounded face was already munching this morning's third doughnut.

The picture on the badge she flashed through security showed a woman with cheek bones sharp enough to shave with and a jawline of shocking thinness. Karen's new face were round as a moon, her disguise's glasses looking more natural and she seemed less a lifetime jock than a cute, chubby nerd girl. Finishing her breakfast on the elevator the pleasantly plump heroine walked through the executive floor of her building, passing her slender workforce who'd gone from soft to lean and fit thanks to the diet anonymous snacks. Of course they were now all eating the full fat hyper addictive versions expecting to keep losing weight and the rebounds were already starting , her super hearing could actually detect thickening thighs.

She'd have to work hard to stay the fattest woman at the office.

Her phone buzzed while she thought and she pulled it out on the way to her office. Usually she'd be there by now but the amazing plant based food combined with not enough time in the sun was making her really out of shape and she loved it, her top flight speed and stamina dropping noticably as when she'd given the modified fat fetish plague to Catwoman. Monitoring social media showed it was already ripping through the daily planet, Gotham and justice league like the plague it was.

'Your new secretary is weird,' the text from Atlee said, the geomancer having decided to spend some time in Karen's office as an 'advisor' and earn a pay check.

'...what?' Kara responded.

She didn't have a new secretary...

Hurrying as fast as a fat girl could, the beefy heroine approached her office's waiting room and found seated behind the desk not her efficient secretary Brenda, a rail thin older woman, but instead a whale of a pale blonde with an ass so fat it lifted her off the chair.

'Quinn,' Karen hissed as she recognized the obese ex-villainess, 'what are you doing here?"

'Why making sure you're all taken care of,' the mega pear beamed, showing teeth whitened by the same goodies that had turned her from gymnast to land whale, 'can't do that from the apartment! Want a candy?'

There was enough chocolate on Quinn's desk to give every woman in the eastern sea board an acne outbreak and Karen scanned them quickly to ensure the insane clown hadn't poisoned them or something.

'Where's Brenda?' she asked, ensuring she was unseen and pulling the doughball ex-con from her chair, 'I swear if you've...'

'Relax, she won a cruise...that I rigged,' Quinn grinned, 'come on, we're friends, aren't we Betty?'

'Quinn, we're business partners, and you used me to try and become a super hero side kick when I had amnesia,' the kryptonian hissed, 'now you're going to leave my office and...'

'Hey Karen, these new bars of yours are pretty damn good. Way better than hybrids,' Atlee announced as she left Karen's office.

Her side kick was a fairly short, dark haired girl who was from the center of the earth and had immense powers over tectonic movements. Karen viewed her like a younger sister and a protege. Living on the surface with its junk food had chunked her up a little bit, from a lean 110lbs to a chunky 152, heavy in the thighs and belly. The diet bars had cut three fourths of that off, giving her a trim, fit shape back for the first time in a few years, but right now she had one of the non-diet cookies in hand.

'Oh...good to hear,' PG said, lowering Quinn down, 'you look great...'

Of course she thought Atlee was better at one fifty and would soon see her bigger than that...

'Oh, how much ya lost?' Quinn questioned with an evil look in her eye, 'I've been looking to drop a few hundred pounds...'

'About thiry pounds, I'll be back to my old self in no time,' Atlee smiled as she walked bye, 'thanks Karen!'

'...no problem,' PG said stiffly, Harley getting wickedly happy as the door closed.

'So she doesn't know she's back on the one way train to fat-ass town with no return ticket?' Harley laughed.

'You're leaving now,' Karen told her.

'Leaving? When I'd have to yell out to your pal that you were fattening her up knowingly?' Harley said, 'Are you really even a hero anymore?'

'Shut up Quinn,' Karen told her, only for Harley to grab her in a hug.

'Oh I'll shut up...if you do what I say...,' Quinn smiled.

'What...what do you want?' Karen asked, defeated.

'Simple, roomy...,' the mental patient said, piggy blue eyes gleaming, 'you and I are gonna have some fun...'
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.title: We cut to Karen Starr's office, where there...

choices: footage of Batgirl fighting Maxima
Footage of Wonder Woman receiving a rather ironic reward.
1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
"Alright, make sure yer not peaking with the x-ray specs, okay?" Harley's thick gotham accent grated in Power Girl's ear.

"Harley, I was the one who set this up while you sat on the couch," Karen Starr sighed, resisting the urge to burn off the clown's fingers over her eyes.

She was a hero no matter what and the Clown did have her over the barrel, she wouldn't use force unless it was for something truly heinous.

"Ta-da!" Harley yelled, pulling her fingers away to show the blonde her living room, "what do you think?"

"Well," Karen began while the three hundred pounds of Harley hopped off the groaning kitchen chair she'd been standing on to put her hands over the tall Kryptonian's eyes, "I think this is incredibly tacky and completely clashes with the crystal minimalism couture I have to honor my birth planet..."

"This" was a huge, hot pink ikea shag couch with built in mini fridges and a giant bubbling fondue pot of chocolate next to it that dominated Power Girl's living room.

"Really? I wonder what that Atlee chick would think of it...," Harley teased, "might think that you're trying to fatten someone up..."

"Fine, its the best thing I've ever seen," Power Girl said, crossing her arms over her chest, beefy limp bouncing up engorged tit flesh.

"Can't wait to try it out, when you're dressed for it," the ex-super villain giggled to herself.

"I think I'm dressed for relaxing," Power Girl said, pointing at her clothes.

When not in her business best or super suit, Karen preferred a pair of athletic shorts and a tank top.Right now the shorts were blue and the tank top was white and both needed to be up sized two or three times. Long muscular thighs were looking lazy and plush, cuddling together for warmth and her calves had gotten scrawny, while her deflated ass had begun to fall out of her shorts. Karen had always shown her midriff, but while once firm abs were hinted at now she had a rather large beer belly on display. Soft as a marshmallow, it was starting to tilt downwards under its own weight. Famously large and firm hooters had gone from round and firm to tear drop and clearly were going to continue to sag as they started to outgrow her K cup sports bra. Her sharp face was fuller and softer, looking nerdier and more cute than pretty. Her arms were a strange outlier, their muscle tone had evaporated and Karen's fat hadn't quite grown back to the same level, making her look kind of wimpy.

"nah, you're dressed for relaxing, I'm talking about relaxing," Harley said with raised eyebrows.

Karen sighed, not that deeply though. Harley might be three hundred pounds of infuriatingly crazy ex villain but she was still a three hundred pound pear whose build and phsyique were exactly what the over plump Power Girl liked. Her teeth chattered and all of her much exposed skin was reddened with cold, from her cherubic cheeks to her bulging gut rolls, while her rock hard nipples were visible through her shirt.

"I see," Alfred said, knowing that this woman was a member of the community and saddened yet another young heroine had succumbed to obesity, why couldn't more of them show restraint like Mistress Cassandra?, "Follow me please."

It was indeed much warmer in the immense mansion which combined with the rapid pace the Butler set as he went into the kitchen brought another problem: the frigid Kryptonian soon warmed up by the end of the foyer and was feeling comfortable through the cavernous billiards room, a bit toasty in the secondary dining room and beaded with sweat past the entrance to the reading room. Karen began to wheeze, wondering how big the house could be and it it would be bad form to ask for a sit down break and a soda to catch her breath.

Selina Kyle had a natural aversion to water.

She was after all the Catwoman, even if her cat suit was now retired and too small to get past her cankle. Maritime heists were something she refused to ever do, she didn't even like getting into the dock districts. But there was an exception when the water was hot and bubbly.

The uber-pear socialite leaned back in the manor's indoor hot tub, foaming water sloshing against the formidable boobs surging in their too tight mono-kini top top. Selina had been decently busty before accidentally infecting herself, an event the virus had erased fully from her memory, but after gaining more than a hundred pounds in just a few months was still wearing the same bras as when she ran several miles a day. Her band size might have grown as she accumulated backfat, but the Catburglar's cups had grown not an inch, even as her perfect derrier went from traffic stopping tight to so wide and thick a car might bounce off it. Catwoman didn't mind the explosive growth down stairs and thanks to her infecting most of Gotham's upper classes and her own dear Brucey neither did anyone else she knew, but did feel a bit miffed that her bust was a bit below average anymore, especially once the huge busted Starfire had begun to hang around the manor more. The only one currently using it for that was Cassandra, powerful strokes and kicks propelling her through the water for lap after lap.

Selina frowned at that. Her step-daughter should really be resting, the poor baby pushed herself far too hard even when she wasn't wounded. Really the thought of her even going out at night to run around on the slick, cold roof tops, let alone fight ninjas and bank robbers with just her hands, stressed Selina out something fierce. She was lucky she dealt with stress so well, otherwise she might indulge in something to ease her fears, the short haired socialite thought as she filled her mouth with bon bons. Why couldn't Cass be more like her friends?

Take Stephanie for instance. The retired Spoiler was relaxing in an intertube float, wearing a purple string bikini left at the manor when she'd been an uber fit vigilante. Its strings barely tied around significantly meatier hips, Steph's spoiled, stuffed paunch pressed the tiny triangular pantie down and her very large, heavy breasts surged out of the tiny top in every direction. The blonde girl looked pampered and lazy and wasn't even yet a real member of the upper class like Selina or Cassandra were. Selina thought that the blonde was an adorably sweet girl who'd make an excellent future wife for Tim or even Cass, she wasn't one to judge, and was happy she'd stopped risking herself through foolish exertions. Catwoman had been so happy her step-daughter had made a friend and had hoped the expanding Stephanie would rub off on her daughter in more ways than one, but while the blonde had ballooned, the Batgirl had remained as dangerously lithe and head strong as ever.

"She's going to hurt herself," Selina grumbled and yelled at her stubborn adopted child, "Cassandra, Cassandra! Stop swimming laps this instant!"

The fast swimming Batgirl steadfastly ignored her, feigning ignorance as she kicked through the water. Selina huffed and considered grounding the ex-assassin, which would do nothing considering the girl had no social life at all, but she needed to be stopped anyway before she hurt herself. Ultimately the socialite didn't budge an inch except to grab more bon bons. The salt water hot tub was very warm and comfy, her knees had been complaining of late and standing up was so hard. And the pool area was chilly outside of it, the pale woman's sensitive skin would shiver and shake to be so exposed unless absolutely necessary. But she was thankfully very rich, so Selina did what the rich usually do: get someone poorer to do it.

"Stephanie!" Selina shouted, after swallowing more chocolate, "Stephanie! Can you please get Cassandra's attention for me?"

"Ugghhh, I don't know Mrs. Wayne," Spoiler moaned, rubbing a stomach swollen to the bursting point with the absolutely massive pile of soy bacon, waffles and cage free eggs Cass had stuffed her with that morning, "I'm so full...if I get into the water I might cramp up."

It was then that Alfred walked primly into the room, the waddling, wheezing house guest following along behind him.

"Mistress Selina, you have a guest. One Miss Starr, will you be requiring anything else?" the Butler asked.

"More bon bons please and perhaps some donuts...its been a bit since breakfast," Selina said, "and some snacks for Miss Starr."

It puzzled Selina why Power Girl's secret identity was here. She didn't know her that well, although she knew that they'd met before. It was almost like they'd collaborated on something important but she couldn't remember for the life of her what that was. Power Girl's puffing breath and heavy foot steps announced her presence, the pale immensely fat woman with her gigantic breasts immediately drawing the eye. Selina ran her eyes over the pale, rotund mass that huffed and wobbled into the vast pool room.

Power Girl had continued inflating over the last few months, going from merely very chubby and out of shape to laughably obese. She was well over three hundred pounds of toneless lard crammed into snug sweat pants and a shirt that rode up to her chest, letting a milk white, striated gut sag over her groin. The Kryptonian's famous breasts had gone from slightly saggy to floppy parodies about to pop out of her shirt. When had they met last time?

"Karen, ah take a seat," the Catwoman said as the alien wobbled up, her duties as Mistress of the House supplanting her rebudding memory, planting a flattened ass onto a groaning set of pool furniture, "you're looking good. To what do we owe the pleasure?"

When they'd met for Power Girl to give her...

"I'm sorry I didn't return your call!" Kara said rapidly, "I got a bit uh, tied up yesterday, and forgot to charge my phone..."

Tied up had been a very accurate description of the Supergirl's status at the time. Tied up up, stuffed to the brim with junk food and with a face between her thighs to be more specific.

"Just wanted to make sure you were okay," the horribly out of shape Power Girl wheezed, wiping sweat off her forehead, "I'm gonna...I'm gonna lay down now..."

Karen Starr flopped back against the pool chair, Australian cleavage pouring out from the bottom of her t-shirt as she gasped in and out. She was breathing just as hard from the walk as she had from flying over to her that morning when she'd given Selina the dose of...

A cold...like a virus. Rusty gears started turning in Selina's mind as she remembered finishing her morning run around the manor's trails, when had she run?, and meeting the fat, sweaty alien who'd given her a packet of crystalized virus. A virus that was going too...

Selina took in her step daughter's lithe, muscular physique: hard muscular legs, narrow hips, abdominals so cut they seemed jagged and hard, sinewy arms. Her normal matronly concern over how skinny Cass was chimed in her head, but jogged a memory over how her own body looked the last time she saw Power Girl: endless toned legs, a tautly round ass a coin would bounce off, a carefully toned six pack...

"Do you want to sit in the pool?" Kara asked the wheezing Power Girl.

"I'd love to but I'd need a suit," the pale CEO said, "unless you have a K cup bikini top at hand, I'm a growing girl anymore."

Catwoman stood up shakily, her weak legs trembling as she broke the hot tub's surface with a sploosh of displaced water. Not quite believing what she saw, Selina put her thick, clumsy fingers onto the cellulite studded, spongy mass of her sagging ass cheeks, gasping at the weight and at the heavy slap that sounded when she released it and it slammed against the back of her thighs.

Selina's mouth fell open, making her new third chin pop out, and she collapsed back into the hot tub with a splash. She sat their mentally numb as the jets made her fat layers wiggle and jiggle, trying to comprehend what had happened to her lean sexy body, the carefully honed slinky figure that had made her one of the most successful thieves in the world. That agile ruthless thief was gone, months of snacking, over eating and gorging having changed it day by day into a lazy, bloated, sedate, huge assed society matron who spent her scant not eating hours fussing over her step-daughter and a broodmare for the latest Wayne heir. Selina swallowed, realizing that she'd doubled in size, turning into an engorged fatty who'd never run across roof tops again and would be lucky if she could ever touch her toes once more.

She remembered glutting herself, she remembered Bruce complimenting her growing curves. Their sex life had gotten better and better as she'd gotten fatter and fatter, a process that had sky rocketed as she'd spent more and more time around her step-daughter. But surely Cassandra wouldn't fatten her up, she was so sweet and innocent...her treacherous stomach rumbled, demanding more food when the smell of a rich, hearty soup hit her nose.

Her pudgy fingers poked her flabby body, finding that she had a deep roll of hip fat over her thighs, and was both turned on and horrified by it. Catwoman stood up again, limbs trembling in fear and at realizing that she'd doubled in size.
