Near fifty inch hips wove and shook, her old slinky, seductive strut slowed down to a parody of itself. Fight or flight mode was kicking in, but Selina wasn't really capable of running. So plumply round were her thighs that a medium-fast waddle was all she could manage, even as her bruised and battered ego yelled at her to escape this fat trap she lived in before it was too late. Halfway panicking, Selina made it to the front door just as she started to sweat, her busy schedule of dress fittings and being a smothering step-mom to multiple kids having kept her in better shape than Power Girl even if she at twenty hours a day. Not thinking of what she was going to do besides escape, Catwoman pulled open the main doors and was greeted but a blast of 0 degree air and snow that sent goose pimples running over her fair skin.

The snow storm outside was getting worse and worse, turning into a record setting blizzard. Selina pushed the doors closed with difficulty, finding that while her super thick thighs remained at least a little strong, her once corded arms had lost all their strength even after swelling up into floppy, meaty jigglers. Damn her ass was at last getting that sag to it that she wanted and the spread of cellulite under her spider veins across the inflated moonscape of her thighs drove her wild. And her cankles, damn, they were starting to droop!

Agh, what the hell was she thinking!? Selina shouldn't be getting turned on by the sight of her doubled body, she should be infuriated. She should be calling Ivy and demanding a cure, going on a diet, getting emergency lipo suction and strapping herself to an exercise bike for a year. At the end of the long weekend, Cass was thinking.

Quiet she might be, but the young ex-assassin was also contemplative. Speaking little gave her plenty of time to think, especially during the long naps of the stuffed, lazy foursome of ex-heroines she was pampering ever deeper into obesity (although she'd also slipped out and done some crime fighting while her mom/girlfriend/fuck buddy/guest were sleeping off a few gallons of cake batter). And whether she was rapidly mixing together batter or darting silently from an alley after a mugger, Cass was considering the ever expanding waistlines of the other women and what that meant.

"You've got a type," she admitted to herself, padding back into the billiards room where she'd left them, still in her tight batgirl suit, "blue eyed blonde fatties...who used to be fit."

Stephanie snored in a chair, topless and stuffed. While never as buff as her, Spoiler had been slender and athletic, with a (relatively) flat chest. Now she was over plump and slow moving, head sized breasts sprawling across her beer belly. She'd been a determined crime fighter if never the best, surviving just by grit as she accumulated skills, but now she'd just quit after getting chubby, becoming an assistant "chick with a computer" for Tim and Cass without a word of complaint.

Supergirl was passed out on the floor, chubby thighs spread wide and still touching, a pair of borrowed sweat pants ripping off her. Although she'd never known the alien, had been even thinner, a tiny little tinker bell. But now she had an ass thick enough to stop bullets even if it hadn't been made out of Kryptonian cells. Although her superhuman powers remained, sometimes, the other young woman was just as intent on being a lazy lardass as anyone else. Alone possessed of superhuman stomach stamina, the alien had tested even Cass' ability to feed a fatty, always the last to pass out from being overfull.

Power Girl, snorring loudly in an open bathrobe while sat against a pool table, intrigued her though. Cass had known about the now very heavy heavy hitter. Had felt self conscious at her own small boobs when she'd seen posters of the atomic blonde in Tim's room. But nothing remained of the tall, tan, buff, confident woman. Her giant boobs had become a sagging parody of themselves, her skin was milk white and her body language was of a woman who was not only weak and unconfident, but revelling in it. Cassandra valued her own much weaker fighting prowess, she'd hate to lose her ability to help her friends and the innocent and loved being able to run, fight and jump, but Power Girl was turned on by it! It was very strange...

"Except you...," she said, stepping to her step-mom, spread-eagled across the room.

Catwoman groaned in her sleep, her impossibly stuffed gut rising and falling with each whimper through the split fabric of her nightie. Cassandra had found her step-mom weeping quietly in the attic, a long walk for such a lazy woman, and decided to counter the handful of calories burned with enough muffin batter to feed a small ballgame. Catwoman's belly was so swelled up it had pulled even with her hips temporarily, the once slinky woman's door jammers a tidal wave of cookie dough spreading across the green felt.

"Why you," Cass said, running her fingers down Selina's stuffed gut.

She'd hated Catwoman. When she'd been a villain, Selina hadn't fought honestly, using her feminine wiles on Bruce, having been able to make her body language scream lust loud enough for anyone to read. Cass had hated that, not knowing how to do the same to anyone and had been jealous of the older woman's bustier build.She'd thought Selina vain and weak, knowing the increasingly less villainous Catwoman was afraid of Batgirl in turn.

"You were vain," Cass told her slumbering step mom, "you were...seductive. Now you're..."

Selina's face was getting perfectly round. Guileless and soft, like a big marshmallow. All she did all day was either fret, wanting to make sure everyone was safe and cared for, or eat. Cass loved both of those traits, loved that somebody was treating her as a beloved family member and not just a woman and went inwardly wild to see her modelesque mom multiply in size.

"So fat," Cass said, poking at stretchmarked thigh thick as her own waist, "so lazy. A sweet, fat mommy."

If Batgirl hadn't seen first hand this lazy butterfly of lard emerge from the cocoon of the seductive Catwoman, she'd have never believed it. Selina was a fluffy, chubby housewife. An obese society socialite. The old Selina would have been fretting at what a pregnancy would do to her figure, this one was so fat no one would know she was knocked up.

"How?" Batgirl asked, cupping her own firm jaw in one hard hand, "and why do I...like it?"

It was an odd question to ask after two days of massive feeding. Of dumping slumbering fatties in tubs and filling them up with molten chocolate for them to eat their way out of. Of putting half a hundred Batsymbol sugar cookies into Selina's belly, making her look far more pregnant than she was. Of privately filling Stephanie to the brim with bread sticks and garlic butter, then making out with the chubby blonde until well...

"I always liked you," the ex-assassin said, pacing over to Stephanie, seeing the fading muscle tone of her arms and legs, "you were so funny. So pretty. But..."

She remembered Stephanie being bikini model slim. She remembered secretly loving Steph when the Spoiler was stick skinny, secretly touching herself to thoughts of the blonde as much as she did the middle Robin Tim. It seemed absurd, a sexy girl should be soft and fat and lazy, big and bloated and warm, but that would have been disgusting a while ago.

"How?" she asked herself, sliding off her face covering mask, "I didn't always, now I do...was she...right?"

Wonder Girl's cruel words, claims that the fat fetish was a new thing, a disease came back to Cass. It had seemed strangely true then but she'd been suppressing dealing with it. Was it really true?

"I'm a detective," Cass said to herself, abandoning the room of snoring, rumbling fatties, "I have to know..."

Cass hurried quietly up to her room, opening up a drawer and carefully taking out a stack of well thumbed celebrity gossip mags focusing on Selina Wayne's weight gain since her marriage to Bruce seven months earlier. With some difficulty, the dyslexic girl determined the exact date of Selina's gain, then hurried down to the Batcomputer.

Every member of the family's entrances and exists were logged. A check of the house security tapes on that showed an unbelievably slim-fit Selina going running at 7 am, her tapered waist and slender legs making Cass blink to see. That was her lazy, doting mom? On the tape, Selina ran down the perimeter of the manor's large grounds, going gradually out of frame and not reappearing on the next camera for several minutes.

"Using the blank spots," Cass hummed, catching a flash of a not-quite as obese as she was now Power Girl, "Karen..."

She fast forwarded the tapes, watching Selina come back home and eventually leave, having logged that she was going to lunch with Lois Lane.

"Supergirl's mom...," Cass said, tapping her chin.

When Selina returned from the trip she was incredibly bloated, the first sign of her weight gain standing stark against her otherwise fit body, and she was clearly sick. She was sneezing and coughing, having a long bout just she went past Cass' door. Cassandra put her hand to her mouth.

"She was right, I was infected...," Cass said, amazed, "do I even like fatgirls?"

She thought of Stephanie's swollen chest bounce out after Cass' nimble fingers had undone her bra. Of Selina wriggle herself out of a sports' cars narrow doors.

"Of course I like fatgirls. I don't want to change that," Batgirl said to herself, "but, I need to make sure...someone did this. I have to find out who infected my step mom..."

Although she could tell if the now whimpy Power Girl was lying on interrogation, training from the Batman meant she needed to get some more evidence before confronting her. She could surely finagle some sort of ...internship or something, getting herself and Stephanie in NYC and keep a close eye on the pale woman.

Or she could keep an eye on Supergirl's Step Mom Lois Lane and see why the wife of the Man of Steel was now an obese food critic. It might be odd haunting the Kent's quiet farmhouse but she was sure she could figure out an excuse or two. Lois and Selina went out every once and while, surely she could figure out a way

Its just that you've gotten lazy upstairs at the same rate you've gotten fat downstairs, which is pretty fucking lazy" the other woman said, slapping Karen's butt for emphasis, "but since you're ass is too fat for panties, I'm deciding that this means your tits are too big for bras. Shed it Holstein and let those milkers flop free!"

"Gonna need...phew...a fucking shower after that....I'm a little out of shape," Harley wheezed, a pile of naked, sweaty, pale fat on the floor, "you gotta get those interns out of your place or I'm gonna be too big to even screw soon!"

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Breath coming in huffs and puffs, Selina staggered across the seldom used fourth floor of Wayne Manor.

Once scrambling up a skyscraper would have left the agile cat burglar fresh as a daisy, but the retired Catwoman was on the point of collapse. Her hoggish thighs burned, not just where the flab rasped together like normally, but deep within the layers of lard where the atrophied remnants of her firm muscles groaned at greater than normal movement. Selina was kind of almost not in completely pathetic shape for her size due to her busy social calendar but her lack of exercise and total gluttony meant she was still at the end of her stamina.

"How big is this stupid mansion?" Selina whined, stumbling past rooms that had once been servant's quarters and were now home to her mothballed gowns.

She saw a rack of size eights through an open door, slinky black gowns the best designers had paid Bruce Wayne's leggy bride to wear at various high society parties. Selina recognized one sequined number that had made her ass seem huge at the time, initial feeding sessions having put a new layer of fat over her buns that tabloids had eagerly, and positively, commented on. Right now, the aristocrat doubted she could get half an ass cheek into it.

"I don't know if I'm more turned on or horrified by that," she asked herself, trying to ignore the siren call of a divan sat in the hallway, "Come on Selina, think skinny thoughts. Think skinny thoughts and get thin again..."

The slightly pregnant ex-supervillain wiped sweat from her brow and paused at a cord hanging from the ceiling, smiling at it just as she'd grinned at valuable gems on the other side of bullet proof glass.

"At last...one last set of stairs," Selina smiled, pulling the cord and then hurriedly stepping back as the attic stairs descended from the ceiling.

The fast stumbled bumped Catwoman's basketball sized buns into a side table, making a vase shake back and forth. Suppressing a yelp, she snatched at the tipping pottery with chubby, clumsy fingers, only for her over stuffed stomach to knock it to the floor. Catwoman stood horrified, waiting to see if her guests or worse her step daughter had noticed but after a minute no one appeared.

"This is all your fault," Selina said, twisting around to stare at the twin couch cushions she permanently dragged behind her, then turned around at the not normal sphere of her gut, "and yours. Ugh, is this what being pregnant is going to be like?"

She had no idea how many meals had been stuffed down her throat in the past 48 hours. The snowed in weekend had become a pattern of being stuffed into agony, given a belly rub into unconsciousness and then waking up in some other room for the feast to see her smiling, silent step daughter proffering more food. Sometimes Selina had woken up in bed, once belly to belly with Power Girl, sometimes in one of the living rooms jammed tight into a love seat with Cass' blonde guests already digging into a pie big enough for a plus size stripper to pop out of and once inside a warm bath up to her chin in melted chocolate. Without her phone she'd have no idea what time or day it was, probably late sunday night, but knew if she ate another bite she'd pop. Her belly looked as if she'd swallowed a couple watermelons and never stopped groaning, heavy enough it tilted her torso forwards and had angry red stretch marks starting to form on the sides. Selina rubbed it, wishing her fingers hadn't lost all of their strength and wondering when and how she'd exchanged her ruined monokini for black lace nighty and silky bathrobe too small to cover her stomach.

"Am I going to even fit into anything on monday morning?" the thief wondered, touching her face and realizing that she'd picked up another chin since friday when this gorge session had begun.

Appalled at her butter fingers, Selina waddled over to the very narrow seeming attic stairs and took a cautious step onto them, wincing at the wood groaning. Her ultra plush hips pressed into the railing on one side, making her lean to the side. Selina's balance was awful due to her center of gravity changing so much and as she looked to the carpet three feet below her slippers the once fearless thief felt a lurch of vertigo. Not that she could actually see her feet with the food baby she was sporting.

"Come on Selina, you've run across high wires," she steeled herself, closing her eyes and making herself slowly walk up the attic stairs, "don't be such a fat, whimpering, lazy pussy...and stop getting turned on at being like that!"

Catwoman managed to get into the attic without falling and only getting mildly stuck. Buttery hips jammed fast into the narrow opening, leaving the pear stuck, her torso jammed into the chilly attic. Selina had to wiggle side to side, hip fat bunching and rolling as she gradually popped free into the frozen room, longing immediately for a hot tub, a belly rub and somehow, more food.

"I've got to fix this," Catwoman gasped, "other wise...that doesn't bear thinking...by this time next year I'll be too fat to even walk..."

A picture of herself, an immobile whale of a woman flowing out of a mobility scooter with an ecstatic Cassandra feeding her bonbons flashed in her mind, making her shiver even more than the dwindling storm outside. Selina pulled a phone out of her bathrobe pocket, not her real cellphone but a burner phone kept from her super villain days. Oracle was still monitoring everything with a Wayne computer chip. Swallowing, praying that Ivy hadn't gotten a new number, she dialed.

"Come on Ivy, come on," she whimpered, mouth going dry.

It took four rings but the phone was finally answered by Ivy's somewhat nasally voice, "Cat, what the hell took you so long to call back after the mission, did you infect Lane or not?"

"What took me so long...Ivy I'm fat as fuck is what took me so long!" Selina hissed, "I realized I was two hundred and fifty pounds on Friday and that was before this weekend! You've got to fix me before my ass gets its own zip code! The tabloids are calling me the richest fat woman in America, how did you not realize I'd gotten infected too!"

"Oh, well, I assume you wanted to reject unrealistic western beauty standards," Ivy said, pausing to chew, "Pardon, trying out the new synthetic steaks. You should come by my new steak house at some point, its delicious."

"Food is the last thing I need, Ivy I doubled in weight in a few months!" the burglar nearly yelled, "You've got to fix me!"

"Selina, losing weight is the last thing anyone needs! Think of all the green house gasses you're storing in your thighs," Ivy pointed out, "you're helping the world!"

"Ivy I spent in a daze eating myself to the size of a hippo," Catwoman pointed out, "you've got to fix me damn it. You can do that, right? I can waddle over there and get a cure and go back to being skinny?"

"Well...I mean I never bothered to come up with a cure," Ivy sniffed, "we're all better off obese you know. And think about it, you might not be able to do a cartwheel anymore but all of those dreadful female vigilantes are currently fatties too. Last I heard Black Canary couldn't even do a kick anymore, Huntress' can't get to her crossbow arrows past her stomach flab and that Spoiler hasn't been seen since her boobs popped out during a sting op."

"Not all of them, Batgirl...," Selina said, not giving up that said Batgirl was her step daughter.

That Gotham's villains had somehow not guessed her marrying Bruce pointed to Bruce being Batman was baffling to her, but her family's secret identities were their own.

"The dreadful ninja girl? Ugh, I hate her. She broke every bone in my arm the last time I tried to unleash a hyper allergenic flower at the park and poison everyone, I can't wait to see her too fat even to throw a punch the stupid quiet bitch!" Ivy giggled.

"You never call her that! She's one of the sweetest," Selina began indignantly, stung maternal pride rearing its head and still unable to see the hyper dangerous assassin as anything but a precious darling to be protected, "I mean...um, she's, uh, she's immune."

"Immune?" Ivy screeched, "Immune? No one should be immune! I made it to work on Kryptonians and demi-gods! Some kung fu girl shouldn't even be able to stand up after getting infected!"

"Well she's still got an 8 pack and she's turned into some sort of super feeder," Selina said, rubbing her stomach, "she just ignores food unless its to put it in some other woman's mouth."

"Well...shit," Ivy said, "I didn't count on someone being immune..."

"What do you mean shit?" Selina asked, "and you're Poison Ivy, you should find a way to infect her lickity split, right?"

"Well, I've been a bit distracted really," Ivy admitted bashfully, "Mostly the plants around me are a bit too focused on feeding me and whenever Harley's around I tend to get peckish and I'm becoming kind of a really big girl...but let me put it to you plainly Selina.I can cure you or try and make Batgirl fat, but I can't do both."

Selina bit her lip. Her own vanity demanded she get back to a size two, while her unleashed feedee libido demanded she never lose a pound. Jealousy demanded that she not be the only fatty in the family, envy proclaimed she needed to get back in shape. Motherly concern jumped with joy at a way to keep her cutie pie out of danger and properly plump, while familial pride didn't want her martial artist daughter slowed down...

"Well Pam, I want you to," she started to say,

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
For a moment Selina felt a pang of maternal fear.

Every night her sweet little baby swung out into the city to fight crime alongside the rest of her family, making Selina stress eat to ever greater heights. That her quiet adoptive daughter wound up getting the odd scrape and gunshot wound while filling the emergency room with supervillains and mercenaries, terrified her. She was just the world's most dangerous hand to hand fighter, she was going to get hurt! Better she stay home, fat, safe and warm next to her mom...

Who had an ass that was outgrowing the manor's fleet of sports cars. Who couldn't see her feet past her belly anymore. Whose fat, clumsy fingers couldn't even pick a lock. Whose lumbering step made the furniture bounce. Who was impossibly getting hungry again after a mere half hour not eating. Who was wet as a swamp at the thought of all of that because damn did a part of her want to be huge.

Catwoman twisted around, side rolls forming and stared at the basketball sized cheeks that had been her perfect ass, thoughts of anyone but herself falling away as she poked her pudding plush buns.

"You've got to fix me Pam," Selina whined, "I've turned into this over stuffed house cat who does nothing but sleep, eat and watch TV all day!"

"And what's wrong with that?" Ivy yawned on the other side of the phone, "isn't that an ideal existence?"

"No!" Catwoman huffed, shivering in the cold attic.

"Are you getting enough sex?" Pam asked tiredly, "I'd hope that billionaire idiot's gotten a taste for real women, do you know that he told me I was too fat to sell diet food just for gaining a few curves?"

Mention of sex made the house wife remember passionate early mornings and evenings with her billionaire vigilante husband...which made her hungrier. It had been half an hour after all.. Feederism had been introduced soon after she and Bruce's unknowing infection, contributing half a foot to Selina's 54 inch hips before the pregnancy cravings had kicked in. Selina blushed, crossed her chubby legs and patted her still stuffed stomach before answering.

"Two or three times a day, its not the problem," Selina denied, pacing across the attic floor with a groan of squeaky floor boards.

"Only two or three?" Ivy asked in surprise.

"I...what? I' don't even want to know, Ivy if I keep eating like this I'll be too fat to walk by the time I'm to term," Selina insisted, butt banging against the attic struts.

"You can still walk?" Ivy asked in amazement, 'I've almost forgotten how annoying that was."

Catwoman blinked in the gloomy attic, stomach churning. She'd meant it as an expression but if Ivy, the absolute skinniest villainess in Gotham was too big to walk after sampling her own superfood, superfood Selina had been chowing down on for a couple months....

"Pam, just how much do you weigh?" the burglar questioned, fear in her voice.

"Oh Selina, weight is just a number," the immobile bioterrorist turned food mogul waved off, "Now, if you're determined to ugh, lose weight, I can get a cure to you in ...about six months."

Catwoman's massive thighs gave out and her bean bag hips slammed down onto an ancient toy chest, which crumpled under her weight.

"Six months!" Selina screamed.

"No need to yell," the obscenely obese redhead said, making a little coo of joy as some server sat another heavy plate of synthetic meat onto her table, "oh, my rib platters are here!"

"Forget the ribs!" Catwoman hissed, hoping no one had heard her, "I'm gaining a pound a day here Ivy! I'm going to be four hundred pounds by then!"

"Well, just eat less then," Ivy suggest through a full mouth, "maybe exercise a little."

"Ivy you turned me into fatophillic perverted glutton," the pear grumbled, "I wake up stuffed silly from sleep eating and then eat the rest of the day! The only time I don't eat is when I'm taking my step daughter to appointments. I can't wait for six months!"

"Then spend more time with her," Ivy suggested, not knowing she was suggesting Ivy spend more time with the best feeder in town, "I'm a busy woman and six months is a rush order. I've got to be careful making a plague that will cure you without hurting you. Unwriting retroviruses is harder than making them, especially with you pregnant...ooohhh, baby back ribs! Now I've got to go, the Planet's best food critic is coming by tomorrow and I need to sample every dish to make sure its perfect!"

Catwoman stared at the dark attic for a moment, amazed at what she'd heard. She'd have to wait six months before being cured? She'd be...unimaginably fat by then...probably more than four hundred pounds given how she seemed to be getting fatter faster the fatter she got! The bigger she was the more Bruce was turned on, the more Bruce was turned on the more she was fed, the more she was fed the fatter she got, the fatter she got the more Cass pampered her, the more Cass pampered her the wider she got, the wider she got the lazier she got, the lazier she got the less she exercised, the less she exercised the more Bruce was turned on...

"Its three vicious cycles," the obese socialite groaned, putting her head in her hands.

Selina stiffled a sob. She was the Catwoman, a lithe, athletic, gymnast, dangerous as she was beautiful. A lethal fighter, a stealthy infiltrator, an impossible thief...who'd become a fat, lazy, clumsy, soft skinned housewife. It was humiliating, it was degrading, it was really arousing!

"It's okay," a soft voice said, hugging her tight in hard arms.

Selina almost yelped, finding her daughter had somehow snuck up on her and hugged her.

"Cass, how long have you been there!?" Selina asked in a panic.

"Just now," the quiet girl smiled, hugging her soft, butter mother tight, "you hungry?"

Selina's stomach rumbled in answer.

"No, no sweety," Selina lied, "mommy's tummy is upset...I ate too much, how about I go for a walk?"

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
It wasn't an easy night for Cassandra Cain but life was never easy for her.

Raised to be the ultimate assassin, Cassandra's extreme ability to read micro-movements in body language coupled with extreme martial arts training put her in the low levels of superhuman...at the cost of illiteracy and near muteness, essentially a form of autism. Her extreme morality prevented her from ever killing and had brought her into the bat-family as the second Batgirl, and fitting into that family was as hard for her as everything that wasn't fighting. Legally she was Bruce Wayne's adopted daughter but typically worked with the rest of his wards under the supervision of the original Batgirl, Barbara Gordon.

Perched on a gargoyle, the ultra lithe crimefighter nursed an uncharacteristic cold while watching models, moguls and journalists get out of limos and move towards a massive fashion show, showing fear and hope and exhaustion and lust like they were carrying neon signs. Down there, she saw the Wayne limo drop off Tim Drake, Red Robin, and Stephanie Brown, Spoiler, her own adopted brother and best friend who'd danced around the attraction their fit, muscular bodies signaled into the stratosphere. The two had been flirting and teasing toward it for two years and it had been clear to Cass the first moment she saw the two together: the jokes, the teasing, the lingering looks...the same things that both had occasionally given to her a few times but that she, the girl who'd could kick through a brick wall and read a punch before its puncher knew he was going to punch had blanked at acting on them, couldn't dredge the words that howled inside her head for any sort of release. How come they'd never been able to read any of her body language?

And how come neither of them had read how shitty she was feeling in the mission briefing?

Her brow burned, her button nose was stuffy, her eyes were red behind her night vision hood lenses, her mouth was dry behind the stitching of her mask and the lithe, corded, titanium hard muscles of her body ached, while her stomach rumbled with unusual hunger. It was rare for Cass to ever get sick, her healthy diet and social isolation besides vigilantism and speech therapy prevented most infections. She'd wanted to bring it up again and again but the words kept jumbling in her brain and the only thing that came out of her mouth was a quiet cough.

'Calendar-Girl is going to spray some sort of nerve gas into the crowd of models at the fashion show,' Barbara had briefed them from her wheel chair, a once hyper-fit vigilante who was getting a bit skinny in her chair, 'Tim and Steph, you'll go in in your civilian identities, the rich Wayne ward and his pretty girl friend.'

Stephanie was pretty: a tall, fit blonde with incredibly shapely legs and a firm butt you could bounce a coin off. She was Cass' best friend, showed her how to text and then texted and read them for her, the girl that Cass defined pretty as, with her long hair and make up and boobs and hips...although she was a little scrawny now that Cass looked at her closely. And she'd be with Tim who Cass really liked too...not as much as Steph but a lot...

'Cass, you wait outside on over watch for their entrance,' Bab's had said, and Cass' objection over how she felt like shit and how she wanted to get to wear a pretty dress and couldn't begin to reach her throat before she was already looking over the fashion show.

The miserable Bat-Girl noticed a slow in traffic, traced it back to a line of armored cars driving erratically. She wanted to alert Babs but knew she couldn't say it before they arrived. She zip-lined over, swooping over traffic and landing on another gargoyle to see a group of armed thugs getting out of the armored cars, along with a gorgeously fit and perfectly voluptuous woman in a skin tight body suit under a skimpy black dress and a white mask. Calendar Girl, former super model Paige Monroe who's career downturn in the bitter world of fashion as she'd aged had driven her vengefully insane. Superbly fit and carrying a harvesting scythe, she was surrounded by at least twenty armed goons eager to take in promised hostage money that would never arrive due to the lethal nerve gas they unknowingly carried.

A smoke bomb went off among them and a bout a minute later all of them were on the ground, unconscious and hand cuffed to their cars. Cass really did feel like shit after all, but at least the mission was over...she looked down at Calendar Girl, honestly way too skinny to be pretty and at the dress and heels which would fit her...damn it did fit her, was she really this skinny?

Cass looked herself over in the mirror of a van, seeing a slightly tall, steely fit half asian girl with short hair and a slightly red nose. Her legs were slightly bulky with muscle, her abs cut like diamonds and her arms bulged with steel. Not very elegant but not bad, she was happy to be so fit.

Ivy's virus was running rampant in Cass' body but the plague had only partly penetrated Cass' amazing immune system, white blood cells as tough as the rest of her. She sneezed, the spray landing on Calendar Girl and immediately infecting her, and slid silently into the fashion show, leaving a trail of high infectious viral clouds from sneezes and contaminated door knobs. Diets broke like glass and hungry models began visiting the craft service between walks.

Fat fetishes bloomed behind her like flowers after a spring rain, skinny models suddenly hot houses of weight gain in the path of the near mute Batgirl. She slipped into the crowd and was suddenly sitting between Tim and Stephanie, interrupting an almost first kiss.

'Uhh...Cass, aren't you supposed to be outside?,' Stephanie asked, pulling back to see her friend sitting next to her instead of her almost boyfriend.

'Yes,' Cassandra said after a moment, wrinkling her nose to stop a sneeze.

'Cass, what about Calendar Girl?' Tim asked, slightly alarmed and noticing as always just how dangerously sexy Cass looked in that dress and too afraid to make a move.

'Taken care of,' Batgirl promised very carefully and slowly, putting her arms around both their shoulders, 'just watch.'

Tim and Steph looked at each other, confused at the sudden appearance of their friend. Then Cass sneezed and the faint spray touched both their noses, the quick acting virus immediately penetrating their minds. Stephanie soon felt herself get hungry and immediately stopped a waiter coming by with a tray of shrimp cocktail. Like most young women in the super hero business who lacked a super metabolism she was on a careful diet to keep squeezing into her skin tight purple jump suit. Being In the same career path as women like Wonder Woman or Power Girl wracked up body issues, ones Stephanie was forgetting as she began shot gunning shrimp.

Why should she worry about staying super skinny? Cass did most of the fighting, all she needed was to be able to keep up, hack stuff and sabotage. That six pack she was working for didn't really help her help people at all, why not relax and enjoy herself...have another thing of shrimp, signal for a thing of champagne, try some of that cake and a slice of that pie...

Stephanie ate like a pig at a trough, an amazing amount of food disappearing into the lithe blonde's usually flat belly. Cass smiled at her, happy to see her cut loose, while Tim began to feel strangely turned on and uncomfortable. Steph really shouldn't be eating like that he thought, seeing her shovel down her three thousandth calorie in the form of a caramel cupcake, but damn if she didn't look good doing it and that little food baby suited her...

Meanwhile, models were stalking by on the catwalk, looking hungrily at the amount of food Steph was shoveling in. Mari McCabe, also known as the super heroine, Vixen, was practically drooling down in her bikini, while the Brazilian heroine Fire almost walked into norwegian model Heroine Ice who'd stopped to stare at a cheese cake.

Cassandra sat back in her cheer, feeling far, far better...

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Thanks to Catwoman, fat fetishes were happily ripping through Gotham. Only one female member of the upper classes wasn’t growing and she was the happiest of all, Ivy’s virus having turned her life around.

At 2 am, Cassandra Cain dashed across roof tops at full tilt. Up buildings, across them and leaping over streets, she reached her destination in the warehouse district faster than a car would have, breathing easy when she found the designated meeting point. Tim reached it not long after, not able to keep up with Batgirl’s amazing parkour speed.

‘Woof, Cass. You should maybe take it a little easier,’ he joked at his adopted sister, ‘you’re gonna wear yourself out.’

‘No,’ Cass told him, looking at the trucks until Stephanie arrived.

‘Oh my god, *puff* oh my god, *huff* oh jesus,’ Spoiler huffed, flopping onto the top of the building like a limp fish, ‘I’m gonna die. I’m gonna die. How do you do that. No way you’re human...oh jesus.’

Cass pulled a bottle of soda out off her belt, handing it to the blonde with a smile behind her mask. Stephanie grabbed it and sucked it down, emptying twenty ounces of soda in moments and then giving a soft belch, her breathing heavy but steady.

‘Thanks Bg, that really hit the spot. You always seem to know just when I need an energy boost,’ she gasped, the seams of her dark purple and black outfit groaning with each breath, ‘don’t know what I’d do without you.’

‘My pleasure,’ Cass smiled and handed her a candy bar.

Stephanie had been Hollywood’s idea of the girl next door: long golden hair, soft peachy skin, big hazel eyes, long straight nose, bow lips and a banging body. Long legs and round hips, with a tapered waist and high C cups. Bat mandated exercises and sparring sessions with Cassandra had made her hard and fit, a dangerous vigilante in her own right if focused more on sabotage than fighting. Four weeks of increased hunger, a subconscious desire to see big as beautiful and pampering from Cass at every moment had plumped up those trim legs, wrapped a muffin top around her girl abs, added a year early freshman fifteen to her ass and popped her Cs up two cup sizes while adding a growing softness to her jaw.

Cass had had to help her friend into her costume, Batgirl’s immense strength needed to shove the zipper over her soft curves. The near mute girl had read every one of Steph’s emotions in a feast of her own: elation at the tightness round her thighs, embarrassment at how squishy her stomach was compared to Cass, happiness at her bigger boobs and worry that Cass was too skinny. To the altered Batgirl, the softer Steph was the very definition of girlish beauty: soft and chubby and destined for rapid growth.

‘No problem,’ Cassandra said slowly, ‘you earned it.’

Five words weren’t much for most people but Cass’ heart thrilled at the length of the sentence. She had a friend, a friend who she was softening and growing at Cassandra’s will.

‘Check the perimeter,’ Cassandra ordered Tim, who departed at a last glance at Steph’s rising and falling belly.

Batgirl looked down, marking out the Mafia goons by their hostile body language against the nervous forklift operators and truck drivers. She counted twenty five of them loading up five trucks, meaning there’d be five each on an even distribution. Illiterate she might be, but Cass was an ace at math.

‘Cut four,’ Cassandra told Stephanie when her friend rolled to her feet, adjusting her utility belt where it pinched into her new paunch, ‘leave one.’

‘Sure, just give me a minute. I swear, these warehouse districts are getting farther apart every day,’ Stephanie huffed, zipping away and still breathing hard.

Cass watched her standing up, eyeing how her buns pressed into Steph’s pants. Out of shape as she was it didn’t take Spoiler long to cut the truck’s ignition wires, although getting under the trucks was starting to be a tight squeeze for her friend. The moment Stephanie was safely aside and Tim was in position, Cass began her assault, swooping down and landing heel first on a mobster’s jaw. A dance of dodged bullets and broken hands followed, the near superhuman Batgirl leaping out of sight lines and breaking knees before her opponents even knew she was there. Eighteen of the mobsters went down in a minute, the slow speed due to Cass having to jump to Stephanie’s rescue.

The chubby blonde had sprang from cover to launch a high kick, that landed with a loud rip as her butt seams tore from belt to knee. Mortified she froze just as a man swung a crow bar at the back of her head, Cass’ batarang knocking the weapon away before Steph even knew it. Cassandra darted in and broke a few hands and jaws while Stephanie bashfully pulled her cape over her now exposed ass.

As planned the remaining goons drove off, hurtling towards their hide out and not noticing as Red Robin jumped onto the top of their truck. Cass watched, completely satisfied at her success, then threw another batarang to knock out a goon disguised as a factory loader.

‘Stay hidden next time,’ Cass told her, wagging a finger, ‘no fighting.’
‘I can still fight, Cass, not like you can but I’m not useless,’ Stephanie objected, ‘I get that I’ve put on a few pounds but weight’s just a number.’

For a moment Cassandra froze, the perfectly graceful woman at a loss of what to do. Then, with more courage than she’d ever felt before, she stretched out one gloved hand and ran her fingers up Steph’s puffy belly, over her fuller chest and cradled her soft chin. With the other she wrapped Steph’s waist, squeezing one fluffy bun. She leaned in close, her mask touching Steph’s, breath’s mingling.

‘You are not for fighting, you’re for spoiling. Do you understand?’ Cass whispered, mouth dry as she completed her longest ever sentence.

‘...yes,’ the motor mouth Stephanie gasped, lust, longing, embarrassment and desire boiling off of her and Cass stepped closer, her chiseled waist pressing against Stephanie’s soft belly, only for Tim’s radio broadcast to interrupt them.

‘Found their hideout and handled them. Some weird stuff, come check it out,’ Red Robin said

The two girls parted, slightly flustered and began zip lining towards their target. Cass landed silently while Stephanie landed with a thump and another rip, her disintegrating outfit totally exposing her backside from soft calf to full hip. Her cape was wrapped awkwardly around herself to maintain her dignity, but each step brought a small sigh of seams.

‘You guys all right? It took you long enough to get here,’ Tim asked, domino masked eyes going to Stephanie, Cass reading the lust coming off him at her embarassment, ‘Why are you standing like that, Spoiler?’

‘Had a minor wardrobe malfunction, I took a little damage during the fight,’ Stephanie blushed, embarrassed and horny,’ what’d you find?’

‘Drugs, guns, bombs, standard stuff,’ Tim said, leading them passed knocked out and hand cuffed goons into the building, finding gun racks and drug piles, ‘but the truck they were driving in was full of this stuff.’

The fit young man opened the doors, revealed stacked boxes of Anonymous brand donuts: glazed, cream filled, jelly filled, long and rounds, chocolate, vanilla, sprinkled and cream topped. Steph’s eyes almost bulged out of her head and she hoped up onto the truck with a slight grunt, Cass and Tim almost fainting as they saw her plump legs and wobbly but as her cape fell away.

‘Huh, hadn’t heard Anonymous donuts were coming out. Not even marked diet huh.These would just rot in an evidence locker so I’m going to have a few. Holy crap these are good,’ Steph said, immediately stuffing a cream filled long jon under her mask, ‘try one Batgirl!’

Cass caught the box, the treats gleaming inside. She shrugged, Ivy’s virus had only given her a fat fetish, not a desire to get fat herself thanks to her honed immune system, and tossed the box to Tim.

‘Ingredients?’ she asked, wishing she could read.

‘Uh, flour, sugar, yeast, eggs…,’ Tim read.

‘Cage free?’ Cass asked immediately.

Cassandra’s ability to read body language came with a deep empathy, loath to cause any pain save to help others. A vegetarian, she got the vast amount of protein her muscular body needed from beans and eggs, bought from humane farms by the Wayne Butler, Alfred. She’d spent most of her childhood locked in small rooms, being raised as a human weapon without seeing the sun and couldn’t imagine supporting even chickens in that environment.

‘Doens’t say, I guess not?’ he asked.

‘Eww,’ Batgirl said, eyes tracking back to Stephanie.

Spoiler was finishing up her first half dozen doughnuts, whipped cream and custard on the front of her uniform and her cheeks bulging against her mask. Her stomach had gone from cute girl in math class squishy to the knocked up homecoming queen, revealing a crescent of pale skin as her pants separated from her shirt. Tim dropped the box while Cass’ jaw hung open, drool collecting in her mask as she took in the complete happiness coming off her over fed friend.

‘C-co-collect!’ Cass ordered Tim, pointing at a trio of empty duffle bags, ‘e-evi-evidence!’

…

At nine thirty in the morning, Cassandra found herself waking up comfy and warm in Stephanie’s bed.

Her rock hard arm cradled Steph's engorged belly, hot to the touch and beachball taut. Steph smiled beatifically and Cassandra's heart thundered as she remembered what happened and blushed. A celebratory session of hand feeding Stephanie donut after donut had led to something she'd never imagined herself doing...

Snuggling.

Letting her friend sleep until her classes, Cass slowly got to her feet so she could..

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Cassandra's life was changing rapidly for the better.

From an abused human weapon to a homeless vagrant to a vigilante, she'd never imagined having any sort of normal life. A boyfriend or girl friend, non-abusive family, even a roof over her head had been beyond her dreams. The best she could hope for was using her assassin's skills to help the helpless, even after getting adopted by Batman and mentored by Oracle. She could read people like she couldn't read a book but could never speak beyond a forced word or two.

Now though, since she'd started appreciating curves, the almost mute girl was happy as a clam. She had friends, almost a girlfriend and something she'd never expected to have: a Mom.

She left a beautifully drawn heart around two Cs, nearest she could get to a signature, on Steph's table and tip toed out. Clad in leggings and a hoodie, never one for fashion, Cass walked out of Steph's apartment silent as a mouse, not wanting to wake the heavenly soft spoiler early. As soon as the door closed she felt a hum in her pocket, pulling out her phone and seeing Selina Kyle's chiseled face on it and the word 'Mom' under it. Cass smiled at one of the few word she could read and flicked it open.

'Hi,' she said.

'Cass, I've been trying to get a hold of you all morning,' Selina said, voice slightly worried, 'where are you? Do I need to have Oracle put out an APB? Do you know where you are?'

'I'm fine,' Batgirl reported without sarcasm, 'at Steph's.'

'Oh thank God, you've got your speech therapy appointment in an hour. Are you alright to go? Do you need to recover from last night?' her step mother questioned.

'I'm good. Just mafia,' Cass told her.

'Good, I'll pick you up by ten, are you in a safe neighborhood?' the reformed criminal asked, as if the college campus was a warzone and Cass a lost puppy instead of the most dangerous person in town.

'Be fine,' Cass smiled.

Anyone else would have been smothered, but for Batgirl it was just nice to have someone care about her. She'd only met her birth mother, the super assassin Lady Shiva, four times and each time the mass murderer had almost killed her. In contrast Catwoman took her clothes shopping, spent time with her, worried about her safety and tried talking to her about boys...as much as Cassandra could talk at least.

After a wait she spent people watching, taking in every emotion the groggy college students around her could give, the ex-jewel thief pulled up next to Cass in one of the Wayne's stable of Rolls Royce's rolling down the window and ushering her adopted daughter in, brow rising at the two duffle bags Cassandra carried. Selina's green eyes looked the vicious fighter up and down worriedly, trying to find any sort of injury and sighing with relief that she was alright.

'I don't know why Bruce lets you go out like that, you'll get hurt one of these days and then I'll have to ...do something,' Selina sighed to the girl who nightly filled hospital wards with mercenaries.

Back when she'd been running herself ragged stealing jewels and art, the second Batgirl had been the very last person Selina had wanted to run into. A meeting with Bruce was tinged with the possibility of being caught by Bruce, while any of the past or present Robins had been easy to fluster, same with the old red haired Batgirl. But the silent one was a relentless pursuer out of a horror movie, who ignored every distraction, plowed through walls and beat Selina, no poor fighter herself, like a redhaired step child. When she'd reformed for good and joined Batman's team, she'd still been unnerved...until she'd met the girl under the mask after the wedding.

Cassandra was quiet as a mouse and gentle as a lamb. She didn't speak up for herself and when Selina had found out what little had been pieced together about her past, her heart wept. Human weapon or not, someone needed to look after this girl as more than just a crime fighter. Bruce might be content to use her as another weapon in his war on crime, but not Selina.

That filled up more and more of Selina's days after her inadvertent infection from Ivy's virus made her drop the four hours of running and pilates she did each day to stay cat burglar fit. Running up roof tops was a young woman's game, not a proper high society matron like Selina was now. Staying unhealthily thin wasn't nearly as important as making sure her sudden brood of adopted children were taken care of, especially Cassandra.

'Have you eaten breakfast? There's a new donut place we can try,' Selina asked, eying her gaunt daughter, who had arms carved out of wood and a six pack so defined it showed through her hoody.

'Already ate. Try this,' Cass smiled back, handing over a fresh half dozen donuts, 'you're thin.'

'I have been running around, Damien's parent teaching conferences took forever. That academy is like a palatial maze,' Selina confessed, munching down a glazed donut with joy, 'oh my these are incredible. Do you want one?'

'I'm good. Already ate,' Cass, who'd eaten cage free eggs and drank skim milk confessed, busy looking Selina up and down.

Cass took in her gorgeous step mother, not all the slinky jewel thief she'd been.Clad in the latest fashions it might be, but Selina's models body had been hit with middle aged spread, replacing steely muscle with padded fat. While her upper frame was just a little soft, with fuller breasts, a hint of a double chin and a slightly puffy belly, the real change was on Catwoman's glamorous legs. Her short dress showed off thick, toneless thighs spread across her seat and she sat higher on a soft pillowy rump who's width had put her into a pear category. Graceful ankles were swollen and thick, cementing her as totally bottom heavy if the slight waddle the agile woman now possessed hadn't already.

It would take a miracle to get Selina into her rapidly outgrown costume again, the plump socialite six sizes too big to get them over her thighs, much less running over roof tops. She was outgrowing even the thick Lois Lane, for Lois still had only a middle class budget, Clark's lust and her own gluttony to fatten up on. The candle of catwoman's figure was burning at every end: the infected Bruce was just as approving of her gain but had billions fueling it, while a staff waited on Selina hand and foot. And of course, she had a live in feeder who could read her mood at a glance.

Chocolate for boredom, muffins for stress, soy bacon on waking and pie when she needed to rest. Coffee heavy with cream and sugar before noon, chamomile tea with spoonfuls of honey afterwards. All delivered silently, before Selina even knew she needed it. It was honestly rare for the rapidly expanding burglar to even feel hungry, Cassandra reading the slight ripples contracting stomach muscles made as food moved on and making sure more was in Selina's hands before any pangs hit.
Selina wasn't aware of this feeding and would have been ballooning even without Ivy's infection, although now she was just happy she was getting a proper upper class physique: pampered and decadent.

Cass was exultant that her new mom wasn't all hard edges and bones anymore. Selina's emotions weren't, Cass judged, that of a criminal, but a kind, warm woman, the type of mom found in cartoons and it was good Selina was growing into that persona: soft, warm and cuddly. Could she maybe...Selina liked to take cat naps in the drawing room by the fire now that fall had come, maybe one afternoon Cass could...cuddle next to her? Feel warm and loved and safe? What if...what if she asked Selina to read to her first?

'Cassandra, your eyes are watering, are you okay?' Selina asked, pulling a tissue out of her purse in a very mom like gesture.

'Fine, just happy,' Cassandra smiled to her.

The next hour was spent in a therapist office, Selina's porky buns poured into the chairs next to her. The now 180lb society matron's double chin wobbled as she ate down another box of the donuts Cassandra had given her, ignoring the warning signs of thighs chafing just from the short walk in. When she was finished, she got up with an ignored fat girl grunt and swayed over to the trash can, noticing as she did a months old magazine showing her wedding to Bruce. He looked so handsome...and she looked so gaunt! Had her collar bone really been so pronounced? And her cheeks...so gaunt! Ugh, her waist, like you could put your hands around it. And her arms were tooth picks!

'Thank God that's changed,' she told herself, waddling back to her seat, another pair of eyes watching her basketball ass cheeks swing.

The slender receptionist had been lucky to not been infected by either Cassandra or Selina and was amazed in the other direction. The impossibly graceful trophy wife who brought in the quiet Asian girl had morphed into a thick thighed, huge assed mom in barely a month. Her cute pixie cut that had shown off modelesque cheekbones no longer flattered her puffy cheeks, slowly turning into a 'I need to speak to your manager' hair cut. At first there was no way she could be that 19 year olds mom, but now she looked to have gained fifty pounds and twenty years in weeks!

'Crazy world anymore, I'll never let that happen to me,' the young nurse sighed, taking a bite of an Anonymous diet cookie, the last of the old, actually slimming kind in Gotham City, with a fresh package of the hyper fattening kind ready to go, 'to get that big, ewww.'

As Cass got out, smiling from having made further strides with her speech, Selina's phone hummed...

1553311111111211122121121111111111112122.content:
Barbara Gordon let out the exasperated sigh of a late twenty something who's stayed up too many hours with both too much and too little coffee.

The information broker rubbed her eyes, the sclera around her big green irises shot with red veins, and considered wheeling herself to bed. She'd gotten up at 6 am the day before and gone through twenty seven hours of database scraping, firewall hacking and police report scanning and even managed an hour of rolling her wheel chair around the block. But crime never rested and neither did the Oracle.

Babs checked her progress bar on a download. Someone was buying up a lot of unused land for some reason, along with tech used for hydroponics and green house farming. To the paralyzed red head it smelled a lot like an enormous drug production ring, the question would be for what. And that was the best case scenario, the worst might be Ivy breaking her parole again.

'I know that crazy dryad going onto the straight and narrow was too good to be true,' the exhausted ex-Batgirl sighed and tossed the blanket off of her legs.

Before the horrible, almost accidental gunshot that had damaged her spine, the 5'11 Babs had possessed a spectacular pair of stems. Years of childhood ballet and gymnastic competitions and lots of martial arts had given her a magnificent set of leg muscles, from her shapely calves to her chiseled quads leading up to her deliciously curvy backside. Much of that was gone now, three years in the chair leaving her legs spindly and atrophied. She was lucky she still had feeling in them, although her control amounted to maybe a toe wiggle.

But that was before Barbara had been in the same room as an infectious Cassandra Cain. Immediately after developing her cold, her appetite had skyrocketed and Barbara had suddenly began to care more about her appearance, finding herself way too skinny and seeing nothing wrong with women who were on the heavy side. The cupholder of her wheel chair had a half empty 32 ounce soder cola in it, while her work station had an empty bag of chocolate chips besides it. Barbara's thick ankles and chubby thighs tested her leggings, she sat higher on an inflating fat ass that wouldn't have fit into any of her old batgirl costumes and a flabby belly was puffing over her waistband. Bab's boobs had bounded up past her bras capacity and her painfully thin face had softened up.

'What is wrong with this wheel chair, its like its getting harder and harder to push,' Oracle muttered to herself, turning around and letting out a startled yelp to see her successor standing in front of her holding a duffle bag the size of a grown man, 'Jesus Christ Cass!'

'Hi,' the second Batgirl smiled, handing her mentor a full box of new Anonymous doughnuts.

'Sorry, you almost gave me a heart attack. We really need to work on your social etiquette skills,' Batgirl sighed, shaking her head, Cass beaming at the little jiggle that went across her cheeks, 'uh, what are these?'

'From the drug bust,' Cassandra beamed, forming the next words with care, 'I confiscated.'

'You can't just steal stuff from a crime scene, Cass,' Barbara shook her head and took a bite, 'oh wow, these are really good.'

Before she knew it the contraband was gone, having vanished into Barbara's stomach and begun making its way towards her expanding fat layer. A second soon replaced it and Babs slowed a little, looking over her grinning protege.

'Okay, good job then I guess. Although I wonder why they bothered to steal them, they're just donuts,' Babs went on, wheeling her way back towards the computer only for Cass to grab the push handles of her chair and wheel her towards the bed.

Barbara lived in a secondary Bat-base called the clock tower, a shimmering hub of the information super highway packed with servers and super computers. Taped into Wayne Enterprises telecommunication network, it gave Barbara access to anything she needed, except for maybe human comforts.A tiny bathroom and a small cot were all Babs had to herself, pouring the rest of her life into preventing another tragedy. Cassandra wheeled her away from the computing file and soon had the exhausted woman tucked into bed.

'Rest and eat,' Cass insisted, shoving the last doughnut in the box into Barbara's mouth, the others having been eating already by the ravenous redhead.

'Ugh, I guess your right,' Babs sighed, swallowing the last mouthful and letting her stomach rumble, 'I do need a nap.'

The quiet vigilante looked down at her soon dozing boss, blanket tucked tight around her stuffed belly. It gave her the biggest thrill to make sure her mentor was taken care of. Barbara spent so much time worrying she didn't take care of herself, having gotten frighteningly thin. It was so much better to see her chubby and soft, cuddly and warm. And it would be so much better when she was even bigger, with breasts bigger than her head and a belly out to her knees and legs so thick and swollen they wouldn't be able to support her weight even if she wasn't paralyzed.

Silent as a bat, the vigilante began turning Barbara's apartment into an immense fat trap. Cookies in every nook and cranny. Doughnuts on every shelf. A fridge full of cakes and brownies. Cass even heated up a pie, guessing at how long it was supposed to stay in the oven and at what temp, then set it out to cool by Barbara's bedside.

To Batgirl it all smelled awful of course. She liked vegetables and baked beans and whole wheat toast and poached, cage free eggs. But ever since that night she'd felt so bad, she'd come to many realizations. Liking fat girls was the smaller of them, the other was that while speech was still hard, she could still care and control for those around her. She could make the girls she cared about soft and squishy and safe...

'You'll be happier fatter,' she told Barbara, leaning down and kissing her on the forehead before leaving.

'Cassie, don't let her use her telekinesis on you!' K'oriander called from where she hovered on Titan's Island, 'Raven, keep your guard up even though you've got her wrapped!'

The alien stunner had three jobs: as a crime fighter, as a super model and as the super visor and leader of the Teen Titans. Watching over half a dozen super powered teens could put anyone into the nut house, with the normal teen tantrums and angst issues super powered as well, but the tall, tan redhead was an image of warm authority. She hovered over the sparring gym where Wonder Girl and Raven sparred against each other, eying form and stance with a warrior's eye.

Cassie Sandsmark was forwards and confident, putting too much trust in her Amazonian durability and strength instead of quick thinking. There's no jock like an ex-nerd eager to forget the days of being a shy book worm and after getting powers near equal to Wonder Woman, Cassie had become as aggressive and brash as she was buff and leggy. In comparison, Raven was a short, skinny grouch of a goth with enough half demonic powers to rip up a mountain range and the arrogance to match. The two did not get along in anyway shape or form, demonstrating it as Cassie gave out very unpulled punches and Raven's telekinetic bursts started going beyond what even the Amazon could endure.

'That's enough!' Starfire yelled as she saw Cassie bury her arm up to the elbow in the concrete wall, right next to Raven's very non-super durable head.

The teens ignored her, Raven lashing out with lethal power Cassie barely dodged. K'ori grimaced, her green eyes narrowing and shot down from the sky with a trail of green light behind her. The team leader snatched both goth and jock by the collar, lifting them high in the air.

'I said enough!' K'ori yelled, 'you've both gone beyond the rules of training! Someone could have been the hurt!'

She dropped both girls to the sand, daring either of them to object. Raven brushed sand off her cape while Cassie muttered, buff arms tensing and fists clenching.

'Raven, I want egg juggling from you without a single cracked shell. Cassie, I want that wall patched and then an hour on the punching bag without a single burst bag,' K'ori lectured, 'You both need to learn control or you could go to far.'

Raven growled but complied, while Cassie gave a sarcastic snarl of 'Funny for you to say.'

You could have heard a pin drop as Starfire glared at her, eyes burning green.

'...what were you of the saying?' she managed, glaring at the blonde amazon.

'That its funny for you to talk about control when you've, well...,' Cassie shrugged.

'When I have the what?' Star asked again.

'Gained weight,' Wonder Girl smirked.

Starfire was a byword for beauty in a profession of gorgeous women. With her ankle length red hair, which was often on fire, gloriously happy and innocent face, high bouncy DDs and hard four pack she was gorgeous. But with her spectacular hips, big steely buns and flawlessly sculpted, literally perfect legs she was one of the most sought after models on the planet as well as a super hero.

Yet after her most recent shoot a few weeks ago for Starrware's new foodline, Starfire was feeling herself...change. Karen had warned her that she was looking a little soft and her words had proven prophetic as the alien red head had started to chub up that very day. Her graceful ankles had gotten thicker, her muscular runners thighs had rounded out, her flawless bubble butt had sprouted a spackle of cellulite and started to deflate and the start of a FUPA had covered up her lower abdominal muscles. The single cookie Karen had given her was enough to kill her super human metabolism permanently dead, leaving the Tamaranian tired, cranky and hungry all the time.

As well as embarrassed. K'ori's species had no taboos about nudity but part of that came from a complete love of their flawless figures. K'ori found herself blushing at the initial brushes of her thighs, of her ankles stretching out her boots, of her butt starting to ooze out of her panties. She'd stopped wearing her V-string outfit out of bashfulness back to her more forgiving mini-skirt and long boots combo, going from exposed belly to one piece as her abs had faded. Not long ago everything would have looked good on her, but now Starfire had a major case of the mom jeans going on. She was shocked and ashamed at the changes, which were doing nothing but increase especially as Star was finding it impossible to stick to any sort of diet. For the first time doubt about her body had entered her mind, refusing to go away.

Was she getting fatter? Uglier? Could she still have her career? Be a heroine? Would Dick still love her?

But when the younger heroine had brought up Star's no longer perfectly svelte figure, K'ori drew herself up to her full, intimidating height.

'Yes, a little of the weight has gotten on me,' K'ori lectured, 'it happens, you'll find that out. But that doesn't take away any point of mine. Now, punching bags unless you want to go a few rounds?'

Cassie, a buff, head strong young woman with muscles seemingly carved out of oak, smiled, 'Yeah, I think I do.'

The moment that her sneakers touched down on the sand of the practice ring, her considerable thigh muscles tensed against her blue jeans, eying the still hovering Starfire who's pants were equally tight if for very different reasons.

Once, Wonder Girl had been the ultimate rule following butt kisser but now in her senior year, she'd grown confident enough in her demi-god abilities to buck at the seemingly petty restrictions placed on her at home, at school and as a Titan. Her mom might bitch about her bisexual tendencies and greek paganism clashing with her own catholic beliefs and school might insist she have to attend every class and do the work to be on the varsity girls wrestling team, but Cassie couldn't exactly punch them and still feel like a good person. Starfire on the other hand? With her demands about team work and restraint? Oh she could punch Starfire and still feel good.

'Ugh, no more of the thigh gap for me,' K'ori sighed, looking at the puffy rub of her soft thighs, 'and my calf muscles have gone!'

Superheroine Monthly's best legs in a row for four years running had gone to seed, losing their graceful muscles and tone, even picking up a little cellulite in the back. And her vaunted ass had ...

For one, although the vivacious Koriander had accepted his date suggestion she'd rejected going dancing. Then the girl who loved showing off her stems had suggested a movie night. Star knew the fashion world had changed a bit, being a little curvier when you were already a name was somewhat allowed but if she kept pigging out like this then...well there was always plus size she guessed.

The slinky, sexy catburglar who could climb a sky scraper like others walked a side walk was gone. Doffing her cowl and changing into civilian clothes, Cass headed upstairs for a shower and pre-afternoon nap meal, already salivating at the thought of poached eggs and spinach when she heard giggling and laughing coming from the dining room. She tip toed over, silent as the grave, and peered inside.

A smile immediately formed when she saw Selina's sweet, pampered body jiggling with a laugh. Every the ex-thief so much as smiled Cass did too. But when she looked past Dick, her favorite of the ex-robins by far, and to the girl next to him...

Endless thick thighs. A well fed food baby pushing past her pants. Insanely round hips. The face of a pampered angel.

Cass blinked for a moment and then found the ground rushing up at her.

Stephanie was a good martial artists but depended more on gadgets and sabotage than the rest of the family. Grayson, overseeing Tim going through the obstacle course, let out a sigh and started thinking of what punishment to dole out to his youngest brother and hoping that Steph wasn't crying. When he turned around though, after less than a second, Steph had her hands over her mouth while Cass was dangling the little turd over a bottomless chasm by his ankle.

'Apologize,' Cass ordered him, eyes on fire.

'What the hell's gotten into you?' Damien demanded, not sure how he'd gone from standing on the matts to hanging in the air, 'I was only speaking the truth!'

'Great leadership skills Grayson,' Damian muttered.

'Nice job insulting the best friend of the most dangerous girl in Gotham, Damian,' Dick told him, eyes narrowing as he read the police report, 'Oh shit.'

Cassandra laid her head on her shoulder, smiling and reading the peace and happiness off the blonde's body language.

The two walked towards the computer, hand in hand.
