The odd one out was Starfire hovering above the ground in thigh high purple boots and a matching bikini, made for a woman thirty pounds thinner. He had trouble not looking at her thigh fat bulging out over the tops of her boots despite having had sex nearly ten times in the last day with her.

Thankfully Cass and Stephanie were masked so he didn't have to see any looks between them. Seeing his adopted sister and his adopted brother's girlfriend frenching was not his idea of fun. Granted he was happy for Cass but was not looking forwards to dealing with the teen drama from it.

'Okay, now that everyone is here,' Dick said, wishing that Bruce was here to deal with this shit then realizing it was best he handle it given Bruce's uh Bruceness, 'we've got an alien incursion in downtown.'

'Blast, I knew that this would happen again,' Damian snarled, 'who is it? The White Martians? Darkseid? Have the Kryptonians turned on us at last?'

'Uh, no,' Dick sighed, 'thankfully, but its um...I'll let the video speak for itself!'

The Computer Screen flickered over to a news feed of the plaza in front of Wayne Tower, an upper end commercial district usually well policed. Right now it was littered with hopefully just unconscious police officers and burned cop cars.

'Weak mortal men of uh... Earth! I, Maxima Queen of Planet Almerac have come seeking a suitable mate!' a tall, incredibly muscular redhaired woman in extremely revealing green armor yelled, holding up a sword in one hand and a cop car in the other.

She looked like a cross between Starfire and Wonder Woman at their fittest, an impossible collection of curves and muscle although with a slightly bloated stomach.She also swayed slightly, as if she was just moderately drunk.

'Bring your best to me! Only the one who defeats me will be a suitable mate!' the human seeming alien yelled throwing the cop car away and taking a chug off of a bottle, 'And do it soon I tell you!'

'Easy then, earth men are...uh, very nice,' a yawning Kori saved realizing that Damien was in the room, munching on a post-nap muffin, 'we find her a boyfriend and everyone is the winner!'

'Unfortunately its not that easy,' Dick explained, 'I'll let the video speak for itself.'

'If no one defeats me by the stroke of midnight, then I shall wipe this miserable city off the face of the earth!' Maxima finished.

That brought a wince from the entire assembled Bat Clan.

'So as for beating her...,' Dick began only to be cut off.

'She's a Kryptonian level threat,' Barbara Gordon interrupted, rolling into the room, 'first rank psionics letting her resist bullets and throw battleships. We're going to need a plan to be able to beat her. Good to see everyone again, sorry its under these circumstances.'

Oracle wheeled herself up to the computer, the plush and pudgy computer PHD's belly jiggling as she went over every bump in the tiles. Her slightly plumper finger tips dashed across the Bat-Computer's keys, bringing up detailed information on the alien queen. She gave nods to the rest of the family, even Selina, while pointedly ignoring Starfire. K'ori glared and Dick immediately felt himself start sweating from the nerves one got when your ex-fiancee and current fiancee are in the same room. Especially when one was a genius computer hacker information broker and the other was an alien princess super model.

And the weight Babs had put on really suited her.

'She typically bothers Superman whenever shes' ...amorous,' Barbara informed them, 'unfortunately he's not available. I'm sending out notices to any meta human or alien with a high enough power ranking to fight her but I don't know if any are available.'

'As if we needed some alien or meta human's help. This is Gotham,' Damian grumbled.

'Wouldn't Starfire be able to beat her?' Tim asked, his lack of social skills missing the obvious tension in the room.

'...Oh, is Starfire here?' Barbara asked, turning around and pretending to see the towering, gorgeous woman falling out of her swimsuit, 'Oh, didn't notice you.'

K'ori glared, eyes starting to smoulder in anger and annoyed the wheel chair bound PHD was looking so healthy, 'Glad to see you out and about Barbara. But don't worry I'll be able to handle her.'

'Doubt it,' Babs said, annoyed that the supermodel alien looked so good, 'I've got body cam, surveillance and traffic data to begin evacuating downtown at the very least. I'm going to need everyone doing sweeps for anyone trapped. I've got some feelers out, there's some reserve members who might be able to take her down.'

'Glad for the information Babs,' Dick decided to run with, sweating more when he saw Starfire's face, 'but right now I think we can at least hold her back. We'll be splitting into two teams. Cass, Tim, Damian and Stephanie will run evacuation. Star and I will try and stall her. I'll do my best to talk but if we have to, Star can fight her until we get some heavy back up.'

'I'm on the fight,' Cass objected.

'Cass, she's not someone you can beat with just human punches,' Nightwing tried telling her.

'I won't use punches,' the quiet girl objected.

Dick knew that arguing with her was a losing proposition. When the other person can just go silent forever words can't have that much of an effect, 'Alright then Cass, if you say so. Everyone, let's head out.'
...

'Cass, baby, I'm worried about you,' Selina told her, wrapping her tubby arms around Batgirl's iron hard shoulders, 'you fell down today and you shouldn't be going out in a fight like this?'

'Wait, you fell down? Since when do you fall down?' Barbara demanded, turning away from working the transit networks and wheeling up towards her charge, belly poking into Cass' thighs.

'Are you sure you're alright? You seam extremely sweaty,' Starfire observed, pressing close enough Cass was threatened to be pulled in by her breasts gravitational pull.

'fff...fine,' Batgirl managed, overwhelmed by so much motherly attention at once.

'Did you ever even eat any dinner?' Selina pressed on, 'look at you you're skin and bones.'

'You have been on duty every night for the last year. Maybe you should relax a bit,' Barbara told her, 'I know, I should book us a cruise. You can lay back and put on a few pounds that you clearly need.'

'No, I mean, uh yes, later,' Cass stammered, 'have to fight now.'

Breathing heavily, the girl dashed towards the already taking off Batwing, Starfire floating alongside her.

'Don't worry, I know you're the clearly an excellent fighter,' the alien told her, 'when this is done, why don't you come train with my titans? There's a lot of other girls your age there.'

Girls her age there. Cassandra almost slipped getting into the jet.

'Are you sure you're the okay?' Star asked again, boobs almost falling out of her top as she leaned forwards.

'Sure,' the quiet girl managed, having to swallow.

The bat shaped jet's engines fired off, sparing Cass more sexual confusion. Her heart beat returned to normal by the time they left the cave's tunnels, the stealthy fighter craft humming along under Dick's command.

'I'm not gonna tell you what to do,' the oldest side kick told her, after insuring the comms were off, 'but please let me try and talk this crazy alien out of this first. I hate to brag but this won't be the first time I've had to deal with a horny alien princess...'

...
Ten minutes later and the Bat-Wing was smouldering shrapnel.

'Babs, any update on that help?' Dick asked.

Dick struggled, trying to free himself but fifteen years of Bat training can't help much against a steel bar wrapped tight around your wrists. He'd gotten maybe three words before Maxima had started beating the shit out of him, a few minutes of desperate dodging ending when she'd gotten him around the leg. Spitting blood, he looked around through the one eye not swollen shut, seeing flashes of green light signifying Starbolts. Starfire, covered in sweat with rips and tears in her outfit, fat bulging through the rips, dodged under a cop car chucked at her and fired off another useless burst of light.

'Working on it,' Barbara yelled back, 'I keep getting busy signals and crises and...'

'Is that all...*hic* is that all you...earthlings ...can do?' Maxima ranted drunkenly, staggering on her feet only from booze and not from anything else, 'oh new gods, I'm never...never gonna...get laid...'

'Laid this!' Starfire yelled, dodging down to try and punch her enemy.

The much more muscular alien took a step back from the pudgy Tamaranian and then grabbed her by the throat. Starfire kicked and struggled, bikini bottoms ripping apart to show her inflated cheeks while one chubby boob popped free. Dick would have stared but he was pretty sure that his fiance was about to die and he would be completely helpless.

'Swear to...swear to New Genesis that I...uh...,' the drunk Maxima slurred, 'uh...blow up your city and then drunk fuck the guy with the tight ass over...over there...'

And that didn't sound good either. Captured, about to see his city blow up, his fiance killed and then getting...and where the hell was Cass?'
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.title: Dick begins the briefing

choices: Cass spends more time with Steph
Star invites her to the teen titans.
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.content:
Cassandra Cain knew how to read people.

And while alien body languages hadn't been part of her horrific upbringing, the near-humans like Kryptonians and Tamaranians and the like weren't any different. She'd been able to read the absolute and selfless love pouring off K'ori towards Dick like Barbara could read computer code, as well as her petty jealousy and flustered attractions towards Barbara. Ditto for the few times she'd seen Superman, who'd radiated love and honesty like a star radiates light, and Power Girl who'd done the same with a little resentment and an immense amount of hidden lust.

She'd been able to read Maxima clear as day the moment she saw the buff red head on the Bat-Computer's screen and immediately figured out how to beat her. Well, almost. Cass knew academically that the kick to the throat her muscles suggested wouldn't do something to a woman so strong. But knowing that, she'd still been able to figure out the way to defeat the angry redheaded warrior Queen.

When the Bat-Wing had sat down, Dick had slowly approached the drunkenly ranting Maxima while Starfire served overwatch. Cass had done a Bat-Family vanish, running past wrecked cop cars and abandoned barricades until she'd found what she was looking for. Figuring out how to get it started and drive it was an issue, she'd seen Bruce and Dick and Stephanie drive before but the Batmobile and various other bat family vehicles were a far cry from a semi-truck. She managed to get the key turned by the time Dick's 'I'm Nightwing and I'm not here to fight you' speech had gone south and put it into a gear by the time he finally failed to dodge one of Maxima's sloppy yet sound barrier breaking punches.

Unfortunately that gear was reverse and a thankfully abandoned car got smashed flat as the big semi backed up. Panicking, Batgirl slammed on the breaks and looked at the confusing mishmash of gear letters, her severe dyslexia keeping her from figuring out which was which. Trial and error found 1st by the time Dick was tied up and she started driving forwards, having to painfully navigate at 3 miles per hour while Starfire's chunky form loosed useless starbolts at the nearly invincible Maxima, the energy doing little but blast off pieces of her armor and leave the scantily clad alien even more naked than before.

'I swear I'm gonna...do...ugh. So stupid...piece of shit Lobo...ran off...,' the alien Queen slurred as Starfire kicked helplessly in her grip.

Dick saw the fight scene illuminated as a massive truck pulled up, coming slowly but surely towards him. The acrobat winced at the painful death, especially as he saw Cass, the least vehicular inclined member of the family behind the wheel. Fortunately she managed to slam on the break ...before it hit a barrier. But the truck was only going a mile an hour so it just stopped.

'What...new devilry...is this...stupid planet,' Maxima muttered, tossing Starfire away towards Dick and trying to find her sword, 'kick its ass...anyway...unless something has the balls to fuck me today...'

Cass leapt from the window of the truck onto its top with athletic grace, kneeling low and balling her fists as Maxima stumbled to the top. Her mind was giving her suggestions on how to physically murder this woman, like it always did around everyone all the time, but she had to ignore it even harder than before. Punching couldn't solve anything...but her other talents could.

'Back off little twig girl...the chubbster over their couldn't kill me and at least at least *hic* she's tall,' Maxima muttered, taking another drink.

Batgirl raised her black armored fist in the air and brought them down. Skinny as a twig she might be, but Cass was stupidly strong and she ripped through the steel top of the trailer like it was tissue paper, tearing a four foot wide hole. Taking a deep breath and again glad her suit lacked a mouth, she dove down into it, leaving the drunk alien wavering in confusion.

'Uh...not yet you don't!' Maxima snarled, jumping after her and into a sea of cream filling, frosting, crust, syrup and Poison Ivy engineered hormones designed to make the consumer fat, lazy and placid.

For half a second the alien Queen feared a trap of some sort, but then she was munching on the stacks and trays of unwrapped treats out for delivery from the local Anonymous bakery. The low speed wreck had knocked them off the shelves into a deep pile on the floor, one that Maxima was now gobbling down with superhuman speed and appetite. Maxima ate and ate, dulling the fires of her post break up anger on a technicolored sea of macaroons and gorging away her horniness on a four hundred pound plateau of triple fudge chunk cookies. Her already booze bloated stomach ballooned out past her considerable breasts before long as she crawled along the floor eating, breaking the buckle of her sword belt and letting her armored hot pants ride lower.

Outside, Starfire ripped the steel off of Dick's bruised wrists, the two heroes readying themselves for the inevitable fight ahead. Dick was terrified his little sister, ultra bad ass or not, had decided to take this maniac on while Starfire, aside from her hurt pride, was just confused.

'Dick! Your lens cameras off line, what's going on?' Barbara demanded over the comm unit, 'what's happening?'

'Uh, Cassandra appears to be a lot better at distracting her,' Grayson reported.

'Cassandra? Dick get her the hell out of there!' Babs yelled, 'if she tries to fight she'll get killed! Holy shit, her vital signs are off the chart: heart rate, brain activity, its like she's exploding in there!'

'For the love of God, Dick pull her out of there!' Selina ordered, 'if she gets hurt I swear, that retired or not I am kicking your ass.'

'Be the relaxing, she simply tricked Maxima into diving into a truck of...is that me?' Starfire asked.

The side of the Semi-Trailer depicted a perfectly lithe 'Kory Anders' sitting on a beach. With trim, firm and slender legs stretched out in front of her, her hard abs and tiny waist on display and her full breasts about to fall out of a white bikini, while she provocatively put a long jon donut towards her lips. The picture was sexy enough that it made the usually horny princess squirm but also a reminder of just how she'd puffed up. She'd never even be able to tie that miniscule string bikini on now and even if she sucked in an empty stomach to the max, displaying every modeling trick to hide an extra pound she knew, Kori couldn't get her stomach that flat again. She resolved to double down on her diet and be that woman again.

Dick was just amazed how much better Star looked now. So much more luscious, mature and vibrant than the starved stick in the picture. Granted, Star had been pretty then for sure, but now she was just so much more healthy and womanly. Partly it was the effect of Ivy's virus making him think that but such was Grayson's love for her that he'd have convinced himself of it without the infection.

'Doesn't matter, we've got to get her out,' Grayson said, shaking off thoughts about seeing Star in her current, or larger size, pouring out of that thong, 'she's a better dodger and stronger than me but not on Maxima's level, but she's probably bought us some time.'

Both ran forwards, Barbara radioing in their ears, 'Her vital signs have plunged, heart rate almost halved in just a second, she might be out cold!'

'Cass...,' Selina trailed off.

'Don't worry, we'll-,' Dick began.

He was interrupted by the back doors being kicked open and a slightly junk food stained Batgirl hoping out. Cass moved with a slightly woozy step but her full face mask made reading her expression impossible. She sat down and gave a long, satisfied sigh that was almost a giggle. Of Maxima there was no sign.

'she's fine,' Nightwing relayed, 'Cass, what the hell happened?'

'Told you, I could beat her,' Batgirl said tiredly.

Starfire looked inside at her tormentor, who'd dared to call her chunky, and let out a high laugh.

Maxima was passed out flat on her back, her red curls splattered with frosting and her face painted with cream, like a toddler let at a cake. Her armored pants had fully ripped away, leaving her clad only in a bra, and her stomach was a beach ball sized monument to raw gluttony. Strange growling noises sounded from the engorged woman's waist as her alien metabolism, altered by Ivy's extracts, went to work on turning the hundreds of pounds of gorged junk into fat cells.

'And she called me chunky,' Star huffed.

'How did you get her to do that?' Grayson asked, amazed that Cass had come up with it, 'I have to admit I would not have thought of that strategy.'

'Hmmm, knew she wasn't angry,' Cassandra explained, 'just depressed.'

It had been obvious to Cass. When Stephanie felt inadequate she overate. When Babs felt despondent over her legs and single-ness she over ate. When Selina worried about her social class she over ate. Granted they often ate because Cass was there giving them food, but the truth remained: depressed girls over ate. Not Cass though, she generally just punched training droids or holograms when she was depressed which was frequent given everything.

Tonight though she wasn't. The kiss with Stephanie had been special but the sight of Maxima gorging herself into defeat and out of her clothes had been...something else for her. For a while all the bad fears and doubts and self hate had gone away, leaving Cass ready for more action.

'Going on patrol,' Cassandra announced, drawing out a grapple gun, 'you clean up.'

She shot off into the night, leaving Dick and Star alone.

'Not what I was expecting, but I'm glad she talked me into it,' Grayson shook his head.

'She seems very *munch* capable,' Starfire agreed, digging into one of the uneaten cheese cakes in the back of the truck.

Her diet could start tomorrow.
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.title: Cass had a plan.

choices: Steph is here...with a friend
Its Selina...but Steph has been kidnapped!
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.content:
Nervous didn't even begin to describe how Cass was feeling.

It had all started after her defeat of the alien warqueen Maxima, when some plucky news reporters had gotten an excellent photograph of the 5'6 Batgirl standing alone against the 6'4 tower of drunken alien muscle. That had given her the public credit for saving the city, especially as the embarassing details of Maxima's fattening defeat hadn't been shared, and as a result the quiet girl's popularity in the community had skyrocketed. But Gotham being Gotham this had pissed off many of the Mafia gangs and Supervillain madmen that had had previous plans more quietly thwarted by the frightening ex-assassin. The Penguin had set a fifteen million dollar bounty on her head, dead or alive, leading to a deluge of hit men, assassins and bounty hunters descending on the city for Cass' head.

Two weeks of criminal murderers trying to punch, stab, snip or blow her up hadn't been an issue for her. Not having to worry about them gunning for anyone else was honestly relaxing and with all the criminals throwing themselves onto Batgirl's fists, the city was more peaceful than it had been in years. She'd filled hospital wounds with the broken bodies of her would be hunters, all of them alive but in immense pain, during a two week war that had ended when Deathstroke had gone after her on a friday, counting on her being tired from the constant fighting. Cass hadn't slept in a couple days at that point and the deadly contract killer had managed to get in a few deep sword wounds to her thigh and bicep before she broke his legs, arms, pelvis, jaw and nose and then put him into a coma before passing out from blood loss herself.

"You're off patrol for the weekend," Bruce had told her when she woke up in the cave, her arm and leg sutured and a blood transfusion going into her veins, "Just until you recover."

"What? No, I'm fine!" she'd insisted, but seeing the ponderous form of Selina tapping her foot behind him told her exactly what her chances of winning the argument were.

"It should be for months, you had me worried sick the whole two weeks," the matronly catwoman huffed, ripples going up her when she tapped her high heeled shoe and chin wagging as she munched an eclair, "I swear, you're going to drive me to drink."

They started at her swollen foot, fat rippling up her swollen ankle and clumsy cankle, over her dimpled knee and across the pillowy expanse of her thighs, which were red where they rubbed constantly despite constant applications of soothing cream. Stylish as ever, the obese Selina was crammed into a little black dress which barely covered the immensity of her hips. The uber-pear Catwoman had recently announced she was expecting and certainly had the birthing hips for it, currently measuring in at a staggering 50 inches.

Her belly was relatively smaller, the gut of a 180 lb out of shape woman rather than the pushing in on three hundred pounder she was. Completely lazy and totally inactive, Selina was essentially eating the richest foods on earth round the clock, worry about her husband and adopted children causing not only stress eating but a nasty case of sleep eating that was compelling her multiple pounds a day weight gain. No one would have believed that mere months earlier she'd been forty pounds thinner than average, a delectably nimble anti-heroine.

"Months is a little drastic Selina," Bruce spoke up for her, "she knows her limits enough."

"So are days," Cass shrugged her impressively shredded shoulders, her sports bra showing off her diamond cut muscles and numerous scars, "I want to patrol."

Catwoman glared, her piggish green eyes demanding Batman do something. Mentally sighing, Bruce tried coming up with an argument that would keep his adopted daughter under a roof for the weekend and then settled on someone instead.

"Stephanie, new mission for you," he told the Blonde currently scanning police scanners on the Batcomputer.

Stephanie Brown had spun around in the computer chair, hopping up with an enthusiasm a sixty pound weight gain hadn't dimmed. She didn't need her hands to stand up, but when her thick legs pressed the lower slope of her overfed belly popped out over her yoga pants and remained in view after she stood up, a size to small T-shirt not able to cover all of her torso. While her thighs and backside were bigger, the blonde's gain was concentrated on her upper half: a cuddly pot belly with a matched pair of E cups, while her angular face had become cute and round. To Cass' relief, the Vigilante had been removed from active duty after failing the obstacle course three days in a row. While her sparring had been getting better due to her caloric excess fueling muscle growth, Brown's wind was increasingly pathetic. The blonde stopping exercising now that she was on computer and support duty wasn't going to turn that around any time soon, without any exercise her gain would do not but speed up.

"Make sure Cass doesn't go back into the field this weekend," Batman said, "sit on her if you have to."

The kindly blonde had smiled, turning to her girlfriend and saying "How about a movie night?"

.....

This brought the Batgirl to the next evening, strangely in her room instead of swinging from roof tops and punching crooks.

She was on night three of no sleep, having been to nervous to even nap during the day. Cass had a lot of energy, having only been able to workout for eight hours in the cave's holo room and robot sparring chambers during Selina's mid-day napping/eating session until the furious and full to the point of bursting catwoman had waddled into the room and dragged her out by the ear, the jello wobbling of her ass cheeks driving out all three hundred kung fu moves Cass knew to break the simple hold.

"You can do this," the bandaged Batgirl said to herself.

Gunfire and knives didn't scare her, why should a movie night with her best friend/girlfriend? Everything was ready, a pictograph grocery list had been delivered to Alfred who'd stocked Cass' room with all of Stephanie's favorite snacks. A cheesy B grade horror movie was in her VCR, guaranteed to make the bubble gutted blonde press tight to her and to fear eat.

Cass was terrified. Surely something would go wrong. This was so scary, how did regular people date?

A knock at her door made the ultra-dangerous woman jump.

"Come, come in!" she stammered.
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.title: Cass spends more time with Steph

choices: Two blondes are better than one, Supergirl
The Third Wheel, Barbara
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.content:
Cass' exquisitely fit heart skipped a beat when Stephanie walked in.

The Spoiler was wearing typical attire for a young coed in early winter: black yoga pants and a comfy wool knit sweater in her favorite color, purple.They were sized for a girl who could comfortably wear a size ten, but given that after a couple weeks of sitting on her butt at the bat computer instead of puffing her way across alleys and rooftops, Steph was a size twelve tending towards a fourteen. The pants were a little short, chubby ankles showing over the rim of her soft ugg boots, and sausage skin tight.

Cass could see the blonde's pale thigh skin through the near transparent fabric, the only partly atrophied muscle in her quads making her legs extra bulky. When she stepped in, her inner thighs went swish swish. Her friend's gain had been significant enough a camel toe was easily visible through panties and leggings both, making Batgirl sit down onto her bed in shock.

"Cass, are you okay?" Spoiler squeaked, running towards her.

Batgirl read the concern pouring off of her guest...but that was almost foiled because there was a lot of bouncing to distract her. Steph's fat girl habits meant the leggings and soft sweater didn't meet and the purple wool rose higher with every step, Brown's soft spare tire spilling into view as it rode up the curve of her waist, revealing more and more of her belly. The bouncing continued upwards, Steph's new fat girl boobs wobbling like mad and making Batgirl break into a cold, nervous sweat.

This was a terrible idea, Cass thought, barely able to sit up and incredibly nervous.

Steph put a soft arm around Cass' back to support her, meaning that her substantial boobs were pressed right into the ex-assassin's face. Soft wool backed with buttery boob fat hugged Cain's head, a marshmallowy nirvana that the fit vigilante had no desire to ever leave. Batgirl's minimal vocal abilities totally abandoned her, thoughts barely able to pass through her head. When Steph did try to pull away, all she could do was pull her in tighter. All she wanted was to lay here and cuddle and snuggle and hug and maybe, if she got the courage worked up for it, kiss.

"Cass...,"Steph gasped at the surprising strength of the skinny girl, her vertebrae popping, "Cass...uhf...Cass let go of me...I can't breathe..."

"Is she okay?" a second voice asked from the door way.

That managed to penetrate the dream state going through the vigilante's head. It wasn't Selina's voice, she knew her step mom's routine down pat and the mega pear socialite would just be settling down for an evening nap to sleep off her post afternoon nap binge. Giving a frown that could make a mystically trained master assassin shit themselves, Cass pulled her head away from its heavenly pillow and saw...
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.title: Steph is here...with a friend

choices: Fatgirl Begins
The Nemesis
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.content:
Batgirl was pretty angry that someone else was there.

Nervous she might have been as she was at any social interaction, but the shy vigilante had been looking forwards to an evening feeding, cuddling, snuggling, fondling and kissing the ever chubbier form of her beloved Steph. That sweater was pure magic and the ex-assassin wanted her callused hands under it to gently rub the buttery soft bulge that had been a hard four pack a few months ago. Spoiler was at a perfect point, big enough to be the class fat girl a few months ago but due to her now over workout regimen now one of the skinnier girls at Gotham U and Cass really wanted to get to feel her up.

That someone was getting in the way of that made her furious and her frightening scowl earned a sharp yelp from the fat shape in the doorway before immediately softening. Cass recognized the fat, passed out blonde from the back of the car that afternoon, when she'd been breaking the rules of her forced rest and spying on Steph during Selina's early afternoon nap. That had been another fight and a force feeding session towards yet another blonde, followed by the disturbing news that her joy bringing fat fetish might not be native. Cass was still grappling with the consequences of that but all the fat on display put that thought to the very back of her head.

"Sorry I didn't ask ahead of time, but I found her lost and stuck near the campus and couldn't leave a fellow super in the lurch," Steph explained, soft body still pressed close to Cass, "I figured I would have to invite her, so Cass, meet Kara."

Stephanie was absolutely gorgeous and just fat enough to be too big for crime fighting. But for the moment there was still some muscle holding up her chunk, Kara on the other hand was 100% flub. Supergirl was a wobbling victim of the obesity epidemic, looking like she'd spent a lifetime obese. Being able to eat at super speed had increased the tiny blonde by 150%, making her wobble into Cass' room at 250lbs of pure butter pouring out of college cheer leading uniform. Her boobs were plunging, toneless DDs that really needed a bra and were currently near visible through the stretched fabric of her sweater. A big, flabby pot belly sagged over her skirt, two lesser bulges floppy love handles. Her hips were stunning and her thighs were magnificent, living with Selina had given her an appreciation of pears but for every pound Supergirl had gained on her upper body two had popped onto her lower figure. The skirt was so stretched to show the bottom of her panties, bags of hip fat pouring out the sides. She had a lovely waddle, thighs turning red from friction and Cass could read her embarrassment at every step.

"Hi, we met when our moms went out to eat," Kara said sheepishly, "I've gained a little weight since then."

In this universe, one hundred pounds did count as a little.

Cass swallowed, marshaled her dwindling ability to speak and tried to not pull both bubbly blondes into her bed.

"I saw you today," she said softly, crossing her yoga panted legs and hoping she wasn't soaking through.

"What do you mean I didn't see anyone who was...oh my god, I should have figured that out, you're Batgirl!" Kara said, a moment of fear sweeping through her at remembering how scary the black armored vigilante had been.

Out of her outfit and in just a pair of Yoga pants and a t-shirt, the other girl didn't look scary. Uncomfortably ripped and skinny and those scars were a little sad but she mostly looked cute.

"Yes," Cass, who cared little for her identity admitted.

"Well, I'm Supergirl and you didn't happen to see my friend Cassie did you?" the fat blonde alien asked.

"...Briefly, she left," Cassandra fibbed, Sandsmark having drifted off like a balloon back towards her dorm.

'Ugh, that B-word," supergirl almost swore, "you don't mind if I stay here do you tonight do you?"

Cassandra smiled, glad that problem was out of the way.

Ten minutes later and the three girls were curled up in bed, the schlock horror movie playing and the two blonde's gorging. Cass had the supple Stephanie pressed in tight on her right side, her marvelously soft sweater and its even softer contents pressing tight to Cassandra's jacked form while the Spoiler munched on her fourth strawberry poptart of the evening. Cass watched her girlfriend's soft second chin jiggle with every small bite and how with every swallow her heavy boobs bounced just a little inside her snug bra. On her left, the pear shaped Kara had a half empty three gallon bucket of pop corn in between her thick legs, that an entire stick of butter had gone to greasing down her throat. Her legs were crossed, one meaty hamhock covering Cass' hard thighs.

"You moved really fast today," Supergirl complimented her, "I'd have trouble keeping up even if my powers were on today. How'd you do it?"

"Practice," Cass shrugged, "you look...strong."

"Ha, thanks. Usually I am I guess," Kara beamed at the compliment.

"Practice she says, its because she's not in college and didn't put on the freshman fifteen like us normies," Stephanie chuckled through chocolate, patting the gut her sixty five pound weight gain had packed onto her.

"Yeah, I can't believe how skinny you are," Kara munched, "aren't you cold?"

"Nah, I'm...," Cass stretched out, "content. You two are nice."

Outside snow was falling but inside Cass was gloriously warm. The information from that afternoon that this was somehow fake barely even niggled, because damn did it feel good to be literally surrounded by these gloriously soft, binging fatties. She smiled and slightly adjusted herself, her hard body making the fat pressing onto her jiggle and bounce.

On screen, a rail thin bottle blonde with silicon DDs got axed in a ludicrously unbelievable fashion, making Cass' two bed mates press in close to her in automatic fear, despite being or having been a super powered space alien and a badass vigilante. The fit assassin smiled ear to ear, sliding a hand up Steph's back rolls and nimbly unsnapping her bra. Cass had already had light fingers and before her concerns had turned just to food, sex and coddling her Selina had given her a few pick pocketing lessons. Stephanie never even noticed her bra was missing and her ripe E cups plunged against her sweater, jiggling as she put yet another pop tart into her mouth.

Cass smiled, reached out a hand and ticked a particular spot on Stephanie's flank, making the blonde a little thirsty. Stephanie reached out and grabbed a two liter of Soda, chugging down the Soder Cola like it was a cup of water. A rumbling stomach swelled out more under Steph's sweater. Crossing her legs, Cass reached out her left hand and undid Kara's bra as she swallowed. The temporarily de-powered Kryptonian only had a C cup but they dropped pretty far, jiggling when she let out a loud belch at having finished.

"I'll get cocoa," Cass said, sliding out between the warm cave of fat.

Her room had a small kitchenette and she hummed happily to herself as her plan went on, quickly making three mugs. One held zero calorie chai tea, the other two a 1200 calorie drink of cocoa, cream, whipped cream, marshmallows sprinkles and shot of peppermint schnapps filched from the liquor cabinet. The two blondes took the steaming drinks and sucked them down with gluttonous squeals, Cass sipping her own tea and then putting it on a window sill when they finished. Both Steph and Kara's round cheeks were red with warmth.

"Its warm now," she smiled, sliding off her shirt and revealing firm A cups in a sports bra and abs hard enough to shred cheese on.

"Yeah, I'll do the same if you don't mind," Steph said, warm from the Manor's furnace, the shared body heat, the blanket and her overweight body.

Kara nodded, "yeah I'm warm too, I'm not used to having to need to worry about temps, hopefully my powers are up tomorrow."

Sweaters were slid off, revealing gloriously soft bellies resting in their laps and two pairs of fat girl boobs. Steph's were larger and firmer, her still in existence pecs lending a degree of pertness to her center fold rack. Kara's were smaller but their sagginess was enticing. Both gave small squeaks of shock that faded when Cass dropped her own bra.

"Oops," the dark haired Batgirl smiled.

...

Cass woke up to sunlight coming in through the window. Fat pushed onto her at every angle, from the sweat shiny E cups wrapped around her face to the basketball sized ass cheeks pressing into her hard stomach. She smiled and yawned, sitting up to see...

Story Diverges:

Fatgirl Begins: her own stomach packed full with anonymous food, Cass isn't immune anymore.

The Nemesis: the door opens to reveal a pale, obese, depowered Power Girl
1553311111111211122121121111111111121111.title: Two blondes are better than one, Supergirl

choices: The direct method: Break into a factory and add the compound herself!
The money method: Start a food company and add the compounds to the mix!
The alternative method: Find something else to put the compound in!
155331111111121112212112111112.content:
You would think, Ivy mused angrily, that it would have been easy to find a corporate fatcat in Gotham City of all places who was willing to play patsy to your schemes.

As time dragged on and the girl's attempts to find a collaborator consistently failed to bear fruit, Ivy grew more and more irritated. Spending most days spread out across the couch and enjoying nature documentaries and gardening shows, even her plants were starting to reflect her foul mood, growing more thorns and barbs and turning red and more vicious looking. Perhaps this was to make up for how Ivy was looking less threatening this ways, since she was growing a lot more then just irritated.

While she might have been able to claim before that she was just incredibly curvy or pleasingly zaftig, there was no denying nowadays that Ivy was more pig girl than plant girl. Graduating from taking up one seat to two on the sofa she occupied nowadays, Ivy had bloomed with excess adipose, with a grand cauldron of a belly that hung over her sunken in knees, tree-trunk thighs, and flabby bingo winged arms that did little more then deliver food to her eager little mouth when she wasn't feeling especially lazy and having her sentient vines feed her instead. This fed into her frustrations considerably; she may have found her double chin rather striking and enjoyed the impressive size of her rack that was beginning to resemble her own melon plants in size, but those were all the signs that she was losing her touch, and while her infinite checkbook was the silver lining of this arrangement, she had to admit that it was the biggest reason why the scale with a three hundred pound limit cracked under her.

It was also the biggest reason why it was so hard to find a corporate lackey that would go along with the scheme. Her donations to environmentalist causes have been doing wonders to further her goals, but a lot of those groups were viciously anti-corporate by nature, meaning many corporations were a bit unwilling to work with the super-sized super-villain that funded them. Even the Penguin, while he was willing to launder their money and find some investment opportunities, chafed at the idea of getting the businessmen he rubbed elbows with to meet and discuss Ivy's ultimate plan. Still, if there was any positive to come out of the time wasted on the endeavor, the compound she wanted to put in the food supply, the compound she not-so-subtly tested on Harley, worked like a charm.

"Red!" came a shout from the kitchen. "We're outta burritos!"

"Then have something else!" Ivy shouted back. "You just had food delivered yesterday!"

Whining under her breath, Harley emerged out of the kitchen to display the full effects of Ivy's little experiment. Dressed in only a light t-shirt and panties, her thigh meat was on full display, creamy and jiggling with every ponderous step yet still resolutely supporting the rest of her body, including the belly that broke into two rolls as it hung down and the head-sized cleavage straining the limits of her top. Once the smaller of the two, the jester's lazy lifestyle and Ivy's formula had torpedoed her metabolism; now she was matching Ivy in terms of girth and didn't look like she was going to stop any time soon.

"I thought you said we were out of burritos," Ivy said, eying the giant Mexican delicacy, twice as big as any normal burrito would have been, in Harley's hand. Undeterred, Harley opened her mouth and fed the giant burrito into her eager maw, swallowing the meal and letting out a powerful belch that wobbled the ring of fat that made up her second chin.

"We're outta burritos now," Harley said, grinning.

"Ugh, you're impossible."

"What, it's parta my charm!" Harley said defensively as she went to sit next to Ivy, the two of them filling up a sofa that could comfortably fit a whole family and still creaked dangerously as the jester lowered her bulk into it. "Besides, not like I have anything better to do, no one wants to work with us!"

"I wonder why..." Ivy said sarcastically, running her fingers across her own belly sprawled out in front of her and letting out a soft belch. This couldn't last, Ivy realized. She had to come up with a new way to get her formula into the food supply before she and the jester were too big to fit in the house anymore. But what?
155331111111121112212112111112.title: Growing Impatient

Come up with a new scheme
155331111111121112212112112.content:
Feeling like everything was well in hand, Ivy headed back to the apartment. She decided to indulge in some early victory celebration by eating some ice cream. As soon as she got home, she marched right over to the kitchen, pulled out a pint of cookie dough ice cream, a spoon, and took a seat at the kitchen table. She eagerly dug into the ice cream, stuffing a big bite of the ice cream down her threat. Mm, so good she thought to herself happily. Having always had an addiction to chocolate, Ivy continued to stuff bite after bite of the delicious creamy ice cream down her throat until she had finished it all. Mm, that was so delicious she thought to herself as she contently patted her belly. It was just then that she heard her cell phone ring.

Not feeling like getting up, Ivy was grateful that she had left her pink cellphone on the table. She picked it up and smiled as she saw Harley's name flash on her caller id. "Hey Harl, did the guards bring over all the money?" she asked. "Um...no. None of them have come by yet. That is why I am calling ya. Did they get confused and come to the apartment instead?" Harley asked. "No! How strange. I wonder what happened. Maybe it was a mistake to use men, they are such simple creatures" Ivy commented. "Yeaha, well everyone but Mistha J of course, he is a complicated fella" Harley said. "Yes, everyone but the Joker" Ivy said, placating her friend for the moment even though she didn't feel the same way.

Harley then heard a door open and one of the guards walked in. "Hold on Ivy, I think the guards are starting to arrive" Harley said before covering the mouthpiece with her hand. "Where were you? What took you so long?" Harley demanded of the guard Paul and then noticed he was moneyless. "And where is all the bags and bags of money? " Harley asked the guard.

"We ran into your friend Catwomen. She is really nice. She said she was working with you guys and that there had been a change of plans. We were supposed to give the money to her so we loaded it up into her car and she drove off. Aren't you pleased?" Paul asked with a smile.

Paul never got his answer as Harley then grabbed her hammer and knocked the guard out. Harley then picked up the phone. "Uh red, we got a problem. Catwomen intercepted the guards, told them that she was working with us, and got them to give her the money. What are we going to do?" Harley asked.

Ivy immediately grew quite angry. Catwoman was really getting to be a pain, getting in the way of her crimes. Something needed to be done. Ivy decided that....

Harley runs into Selina Kyle (Catwoman) who's been living it large
1553311111111211122121121122.content:
Ivy was defeated. There wasn't anything she could do about it now, Catwoman had the money and hadn't even resorted to violence. It wasn't like she could go to the cops, for God's sake!

There was a long, drawn out silence. "Harl, you still there?" she finally managed

"Yeah, what's up?" she responds with just as much discomfort in her voice.

"Kill the guards, get out of there..." Ivy sighed again, "I need time to think."

"Gotcha..."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------
"Time to Think" soon became long and drawn out, almost eight weeks had gone by since the criminal duo's last outing, which was regarded amongst the criminal underworld as a ridiculous flop; especially considering Ivy's caliber amongst the scum of Gotham City. They hadn't done anything in those past weeks. If one good thing came out of this little hiatus, it was that suspicion had certianly dropped around them renting an apartment.

Ivy's bloated form continued to swell and swell in a mixture of self-pity, boredom, and a generally healthy appetite. And Harley seemed to resume her life as normal, not so much as put off by the rarely-mentioned flop. Sure, she sat at her computer nearly 24/7, but at least she wasn't moping around like her redheaded roomie. Harley could swear Ivy vegged out on the couch (lol) more than she did

Poison Ivy's massive behind crushed the cushions that were unfortunate enough to meet it's swollen cheeks, the couch frame itself wasn't bothered however. Her stomach swelled outward as she sat, billowing out to swell over the plush seating ever so slightly. Her cheeks, fixed in an almost permenant state of 'flushed' were round and drooped slightly over her long enveloped neck. Her eyes were forced into a slight squint and her nose crowded by her chubby cheeks. Supporting her stomach were two purely massive thighs, past succulent and much more than 'meaty', Ivy's thunderthighs had enveloped her entire lower end, her ass was fat and so was everything else about her.

The once respectable villainess placed rather large forkful of chocolate cake in her mouth, a few crumbs tumbling down into her generous green bosom. She grunted somewhat, letting the flavor sink into her taste buds and then immediately sucking it down her esophagus. Again, she grunted; this time in exasperation.

"Harley!" she barked, simply yelling for her cohort wasted precious breath, "HARLEY?!"

Harleen Quinzelle, the 'thin' member of this team, had a lot of time to do whatever she wanted. She could leave the apartment whenever she wanted, and she certainly had free reign over the internet so long as she payed the bill, but living with "Premadonna Ivy" had taken a bit of chipper out of her around the house. She got irritated a lot easier...

"WHAT?!" Harley's shrill cry pierced Ivy's eardrums, the blonde woman storming into the living room like Hurricane Norman.

"I'm out of cake." Ivy pouted, doing her best to cross her cushion-sized arms. Ivy had resorted to pouting to get what she wanted lately, even to get Harley tending to her plants. The green skinned goddess spent nearly all her time wallowing in her failure. "Go get some more." she rested her hands on her gut, letting her turkey neck rest on her fat chest.

"No Way!" Harley whined back, that wasn't so odd, "I'm busy playin' RuneScape!"

She put her hands on her hips, standing indignantly at the incredibly lazy chloropath. If one were to just look at Harley, they would see a very pretty young gymnist in blonde pigtails. But when someone who knew her (other than the self-absorbed Poison Ivy) looked at her, they could clearly see lack of definition. She was losing her muscles, which was made almost painfully obvious.

"Aren't you a little old for that?" Pamela quipped, turning up the volume, "It's not like I'm asking you for a leg or anything, just some cake!" Harley grumbled, storming back into her room. Ivy barely noticed, she was currently wondering how she could get that simply elegant forest patterned dress from QVC without theft or having to get off the couch.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------
Harley muffled her exasperated screams in a pillow, she was so tired of Ivy!

"I used ta think tat livin' with Red would be a breeze!" she sat back down on her bed, focus shifting back on the bright LCD screen of her laptop, "Feh, she sure proved tat wrong!"

She looked over the mail, something from the supor. Probably about the bills again, she and Ivy hadn't paid them in a while, if things kept up like this they were going to get evicted. Not that they could force Harley anywhere, she could whoop their blue-clad asses.

She grumbled again, "We need money..."
1553311111111211122121121122.title: Two Girls in an Expensive (and Fattening) World

choices: Tell Selina what had been going on with Ivy
Not tell Selina anything knowing that she would use it against her and Ivy
15533111111112111221211211222.content:
While Ivy was sitting on her fat all day everyday since their failed heist, Harley did take breaks from the computer to do errands appart from watering Ivy's plants and caring for her hyenas. She would go out to do the grocery store as someone had to keep plenty of food around for Ivy and other basic needs. She would even do both her and Ivy's laundry. She also used these ventures out to get new computer games to play. Not that she was getting bored of her old games but she liked to have a variety to play. After going to the laundromat and putting their clothes in, Harley headed across the street to the mall to go to the video game store. As she passed the jewelry store on the way to the jewelry store, she noticed Selina Kyle aka Catwomen trying on some jewels. Instantly she felt some anger surge through her, Selina had the money that should have been hers. She quickly calmed down as there was nothing that she could do about that now and her getting into a fight with her at the mall which had it's own security certainly wasn't going to help the situation. It wasn't that she didn't think she could handle the security, she could, it would be just a hassle that wasn't worth it.

Harley was about to continue on our way to the video game store when Selina walked out of the jewelry store after making her purchase. Now that Selina had money, she had no problem with getting her jewelry legally. Harley didn't hold this against Selina though as she and Ivy had done the same thing. Selina smiled as she spotted Harley. "I am sure I am the last person you want to see but it was just too easy to steal your money from the guards that I couldn't help myself" Selina replied. "Ya I know, I learned tha hard way" Harley grumbled. As she took a closer look at Selina she noticed that she had been living it large. Selina's hair was looking fabulous, long and straight, like she had just been to the salon, had on gucci sunglasses, a prada bag, and some expensive clothes. It also didn't escape Harley's notice that Selina had put on about 10 pounds. She had a small belly with a little thicker thighs now I guess Ivy is not the only one gaining weight Harley thought to herself.

"Well don't take it too hard Harley. I am sure you and Ivy will be able to pull off another successful heist soon as long as you don't use men in your schemes or otherwise I will foil it agian" Selina replied with a laugh. She hwas half teasing and half serious. She definitely would foil Harley and Ivy's plan again if it was as easy as last time.

"I don't know about that" Harley said before even realizing that she was saying it. "Why not?" Selina asked curiously. She had noticed the sincerety in Harley's voice and wondered what had happened that had gotten Harley so down that she didn't think that she would pull off another heist. This was alarming to Selina as she always enjoyed the rivarly with Harley and Ivy.

Harley decided to....

choices: At the long-awaited Social, Ivy's confections sure are popular...
-Free Choice-
155331111111121112212112112222.content:
Telling Catwoman about Ivy's weight problem and their general disfunction would certainly be a bad idea, Harley decided. It'd be like giving Superman the key to his kryptonite shackles, or Batsy a target that says 'BATARANG GOES HERE' on her rump. There was no way she was going to allow that to happen, how else could she and IVy pay for the internet bill (among other things)?!

"Ah i's nothin', I'm just eh... havin' a bad day is all!" Harley quickly fabricated a lie, hoping it would be satisfactory. Selina looked her fellow criminal up and down suspiciously, "You sure?" she asked finally, leaving Harley sweating nervously, "Can't have my cash flow dropping any time soon."

Harley twinged, that last comment stung a little. "I mean, had it not been for you and Pam, I would have never been able to afford all this!" she gestured quite haughtilly to her ensemble; a slinky town dress with a prada bag, pearls, and many other extravegant items. "I owe you guys a lot." she purred, self-satisfied as always.

"Someone's gettin' a swelled head on 'er." Harley jested, half serious. Ms. Kyle continued, "And I've been cordually invited to the Social Society of Gotham, courtesy of Mr. Bruce Wayne." she had drawn out her date's name for effect, the most elligible bachelor in Gotham had asked her, over all the other socialites in Gotham (or the world, considering his vast wealth) She was going to go anyway, she and Bruce had a very 'on-again off-again' status, but Harley didn't need to know that.

Quinn's face grew heavy with exasperation and jealousy. "M-Mistah Wayne?!" she couldn't help but stutter, it was Bruce effin' Wayne for God's sake! "He asked you?!"

Selina looked away teasingly, "My, I think I may have said too much!" she purposly feigned panic in the most caddy way possible, "I should go!" Harley was left agape for a few seconds, there was just nothing left to say (which was quite a shock, considering it was Harley) She heard Selina's heels click loudly as the socialite made her way into another nearby store, "I'll be sure to see you around, Harleen!" she waved back, laying it on really thick. Something that made Harley even angrier.

"Yeah, by the looks'a tat tummy, Mistah Wanye'll be seein' alotta you too..." she murmered, storming into 'Joystix', counting what very little spending money she could spare...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Ivy hadn't done much since Harley left this morning. She was dressed in slacker shique, huge sweatpants and an equally large black tee that had a few crumbs scattered aimlessly across it. Her red hair was combed half-heartedly, though she still put on her special lipstick in the off chance of a home invasion.

Her stomach was completely covered by her garments today, a rarity around this apartment, but still spread out far; it rested heavilly on her monstrous thighs and spilled slightly through the small gap between her legs. One pleasingly plump hand held the remote and rested on the couch's arm, and the other rest on her midsection. Currently, she was flipping through the channels aimlessly.

She had grown to enjoy the luxury of satellite TV, a big improvement over cable. The only downside was that out of hundreds of channels, only a few shows were watchable. Even less things if you only counted the ones in English. Ivy grumbled, there was nothing on TV.

The green woman hefted her bulk from the couch, something that was getting harder and harder to do lately (though she couldn't exactly tell why...) and waddled to the Island Countertop that seperated the Living room from the Kitchen. As she wobbled about the room, her gut jiggled wildly about on her thighs, and her heavy footsteps sent her behind quaking. "mmm... hungry..." she said in a rather husky tone.

One hand travelled from her side to the fridge's stainless steel handle, opening it lethargically as she pondered what she could eat. "The cake's gone..." she put a chubby digit to her cherubic cheek, "There's no more of that pasta..."

For a while, Ivy spent her time with her rear up in the air as she searched the fridge. Until she found it; Harley always had something sweet stored away and this week's turned out to be a large pan of brownies. She always made the best brownies.

Without a second of hesitation, Ivy's stomach growled and that look came across her face again, the "I want that." look that had once struck fear into many do-gooders around Gotham. She shamelessly struggled over her own bulk to get to that tray, placing it on the counter, and cut a whole fourth of it for herself.

She sat down on the kitchen's barstool, her overall bulk inadvertantly spilling over onto another nearby stool and began her work. Pamela always complimented Harley's tastes in baked goods, even if she was the one eating all of them. She finished the morsel off quickly, tummy still grumbling for more.

Once again, she heaved and hoe'd her weight onto the floor, icy linoleum chilling her bare plump feet as she travelled back to her prize. "Mmmph..." she mumbled, chocolate dough stuffed into her mouth , "So good!" she lauded over the pastry.

"If only Harley could sell these!" she mulled over the thought, examining a chunk of brownie before inhaling it, "We'd be rich!"

Suddenly, something inside Ivy's brain clicked. She had a long-overdue idea.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------
Harley burst into the apartment, back to her usual chipper self at the thought of getting to play her new video games. "Hey Ivy!" she said, looking for her obese roomie. Suprisingly enough, her usual space on the couch was empty!

Looking over to her left, she saw Ivy; fiery red locks held back by a bandana, bloated belly framed by an apron that suited her better a few pounds ago that squeezed her fat ever chance it got, and batter splattered on her green cheek. "Red?" Harley asked, she hadn't seen Ivy doing much of anything these past few weeks, this surely came as a shock!

"Hey Harl." Ivy said, unusally merry herself considering her massive attitude lately, "Something I wanted to talk to you about?"

Harley sat the bags down on the couch, Bud and Lou came to greet her eagerly. "Yeah?" she asked, looking up from her babies, "What's up?"

"I need you to make your brownies, a lot of them." she said curtly, her entire body jiggling as Ivy emerged from behind the oven, "We're gonna get rich."

Harley raised a wire-thin eyebrow, "Call me crazy Red," ("Not really, tat's not funny.") "But I don't think a bake sale's gonna make up for all the money we lost." she crossed her arms, wondering slightly if Ivy could do the same anymore. "Of course not, but with this we just might." she sprinkled a purple pollen into the batter from a bottle marked with the ever-familiar Skull and Crossbones.

"An'..." she had to ask what Ivy was doing to her Ma's recipe, "What was that?"

Ivy's plump face smirked as she stirred the spores into the batter, "That's a very potent dopamine stimulant..." she trailed off slightly as she dropped in another powder, marked poisonous. "And an -huff- body fat stimulant, I figured that -wheeze- mixed in with a brownie, they couldn't fail."

These words were familiar to Harley, she did have a degree in psychology after all, but for some reason she couldn't place the exact effect. "So... they're gonna get fat and that'll make us rich?" Harley was totally lost, lost in excitement over getting her new video game and the fact that the two might have some cash flow soon.

"No!" Ivy hissed, stirring vigorously. It visibly tired this large woman out. "The stimulant will release dopamine every time they take a bite, and the body fat stimulant will lower their metabolism, and heighten their appetite!" Harley was still lost.

"So... it's like crack?" she asked, trying to humor the gigantic green vixen; she sighed in return. "Yes, Harl..." she huffed, "It's like a drug."

"An' we're gonna..." the dethroned Clown Queen of Crime tried her best to put two and two together. Ivy interjected, already knowing the next question. "No, Harl, we don't need to open up a bakery, I'll just 'motivate' the caterers of all the important events in Gotham!" she continued to explain further, removing her kitchen outfitting and shoving them into Harley's chest, "And I've been baking all night, so get to work."

Harley narrowed her eyes, she enjoyed baking; when it was for fun.

Ivy sensed she was being to harsh, so she tried to lighten the mood by playfully spreading a dollop of batter onto Harley's cheek. She was quiet for a while, but burst out into manic laughter. "Right-aroonie Red, I'll get to work."

"Great, sorry for being such a bitch, Harl." Ivy smiled, waddling down to her room. The blonde girl seemed strangely drawn to Ivy's monstrous hiney jiggling with every step. "Hope she remembers that these a'e for those Rich Guys...

Harley wiped the batter off her cheek with a slender finger, "Mm!" she squealed, "Chocolate!"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------
Selina Kyle peeled the dress from her frame, a note lay neatly on her plush pillow; untouched by any of her many mischevious cats, even.

'Selina-

Going to be out of the country for a while, I'm sorry.

-Bruce

She huffed, "Dammit Wayne..."

choices: Harley and Ivy have their first good pay day/ Selina gets addicted to the browni
Harley and Ivy attend the Social in disguise to see if their scheme is working
1553311111111211122121121122221.content:
The next day, Harley and Ivy dressed in their disguises and paid a visit to the caterers of the upcoming social. Luckily all the cooks were men and so Ivy was able to use her pheromines on them. She and Harley quickly signed a contract that said the caterers would use their brownies at the events they catered and they would get a cut of the profits. The long-awaited Social would be the first of these events. A couple of days later, the Social arrived and the girls brought over the brownies to the caterer's business. They had spent the past day baking all of the brownies. Harley was the one actually doing the baking, Ivy was more subervising and eating the extra brownies. Aftter arriving at the caterer's business, Harley got out and helped the caterers load the brownies into their van while Ivy sat in their car eating more extra brownies as she was too lazy to help out.

After helping finish loading the van, Harley got back into the car. "All done Red. I sure hope this plan of yours work" Harley said as she started the car and started driving them back home. "It will work. Don't you trust your own family's recipe and my dopamine stimulant?" Ivy asked in a casual and confident tone. "Oh I do" Harley quickly replied. "Then relax" Ivy said. She then added, "Let's stop at McDonalds on the way home. I feel like having fast food for dinner" Ivy said. She loved fast food and was in the mood to celebrate. "Alright red" Harley agreed.

............................................................................ ................................................................................ .............................................................................

At the social, the caterers were pleased to see that all of the guests seemed to really enjoy the brownies. They quickly became popular among the guests through word of mouth. Almost everyone had one and some even had a couple. Even though she no longer had Bruce for a date, Selina was still invited to the social and she was still sure going to go bed. She decided to arrive late to make her entrance and an entrance she had. All eyes were on her as she descened the stairs to the party. She looked beautiful with her long raven hair down, her makeup done prettily, and a beautiful silky black dress that hugged and flaunted her figure. She carried a small purse with her. She was pleased to catch the eyes of some of Gotham's wealthy single men. Though she had said nothing to Harley about her belly, she was a little self concious about it and so she sucked it in as she made her entrance.

Selina immediately made her way over to the bar where she ordered a strawberry daquiri. She recieved her drink, thanked the bartender, and glanced around the party to see who was around. One of gotham's wealthy bachelors made his way over to her with a couple of brownies. He offered her a brownie saying it was really good before beginning to talk and flirt with him. She accepted the brownie and took a bite. She had to admit the guy was right, it was delicious. She quickly ate the brownie while talking and flirting back with the guy for a bit. The guy was a bit old for her so she moved on after talking with him for a bit. She walked around the room, mingling with different people while nursing her daquri. As she talked with some more wealthy bacheeleors a mix of some closer to her age and more of the old type, she found herself glancing over at the brownie trays from time to time. Her black painted lips smiled, driving out of Wayne Manor's impressive parkway. Ivy snorted haughtilly again, "Thought so."

And so, the criminal's confections were soon spread lightly throughout the social standings of Gotham. They were served at a handfull of Socials, a few plays, and even a girlscout meeting or two. Ivy and Harley had accumulated a certain wealth, enough to live peacefully in their new lifestyle anyway, and things remained peaceful at their household.

However, things were beginning to change in Gotham, namely the wealthiest of the wealthy...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------
Week Four, Party Eighteen:

Dick Grayson escorted the lovely Barbara Gordon (better known as Nightwing and Oracle, respectively) to this next outing. While the two posed as a couple, they were really running recon for the strange occurrences that had been surrounding the richer population.

Barbara wheeled her way around the floor, hoping that her wheelchair wasn't leaving skidmarks that would ruin the elegant tile. She was dressed in a salmon-colored evening dress, and her 'date' adorned a designer tuxedo with blue lining, his long hair tied back into a pony tail. "I still don't see why this is so important, Barb." Grayson mumbled, it wasn't that he disliked being with Barbara, it just seemed that they seemed to do a lot more dancing at these things than actual research. "Oh come on, Dick." Barbara pleaded her childhood companion, "Is it so bad to be seen with me around your arm?"

Dick couldn't help but lose his tongue, she always had that effect on him. "Fine, just keep your eyes open, and not on my chest." he quipped back finally. She raised an eyebrow, "Fine, but no promises." she teased.

On the far side of the room, one of their main reasons for recon had spent almost the entire evening picking things from the complementary buffet; Selina Kyle.

The much pudgier Selina Kyle examined the confection dreamilly, her plump lips open slightly as her lovely eyes scanned it. She knew something this delectible had to have strings attached, and her weight was certainly becoming a very thick string, but she didn't really care. This treats were too good to watch her waistline. Selina popped the pastry into her mouth, eagerly picking out another victim. Her eyes travelled towards the donation sign

"Still anonymous?" she asked herself, "Too bad, I might have considered donating to their cause..."

As she ate her next prize, Selina's double chin exaggerated itself as she chewed. Her thick booty wobbled as she moved to the other end of the table, and the eyes of once-jealous (but equally large) sociallites turned away, the only thing she had on them now was all that money. "Judging by her size, it all goes to food..." an obviously fake english accent caught her ears...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------
Posion Ivy laughed somewhat maniacly, sending her entire body into a massive sensation of jiggling. She had finally hit the big time, and all she had to do was put some pollen in some food, how ironic after all her hard work! Harley couldn't help but laugh too, only because she was easilly impressionable and was just happy that Ivy had calmed down a bit.

While everyone else had slowly ballooned over the past few weeks, Ivy hadn't gained too terribly much over the past few weeks. Instead of having to special order new sweats to lounge around in, she just stretched the ones she had to the limit. And instead of blowing all of her money on food, she actually saved up enough to buy Harley a new makeup set.

Today, they were lounging around like always. The two villains had decided that instead of spending this time apart, today they should sit down and enjoy eachother... as friends

"So... So that's how I got the name 'The BackSeat'!" she puffed, long lost her breath from laughing so hard.

Every now and then the blubber nearly suffocated her, causing her to unwillingly wake up with a jolt. However, she always managed to meander back to slumberville... Until dawn, that is.

Harley's comically stereotypical snores blended in with Ivy's log-sawing almost harmoniously. The smaller of the two currently laying face-first in her friend's flab. Without warning, though, Ivy's gelatinous form shifted in her sleep, forcing Harley's head from her stomach and knocking her to the floor with a thud

It took the blonde girl a few minutes to fully realize that she had been knocked aside by Ivy's bum, and even longer to realize that she was fully awake now. Harley rubbed her head, "Oww..." she whimpered to herself.

Fortunately she concluded that she had no more brain damage than usual and brushed herself off, rising to her feet. Harley turned to face Ivy, or rather IVy's rear. Things came back to Harley from the night before slowly as she started on her breakfast; the laughing, the money, the television... how unbelievabley soft Ivy's tummy was... Harley couldn't help but giggle, that was probably the best non-medicated sleep she'd ever had! And it was all thanks to...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------
"Red..." she soothed, trying to wake her corpulent cohort. Ivy continued snoring loudly

"Re~ed..." Harley tried again sweetly, rubbing her friend's massive muffintop lovingly

Ivy continued to go on with her sleep, uninterrupted in the slightest by her friend's calls of breakfast

Harley stood up straight, a forefinger to her chin curiously. "What was tat Mistah J usetah do ta wake me up?" she asked herself aloud, after a couple of seconds she got her answer; Grabbing Ivy's green nose so she couldn't breath.

Surely enough, Ivy woke up startled and out of breath. "Harley?!" she asked, exasperated at her friend's antics, "What time is it?" she asked groggily. As soon as she could breath through her nose, however, Ivy's nostrils caught waft of something grand. Something like waffles, whipped cream, toast, strawberries, all the breakfast delicacies that Ivy adored; all laid plainly on the kitchen counter.

"Wha?" she asked, half curious and half starved

Harley bounced over to the feast that she painstakingly laid out for her gluttonous friend, presenting it like she had seen so many Wheel-of-Fortune prize girls present before. "Ta-dah!" she chimed (off-key) "I thought ya'd be hungry, so I made my bestest buddie brekkie!"

Ivy was stunned, she never expected anything like this. "How long did it take you to make this, Harley?!" she asked, heaving herself from the couch, "It looks... edible!"

While Harley wore clean clothes, she wouldn't admit that in her room lay two pairs of batter-stained clothes from some of her failures over the last few hours at this banquet. She was in a simple pair of playing-card pajama pants and a black tee, nothing special. Nothing... too odd.

"Oh tis is nothin'!" she nonchalantly waved away her question, "Thought I'd do somethin' nice for ya, I know how hard ya work at makin' us money." she flattered her friend, who drooled as she waddled towards her prize. "Th-thank you Harl!" Ivy said, not exactly sure how to take a token of kindness anymore. She hesitated, but locked her thin companion in a big bear hug, her massive top half suffocating Harley.

"I-It's nothin'!" Harley stuttered, "Now dig in, b'fore it gets cold!"

Ivy didn't need to be told twice, she grabbed a piece of butter-soaked toast and shoved it into her mouth before she even plopped down in her seat. Immediately following, she grabbed her knife and fork (laid out courtesy of Harley) and began mutilating her waffles, greedilly wolfing down her sustenance. Next to her sat a glass of apple juice, the jug placed just barely within her reach (to not draw suspicion). Her cheeks grew flushed with excitement, she never knew Harley could cook this well!

The plump vegetation woman travelled a little to the west of her waffles, seeing a whole bowl of strawberries. Two porky fingers pinched one and placed it between her plump lips, taking a bite of the fruit, and placed the rest on top of the butter smeared across her waffle. Harley, who had remained silently watching from the counter, reached over and placed a serving-spoon sized glob of whipped-cream on top of said strawberry. "Righta-roonie!" she smiled, "Enjoy Red, I'm gonna take a shower!"

But it was no use reaching Ivy, she was lost in her glut.

Harley skipped off, taking enough time to look back at her friend's badonkadonk booty. "I hope you get big and squishy~!" she said very quietly, continuing her romp down the apartment's hallway soon after getting an eyefull of her friend's many rolls.

Taking it as a sign, she decided against going further into Ivy's fat; "I'll get'ta that later..." she whispered to herself, "Gotta reply to that Malone guy...."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------
Ivy awoke to the smell of baking and cuisine; that was three times today, not that her shameless gluttony minded.

On the ovaltine coffeetable that acted as the living room centerpiece sat another decadent meal. Lasagnia, garlic bread, a side of linguini and stroganauff, a basket of rolls and breadsticks, and sausage all somehow crammed onto that table.

Ivy's mouth watered, again.

"Hey Harl?!" she bellowed from her seat, a little curious as to why fine fods had been showing up in front of her all day; it was like someone ripped a page from her metaphorical diary. Ivy pushed aside the thick blanket, almost losing her breath from that simple act of exertion. She could hear the clammor of a plate placed on a hard countertop and a knife scraping against something metal.

"And brownies for dessert!" Harley cheered, placing the final piece to Ivy's fattening puzzle, "The regular ones, I'm makin' another couple'a dozen batches for the sociallites in Mrs. Katrowskie's room downstai's."

Ivy looked back up at Harley, "You sure do seem to like baking lately, Harl." she raised one of her fiery eyebrows, picking up a brownie. "What can I say?" Harley replied nonchalantly, "I'mma girl'a many talents!" As Ivy took a bite of Harley's confection, her face instantly lightened up. "I'll say you are Harl, thank you!"

After four months since the initial launch of her Catering Businesss (or about two and a half since the last chapter :D) their business was booming. They could afford almost anything their hearts could desire, short of a clean record in Gotham and a home plastic surgery kit.

For four blissful months, Harley Quinn watched from behind the oven as Ivy swelled and swelled into the blob that sat before her today, unable to think of much more than eating whenever food was placed in front of her.

Today, like any other day, Ivy was zoned out in front of the television as Harley fiddled with an ever-fattening snack for her friend, humming merrily as she did so. She examined Ivy's backfat, resting heavilly on the backboard of the apartment's couch, she tensed a little at the thought of it becoming even thicker and larger.

For probably the third time this morning, Harley's baby blue eyes traversed Ivy's massive body with a lusty gaze. She was positively enormous.

Ivy's stomach dropped halfway down the couch, covering her long-forgotten crotch with it's thick apron of flab. It had so many rolls, and cellulite packed itself at the farther regions of it's acre. Crudely smacked on top was her naval, the lone sinkhole on the trail that was Ivy's belly. She couldn't even wrap her hands around it anymore, it was simply massive!

Above her, swollen cheeks took up a good majority of her face, only further crowded by the three chins she had blossomed. Below that, neck long forgotten, and breasts a bundle. They were gigantic, definately beyond 'hooters' or 'melons' in any sense of the terms. The drooped to either side of her gut, gravity finally proving victorious over the mammaries.

All of Ivy was supported by an equally large, if not somewhat larger base. Her legs were weak and flabby, her behind corpulant and jiggly. Whenever she got up, Harley always made sure to sneak a peak at her rarely seen heavy green orbs of butt blubber. All of Ivy had become exactly like her ass in every sense; Weak, flabby, and heavy. Ivy had become nearly spherical

"Alrighty Red!" Harley picked up the heavy platter, "Cookies?"

The green woman grunted something incoherent in her newer, much huskier and demanding tone. As Harley pranced over to her, Ivy eagerly began stuffing herself. She was a complete beast, unable to control that massive appetite of hers.
