Again, she retreated to the kitchen to fetch the beast a beverage. She picked it out of the fridge, 2% milk like she asked for. Back at the couch, Harley put the jug down in Ivy's reach. It didn't take long for Ivy's trained maw to demolish the batch of cookies, and she immediately uttered a simple sentence,

"Urp.... Is there -morp- any more?"

Harley's smile widened, a smile so wide was only reserved for whenever the Joker was in the mood. "A
course!" With haste, she came back with a bag of barbecue chips; they were hers, but whatever. Harley was just glad to [i}help{/i} Ivy's poor appetite.

"You're... -urp- You're fattening me up, right?" she asked sarcastically, "This is... -huff- You're spoiling me... and I can't- wheeze... seem to-"

Harley shushed her, "What? You're as good-lookin' as eva!" Harley cooed, tapping Ivy's round cheek, "Maybe a little bigga', but hey, nothin' wrong wit a healthy appetite!"

Ivy wheezed, swallowing a nearby Tums, "Yeah... you're right..."

For a while, nothing much else was said beyond the television's incessant blaring and the grumble and moans of Ivy's gluttony. "Mph... So.... So good." Ivy had to struggle to catch her breath a lot more lately, with her added bulk and whatnot it was very understandable.

Her plump hand tapped the bottom of the bag over her awaiting maw, armfat jiggling with her small movements. Every last crumb was sure to fall into Ivy's mouth, lest she miss one and Bud or Lou tear up the house looking for it. She was satisfied, belched, and fell back to relaxing.

"Anythin' else?"

Ivy belched again, "-orp- Well.... No, I'm... I'm good." she yawned, falling into another one of her mid-day/post-snack naps. Harley took her chance, the young blonde cuddled up to her personal plant-whispering food dispener. She sighed lovingly, resting her head on Ivy's prominant gut and falling fast asleep with her.

She smiled to herself as she heard Ivy greedily stuff bite after bite of the brownie down her throat. That's my girl she thought to herself proudly. She rode the elevator down to the lobby and walked over to her mailbox, She pulled out her key, opened it, pulled out the mail, closed it, and locked it again. She then rode the elevator back up to her room. She glanced through the letters and one in particular caught her eye, it was from the Gotham Elite Society.

As soon as she walked back into her apartment, Harley quickly tore open the envelope, and pulled out the letter. It read as follows:

Dear Ms. Isley and Ms. Quinn,

On behalf of the Gotham Elite Society, we would like to invite you both to our social next saturday the 28th. We are very impressed with the growth of your business in the 4 months since you started it. We wish you both continued success with your business. In honor of the success of the business, we would like to welcome you in as members of our society. Please rsvp and let us know if you can make it as soon as possible. Thank you.
Sincerely,
Gotham Elite Society

Harley could barely contain her excitement and was jumping up and down. She had always wanted to go to one of these socials. She had no doubt that Ivy would want to go as she loved socials. She had grown up with them, attending them from the time she was a little girl on until her accident and change to a life of crime. Ivy had just finished eating all of the brownies. She licked the chocolate off her fingers and lips as she noticed Harley jumping up and down. "What (huff) has got you (huff) so excited?" Ivy asked. Ivy was always a little winded and had a little trouble after stuffing herself with food. She then washed the brownies down with the rest of her milk as she waited for Harley's reply.

"We are finally on top Red. We get invited to the Gotham Elite Society's social for next Saturday the 28th, isn't that great? We are the elite! I finally get to go to a social and you finally get to go to one again" Harely said excitedly, hardly able to contain her glee.

A small smile sprouted over Ivy's chubby cheeks, "About time they ...-puff- invited some real women to...orp... out!" she chuckled to herself lightly, picturing the shock all those hoity-toity aristocrats would recieve when they realized that Poison Ivy was officially among their ranks. Her hands shifted to her stomach, now picturing the decadent buffet that was sure to be there.

Harley smiled too, she had never actually been to a social event among the higher-ups of Gotham (well, never invited, anyway; nor had she stayed long enough to enjoy the entree's) Her painted lips grew wider and wider with glee, this could open up so many doors for her and Ivy. They could finally have a normal life, a better life...

"Hey, Harl." Ivy snapped her blubbery fingers in front of Harley's button nose, snapping her out of the near minute long trance she had wandered into, "You... you alright?" she asked, genuine concern detectable within her thick voice.

"Oh, yeah, I'm fine." Harley smiled, "You lookin' forward to it, Red?" she asked, entire body tense at the mear thought of a normal life with her best friend. "Of course I am." she responded, flipping off the television, "Time for Gotham to see that we're... we're just as -orp- good...mph... oh... forget it, you know." she struggled to sit normally nowadays, a part played in no thanks short to Harley's cuisine and Ivy's slothliness.

Ivy grabbed the remote, having already given up her ambitions of getting up for tonight, and turned on the television once again. "Let's not... mphah... Go start on dinner please... something slimming." She grunted.

"A'course Red," Harley obeyed with a wicked glimmer in her eye as she glanced Ivy's pale green flesh pouring over the couch, "Anythin' you say."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------
"No, no, no!" Harley barked, "It's gotta be bigger, tat's nevah gonna fit Ivy!"

The small tailor nodded vigorously, unravelling more and more fabric. "W-Will this suffice?" he whimpered, fearful of this young jersey girl's temper. She seemed somewhat dangerous.

Quinn held out her arms the best she could, mentally picturing just how big Ivy's belly had gotten, "Yeah, sure, if she goes on a diet!" she growls, "GET MORE!"

Harley had researched the finest tailors in Gotham in search of their party attire, she had already had to hog-tie an old woman today, enough of a setback in her 'normal' plans. She certainly didn't want to have to off this old guy. He was a really little guy too, little enough to make Harley feel guilty about squishing him.

In his hands, Arnold held out a very leniant fabric. It was floral print, of course, leaves outlined and flowers filled with a certain faded amber quality. It was suppossed to be stretchy, that way Harley could gawk at how it clung to Ivy's tummy, but allow the latter to gorge herself without the mental stress of ripping her dress. The lighter she thought she was the better.

"Alright, I think tat'll work." Harley reluctantly concluded that he had gotten just enough to cover the expansive belly in question. Arnold sighed, until he heard the next words out of his customer's mouth, "And now for the layas."

"P-P-Perhaps we should... focus on your dress for now, Ms. Quinzelle?" he mumbled nervously

Harley grumbled, "When we get the third laya done, and you betta make tis dress backless."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------
"What are you crazy?" Harley cheered from outside the bathroom, "Ya look great!"

Ivy grimaced, her chins creasing with displeasure, "Are you kidding?" she huffed, "It's... It's huge!"

Harley did her best to remain calm, "Hey, it's the style." she reasoned, "All the girls're wearin' dresses big, whattaya gonna do?" Ivy emerged from the bathroom slowly, her expansive wideness nearly trapping her in the doorway. She was right, the dress was huge.

It had the afformentioned pattern, but it was quite distorted over Ivy's generous curvage. The leaves looked more like Elephant Ear Leaves than the simple autumn variety they had were intended to be. Over her ass, there was no pattern, only the lattermost shade of green exactly half-way verticly down the dress with amber piping under the arms and over her huge thighs. It had a slit down the train of the dress, exposing her chubby legs and sagging knees, as well as a generous amount of her cellulite. And, just to Harley's specifications, the dress' backless quality allowed not only her cleavage to spill out, but also allow her superflous backfat to flow freely along the creases.

"It makes my ass look gigantic." Ivy pouted, a little self concious over her self-justified little weight problem, in truth she very much wanted to go, just to be the best looking girl there.

'Tat's because it is gigantic...' Harley muttered under her breath

"What was that?" Ivy snapped back, having caught a slight breeze of her comment

"O-Oh nothin' Red!" Harley stuttered, "I said that you look gorgeous... and that your ass was small yet perky!"

Ivy's perma-blush couldn't go much deeper, but she was very touched. "Oh... thank you, Harl." she smiled, "You -urp- you look great, too."

Harley, however, even with makeup on, could still blush. "O-Oh really?" she turned away slightly, "I was a little upset tat I, uh... wen'up a few sizes..." Ivy laughed, driving her belly wild with a jiggling sensation, "Nothing wrong with a -huff- healthy appetite, right?" Ivy quoted Harley's own words, used to comfort her.

Harley smiled, "Yeah, I guess yer right..." she started towards the door, "Come on, let's party!" she cheered
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Night of  Socialites (Or: Plus-Sized Party Girls)

choices: Ivy continues talking with Penguin who gets her to eat/Harley talks with Riddler
Bruce Wayne arrives with a heavier Selina Kyle
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Harley and Ivy enjoyed a limo ride over ot the social. Ivy was disapointed that there was no food in the limo but enjoyed a couple of strawberry daquris instead which she found she quite liked. Harley allowed herself to have a couple strawberry daquiris herself as she was nervous about going to her first social and needed a little liquid encouragement. They arrived at the social a short time later. The girls were let out of the car by the driver and proceeded into the hotel. They got onto an elevator which they rode to the top floor where the social was being held. Harley was so glad for elevators as she knew there was no longer any way that Ivy could get up stairs anymore. Ivy also was for the first time in her life very grateful for the elevator as well as she just didn't seem to have the energy for stairs anymore.

The elevator dinged as the door slide open. Harley and Ivy linked arms as they slowly walked off the elevator and into the party. All eyes were on them with looks of welcome and smiles. The girls had linked arms as a form of solidarity as they both were a little nervous and just because they were friends. They both instantly felt at ease as they realized they were welcome. Everyone there knew who they were, the new members, and they were given a round of applause. The girls acknowledged the recognition with smiles and royalty like waves. "They like us, they really like us" Harley whispered excitedly into Ivy's ear.

Both girls then separted and began to go around the room. They introduced themselves to a mix of wealthy couples and wealthy single men. They even flirted with the wealthy single men no matter if they were good looking or not or at least Ivy did. Harley had been a little worried that Ivy's weight would cause her a problem with men but she quickly saw that she had no reason to worry. Despite her weight gain, Ivy was still gorgeous, and the most beautiful woman in the room. Also, the other women in the room had all gained considerable amounts of weight so it wasn't like Ivy could be singled out and ridiculed. It was a little dishearing to Harley that even fat Fat Ivy was more attractive then her but she had to agree. She also had to admit it that it excited her that Ivy still looked hot fat and it encouraged her to continue fatting Ivy up.

One of the single wealthy men that Ivy ended up was "reformed criminal and business man" the Penguin. Even though Penguin was not the most handsomet guy even for a villian and had a gut himself, he was still attracted to the skinny super-model girls. Though with his money he was able to get with a few of these girls, he wasn't able to get with alot of him. He had always thought that Poison Ivy was super hot like most men but he found her even more attractive with the extra weight. He figured with her being heavier than him, it was less likely that she would leave him. He also thought it might be a good idea to make her gain just to be doubly sure. "Hello my dear, may I buy you a drink?" Oswald Cobblepot aka the Penguin asked Ivy after making his way over to her. "Sure, that would be lovely" Ivy said as she blew some of her poullen on him.

Another so called "reformed criminal and business man" Edward Ngyma aka the Ridder was also at the social. He had been surprised by how many of the socialites had gained weight but found the extra weight to suit them well. He had always that that Harley Quinn had been attractive but now with the couple of pounds she had gained, she was even more attractive if that was even possible. She had always been so infatuated with the Joker that he thought he would never have a chance with her. She was here alone and he hard heard that she was living with Ivy now. Maybe she was over the Joker. Edward made his way over to Harley. "Hi Harley, how are you?" he asked. "Hi Edward. I am doing really good thanks. How are you?" Harley replied. While she was not completely sure that Edward was completely reformed, she did feel quite sure that he was talking to her because he wanted to. It was the first time in her life she got the feeling that a guy liked her and it made her feel good. She wasn't sure exactly what kind of like this was but it was a start at least.

choices: Ivy's Date with Penguin goes great, she heads to his place, Harley's flops
Harley's date picks up, Ivy's is a dissappointment...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
The portly couple of reformees soon headed over to the obvious; the bar. Oswald had some trouble navigating Ivy's bulk through the room, especially keeping her from the buffet table long enough to work the old Cobblepot Magic.

Soon enough, both of their plump rearends were seated, ordering immediately...

Ivy sipped her drink, the strong scent of strawberries, barnuts, and bitter alcohol wafting into her trained nostrils. She loved the taste of anything fruity, especially when it was doused in liquor. "So, Pengy, I see you're -huff-... legit now?" Ivy teased her current suitor with a wiggle of her porky fingers around the martini glass.

Oswald's wire-thin lips formed a crooked smile, "I've been legitamite for quite some time now, Ms. Isely."

"Please, call me Pam." Ivy's hummed, her surly tone was as enticing as ever. "Pam," Cobblepot raised a curious eyebrow behind his monicle, "Would you care for something to eat?"

"That depends... Ozzy," Ivy sloshed her drink lightly, "What'cha got?"

Oswald gingerly grabbed her portly hand in his own, struggling to get past his sizable nose. "Anything you want, my dear." he layed on the sugar thick, hoping that his bottomless "charm" would woo the massive woman.

"I like the sound of that, Pengy." Ivy smiled, finishing off her drink and placing it delicately down on the bar.

Clack, Penguin's dress shoes clicked as his portly shape fell from the barstool to the floor, his hat still barely peaking over Ivy after standing on his feet. He held out his hand, gesturing her to grab it, "Then shall we retire to the dining table?" Ivy's stomach gurgled slightly, her nostrils flexed, and her mouth beginning to salivate; she was getting excited.

"Mhmm... We shall."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------
Harley stood with Nygma by the stairway, star-crossed from her green-skinned partner and her corpulant courier. While Ivy was getting somewhat excited, Harley's 'date' had a lot less potential.

Mostly, things were akward between the two. Sure, she and Edward had traded casual glances on Joker's semi-regular, almost bi-weekly poker night; but things hadn't evolved much due to the Clown Prince of Crime's interaction with his "Poo". She did see him sneak a few glances at her rump a few times, but she only assumed that it was a mistake on her part. The last guy she squealed on for checking her out ended up in the river with trace amounts of Joker Toxin in his blood...

"So..." Edward could barely think, he couldn't take his eyes off of Harley's shapely rump, "Riddle me this, Where's the J-Man?"

Harley turned away, uncomfortable with answering such a question. "Last I heard he was dead." she quipped, knowing full well that the same thing had been said many a time before about Gotham's Prodigal Clown. Truthfully, she hadn't thought much of her Puddin' in a long time, their last falling out was quite a doozy.
But the past was the past... even if she had said that before. She hadn't thought about it, maybe there was a future out there for her?

Riddler let out what could only be a cross between a girlish giggle and a nervous chuckle. "Y-Yeah, that sounds a lot like Joker." Even when speaking, Nygma's eyes were locked onto Harley's hips, her thighs, and that lovely ass of hers.

Harley grumbled, she knew the dress was tight, but Eddy's pants were a lot tighter than before they started this little conversation. "Hey, Nygma." Harley cleared her throat, "Eyes're up here." Gotham's riddling, question mark obsessed lunatic jumped up nervously, "S-S-Sorry." he stuttered, Harley rolled her eyes.

Maybe not.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Double Date (A Terribly Forced Chapter...)

choices: Penguin Feeds Ivy for most of the night/Harley eats more brownies before bed
Skip to Next Morning
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Ivy enjoys a great time with the Penguin. She finds him to be very smart, understand and suport her views, and be a fun, interesting, and entertaining coversationalist. She would smile and flirt with him at appropriate points during the coversation. Over the course of their coversation, Ivy ends up having two more strawberry daquiris and lots of the food at the social, mostly the brownies that she and Harley had made for the social. Oswald was surprised by how much he was turned on by watching Ivy eat and watching it add some more pounds to her lucious body. "Here, allow me" Oswald insisted at one point and began to feed Ivy the brownie. Both Oswald and Ivy thorughly enjoyed having him feed her and they did it a couple more times throughout the night. After a couple of hours, Oswald felt it was time to take the next step. "Would you care to come home with me tonight? I can assure you there will be more delicious food for you to enjoy" he said in a proper tone with a smile. "Oh yes, Pengy, I would love to" Ivy replied in her sweet and sexy tone. It was a mix of the promise of her getting more food and her actually liking the Penguin that made her agree. She quickly sent Harley a text on her iphone as fast as her chubby fingers would allow before heading out with the Penguin. They headed out to the elevators, rode it down to the lobby, and walked out to his limo which was waiting out front for them. They got in and headed back to the Penguin's mansion.

Ivy couldn't help but gasp as she saw the Penguin's mansion as their limo pulled up in front of it. In no way had she ever imagined it would be this beautiful. "Oh my god! Your place is lovely" Ivy said. "I'm glad you like it my dear but I am sure you will find the inside even more to your liking" Penguin said before the limo door was open by the driver. His dress shoes clicked again as he lifted his portly frame out of the limo. It took Ivy some energy and effort to get her bulk out of the car. She had to take a minute to catch her breathe afterwards. The Penguin was suprised by how much he liked Ivy being so out of shape in addition to her being so fat. Oswald then wrapped his arms around Ivy's soft and flabby waist the best he could before leading her inside his mansion. He gave her a very quick tour of the house due to her bad shape and his anxiousness to have some fun with her. The last stop of the tour was the bedroom. "Wow, very nice bedroom" Ivy purred flirtiously as seductively sauntered over to the bed. Penguin licked his lips as he watched her waddle to the bed, seeing all of her fat jiggle, especially her big butt. He also enjoyed hearing the bed groan under Ivy's weight as she laid down on it.

"Oh I am so hungry" Ivy purred flirtiously. "I will call for food immediately" the Penguin said before quickly racing off as fast as his portly frame could carry him. He returned a couple of minutes later. "Some food will be brought shortly my dear" He announced. "Great" Ivy replied in a sweet and sexy tone. She watched as the Penguin hung up his jacket and then headed into the bathroom. She couldn't help but giggle seeing his gut. The Penguin then returned in a loungue robe before walking over to the bed and laying down next to her. Ivy then moved to cuddle up close to him,enjoying the feeling of the soft warmth she recieved from their soft bodies being against each other. She moved her head to rest on his shoulder, closes her eyes, and sighed happily. She was really having a good time tonight. A smile spread across her face as she felt Oswald began to knead her belly fat. "I hope you don't mind" Oswald whispered into her ear. His long poiny nose touching her hair sent a shiver down her spine. "Not at all" she purred seductively.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------

While Harley appreciated that Edward was so attractive to her, it was also a bit of a turn off and a little freaky seeing him stutter around her nervously while getting a turn on at the same time as he stared at her. Edward got really nervous after that and didn't know what else to say. He seemed to stand around her nervously, trying to will with his mind a coversation to start with them again which was also a little freaky. He also continued to stare at her with a hopeful smile. Harley had finished her current drink while this occured. Needing a new drink and tired of Edward's stares, she made her way over to the bar, and got another strawberry daquiri. She drank it as she walked around the room, trying to talk with more people, particularily single wealthy Gotham bachelors. Unfortunately they all seemed to be matched up with a socialite by now and she felt Edward continuing to lear at her. So after she finished her drink, Harley headed back to the limo and rode it home. She had recieved a text from Ivy telling her that she was going home with the Penguin for the night. She was happy for her friend but she also wished that she had been able to go home with a guy as well or if not, at least then have Ivy come home with her so she could feed her more. She would have been equally happy with either of those, she just didn't want this going home alone. After changing into a pink t-shirt and a pair of greysweatpants, Harley fed her hyenas, watered Ivy's plants, then grabbed herself a small snack of a couple of brownies and a glass of milk. She set herself down in front of the tv, and turned it on. She watched some late night tv shows while enjoying her snack.

choices: Harley and Ivy wake hours later, discussing Ivy's night over lunch
Harley wakes up several hours later, her head propped on Ivy's tummy lovingly
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
The lard-laden lovebirds remained perched in Penguin's quarters all night, not leaving the silky confines of his egyptian cotton sheets. Not to say that the room was quiet, it was far from quiet. Oswald's boudouir was quite boistrous throughout the night, a few of his business associates and even the hired help could hear many groans, moans, and belches. Most of them belonging to his new 'acquaintance', Ms. Pamela Isely.

They were so loud, in fact, that no one within earshot got a wink of sleep. Penguin did, but only because he passed out with his shirt unbuttoned, he awoke to Ivy's blimping busom, and the two got right back to work.

Presently, it is five in the morning; Cobblepot's servants sit in his dining quarters, quite agitated at their employer's randy behavior. It was shocking, really. Most of his servants had a strong dislike of oneanother, the fact that something so trivial as sleep had bonded them together was a true testament to the couple's raunchiness.

"Ugh, I'm, like, so tired..." a usually buxom, dark-skinned woman leaned on the table. Dark Bags of sleep deprivation were present under her's, as well as everyone else's eyes. "We know, Miranda," a redheaded, somewhat aged woman snipped, "We all are."

"Like, don't you yell at me!" Miranda barked back, too tired to even raise her head from her supple arms. A rather elderly man stood near the door, still quite diligent in his butlering duties despite his own lack of sleep. "Miss Miranda, please refrain from raising your voice, Mr. Cobblepot does have company."

Speaking of which, everyone recognized the now familiar rocking sounds that could be heard from three floors down. Miranda wretched, Harriet gagged, and the butler in the corner remained somehow unaffected. And then the now customary cry of euphoria...

"OH OZZY!!" Ms. Isely's voice echoed throughout the estate, her thick pipes now sent shivers up the female members of the working shift. Oddly enough, they couldn't tell if it was a testament to the Penguin or the chef...

The younger of the two maids shivered, "How could, like, he find anyone willing to go up to his bedroom, I mean even if she was that big?" she finally lifted her head, her usually bright brown eyes remained dim with exhaustion, "I mean, he's not the best looking guy..."

Harriet blushed, "Oh he has his ways, he does have his ways..."

Miranda's head fell down to the table again, letting out a weak "Eww..."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------
Harley remained in her seat on the couch, more precisely it was Ivy's seat. She could tell by the large indent that refused to re-flate back to the original plush of the davenport. In her lap sat a well-worn batter bowl, some brown would be confection and a spoon still remain from the night before, as well as a smidgeon under her chin.

The television was blaring, some channel that Ivy had programmed it to record, and had been left there all night. Her sweatpants cut into a swollen tummy, the tiniest bit of weight swelling over the white elastic. Whatever the case, the usually hyperactive Harleen Quinzelle had been reduced to 'heavilly sedated Harleen Quinzelle' in a single night, something not even the highly acclaimed doctors of Arkham had managed.

The slumbering psychopath looked distraught, even in her sleep. Her brow was furrowed slightly, eyebrows plucked carefully in preperation for the night before pressed together due to bad dreams. She had obviously taken measures in going to bed, or was very bored before falling asleep; her nailpolish had been removed as was her makeup, her hair pulled back up into her informal pigtails.

Not even the lumbering of her rotund roomie woke her up, Poison Ivy making her entrance as quietly as a woman of her stature would allow. Even as she squeezed into the doorframe, and knocked the coffeepot to the floor with a stray lovehandle, Harley remained knocked clean out.

Ivy giggled, still giddy from the night before. Her giant stomach was even more distended with her consumption, never in her wildest ambitions did she ever think about eating so much food. All of it high class too; Filet Mignion, Cavier, Prime Rib Cuts, rich Starfruits, more teacakes than she could keep track of...

And boy was she stuffed. Barely able to waddle from the elevator to her apartment. Massive green stomach billowing out and falling further down her knees, taut like a drum. She let out a triumphant belch (still futile in waking Harley)

However, that didn't stop her from reaching over and plucking the batter from Harley's grip, letting her lax grip fall over dead to her side.

She let out a low growl, hungrilly glaring at the batter; she had definately learned to appreciate food in bed.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: How to Stop Caring and Love Noisy Dinner Foreplay

choices: Harley offers Ivy dessert which Ivy accepts
Ivy takes a nap while Harley gets started on widening the apartment for Ivy
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Ivy waddled back to her bedroom carrying the bowl of batter, planning on eating it in bed. She managed to squeeze through the doorway into her room, made her way over to her bed, and slowly laid down on it. She didn't notice how her bed groaned under weight as she laid down on it. As soon as she had situated herself back against her pillow, she greedily dug into the batter, eating it with her fingers, pigging out. "Mm, so good" she moaned softly. She really had learned to love and appreciate eating in bed. She ended up eating the rest of the batter before quickly passing out due to her long night of eating.

............................................................................ ................................................................................ .........................................................................

Harley woke up some time later. It took her a couple of seconds to get her bearings. Remembering that she had passed out while snacking and watching tv, she saw that her bowl of batter was gone and tv shut off. Ivy must have come home from her late Harley realized. She also figured that Ivy must have stolen the batter from her. She was glad for this for two reasons. One because she had already eaten a little too much and two because she rather Ivy eat it and have her grow fatter. Figuring that Ivy would be waking up soon, Harley decided to make breakfast.

She got up from the couch, stretched, then headed into the bathroom to freshen up a bit. She went pee and then washed her face. She then headed back into the kitchen to make something for lunch. She wasn't worried about making too loud of noises since Ivy was a deep sleeper. She proceeded to make alot of mac and cheese, toasted some bread, and got out some sodas.

Ivy was woken by the smell of macaroni and cheese at just about the time it was ready. Despite eating so much, after her sleep, she was feeling very hungry again. With some great effort, she got up, squeezed herself out of her room, and waddled towards the kitchen. She didn't give a second thought to freshinng herself up, she just wanted food.

Harley couldnd't help but smile seeing Ivy even bigger than the night before with her green belly very round and prominent come into the living room. "Hey Red, just in time. I was about to call you to lunch. I made mac and cheese" she said.

"Thanks Harl. I am starving" Ivy said as she waddled over to the table and took a seat in one of the chairs. The chair groaned under her weight and seemed a little untable. Ivy didn't notice this but Harley did, much to her delight. "So how was your night girl?" Harley asked her friend curiously as she brought over the bowls of macaroni and cheese. She had a big one for Ivy and a smaller one for herself.

"Thank you" Ivy said as Harley brought over the food. She took a couple sips of her soda before eagerly digging into her marcaroni and cheese. "Mm, so good" she moaned softly. "Last night was amazing. I never realized just how charming Oswald Cobblepot can be. He really knows how to treat a woman and spoil her with good friends. He is actually pretty good looking. After we left the party, we went back to his place, he gave me a quick tour, then spent the rest of the night in bed. It's not what you think though, I just ate the rest of the night, a mix of him feeding me, and me feeding myself as he rubbed my belly. It was soo nice" Ivy moaned soflty as she conitnued to enjoy her macaroni and cheese. She continued to stuff bite after bite down her throat, only stopping occasonally for sips of her soda. "How was your night?" Ivy asked Harley.

Harley was happy that Ivy had a great time last night and even happier that she ate so much. Maybe it wouldn't be so bad if Ivy started to see Oswald if he was going to feed her. She had no doubt that if they both continued to feed Ivy lots she would get very fat very quickly which was an exciting thought to her. "I had a fun time at the party. Unfortunately I didn't click with any guys. I talked with Edward Nygema but he is just a little weird and a little too obsessed with me you know?" Harley said as she ate her plate of macaroni and cheese.

"Aw, I'm sorry Harl" Ivy said with an apologetic smile in between bites of her macaroni and cheese. Before long Ivy had finished her whole plate. She then used the bread to lick up the cheese and ate it before washing it down with the rest of her soda. "Mm, that was delicious" she moaned softly, laying back in her chair, rubbing her bloated belly.

Harley finished off her own plate of macaroni and cheese while starting at Ivy's fat belly lovingly. Ivy was so lost in her stuffed extcasy that she failed to notice Harley's stares. She is going to get so fat, Oswald and I are going to make sure of it she thought to herself as she drank more of her soda. She planned to call Oswald later and work out a plan with him so that they would both be fattening Ivy.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Harley and Ivy wake hours later, discussing Ivy...

choices: Being spoiled rotten and fed like a queen with a tapeworm makes Ivy a fat snob
Later, Harley visits the slums and sees the 'expanding' criminal population
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Ivy belches loudly, just like she usually does after a large meal prepared by her jestered sister in arms, "Ohh..." she moaned, pudgy fingers massaging the pale green dome that was her overstuffed, literally blown taut belly, "That was good." Harley smiled at this, she always appreciated Ivy's ever-growing sense of taste. Even though it was a low-class meal that she had learned in her poverty, Harley knew that Ivy was far too greedy to turn down any food whether it be prime-rib or steakums.

The massive green woman pat her stomach a little dumbly, "Alright, I think I'll... I'll situate myself on the couch..." Ivy huffs as she futily attempts to heave herself from the poor overloaded seat, "Time for.... Botany Hour..."

Before Harley could stop herself, she found that her lips had seperated without her consent; they let out a "Wait."

It sounded lax, like she hadn't quite figured out what she was going to stall Ivy with yet, which she hadn't. Regardless, the stuffed ex-con turned her chubby cheeks to her roomate. "Hm?" her thick voice hummed, "Wha?"

Harley grinned sheepishly, remembering the pan of brownies that she had baked for Ivy earlier yesterday morning, "I've got some brownies tat ya haven't eaten yet..." she choked out the words like a frightened child, "Ya wanna split 'em?"

Ivy's round face broke out a small, elegant smile. She saw that Harley just wanted to spend some time with her, something that she neglected to think about with all of that... "Mmmm... food..." Ivy's voice came out somewhat trancesque, it had become lower and much more sultry with her widened neck. She didn't mean to say that, it just sort of popped out.

"'Kay!" Harley nearly jumped out of her seat to get the delicious morsels from the fridge. Ivy didn't notice the younger girl's enthusiasm now, her stomach commanded her brain now: commanded it to eat. Ivy's nostrils flared as soon as the chocolate aroma filled the air. Even for cold brownies, the smell was still strong enough to get Ivy excited without even having to see them.

"Ya know," Harley tried her best to make small talk with Ivy, in effect lightening the mood between her and the glutton, "Mrs. Katrowskie's complainin' that we fattened up her and 'er girls, funny huh?"

Scratch that: Harley was desperate to make conversation. Even she knew that wasn't funny, nor was it interesting. The redheaded feedbag had been turned on, her eyes glass with lust and greed for those sweets. Her stomach gurgled, Harley couldn't tell if it was a sign of emptiness or that it was filled beyond capacity. Either way, Ivy was getting those brownies.

She tried to reach over her own gut, it proved futile as her immense front side wedged itself between her reach, she grunted and huffed like a spoiled child trying to reach an inaccessable toy. Harley couldn't stand it, Red was so cute when she got like that. She had to do something, and something she did.

The blonde got up, picking up a chunk of the pan's contents with her hand along the way. Her bright baby blues locked onto Ivy's squinched green eyes, they looked at her angrilly. "What?" Ivy huffed, eyes finding some way to narrow themselves even further, "What's up?"

Harley playfully shoved the brownie into her friend's mouth, giggling girlishly, "Tat's what!" she laughed, scampering off to the latter half of the room, which put her behind the couch. Ivy rebuttled by tossing a paper plate like a frisbee at Harley's head. It ended up breaking a lamp and giving Harley a nasty shock which put the Cupid of Crime in a bedridden state for the rest of the day.

Ivy felt no remorse, "She started it."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Fillabuster (Shortest Chapter Yet)

choices: One month later
Harley wakes up, remembers what happened, and thinks of her revenge
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Ivy didn't feel any remore for what she did to Harley as she had gotten used to being spoiled and felt like a queen. She had found it really enjoyable and found herself acting more like a queen while thinking of Harley more as her servant. So when Harley did something she iddn't like, she was going to react with force. She could see from her chair that Harley would be out for awhile. It was just as well to Ivy as it would allow her to eat in peace. She had been able to tell that Harley would want to take while she ate her brownies and Ivy just wanted to eat in piece. Ivy greedily grabbed one of the brownies and showed it into her mouth and swallowing it. She began to stuff brownie after brownie down her throat, not bothering to stop. The chocolatey taste was so good that all she wanted was omre of it and not only want more of it but need more of it statisy her cravings. She continued to stuff brownie after brownie down her throat until she had eaten all of them. She then licked the chocolate off her fingers and then her ilps.

It was then that it hit her of just how stuffed she really was. Her green belly was even more bloated then before and pressing more against the table causing her a little discomfort in addition to the pain she felt from being so stuffed. She closed her eyes and moaned softly, gently moving her hands to her bloated belly and began to gently rub it. She could both feel and her her stomach grumbling and growing as it began to digest all of what she had just eaten. She found herelf breathing a little heavily from having eaten so much. The pain of the table into her belly was really starting to get to her but she realized that she was too stuffed to move and had no energy. Knowing that she couldn't stand the pain, she moved her hands from her belly to the table and with all her strength which wasn't much as all eating and being lazy had weakned her, she was able to manage to push herself just enough away from the table so that it wasn't still hitting her belly anmore.

Ivy breathed out a sigh of relief as she laid back in her chair and resumed massaging her swollen gut. She moaned softly as she sat there rubbing her belly, enjoying the feeling of being so stuffed. She sat there for awhile, allowing the food to digest for a bit before trying to get up. After a while, she placed her hands on the back of the chair and began to slowly heave herself from the chair. It took her a great amount of energy and she felt herself huffing as she got up. She had to take a minute to catch her breathe after getting up. Shen then slowly waddle over to the tv. Luckily "Botany Hour" was having a marathon today so she didn't have to worry that she missed seeing the show at it's usual starting time. Seeing Harley unconcious on her seat on the couch in front of the tv, Ivy was not pleashed. She pushed Harley off the couch who just laid sprawled out on the floor, Ivy then collasped down on the couch, oblivious to it's groaning under her weight. She then picked up the tv remote which was on the side of the couch, turned on the tv, and tuned it to "Botany Hour". She then laid back and began to watch her show while rubbing her bloated belly. Though she found the show very interesting, she was finding herself getting sleepy due to all she had just eaten and eventually passed out ina stuffed induced slumber.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Being spoiled rotten and fed like a queen with ...

choices: the same ol' Harleen Quinzelle. Thin and Perky as ever!
Harleen Quinzelle, about four hundred pounds of giggling, jiggling blubber
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
The elevator hummed lowly, an ominous feeling in the air and reports gone slighted of uncontrollable laughter were the only premonition of the Clown Prince of Crime's introduction.

Inside a gangly, sickly looking man hummed gently along with Beethoven's Fifth; his smiling lips twitching slightly as he kept tone. Ever red, they were certainly the things of children's nightmares. His eyes moved side to side not out of a premonition of threat or a sense of uneasiness, but because his warped attention span couldn't quite fathom what made the painting on the elevator wall "art".

"In what sort of world does a boat equate to a masterpiece?" He asked to no one but himself, as he was truly the only one he could ever amuse, "I mean really; it looks like a nice boat, and I'm sure it is. But honestly, what ever happened to simple paintings? Picasso, Munch... I'm a big Dhali fan."

And then for no reason at all, he began giggling uncontrollably as he doubled over in laughter.

"That's not funny." he dourly chastised as he came to a sudden stop, "That's not funny at all."

In a sense of feigned humanity and mock nervousness, he smoothed the creases from his suit- a dark grape custom made with matching bottoms and a green button-up. He removed his gloves, allowing an abhorrent amount of sweat to pour from their white cloth confines. He whipped the gloves in his now exposed to be pale and ghostly hand; doing the same to the other before slipping them back on.

"Heh. Night with the ex."

Checking his reflection in the golden archway over the automated doors, he smoothed out a cowlick in his trim green locks with some spittle, only to have it pop right back up again.

Before he could rectify this little mistake, he was moderately shocked to see that the doors had opened up to the penthouse suites. Contentedly grinning to himself once more, smoothing over his hair quickly before making his exit, he let out a little chuckle as his gaze travelled back to the disturbing grin forced upon the now deceased Elevator Operator.

"What a stiff." he joked, "Didn't laugh at a single one of my jokes... nice smile though."

***


"Pee...eff... one-o-seven..." he murmered quietly to himself before reaching into his lapel, pulling out a folded slip of paper. He raises the sides in hopes that the number he had written down matched the number that Penguin had given him...

instead he had drawn a puppy.

"This must be the place." he smiled triumphantly before crumpling it up into a ball and tossing it behind him. Gingerly with one of his gloved hands, he rapped lightly on the door and pulled back, waiting like ever so the gentleman he appeared to be.

"Whoooo iiiisss iiiiiittt?!", came a familiar throaty Harliquin's holler from behind the door. Ah how many times he'd heard the sound of that sweet Jersey siren.

"Telegram!" he said calmly, deciding to have a little fun with his surprise date for the evening.

"Oh boy!!"

The door opened to reveal...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Deus Ex Jokerium (Part One)

choices: Inside Ivy's room...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
The door surely opened to reveal the ever-familiar wormy apple of his green, usually dialated little eyes; Harley Quinn. Looking bubbly in her adorable civs and sounding as loud as ever, hearing her voice after all this time was actually quite a relief... no matter what he had told the boys back at Arkham.

"Mistah J!!" she squealed like a child on Christmas, leaping into the scrawny arms of her on-again off-again funny boytoy. "You work for the Telegram Company now?"

the Joker, yes the Joker, could only chuckle at Harley's unique brand of airheaded comedy. Hilarious... at times.

"No no, Poo," he corrected her lovingly, "It's just little old me, come back to beg forgiveness from his Number One Gal... I've been a real sad clown without ya Harley. Won't you come back? The old Toy Factory just ain't the same without a certain psychopathic girlfriend's touch... and you're the only one that comes to mind." he laid it on sickeningly as he scratched underneath Harley's chin with his outstretched index finger

Falling for such flattery, Harley could only giggle stupidly and bat her eyelashes at her beloved boss. "Oh gee Mistah J, you sure know how to make a girl feel special!"

"Well I'm sure by the city of Gotham that's what you'd be called." he coochie-cooed his gullible girl as he barged his way in, "So I take it this is the dump you've been shacking up with Ivy in since I've been gone?" here Harley nodded approvingly, "Well, that's a good girl of Ivy, taking care of you like that... now say goodbye to her because we've got a heist. A big one."

Nervously now, Harley's trepidation was barely hidden at all, "H-How big?"

"Gotham First Bank. Gotta start somewhere, might as well be somewhere with easy access to cash." he said, plopping himself on the couch

"Y-Yeah..."

There was a slight pause between the two demented entertainers

"And what's wrong with you?" Joker finally asked, "You don't seem to happy to see ol' Puddin' these days. Still mad? Another guy? Oh don't tell me Ivy's got you thinking you're a lesbian now. I've been with you in the sack Kid, you're no Gina Gershon."

"No!" Harley hollered, rushing over to his side, "I would nevah cheat on you Puddin', it's just..."

With a flex of his nostrils, an oddly familiar smell wafted into his sizeable nose. "What's that smell?" he asked curiously, not quite able to place the scent, "Whatever it is its great... Your Mama's Special Cinnamon Rolls!" he jeered, "Oh what's the occassion; someone getting married? No, your brother finally got a job? No, that'd never happen... LOST got greenlit for another season?!"

Harley then unprecedentally removed herself from her once rightful spot at her Puddin's side and darted towards the kitchen. "Y'see, that's what's different now Mistah J..." Harley whimpered, grabbing the oven mitt and removing an entire tray of sweets fresh from the oven, "Ivy needs me here so we can work on our plan togetha..."

"Plan? What plan?" Joker snapped, "What are you two up to that involves baked goods?"

"Gee... you really have been in the slamma a long time, haven't ya?" Harley giggled nervously

The overworked little gerbil inside Joker's brain sped up to Mach 5 before a sudden realization hit him smack in the face like so many bat-gauntlets in the past. "Wait a second... you two are the reason everyone's getting so tubby!" he shouted, "Your mother's recipies combined with some weird plant gizmo that Ivy's concocted!"

"Oh Mistah J..."

"No no, it's brilliant!" he shouted, jumping from his seat and pacing about the room, "Tubby people are, for one, hilarious when they run. But they're also much easier- and bigger- targets. Does it take a little bit of the fun from watching them cower in fear? Yes. But on the upside, it makes it all the more hilarious to watch them waddle away!"

Here he laughs maniacally

"I mean really, the obese population is just so funny! Chris Farley, John Belushi, hell even that chubby fellow from the Office!"

Harley smiled, a bit of her stressed eased as she found her Puddin' rather approving. He seemed to be in high spirits today.

"Great! I'm glad ta have your approval Puddin'!" she giggles, planting a big wet one on the sunken white cheek before heading down the hallway with her freshly baked buns

"Where are you going with those?" he asked, "Can't I have one?"

"O-Oh no Mistah J. These are spiked, the way Ivy likes 'em. You'd get hooked in a single bite!"

"...And, Ivy ingests these addictive concoctions?"

"...Y-Yeah, that's kinda how things work around here now."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Deus Ex Jokerium (Part Two)

choices: Pieces fall in place as a whole nation fattens alongside Ivy and Joker's wallet
Or... an alternative path?
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Inside Ivy's room had become a foreign land to those other than herself and Harley.

The blinds were closed and doubled over so as to allow little sunlight, which interrupted her schedule at times and through the lack of which sapped her of some much needed energy. Her plants had adapted to a nocturnal state, with haunting yellow "eyes" of slick mucus not unlike what made a firefly glow. They had grown gnarled and twisted in their evolution, long Seymour-esque "teeth" to capture the occasional fly that managed to slip in from the outside world.

It was kept at a nightly chill and rather humid in her room, for her babies as well as herself. The decorations were coated in a film of condensation or wrapped by some vine-bearing plants. There was plenty of room to breath; the oxygen that her loving plants provided their mother with may have been the only thing keeping Ivy from her terrible wheezing and panting fits. In return, she would breathe herself much more carbon dioxide to sustain her own little ones...

The roots and vines made a carpet that covered the entire room, with only a trail that led up to the sole piece of visible furniture.

There, behind a divider of protective pink flowers that glowed with the same eerie incandescence as the rest of her babies, sat Poison Ivy.

Though it would not be the Poison Ivy that Joker had seen last, almost a year and a half ago. Initially what had been just simple overidulgence combined with denial had yielded undeniably the fattest chloropath anyone had ever laid eyes upon. Swollen to unimaginable proportions, Ivy lay in her bed at a staggering half-ton of pure pampered blubber. All green, every fold and nook and cranny of her vast and underused body. Constant exposure to her own toxin had, ironically, left her lazy and hopelessly addicted to her own food.

She sat in the nude, large green body censoring all the dirty bits to her save her saucer nipples. A large, overbearing stomach surged forward eagerly to hide most of her legs. It lumbered towards the edge of the bed, folding over even itself several times over as it lazily sat. There, where it had accidentally flopped atop a pillow, was a small break in the perfect line where her mammoth muffin top was forced upwards unto her middle roll. Sitting atop said side bulges were her arms, the thick wings her adipose had lent her matching what would have hung over any bottoms to fit her perfectly in size and girth. Her flabby arms folded couldn't even cross her bosom anymore, they simply sat about four inches from eachother in a sorry state of slack.

Her face, chinned that and a time over, leaned forward as she used her own frontal blubber as a pillow. An exceedingly long strand of leafy red hair drooped over her fifty-some-odd inch arm wing only to get lost in her many folds- reemerging to touch the bed and go on for maybe another three inches. She snored quietly. Obviously this mammoth mound of supervillain had fallen into another fat person nap.

"Gosh Golly, Pam!!" the Joker hollered as he walked into the room, "You really let yourself go!!"

"I mean really; Penguin said that you had put on a few, but he never warned me just how big you'd gotten. Poor ol' chap's broken hearted by the way. Says burn in hell."

At once, all the plants jerked towards the Harlequin of Hate in a threatening manner. They hissed and clicked wildly, some bearing actual teeth and threatening the ghastly ghoul with ingestion. However it took more than that to intimidate everyone's most feared clown. He simply walked towards the curtain petals with wild abandon and rapped roughly on their delicate petals

"Puddin', I wouldn't do that!"

"Knock knock, anyone home?!" he jeered, "Its Happy Girl Cookie Time!"

"My babies!" Ivy was jerked awake by the shrieks and wails of her beloved foliage. Her expression changed to one of pure dumb exertion as she wriggled about in her bed in a futile attempt to see what was going on in front of her. "What's going on with my babies?!"

"Relax Ivy, ya big old softie." Joker said, raising his hands in defense, "Call off your weeds before I pull out the Round Up."

"J-Joker?" Ivy asked in a husky yet surprised voice, "Harley told me you were-

"Dead?" he cut off the mound, "Well I'm certain I was for a second or two there. And you're not far behind me, Heart Disease is the major killer this year... well, besides me."

"Harley, what is he doing here?"

Harley, who had nervously hid behind the doorway all this time, finally peeped up, "He... uh, he kinda dropped in... you know how I can't say know to Mistah J..."

"Ugh!" the blob said in her newer deeper and slower voice, "I thought we agreed that I'd have final say over who gets to come into the apartment- wouldn't want anyone finding out about our situation would we?"

"Here ya go Red!" Harley said with newfound pep as she remembered the tray of cinnamon rolls in her hand, "Fresh from the oven, just how ya like 'em!"

"Gimme." Ivy said greedily as the plants allowed Harley to pass with their mother's tray. She handed her the large silver platter and watched with a wicked sense of glee as she lifted one up with fat fingers; biting into it sinfully with a throaty moan.

"Mmmmm..." Ivy hummed blissfully, "That's the good stuff."

"Oh save it." Joker huffed, "I believe I didn't come back here to talk sugar with the ladies. I came to get my hench wench back, but upon seeing that her services are... profitable to you, Ivy, I've decided to compromise."

"Compromise?" Ivy huffed as she swallowed another bite of bun, "She's my room mate!"

"Regardless; I saw her first." Joker quipped, taking a step towards Ivy, "Now, what's say you keep ol' Harley here with you in good company with Wayne Towers? I'll move myself and a few of my boys next door to keep you company! In return, we'll call it... fifty fifty on profits. Better make that sixty-fourty. Guards don't come cheap, even if they are from Blackgate."

"Sixty-Fourty?!" Ivy roared, "That's insane!"

"I prefer "socially impaired" myself." Joker giggled

"Forget it!" Ivy barked from her fixed position on the bed, "How about you just leave, and we all pretend like nothing ever happened?!"

There was a silence before Joker turned his back

"Fine, fine... I can tell when I'm not wanted. Harley, you stay with tons of fun here and I'll be on my way..."

"Mistah J, no!"

"Harley!"

"Oh my Poo!" Joker cooed, "The poor girl's rather attached to me, you see? Might bweak hewr poowr widdle heawrt to see old Uncle J go. Tell you what- you let me in on this... and I'll use my "connections" to launch your little baked goodies all over the nation. Easy-Peasy Pam- you just keep secreting those spores of yours over whatever it is we make and I'll get my boys to launch them from Coast to Coast! We'll be billionaires!!"

Here, he shouted fervently and raised his hands- a storm of Monopoly money flies from his sleeves.

"...Billionaires?"

"You betcha."

"No Joker gas?"

"Not this time, anyway."

Harley jumps to Ivy's defense, "But Mistah J, there's no way Ivy can produce that much of her pollen- she only gets a good batch goin' if she eats a whole lot." she whimpers, turning to her already engorged friend, "She's gotten real big already, how is she gonna feed a whole country?" Wickedly and with secret pleasure, Harley leaned against Ivy's flabby form. Supported by a hijacked hospital bed to keep her in a sitting position, Harley's face sunk deep into Ivy's soft blubber rolls.

And here? Here is where the trademark grin came along. The grin that frightened children and adults alike. The grin that spoke one thousand words. That grin that sent shivers down even Batman's spine at times...

"Well then... we're just going to have to get her more to eat." he said with a haunting rasp to his most serious of voices, "Isn't that right...Pammy?" he pat Ivy's globular gut before leaving the room and shutting the door- Harley not far behind him...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Deus Ex Jokerium (Part Three)

choices: Waistlines expand after Joker's first batch of goodies
Joker's operation runs into a hitch
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
It was no sooner than the next morning that Joker kept good on his promise of kicking Harley and Ivy's operation into second gear. He had spent the previous night scouring every lowlife den and hideout to put together a veritable who's who of capable henchmen. Big Sal, Joey the Rat, and Tiny, no expense was spared finding the best of the best, henchmen who could not only take a bunch from the Batman, but had enough carpetentry know-how to assemble a proper villain's hideout. By the next morning the 35th floor of Wayne Towers had begun it's transformation into the Clown Prince of Crime's newest abode.

Ivy stirred from her sleep as the sound of hammers being pounded into plyboard rang throughout her apartment. Ivy rubbed the sleep from her eyes as her gigantic wobbling armwings jiggled by the slight exertion. Unable to investigate the disturbance herself Ivy shouted for her roommate "Harley? Harley, what's going on out there?" Ivy's plants sprung up from their slumber alerted to the presence of an approaching force. They hissed quietly as they tensed themselves for whatever was coming. With a pound and a thud, the door to Ivy's room flung open and smashed against the wall, the tendrils and vines that had rooted themselves to the opposing wall, visibly damaged by the impact.

"My babies! Joker you lunatic, I will not suffer you hurting another one of my babies do you hear me?" Ivy shouted, her slower and throatier voice not nearly as intimidating as it was 900 pounds ago

"Whoops a daisies! Won't happen again Pammy-Wam, scout's honor!" Joker laughed as he hid two crossed fingers behind his back. "Anywho, its time to do a little retrofitting Pam, gotta rework this room a bit if we want the plan to really rocket into stage two! Hey boys, file in!" Ivy blushed slightly as 9 men shuffled into her room single file, each one gawking at just how big she had gotten.

"Alright Ives let's introduce the boys here! Bachelor #1 here is Big Sal. Loves walks on the beach and designer chocolate, I suspect you two have a lot in common!" Joker said as he motioned his hands in front of the pale, fat, and bald Italian mobster in front of him. Joker moved onto the next henchmen, a lanky sweaty creep with dark circles under his eyes "Muscles magoo here is Joey the Rat, great guy, murdered his family, ran heroin for the mob, can you believe this guy is single? Next in line is uh....this guy and well that's uhhh and he's...well there names aren't important! But you'll be getting to them over the next few hours as they retrofit your little greenhouse here."

"Wh-what?! Joker get them the hell out of here, this wasn't part of our arrangement!" Ivy said as she wobbled around feebly in anger.

"Should've gotten that in writing!" he laughed before exiting the room, his henchmen taking that as their cue to get to work. The 9 men worked quickly as they assembled a steel contraption to the ceiling. It was a large vat bolted to the wall, with a long running steel chute that fed directly to Ivy's bed. All the time Ivy's plants clicked and hissed as the bolts they installed ran through the vines and roots that entrenched every corner of the room.

"You animals! If you don't stop installing whatever the hell that is, I swear you'll spend the next 4 months slowly digesting in my baby's fly traps"

"Yeah about that" Joey the Rat said flatly. "Jokah said that if you try anything we have full authority to bring in the flamethrower and clear out all the weeds"

"Fine." she snarled. "Just tell me what this thing is.'

"Feeding tube."

Ivy's mind raced at the implications this had for her future. At first the idea repulsed her, was this really what was left for her? To spend every waking moment being fed and fattened, like a prize pumpkin to be saturated with nutrients, grown to immeasurable size, and then harvested? But, before she knew it the idea began to stick with her. She was already at the point in her life where she did nothing, but sleep and eat. The idea of being able to eat at all waking moments deeply appealed to her and by the time she had accepted her fate, the installation was finished.

"Well what are you waiting for?" Ivy demanded. "Feed me!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.title: Prize Pumpkin

choices: Time has been less kind to Ivy, who has become a massive mastication machine
No! I demand to see more Butterball Femme Fatales!
1553311111111211122121121122221111111111.content:
Ivy’s fate was sealed, incredible obesity the only foreseeable option available to the overgrown super seductress. Today would be the first time Ivy strapped on her not so proverbial feedbag and was force-fed liquid nutrients from the mechanical vat in the apartment above. As she was more or less resigned to her incredibly hedonistic future by this point Ivy had little to be concerned about. In all honesty the greedy green glob of what once was Gotham’s most notorious femme fatale was beyond anxiety or fear, even as the respirator-like device lowered from the ceiling and over her mouth. Her feelings on the matter were simple: she was hungry, and this machine was going to feed her.

She would have plenty of time to think of a possible alternative later—but she could already hear the low hum of her breakfast churning upstairs on the other end of the long tube. And that only served to make her massive green middle growl viciously from deep within, demanding to be sated.

As Big Sal lumbered over from his position amongst the other seven whom had constructed the contraption, the sick giggling of their much feared employer heightened as he ran the fastener behind Pam’s mane of red hair and leaves, snapping the mouthpiece into place with a loud CLACK as it cut into the woman’s chubby cheeks. The ghastly clown could barely contain himself or his excitement, presented as a polite golf clap that slowly spread throughout the apartment between the violent sociopaths. Taking a polite bow he lowered his bald head in mock appreciation before returning to the foot of the bed, allowing for the top dog to step forward and lead the christening of S.S. Ivy.

“Ladies and Jerks,” he began as he held his arms out, “I am honored to be here today standing before you a humble, smart, good looking fellow, with a dazzling smile and a wicked sense of humor—I’m sure if you’d ask my main squeeze over here she’ll attest I’m not so bad in the—“

“Mistah J!” Harley coughed as she avoided the lusty glances of the sexually depraved deviants in the room, “It’s, er, almost time for Ivy’s breakfast should we, uh, ya know wrap this up?”

“Oh fine fine.” The Joker rolled his eyes and folded his outstretched arms before beginning again with much less fervor “Anywho, above all, I am proud to say that today begins a new dawn on our prosperous nation. Where clean-cut British gents in powdery little wigs fought so that any poor schmoe walking the streets, such as you fine gentlemen, could be free to make as much money as possible, as fast as possible! Now let’s stick it to everyone but good ol’ Ben Franklin and make everyone as puckish as a Macy’s Day Parade float!” here he adjusted his smiley-faced hard hat and pulled out an equally gaudy walky-talky. “Alrighty Joe, pull the lever!”

Above them, a lanky sweaty man with dark circles under his eyes pulled down on a comically oversized lever embedded into the floor. Deep within the mechanical elephant’s trunk, suction began to flow that pulled the thick pasty mixture from the vat and down the chute—eventually into Ivy’s always open mouth. As the goo quickly bulged Ivy’s cherubic green cheeks her eyes shot open; not quite used to being fed in such a manner. But quickly she adjusted, eagerly sucking down and swallowing a mixture of untold fattening capabilities—spiked with the spores of her own creation.

And as Harley watched, wide-eyed with a terrible wonder, she couldn’t help but feel conflicted over her friend’s new predicament. On one hand , she was happy. Ivy would now gain all the fluffy inches to her waistline that Harley had thus-far enabled and indeed desired. On the other, she couldn’t help but feel… wrong. Getting so much pleasure from seeing Ivy like this, fastened to a feed bag while indulging her every gluttonous desire, knowing that all she was to her Puddin’ was a big green eating machine, made her feel bad. Not bad enough to say anything, of course. But still pretty lousy.

After the other nine men had left the room, Harley snuck over to Ivy. Looking over her shoulder, as if Mr. J was going to pop right back in at any moment, the pigtailed blonde wrapped herself around as much of Ivy as she could reach—relishing the fleshy folds that smothered the right side of her face as the belly beneath it was slowly filled to contentment.

Nah, nothin’ wrong about this at all.

***


It didn’t take long for the results to show around the nation. Coast to coast people were busting out of their Sunday best, their leisure clothes, and uniforms. Of both genders, all those indulging in the newly-named Guffaw Brand of confectionaries found themselves with exponentially growing waistlines; along with a gnawing addiction and a sapped motivation to do much about either.

In Gotham City, high above the rabble and brightly-lit streetlights, a woman vastly illadvised to don any variation of her many outfits had squeezed into one such in an attempt to capture her old days as a neutral party in crime fighting. Clad in black leather that conformed and exaggerated every meaty roll of her generously padded frame, Selina Kyle wheezed up a storm after having jumped from one rooftop to another. Having had to run for a short period of time to build up the proper momentum, Catwoman found that her gait had been long insufficient to be considered “running”. More like she waddled as fast as she could and made a blind leap over to the building over. Thankfully she had made it, having landed on her plump rump rather than her pudgy toes.

“That… does… it…” she grunted as she struggled to rise under her own power, ripping the eared cowl from her head and removing the now uncomfortable goggles, “I’m… becoming… a housecat… full-time!”

Metropolis, as Gotham’s only rival in high crime and cosmopolitan status, was a prime victim to be ensnared by the fleshy vice that became their collective trousers alongside its sister city. Lois Lane sat propped in a custom-ordered rolling chair, chubby legs kicked up on her desk reading an issue of the Daily Planet with a so-far unflabby Livewire and a somewhat husky Parasite running rampant. She hid her face behind the black and white pages, making distinct chewing noises and letting slip a few “mmm”s and “ahh”s.

“You alright, Lois?” Perry White asked knowingly as he walked the halls of the Daily Planet, far from blind to his employee’s expansion.

“Just –mpmh—peachy, Perry!” Lois said from behind her barrier as she chewed on a brownie, chocolate staining her plump lips.

In the middle of our fair country, Smallville Kansas, an uncomfortably large blonde woman in uncomfortably small daisy dukes had all but taken over the modest 50’s diner that had taken stock of Guffaw products some months ago. Evolving from a puckish patron to a rotund regular, Kara Zor-El *ahem* Kent had grown into quite the super-hog since learning that Mary’s Diner stocked her favorite supply of treats. All but wedged into the booth, her mighty appetite had led her to sampling the entire dessert menu in one sitting, a feat most onlookers took with a side shock and awe as the blonde beluga gorged herself all afternoon.

“What can I say, I’m a growing girl?” she asked sheepishly to the expectant waitress, “You can just, uh, put it on my aunt and uncle’s tab.” She said with an innocent smile as she pat her wobbling gut, mostly uncovered by her red plaid shirt. A burp escaped her and, in a feat of identity-jeopardizing super sloppiness, shattered all the windows in the modest diner. “That’s gonna be coming out of my allowance…”

Meanwhile in Coast City Carol Ferris sat behind her desk, dressed in a violet business suit that must have been fitted for a hippopotamus. The young head of Ferris Aircraft was quite plump, owed to her sedentary lifestyle and recent addiction to a certain brand of confectionary. An addiction which was only deepened and indeed attributed to the now year-long disappearance of her boyfriend-slash-intergalactic justice enforcer Hal Jordan, better known as one of many Green Lanterns. Some months ago she had heard about the popular brand word of mouth around the office and… well, time makes whales of us all.

“Oh Hal…” she said solemnly as one plump finger longingly traced the glass on his picture, “Please come home soon…” she said with a sigh before reaching into her desk and pulling out a prepackaged muffin bearing the cheeky grin of Guffaw’s logo.

“But not too soon…” she added quietly before taking her first of many sinful bites…

"Thanks again, Jen." Harley placed a platter of brownies in the oven, "I can't tell you how much Ivy and I are gonna appreciate tis."

Jenna Duffy, more comfortable using her street name "the Carpenter", wiped the sweat from her brow. Normally she preferred illicit activities to doing actual carpentry, but with Harley's promise of a generous paycheck she found herself unable to refuse. "Hey, don't mention it." she says, drill vibrating wildly in her expert hands, "You're the one paying for the gas for me to get up here."

And with that last quip, the Carpenter's job was finished; all doorways in the apartment had been widened by three feet to better fit Ivy's massive form. Though, she didn't have to know that particular reason, did she?

"You're sure Wayne won't mind that we're screwing with his property?" Jenna had to ask, she was crazy enough to work with Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum and their psychotic 'Wonderland Gang', but incite the wrath of the Prince of Gotham? She wasn't that crazy. "I mean, I'm not even sure my carpentry liscence is valid anymore..."

Harley waved off her newfound companion, "Naw, a'course not!"

Jenna narrowed her eyes, "You're sure?"

Harley took a seat close to the finished doorway, admiring the craftsmanship while enjoying the last of an untainted batch of brownies. "A'course I'm sure!" she said, spewing small particles of chocolate treat over the white 3x6's that made up the doorframe, "He was nice enough ta let Ivy keep 'er plants in the next room afta all."

Jenna wiped off the chunks of brownie, "Geez, watch where you aim those things!" she then wiped off her carpentry gloves, "What's with all the brownies anyway? You starting a bakery?"

The former Cupid of Crime smiled bashfully, not willing to admit to herself that she had made these brownies just to inflate Poison Ivy's massive frame before the heaving heffer decided that now was the optimum time for some shopping. Thus leaving Harley alone with Jenna and an entire platter of brownies, all of which found themselves inside Harley.

"Oh no reason!" Harley's answer came out very sharp and almost unfriendly, "Uh... you want one from the next batch?"

Jenna turned her head, Gotham sure were weird. "Nah, I'm watching my waistline." she said, patting a set of moderately polished abdominals behind denim overalls.

"Yeah, good to hear..." Harley replied, visibly relieved that the questioning had ceased.

However, in the distance, an unfamiliar quaking startled the Keystone criminal. It was slow and methodic, but seemed to be approaching the apartment, singled out rather than the entire city being targetted. She ducked, "That better not be the fuckin' Bat!" she shouted, getting her power tools ready for action

Ms. Duffy got her answer soon enough, though it was a very unexpected one at that. Poison Ivy; Duchess of Daffodils, Queen of Crisanthimums, Mistress of Gotham's Crime Underground, looked to be about 400 pounds!

Every part of the ludicrously obese Ivy quivered as she took steps inside the apartment (thankfully the entrance had been widened just a few hours ago) Jenna watched as Poison Ivy's expansive bustline heaved with every deep breath, winded from head to toe. Her stomach jut out boldy past her pitiful disguise, sticking out at least a foot and a half from her original waistline. Jenna giggled to herself as she watched Ivy reach past her own girth to reach her purse, pushed aside by her monstrous lovehandle.

"H-Hey Harl..." she wheezed, winded from her long day of going out on the town, "Guess who I met out on the-" the enormous woman paused as she noticed the snickering low-rate criminal in her living room, "Who the hell is she?"

Harley bit her lower lip, praying that Jenna would keep her mouth shut about Ivy's little weight problem. Her prayers were not recieved.

"Oh-h-h my God!" Jenna roared with laughter, causing her to drop her circular saw on the floor, "What the hell happened to you- You're HUGE!!" the younger girl gesticulated with her hands to reflect just how massive Ivy had been fattened to, "You breathing so hard because you got tired on the elevator?!"

Harley motioned for Jenna to shut her mouth, aware that Ivy's massive form was lumbering towards the carpenter. "Jenna!" she whispered

"Oh, wait, can you take the elevator anymore, or do you fill it up by yourself?!"

"Jenna!"

"Wait... did you eat the bellhop?"

"Jenna!!"

But it was too late, Ivy had locked Jenna in one of her mind-wiping kisses. She had locked the young ponytailed villain in a state of drunken enibration, entranced with Ivy's now apparant beauty. Ivy turned her firey eyes to Harley, who squeaked, "And you said I wasn't gaining weight." Ivy said, suprisingly calm. Harley knew better, that was rage detectable behind Ivy's flabby cheeks, "Oh well, I guess I'm gonna have to start exercising while you do all the work around here, Ms. Five-Meals-A-Day."

She turned to Jenna, who was busy staring off into space. "Empty your pockets, you're paying us for allowing you to work for us." suddenly a wicked sneer crossed Ivy's plump green cheeks, "And take one of my special brownies, you'll love them."

Her grin became that familiar sneer that made Ivy so feared, "Actually, take a few. Spread the word to Keystone about the Gifts of Demeter."

Ivy slammed the door shut, embarrassed in her own right; something that Harley was grateful for. The two women certainly attracted stares. While the initial hype over the rumor that they had given up their lives of crime had long since passed (about the same time that a certain brand of sweets were released), the media had failed to inform Gothamites just how large Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn had become in their recent plight into a much more posh life. Renee Montoya, former GCPD but now the superhero The Question, watched the dying sunset from her tiny apartment. One hand held a donut while the other was holding a file stuffed with various articles and photos. All were related to the recent ballooning of Gotham's citizens.

And speaking of stuffed, Renee thought to herself, finishing her donut and rubbing her formerly trim belly. The detective was now one hundred pounds heavier than she was in the past. Her once trim abs were covered in quite the beer gut. Bigger than Bullock's, if Renee had to guess and she didn't even want to think about how much bigger her butt was.

After applying her blank slate of a face, she put on her blue jumper, taking one last glance into the mirror before heading out into the night.

She'd get to the bottom of this mystery and then work herself back into her former shape.

First, however, she had some questions to solve...
