1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Talia moaned in a mixture of joy and sorrow, with a little bit of lust thrown into the mix; "Oh!!" she moaned, sounding every bit the histrionic that she was, "Ohh!!" she moaned again, "Love- please... belly rub!!" she demanded, massaging her own bloated gullet in a futile attempt to ease the intense pain in her stomach. Harley complied with somewhat mixed feelings; she wanted to fondle Talia's taut tummy, but... it was about three in the morning.

Talia and her voracious appetite had eaten away at her time together with Harley, not that the time wasn't well spent. Together, but mostly on the brunette's end of the deal, the two had consumed many, many of the freshly bought groceries that the chipper jester had worked so hard to lug into the apartment and loaded them into her guest's awaiting maw; leaving her bloated, dazed, and sore. "Mmmfaster!" she bellows, Harley can only go at her stomach in a relatively sleepy pace. Quinn's poor arms were sore as sore could be from all of the monotonous movements, her cheeks hurt from her widening grin (a first) and worst of all, she was tired. All Talia wanted to do, rather than sleep, was get a tummy massage. Surely she couldn't deny Talia one last belly rub, could she?

Her expertise fingers danched over Talia's many rolls, though they were stuffed to a much more spherical shape by this point, and massaged at a rather slow pace for fear of upsetting Talia's delicate equalibreum. And while she was doing a great job at it, Talia was still eager for more pleasure. "Mmmore!!" she arched her back, lifting her stomach farther into the air (and thereby a bit of Harley) in her pleasure, her toes curled, her eyes squinched shut. "Oh!!" she moaned again, feeling a great pressure on her stomach, "L-Love, whatareyou-"

She struggled past her weak neck to see Harley, tossed over lazilly on Talia's stomach snoozing peacefully. Her adorable snoring was quiet, though comically designed to fit her insane jester motif. Talia cooed, but then winced in pain, "Love, get up." she hissed , "Get up get up, get up!"

Meanwhile, just down the hall and to the left (or, to the room with flora sprouting from the crack of the door) there was no moaning, there was no whining, and there was no groping. Unlike their counterparts in the other room, Selina and Ivy's relationship didn't need food in order to work... it just helped. Selina Kyle's heavy breathing and whimpering did little to upset the ever-watching plants. Ivy found it cute, she did all she could to help by cuddling up to her Big Kitty. "Oh, Kitten, are you okay?"

While one of the "conditions" of their relationship was that Ivy be the heavier one out of the two, that surely didn't stop Selina from making a glutton of herself. While Ivy could probably have handled cookies, chips, cupcakes, about four loaves of bread, mayonaise, peanut butter, and two boxes of cereal (and an accidental lightup toy inside one calorie-filled breakfasttime meal that had to be heimlich'd out of her) far better than Selina could have, the latter of the two insisted on eating to her heart's content; which just so happened to be a lot and left Ivy with bare satiation levels... still a lot.

"No..." she answered meekly, vision blurry, "I think... I think I'm gonna puke."

Ivy cuddled closer, "Aw... poor baby" she cooed, "You want a Tums?"

"Please?"

Ivy reached over to the bottle of antacids she kept by her bed for her own indigestion and popped a few into Kitty's mouth. "Better?" she rubbed Selina's stomach lovingly, "No..."

If one were to take a look at the sorry state of Selina Kyle, they would notice that not only was she fighting off vomit, but also that she was fighting Ivy for space on her bed. The two flabby furies took up almost all of the bed with their accumulative apidose. "Scoot... scoot over?" Kyle asked weakly. "I don't think so." Ivy said in a sultry tone, "You need a tummy rub." The fat green goddess hefted the upper half of her body up and gave the engorged socialitte a pathetic massage, ignoring strange creaking noises that emenated from underneath the two.

"Please... urp... no..."

"Oh yes," Ivy teased, "Your big belly, its churning!"

"No..."

"Babies, come, turn your eyes."

"urp"

"Now let's get-"

But it was too late, beneath the heavy load laid on top of it, the bedframe cracked in clean in half. The two fatties on top went folded along with the matress, forcing Selina's stomach to meet her chest painfully. "Oh!!" she and Ivy screamed in unison, now falling with the latter half of the matress to the hard wood floor. Ivy, breathing heavilly from excitement and fear, turned to Catwoman. "Well... I guess we should keep this matress on the floor then?" Selina let out a huge, monster belch that shook the windows.

Ivy pinched her nose, "Ew. That was gross." she said stoicly, "Feel better, though?"

"Much."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------
In her apartment, Renee Montoya sat at her desk. That's all she had been doing all night, sitting at her desk and going over her case report. Inside of the manilla folder, besides some papers stained with chocolate frosting and crumbs from the corresponding donut, held photos that charted the growing weights of several prominent members of Gotham. She grumbled, scratching her lowermost chin.

She stopped on Kate Kane, former lover and sociallite. She watched, unblinking, as her weight climbed from photo to photo. "What's the link..." she massaged her masked temples with a gloved hand, "There has to be a link...". She knew the facts; the expansion of Gotham started at the top, the richest people in Gotham were surely the fattest. Perhaps she could start there, investigation through the air ducts to see what she could observe.

"Maybe not..." the latina mumbled, hidden eyes travelling down to catch her gut pressing outwards in her seated position; wriggling through the ducts was a job for someone much lighter than her. Maybe she could climb the walls of Wayne Manor at the next... no, that involved lifting her bulky body around a little too much for comfort. "maldito..."

The Question sighed, forced into a last resort. "Maybe... I'll see if Kate won't take me." she grumbled, defeated.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Three weeks had passed since Talia and Selina had been stuffed nearly beyond their capacity.

This capacity increased as the weeks came and went.

The beds and furniture continued to groan under the strain of the three ballooning women and slowly gaining jester. Luckily Ivy soon grew tired of that and had the furniture reinforced to handle almost any weight.

With the furniture problem solved Ivy and Harley resumed stuffing Selina and Talia whenever they could. Of course Ivy ate her own large share and Harley snacked on what she could as well.

All of these events led to the moment almost upon them: the weigh in.

"Alright ladies, time to weigh up!" Harley shouted after lunch had been digested.

Talia got up from the love-seat, her jiggling belly and rear causing Harley to swoon at the sight. Walking or waddling as the case may be, Talia made her way onto the scale.

The digital readout flashed a bit before finally stopping at a number: 350 pounds.

Smirking at Ivy, Talia hugged Harley and thanked her with a large smooch on the cheek. Harley sighed in pleasure as Talia's fat breasts were pressed against her and she wrapped her arms around her as far as she could.

Ivy was next, the plant lover tugging at her tighter clothes as she ambled her way over to the scale. Sparing a quick glance at Selina, she got on.

Again the numbers flashed: 400 pounds.

"Someone's been neglecting their greens," Selina joked, waddling behind Ivy as she stepped off the scale. Ivy just gave her lover an amused smile and added an extra sway to her massive hips as she moved off to the side.

Selina then stepped on and Ivy flashed back to the skinny thief she had first met. Her lithe form filling out her leather suit to perfection. What a change she had gone through. Selina now boasted three chins, an ass larger than Ivy's, and a belly just as large. To say nothing of Selina's sweater puppies.

The scale doled out it's verdict: 430 pounds.

Selina's eyes went wide. "I'm...the fattest?"

"It's not so bad once you get used to it," Ivy said, coming over to Selina's side and giving her a sensuous kiss. "Besides your ass doesn't look that big in those pants."

That made Selina chuckle.

"Well Nymph I hope you like being skinnier than someone else because soon enough you'll weigh less than I do," Talia cut in. Ivy glared at her rival for Harley's attention but found she didn't want to start a big fight so soon after lunch. And maybe she could talk Selina into chowing down on some donuts while they waited for dinner.

"Great job you three! You're so big now, it's just wonderful!" Harley said, jumping up and down. It was while she was doing this that her belly flopped out, the gut, for that was what it now was, causing her shirt to ride up her chest.

Harley blushed at that but Talia just gave an airy giggle of her own and ran a hand along Harley's increased paunch.

"My love, we're not done with this weigh in just yet. You need to see how much you've gained as well."

"Okay Tallie, I'm going..."

Harley got on and watched as the numbers settled on her weight: 189 pounds.

Talia beamed as the number came up.

"Welcome to the fat life, my love."

Later that night, at O'Riley's pub...

Renee stared at her former lover as she moved her bulk next to her on the stool, the wood creaking under Kate Kane's massive ass.

"Thanks for meeting with me Kate."

"Sure thing Renee. You've been enjoying your donuts it seems."

"Yeah...I actually want to ask you something. About...well it's about how fat you've gotten. I think there's something sinister behind it."

Kate chuckled at that and rubbed her belly as she ordered some pretzels and a beer from the bartender.

"Paranoid much? Can't a girl pack on some pounds in peace or does everything have to have an ulterior motive where you're concerned?"

Renee sighed and placed her right hand over Kate's own.

"Kate please help me. Once I solve this I can lose all this flab and you can dazzle the blue blood's again."

"Who says I don't dazzle them now? But fine, I'll help you Renee. But can you do something for me?"

"Sure..." Renee agreed, not liking the gleam in Kate's eye.

"Let's binge right here, right now. Then I'll answer whatever questions you have, okay?"

Renee nodded, sparing a glance towards the empty plate of nachos she had already consumed along with the two beers next to that.

Kate grinned and soon enough her own massive plate of pretzels was placed before her, covered in melted cheese. Renee ordered a few more beers as well as two more plates of nachos.

This had better be worth it, Renee thought to herself as she watched Kate start to munch on the pretzels.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
As more time passed, Ivy found herself iching to back into crime. It was not that she was not enjoying fattening Selina up and having Selina fattening her up in return, she was, but she was finding herself missing the thrill of crime. Thanks to Harley's treats, they weren't lacking for money, but there was just something so fun about stealing money. There was some rush of excitement that came along with it. Her and Selina's continued growth was something that she wanted to continue but she also wanted to get some crime in as well.

With their expanded sizes, Ivy knew that neither herself nor Selina were in any shape to commit any crimes. Selina was no longer the lith cat theif who could slide in and out of homes gracefully to commit her robberries and as for herself, she was just too fat and out of shape move fast enough to commit a crime. Of course Talia was in no shape to be committing crimes. Harley was the only one of the four of them who was still thin enough and in good enough shape to commit a crime and even she was not as quick as she once was. Ivy didn't think that she could tear Harley away from Talia long enough to commit a crime. Though she was faced with these challenges, Ivy was not ready to give up.

Ivy and Selina were sitting on Ivy's now reienced for bed, eaching working on a eating a pint of cookie dough ice cream. Knowing that Selina had as crafty a mind as she did, she thought she would ask her for some advice on how to achieve a new robbery. "I've got this drive to commit another crime Selina. It's been so long since I last stole some money. I know that we are both no longer in shape to commit a crime but maybe we could mastermind one, and get someone else to do it for some cut of the money. What do you think?" Ivy asked Selina in between bites of her ice cream.

"Well I totally understand that drive for crime again. I am feeling it too. I would prefer we commit the robbery ourselves but you are right that we are not in the shape for that. Masteringmind the crime and getting someone else to do it is the way we have to go. Where were you thinking of robbing?" Selina asked. "One of the banks in twon" Ivy said with a mischevious smile. "Well robbing banks was never my forte but I do know of someone who would be up to that task" Selina said. "Who?" Ivy asked.

"Circe" Selina said. "The witch?" Ivy asked in surprise. "Yeah. I know she doesn't strike you as someone to rub a bank but with her magic she could easily rob a bank and since she is not as interseted in money then it is likely she will take a smaller take. "I think all of that is great but do you think that she will do it? I mean she might not see much in it for her other than the small cut of the money that she gets" Ivy points out. "I think she would just enjoy the new challenge, getting to hurt some men as she loves to kill them, and just the sense of power she will get from the men not being able to stop her" Selina replied.

"Well then I say it's worth a shot. Give her a call and see if she will do it" Ivy said and Selina nodded her head in agreement.

What was she going to do?

Sighing, Ivy nodded her head.

Talia giggled as Harley gave her rounder gut a tickle, arching her back up in surprise as she continued to do so. Ivy watched the scene with distaste as she waddled up to the pair. Spying Ivy long before Harley did, Talia shot a smirk her rival's way before speaking.

"My Love, we have a visitor."

Harley stopped her tickling then and turned around, seeing Ivy.

"Oh, hey Red, what's up?"

"I think it's time to get back into crime. Obviously not physically as we're all much larger women since the last time we did anything bad." Talia nodded at this, brushing her hand against her large ass and belly. "But that doesn't mean we can't orchestrate the crimes. We just need some grunt work. Maybe from a certain someone's private army of killers?"

Now Talia was intrigued.

"Perhaps I could help in this endeavor. But I expect more than half the reward, understand?"

Ivy locked eyes with Talia, the two not speaking for several moments before nodding.

"Good, it seems some of that fat you carry went to your brain as well." Ivy glared then and Talia was about to continue when Harley spoke up.

"Tallie, that was mean! Apologize right now!"

Ivy and Talia's eyes were both wide open at the jester's sudden outburst.

"O-of course my love. I'm sorry Pamela, it was a joke."

"Apology accepted," Ivy said.

Just then the squeak of a wheel rubbing against the floor rang out and Selina appeared pushing an enormous cart laden with all kinds of unhealthy foods. And all were free of plant ingredients as per Ivy's wishes.

"Now that we're agreed, let's binge and get to planning!"

Ivy, Harley, and Talia nodded.

Selina wheeled the enormous cart over to the ladies, putting it in reach of everyone before collapsing down into one of the chairs, out of breathe. She rather just continue to sit around on her well padded butt relaxing and eating. Harley then finally moved over to Ivy. Harley surved the three sleeping fat beauties. Sweet and fattening dreams ladies she thought to herself with a smile.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Harley Quinn was satisfied. She was satisfied with her friends, her house, her business, and her relationships. For the first time since her first incarceration in Arkham, Harley Quinn was happy with her life and what she had made of it. Sure the good life cost her a once killer figure, but the sacrifice proved well worth it. Honestly, Harley hadn't been quite this happy in a long time...

And while she loved her friends dearly, like sisters almost, she wasn't about to let things go sour because they had gotten too used to the posh life and seeked out a cheap thrill that none of them needed. She had compromised plenty enough for her friends; putting up with Talia's smoking, turning the other cheek for Selina's kitty ornaments in the kitchen, and Lord knows how many meals she'd cooked for Ivy. Wasn't she entitiled to a little comfort?

But, she darent say it aloud. Since her career started as a henchwench, Harley had always been a bit of a doormat (sometimes literally) for her "friends" and "cohorts" and "Puddin", and she knew they wouldn't listen to her. However, there was one thing about her that all three of them cared equally about: her culinary talents. Maybe a good meal or two would keep them out of trouble?

The husky harlequinn looked up from the oven; her personal taste testers all asleep in their favorite spots. Selina stuffed into a chair that hugged her lovehandles so tight that they swell over the flanks, her head tilted down lazilly and pressing her secondary chins into her chest. Talia tossed casually onto the reinforced daybed so that her head was supported by a pillow and one flabby forearm, letting the other fall over her huge hooters that fought eachother for room in her tight lavender turtleneck. And Ivy on the couch, gut falling over the cushions and plump fingers itching to rub it. Harley bit her lower lip and squeaked.

She definately thought it would.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------
"Oh!!" Selina's delighted groans woke the slumbering ecoterrorist, Ivy. She rubbed her eyes with chubby fingers as she awoke to the sight of Harley slowly lowering a skewer of swedish meatballs into her girlfriend's mouth, the corpulant Catwoman drooling eagerly at Harley's little game. "H-Harley?" Ivy's voice was husky and groggy, "Selina?"

"Oh hey Red!" Harley beamed as she slid the meat off of the skewer and into Selina's awaiting mouth, "Ya hungry, I got all kinds'a food ready for ya!" True enough, there was a lot of empty takeout meals left as debris of a truely epic meal. "Well, dere might be a lil left..." the tubby clown grabbed at a box of chinese food, "in here... nope, my mistake." she giggled as she pat Selina's tummy, "Tallie an' Kitty got a little hungry."

The smell of burning flint and tobacco brought Ivy's attention to the stuffed Talia, lighting up a smoke after an apparantly huge meal. In her sausage-like finger was a lit cancer stick, worked with suprising expertise despite the size of her digits. "Oh..." she burped, "excuseme." Ivy, still groggy, let out a polite "yer excused..." before scratching her tummy. "You didn't save any for me?"

"Sorry, Flowerchild, Harley kinda stuffed it into us on the spot." Selina pat her stomach, "You know, I forget what we were talking about before we all took our little nap..."

"We were discussing," the bloated viridian woman yawned, "We were discussing our plans for-"

"Want some cookies Red?" Harley cut her off quickly, "Chocolate Chip?"

"Yes please, thanks Harl." Ivy paused, "Anyway, it was-"

"Frosting?"

"Yeah, thanks Harley." she sounded a little annoyed, "Now anywa-"

"You mean marzipan, Love, we finished off the rest of the "frosting"..." Talia chimed in a rather husky correction, "In the top cabinet."

"Anyway"

"You mean," Selina pat her chest to settle a growing case of indigestion, "You mean the top left, top cabinet is the spice cabinet."

"Kay, tanks Kitty!"

Ivy huffed, falling back down to the couch defeated by the constant interruptions that plauged her so. "Oh I'm sorry, are we done, interrupting me ladies?" she whined, "Anyway, if I remember right we were discussing-" she was cut off by Harley shoving a cookie into her mouth midsentence. "I'm sorry," she mock apologized, "You were sayin' somethin' Red?"

"Mfffmfmfmm." Ivy mumbled through cookie, "I said... I said... oh whatever, cookie me."

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Time continued to pass as it always did but Harley kept villigant in keeping the three sirens constantly stuffed. She loved how big all three of were getting and wanted that to continue. She didn't want her gaining to either be slowed or stopped by planning a heist. She felt the time of heist was over for her and them, now was the time for Ivy, Selina, and Talia to all continue growing while she continued to fatten them up. This goal of hers went along with her becoming more assertive. She found herself telling the girls what to do more often and those things were to stay on the couch, or in bed and continue to eat or even that they allow her to feed them. If one of them ever so mentions another crime, she would shush them up by making them eat even more than they orignally planned too. Harley was enjoying seeing the three sirens continue to expand and enjoying having some control and power for the first time in her life.

Ivy, Selina, and Talia all realized just how fat they were getting but they didn't have the energy or willpower to do anything about it. They were too addicted to eating so much of whatever they wanted and being lazy as Harley made it so easy for them to do and made sure they did. They also had to admit they were really enjoying their new lifestyle and didn't see any new reason for them to stop it. While there had been that brief time were they all three felt an itching to get back into crime, it was mostly gone now, replaced by a contentment of the way their life was now.

Selina was now a fat kitty and Harley loved to call her that as much as Selina loved to be called that. She had her own spot on one of the couchs, laying on it on her back with her feet up. She had a huge belly that stuck out prominently that she could not see over. Her wide hips and very thick thighs were hanging over the couch now a little and though her butt could not be seen while she was sitting, it was very big and round. The buzzing of her alarm clock woke Renee Montoya from her slumber.

Sitting up, she felt her belly jiggle from the movement. Sighing, she looked down.

The binge with Kate had awakened something in her. It was a desire to be stuffed. After that evening she found herself buying more and more treats to take back to her apartment. Whereas her fridge had previously been filled with low calorie meals and other healthy foods now it was stocked with nothing but junk food.

Moving as best she could, Renee got off the bed and stood up, waddling over to the full body mirror.

Her ass had gained the most weight, she decided upon viewing her reflection. Her face was much rounder as well.

Renee then did something she hadn't done in a month: weigh herself.

Stepping onto the white device, she watched as the numbers flashed by until stopping: 290 pounds.

She had gained forty pounds in the span of a month.

Scratching her big belly and tugging out the wedgie created by her panties, Renee stepped off the scale and got ready for the day.

Once she had emerged from the bathroom, she got dressed and headed over to her work desk, sitting down on the metal chair and opening a crammed case file.

As she started to pour over all the information she'd gathered the past month her free hand snatched a donut from the massive box off to the side...

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
the Question was a master at piecing together seemingly random bits of information, as was her predecessor. Whether it be due to a shared case of apophenia or general suspicion of the world around them, Renee and Charles both had a knack for finding conspiracies in everyday life. "Fat" had become everyday life in Gotham, therefore it was the Question's job to knitpick until she found something sinister.

She loomed over her work, scratching her lowermost chin in thought; her temples hurt. Taking a bite of kruller, Renee let out an annoyed grunt as she mulled over the situation.

Nearly everyone in Gotham had gained a substantial amount of body fat; rich or poor, high class to no class. It had started with the sociallites, moving downward on the social pyramid due to endorsements and reluctant sharing; Renee had seen it firsthand last month with Kate. From what she had gathered (and experienced firsthand) the brand was named Anonymous and specialized in unhealthy pastries, cakes, and chocolates. Their booth was the most crowded, bluebeards of all shapes and sizes scarfing down everything they could get their greedy mits on, Kate included.

Anonymous: it was obviously a cry from an unimaginative supervillain/ess trying to strike it rich with doped up brownies. Not hard to figure out. But one thing made the investigation much more difficult; naturally the source of Anonymous would be either uncommonly large or uncommonly skinny by this point, depending on whether or not they followed the Peddler's #1 rule or not. But the largest Gothamites were usually housewives with little to do other than eat the day away or bigwigs who could afford such extravagence. Other than Roxy Rocket, who had proven herself a true glutton and gained nearly a fourth of a ton, every other glam villain of Gotham couldn't match this new M.O.

Renee had interviewed Roxy about a month ago; hopelessly addicted to food by the last time she saw her. A helpless blob who could barely waddle around Blackgate anymore, she was out of the question. The food was still coming, Roxy wasn't in charge of it or she'd weigh a ton. There had to be someone she was forgetting.

the Question scattered her files in desperation, searching for even the slightest thing she may have missed. A frazzled groan filled the apartment as all the files fell to the floor, papers spilling everywhere. "What the hell!" she chastized herself, resting her head in chubby hands, "What am I missing?!" she grabbed the blank slate that was her disguise, thick eyebrows furrowed in anger. "I don't deserve this shit!" she tossed the mask to the floor...

"Ugh... I'm sorry." she said to herself, struggling past her own stomach to pick up the mask proved futile so she was forced to lift her heavyset form from the chair and bend over. Aside from a general discomfort with herself due to her weight, Renee felt proud... most of the time... to be the Question. It was an honor, she decided as she picked up her mask...

"Hm?" she picked up a recent photo of newest sociallite couple Pamela Isely and Harleen Quinzelle; from crooks to bluebeards. "I think I might have to speak with..." a loud ripping sound emenated from her backside, "...a tailor, first."

Knocking on the door, she braced herself for the confrontation.

What she didn't expect was Harley to answer the door with a wide smile, her own weight gain highly visible to Renee.

"Yes, what can I do for ya?"

"I have some questions for you and Miss Isley."

Harley looked over her newest visitor, taking in the large stomach that was close to Talia's massive belly. The jean clad rear end was beautiful to Harley, seeing as it was massively fat. Nodding, she moved aside so the visitor could waddle inside.

And while she did so Harley took a longer look at that beautiful butt.

Renee started her questions as soon as the door was closed, Harley answering them to the best of her ability. Well maybe not the best of her ability as the jester was starting to ponder adding a fourth ballooning beauty to her not so little collection.

Once she answered the latest question, Harley held up a hand.

"Are you hungry? I just put a cake in the oven."

As if summoned by her words, Renee smelled a delectable aroma wafting towards her.

Still she didn't want to let on that she was really hungry.

Staring another question, Renee was halfway through asking it when her belly answered for her.

GROANNNNNNN...

Renee was glad she was wearing her mask or Harley would have seen just how embarassed she was.

"I'll take that as a yes! Go to the living room with the other girls and I'll have that cake out in a jiffy!"

"Ooph!" would be the first thing that graced the five sets of ears within the apartment. However, because that gave little insight as to just how important the arrival of their newest house guest truly was, the next sentence that followed was of much more significance.

"Nediw Yawrood."

As, you should probably be able to piece the information together by now, Zatanna Zatara had become quite the sizable woman. Not immune to the, once innocently delicious yet now sinfully addictive, treats that had taken Gotham and the surrounding areas by storm, the adeptly magical heroine was finding it harder and harder to squeeze herself in and out of particularly cramped areas such as these unforgiving doorways. As such, this spell was quickly becoming a necessity for her everyday life.

As she spoke these magical, somewhat confusing words to those not familiar in her M.O., the very arch that supported the gateway into the Isely-Quinnzelle abode stretched like a rubber band to accommodate the dimensions of the young raven-haired lass as she tottered inside.

Grown to quite the juicy size, Zatanna had puffed right up alongside a good majority of other victims of the Anonymous Onslaught of baked goods; Capes, Rouges, and Civs and all inbetween. Her face had puffed outwards into two round, bouncy cheeks that bobbed with her heavy movements, supported by a single though large facial fold that creased along where her neck should be as it battled for space against her too-tight bow tie.

Her coat, stretched and stitched magically no doubt, looked tailor-fit to her new flabby body; coating her mammoth arms quite nicely in the black fabric and cuffing somewhere around the middle of her forearm, leaving a bulge of blubber between there and her fudge-smudged at the fingers gloves. Wrapping around her impressively thick spare tire was the remainder of her suit, so tight that it gave her chest a natural push-up effect, unable to contain the swaying behemoth that was her midsection from doing just that. It hung over her fishnetted thighs, though not so much as to conceal a few rips in them, and was otherwise undeniably large.

Even her top hat seemed far too small for her head, as if that had somehow gained weight alongside her!

"Much better" she said with satisfaction after hobbling into the apartment, patting her tummy, "This city seems to bear a grudge against a girl who likes to eat."

"You're telling me." Selina said, a sense of kinswomanship already preforged between the two of them due to... 'past incidents with a Mr. Thomas Elliot' (I'd suggest reading 'Heart of Hush') "A girl puts on a little weight and all of the sudden she's a pariah."

"I hear that."

"Zee!" the Question puffed from her seated position, still pinned down to the chair by her lethargic digestive system and equally lazy metabolism, "Stuff the small talk!" We've got to bring these hogs in for questioning!"

"I take offense to the term 'hog'." Talia huffed, her hand self consciously adjusting the hem of her sweater from its position well over her belly button

"I don't care what you... dios Mio..." here the Question paused to take a mighty belch before continuing with a heavy shade of red behind her mask, "I don't care what you take offense to! I'm running the show here and I say you four fat asses are what's making me turn into a parade blimp! Zatanna, hit them with the good stuff!" Renee barked, pointing a gloved hand at the murder of blubberous crones that stood (just barely) across from her and her coat-tailed companion

"Right!" she said with a newfound sense of duty. Taking on even one of the four of these women would have been very difficult had they been in their physical prime. Poison Ivy was quick, but always seemed to have some sort of killer plant up her sleeve. Talia had all kinds of crazy-ass assassin moves that had been instilled in her since birth. Catwoman was quick, had a whip, and wasn't exactly anything to sneeze at in the strength department either. And Harley was really just a big mouth with an even bigger hammer... she liked to swing both around pretty loosely. However, now that they were overblown versions of their ideal selves, this would be quite simple...

However, Zatanna was quite overblown herself. So this might get a little tricky.

"Tcirtres dna Etarapes!" she shouted

An invisible force pushed the four of their fat bodies apart as Zatanna readied herself. Talia was pushed into and forced against the wall, unable to move an undertrained muscle and overpowered by magic. Harley was thrown back into the kitchen, landing noisily amongst pots and pans, whereas Selina was pushed down the hall, onto her belly and therefore rendered helpless. A lot like an upside-down turtle. Ivy, however, was pushed within a reasonable walking distance for the newly lethargic magician.

Slowly she waddled closer to the chloropathic baker, giving the Question a nice view of her overinflated hindquarters of cellulite om-nomming her black shorts.

She huffed, "I'm only going to ask this one time, Ivy. One time." she had taken a lot of mentoring lessons from Batman, just as he had learned escape artistry from her father. And as she tried her darndest to look menacing in the eyes of the green blob she held pinned against the wall like so many Sith Lords to admirals, it was plainly obvious that she was not as scary as the Bat. Or anyone else under his wing for that matter.

"Tell me the truth, Ivy." she began again, "Are you four in charge? Do you know who's ruining all our figures?"

Zatanna stepped closer, the overall girth between the two of them colliding at the middle and preventing them from getting and closer to one another. Ivy winced; having just come from outside, dear chubby Zee hadn't had enough time to get her body fat situated back to body temperature yet- she was cold whereas pampered Ivy had spent all day inside with the heater.

"No." Ivy said with a cocky smirk, "I have no idea who or what is swelling us up like overripe fruit; and I don't like it any more than you do." she grinned evily, already having planned ahead.

"Fine, you've forced me to do this." Zatanna said with a sigh

"Be careful, Zee..." Question said, lurching forward past her taut tummy

"Ivy, are you in charge of Anonymous Sweets?" Zatanna asked, her face almost unnervingly serious, "Hturt eht em llet!"

And it was here that would be the ever-so experienced magician's downfall.

Ivy took a deep breath; showing the calm, level-headed person that she was and still happened to be, despite everything that had happened. She had known Zee's m.o. for quite some time now. The only obligation here was that her next sentence was to be the truth, as it would come out no matter what she did to stop it. This gave her plenty of time to close her eyes, relax, and summon up a concentrated dose of spores from within herself. These same spores that had been going into everything that had come out of her oven for the past year or so; or going into herself, Selina, Talia, and later Harley.

And Zee was about to get hit with a motherload of it.

She exhaled her very breath in her answer, making sure that her pheromones would reach the magician. "Yes." she hissed evilly as she watched the black-haired blob in front of her start to gag, "Yes I am."

"That's good enough for me!" Question said, finally trying to pry her enormous ass from the chair, "Let's get them back to... I don't know, somebody! Supes? Green Arrow? Fuck, we can give 'em to Huntress if she'll stop stuffing her face long enough to get some answers out of 'em!"

But Zatanna was far too busy choking at the moment to sling any more spells Ivy's way. The chloropath chuckled huskily as she watched the bulging mass in front of her double over the best her massive stomach would allow her to. She wheezed heavily as her top hat fell from her head, falling to her flabby hands and knees as she struggled for air.

"Z-Zatanna? You alright, Zee?"

However, there would be no immediate response to Renee's question. For the spores had already begun taking their effect on poor, unsuspecting Zatanna...
