1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
As soon as the bloated crimefighting duo's magical binge ended, their captors got to work on tying them down. This took up pretty much all the rope within the apartment to bind the superheroines.

"Shouldn't we gag the magician?" asked Talia, even further prevent means of escape. Ivy merely smirked, whispering a plan to the other three villainesses, Harley clearly excited upon hearing it, her fat body jiggling as she jumped up and down, slightly shaking the apartment.

Immediately, the red and black woman grabbed all the surplus sweets the Anonymous Sweets group had been saving plopped them on a tray and sat herself next to Zatanna's side.

"Kaerb r-" Zatanna tried to say before she was silenced by a cupcake thrust down her gullet. Renee cursed to herself, realized both that Zatanna's powers weren't going to work, and their captors weren't going to let up on stuffing the poor raven-haired girl. Question had to think of something fast to get them out of this. Being bound with ropes really limited their already hindered movement. No sneaky cut-the-rope tricks either. Renee knew she was about to regret her decision, but it was the only way they could get free. She whispered to Zatanna only two words: keep talking. The mage realized her plan, but hated what she had to do. Nonetheless, she did as she was told.

Treat after treat was shoved down Zatanna's gullet by Harley, completely oblivous that the magician growing belly began to tighten against their bindings...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: The two are helpless.

choices: they return to Curvy Canary, Hungry Hungry Huntress, and Super(bly obese) Girl
or perhaps some other random combination of Superheroines with funny fat titles.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
It took a total of two days.

Two days of sitting, eating, and watching helplessly as the four massive women lived out their debaucherous lifestyle of hedonistic indulgence and exploration of their own bloated bodies. Two days of no movement, no talking to one another; the only contact being whatever was being literally fed into awaiting mouths.

Of course Zatanna, Zee, took the brunt of it. Being able to turn an entire apartment building inside out with a few backwards sentences was a mighty power that was rightfully feared by even the mighty Anonymous group. So while Renee was aloud to speak her mind, as she did in the form of constant cursing and disturbingly vivid threats on what she was going to do to each individual member of the entrepreneurial group, Zatanna was forced under a vow of silence the entire time; force-fed large quantities of baked goods specially dosed with Ivy's spores in an attempt at keeping her magical little mouth shut.

Harley seemed to take the most from the experience of satiating such a large woman's appetite, given that she'd grown quite fond of the appetites of the women around her and herself. She was to stay behind while the other girls struggled and waddled around helplessly trying to make up for Harley's absence by mostly keeping to their rooms until the preparations had been made to take care of their two snoops accordingly via a few handy assassins that were due for duty. Usually, Harley would sit in the back and mindlessly pop treat after treat into Zatanna's awaiting mouth as she zoned out on her monumental rump roast, watching either the television or whichever morbidly obese vixen happened to waddle her way into the living room. When she was on her last tray or so, she'd simply ask whichever girl was nearest to the three of them to take over while she went back to baking.

It was a relatively simple existence, this one. Her insomnia helped. Mental instability combined with a natural manic-depressive disorder (sans the depressive part) assured that she would have no problems staying up late for a couple of days keeping the Big Z (as she had been so cruelly codenamed around the apartment) satisfied.

However, putting Harley in charge of this little project would prove to be a major slip in judgement, but we'll get to that little oversight later.

All this time, Zatanna and the Question were, of course, growing. The former much more than the latter, the latter barely much at all, but still. A diet of nothing but extremely high quantities sugar and dough would not only rot your teeth (thank goodness the Justice League provided dental) but that, combined with literally sitting tied up in a chair all day would definitely cause a girl, any girl, to put on weight. Seeing that those ropes were plenty tight around the two of them to begin with, it wouldn't take much to break out of them.

When they were first secured, Zatanna's tummy bulged out of the gaps that Harley's tying had left; a lot like big fleshy balloons. They were tight, constricting. Zatanna constantly whimpered as they only grew moreso, the pain of her growing body against the not-growing ropes was almost too much for the overfed magician. However she couldn't do much to stop it!

Even if she wanted to stop eating, which she did, something inside of her had changed. When Ivy had done... whatever it was to her that she did, Zatanna inhaled almost everything edible that was just laying around in the apartment. That hunger, her insatiably voracious appetite, had not left her. She was filled with an all-consuming desire to eat! Not just cookies and cakes and pies and all that other crap that Harley had been stuffing down her throat, but she found herself with a maddening urge to feast! To gorge no matter how full her stomach had gotten. And she was frightened.

That's a lot on a girl's mind.

It's no wonder she barely noticed when Harley fell asleep on her plush tummy at two'o'clock in the morning, the very day that Talia had prothesied that her assassins would be ready for the two of them.

The Question nudged her flabbier companion, "Z-Zee?" she whispered, not daring to wake the slumbering sociopath on Zatanna's tummy. As Zatanna had gotten a stronger dosage than the Question, the latter was not inclined with the same hedonistic tendencies- rather, at least not as strong. Though, to be fair, she hadn't been fed nearly as well as Zatanna had been. Perhaps it was fate, though perhaps it was because her mouth could only hurt feelings and smoke cigarettes, not conjure an elephant from thin air. "Zee, you up?"

"Phmeh?" Zatanna asked, caught off guard, "Q-Question?" Her voice was cracked, having not used her vocal chords for anything other than swallowing slick sugary goodies for the past fourty-eight hours. "Y-Yeah, I'm up..."

"Then get us out of here!" she growled, a vein pressing against the forehead of her mask, "I think you can break the ropes now..."

Zatanna sighed, realizing that her companion was right. She took a deep inhale and flexed her expansive belly, marveling as buttons popped and stitches ripped across its fleshy expanse. Slowly the tensed ropes clenched painfully over her overbearing stomach. Ever so slowly, as she whimpered and cried in pain, Zatanna's girth won the battle of the bulge and broke the ropes- letting all of each of them hang free in freshly fattened glory.

"Th-there..." she huffed, red and sweaty from the exertion, "I could really use a snack right about now..."

"Zee, all you've been doing for the past two days is eat. I think you can miss stuffing your face long enough to realize that you could have just Zatanna'd your way out of the ropes and gotten us back to Headquarters."

"Um..."

"Whatever. You owe me a gym membership, tubs." Question huffed, "If I ever see another brownie again I'm going to barf. Get us back to Headquarters, Canary's gonna be pissed."

Zatanna was caught staring longingly at some of the undevoured snacks Harley had planned to feed her. Her eyes widened, a dreamy look across her face as she imagined what all of those must taste like- well able to at this point in her obesity. She inched closer to them on her chair slightly before remembering the slumbering harlequin of hulking asscheeks asleep on her belly... no way out but magic.

"Uh, sure." she said dumbly, "Esab ot epacse Annataz dna Noitseuq... htiw, um, srialce etalocohc fo esac taht htiw!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Ginppans Sepors!

choices: Zatanna casts a spell and the Watchtower starts to fall out of orbit later on.
Check in on the Sirens/Anonymous and their plans/binging.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
In the blink of an eye, the pair were out of the clutches of the fattened Sirens and back at their base, aka The Watchtower.

Still, even here on the moon, the fattening designs that had stared with a bloated Ivy had taken root. One only had to pop into the cafeteria to see the gluttons the former heroines of the world had made of themselves.

Vixen, rooting around with a pig's snout then devouring enough food to fill her four cow stomachs, big rear high in the air as she did so, showing every quivering inch.

Huntress, one of the first to fall out of the Justice League and also one of the largest, all of her a monument to gluttony and adipose, nowadays found taking up an entire bench by herself, eating, swallowing, and belching offering little else but curses besides that as she imagined doing horrible things to whoever had gotten her hooked on all this delicious food.

Supergirl, who found herself back on Earth asking Ma Kent for more and more at breakfast, lunch, and dinner, was banned from the farm, or at least until the Kent's restocked on food, had made her way to the Watchtower cafeteria, where the food replicators worked round the clock to fill her multiple rolled gut.

Wonder Woman, the paragon of heroines, now the fattest among them, a titan of gluttony, her powers used to cram her maw more than saving people nowadays, though she always offered one of her obese shoulders for her comrades to cry on or comforting them with large portions of her meals as they talked and feasted, but mostly feasted.

It was among such obese comrades that Zatanna and The Question had found themselves once again, Black Canary waiting for their report, an immobile Oracle by her side, munching on Oreos, Dinah occasionally grabbing a handful for herself.

"So...what happened?" Dinah asked between chews.

Question broke everything down for her, Zatanna nodding here and there but mostly looking at all the gorging heroes all around, starting to waddle towards a table, digging into the case of eclairs she'd snatched from the Sirens.

"Thank goodness you guys managed to escape," Canary stated.

"Yeah, though I'm still damn hungry. Just don't give me any sweets."

Canary nodded and motioned towards the cafeteria.

Question waddled towards Zatanna, sitting down beside her, their fat rears squishing together, to say nothing of their love-handles pressing together.

"Thank you Zee, I'm sorry if I sounded harsh back there. I'm grateful for you and I owe you one."

Zatanna nodded, her eyes still glazed as she ate.

Her mind was still fuzzy.

She wanted to feast, eat more and more, but more than that strong desire was another...

She wanted everyone around her to do nothing but eat...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: they return to Curvy Canary, Hungry Hungry Hunt...

choices: Oracle, Question and their assembled team gather in Gotham for the first strike
Talia has thought ahead, trading info for food with a member of the new team
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Unlike many of her fellow Capes, Barbara Gordon had kept a relatively cool head about the dietary catastrophe that was affecting the American population. Sure, she was more than a little upset that she had been forced to buy a double-wide wheel chair, but she simply chalked it up to necessity.

Besides, being chair-bound had left her pretty large in her posterior area to begin with. If she was going to have an overinflated rear like everybody else, she might as well not have to worry about squashing her only means of transportation with it.

The swollen Oracle had insisted that the Question come to the War Room so as to plan a proper counter attack. And as the bottom-heavy latina waddled alongside her, Gordon found herself more than a match for her slow steady pace. The electric whir of her new motorized wheelchair had really added some pep into her proverbial step, enough to lug around her exanding form and keep it up to speed with everyone else's.

Renee's, the Question's, own step had been long sapped; taking her walk from a powerful march to a drudging waddle as her inflated bottom half fought for space within her jeans, made only more akward by the uncontrollable jiggling that her volatile midsection insisted upon at every step. She wasn't having much fun being this size, and she aimed to get her revenge one way or another...

"I've seen that look before." Oracle said with a smirk, still zipping alongside Montoya while avoiding the haphazard wobbling of her saddlebag thigh

"You can't see my face." she puffed back, shifting her hidden features to face the crippled Cape, "How could you possibly know what kind of look I'm making?"

"When your mentor's Batman, you kind've learn a thing or two about brooding." Oracle answered lightheartedly with a pat to Question's side, "I didn't even need to see your eyes."

"Yeah, well..." Renee began, her rage burning brightly behind her faceless facade, "I still say that we stick it to Ivy and her little harem. Those brujas were bad when I was on the Force, but they've become so... so..."

"Why don't we finish this conversation in private, Ms. Montoya?"

At that Gordon whipped her chair around to face the bloated latina and delicately brushed the cold silver walls of the Watchtower with her soft net-surfer's fingers. A mechanical hissing opened an otherwise unplaceable door, a common feature on the highly advanced space station. She wheeled inside, Question following soon after...

Whereas elsewhere, in the cafeteria, some of the other heroes had taken a much different approach in coping with their ruined physiques.

While Barbara Gordon and Renee Montoya decided to take the problem with logic and reasoning, the others were far more inclined to help feed the beast that killed them and indulge in whatever edible substance happened to be nearby.

Huntress sat at her table, alone, eating the crap out of just about everything as she popped out of her biggest outfit. Ice was currently contemplating whether or not to have yet another slice of cake while Fire was busy checking out the new awesome rack on Ice. Supergirl was busy satiating her superhuman appetite, begrudgingly having no choice but to subdue her latest weakness: hunger. Wonder Woman, now completely bound to her place by her suffocating amount of blubber, could only contemplate how far she had fallen from grace as she was fed by Stargirl and Donna Troy. Everyone was so ruled by their appetite, without much of a choice in the matter. Ivy's plan had truly worked in ways she couldn't have imagined.

But there in the center, was Zatanna, who hadn't stopped eating since she had arrived.

No small talk, no games. She had plopped her mighty self into one of the tables and began chowing down as if she were charged with eating everything in the world. She was an animal, ripping at tearing at things that needent be eaten so fervently. Making low, hungry grunts and groans as she gorged with her new gluttonous instincts of hedonism. She was consumed with an all-powerful need to feed!

Her arms, getting tired, drooped heavily beside her- never to be used again- as she loathed the aching muscles in her underused arms. The past two days had opened her up to a new world- one where one didn't need to use their arms to ease hunger.

"Em Deef." she said dimly, a stupid smile on her face as the mountain of food around her began to levitate around her in orbit.

Slowly, her meals floated into her mouth.

Who needed hands when she had magic?

"Erom Doof." was what she said five minutes later, when she ran out...

***


"So it's agreed." Question said concretely, "We need a team."

Oracle nodded, her soft double chin moving likewise in agreement, "Exactly. We'll need to take down all of Ivy's manufactoring plants. But since they went national, that'll be a bit of a stretch."

"Why can't we just go in and take them all down ourselves?" Question huffed, removing herself from the table and the table from inbetween her belly rolls, "All we need is Supergirl or some shit to bust in there and take 'em all out. No big hassle."

"The plants probably have the recipe down to a patent by now, which means just taking out Ivy won't do anything." she said conclusively, "She, Harley, Selina and Talia will get booked and we'll all still blow up like blimps until there won't be any fighting back." she said harshly, "We need to manufacture an antidote to Ivy's spores. If I can get all the variations, I should be able to get something, at least something to at least kill withdrawls. That'll make it a lot easier for us all to lose weight and get back to normal."

"So, what are you suggesting?"

"There are eight major plants across the country. One in Metropolis, One in Star City, three out west, one in Louisiana, and of course the biggest one in Gotham City."

"I'd imagine we'll be taking that one first?"

"Naturally." Oracle said with a stifled laugh, "I know those streets better than the tread on my tires."

"Won't they notice that all their plants aren't reporting back? Or at least that their money is drying up?"

"You saw them yourself, from what you've told me they're far too engorged with themselves to pay attention to the faring of their business. Hopefully they won't notice a thing, at least not until the very end."

"...Sounds like a plan."

"But we need to make it quick. With the rate everyone's growing, the Watchtower will be knocked out of orbit soon. We need to get as many samples of those spores as we can, as fast as we can. That way I can inject everyone with whatever we come up with and they can begin their weight-loss therapy."

"Woah, that's kind of a big deal..." Renee said rather flatly, "Is it safe for everyone to be up here?"

"As long as their growth remains constant, I'd say that the Watchtower has about eight months before it crashes into Earth. So as long as everyone can keep control of themselves, everything should be fine."

"That's all well and dandy, but..." Renee stopped, "...Say, how are you going to go cross-country? In your... erm, condition, I mean?"

"I'll keep fort in one of the bases we capture." Oracle answered, "Being surrounded by all of those samples should give me more than enough to work with so that it doesn't come down to anything nail-biting."

"Alright, alright, I got it..." Question grumbled, her head throbbing from thinking so tactically. She was much more of a mystery person, not a general. "Dios Mio this is tough. I need a snack..."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: The Rise of Resolution.

choices: And so the Reserves arrive...
And so the Reserves arrive (alternate lineup opportunity)
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Gotham City, two ante-meridiem, at its darkest.

A bar, long closed, makes for the setting. Boarded up windows weren't there for the grand closing, being a business in the rougher parts of Gotham meant that one had to have some form of security. The cold wrought iron bars made sure to "protect" the easily pickable locks. The owner had always been a little worried about the local crowd busting in and taking everything he had worked so hard for. But he could rest easy, wherever he was, in that the local villains that slithered about the Gotham City streets weren't the one to break and enter into his once precious bar.

A bar, long since closed for reasons forgotten, made for the perfect setting.

Apparantly the owner had left in a hurry, the decorum was untouched. Aside from the scars of Renee's rather brutal entry, one could hardly tell that another soul had even bothered with this place. Luckily for one faceless vigilante, this meant that the booze had been left untouched.

She sat at the bar shot in hand, heavy rear enveloping her stool into its fleshy mass. She refused to grab another one, refusing to simply condone to her gluttonous physique's demands. No, she was far too stubborn. Too stubborn to let her body win over her mind and training. She was in charge, Renee kept telling herself as she downed another shot of scotch.

Not far from her the soft glow of a computer screen illuminated a corner of their setting, the light clicking of keys provided rhythm to an otherwise silent night. Her vibrant red hair stood out amongst all else as she hovered over the screen of her portable laptop, leaning into the table and suffocating the surface with her upper body fat. She continued typing, unperturbed by the glass meeting the hard wood of the bar. Her glasses reflected pinpointing positions and battle strategies while her flabby arms echoed with every strike of a key.

All in all, things were quiet.

Quiet in a profound way, of course.

But quiet still.

The both of them hoped mutually, despite their standpoints on the situation, that the night would not conclude with only them. Their plans were possible with only them, yes. But they needed haste and numbers if they were to earn the triumph that they so desperately craved. And haste would only come with numbers, given their individual physiques and physical limitations. Numbers would only arrive if they were lucky, and if their best truly hadn't fallen as hard as the rest of them.

The night was still young, as Bruce might have put it.

"Hey... O." Q beckoned from the bar, "You really think they're coming, right?"

"I know somebody's coming." O responded flatly as she stared into her screen

"How can you be so sure?"

"I just know things." O said with a closing 'click!' of her computer, "I know I can at least count on Steph... Batgirl, to show."

Without the light of a computer the whole bar returned to it's dark, hopeless ambiance. The Question, turning on her fat rearend to face Oracle, hid a look of hopelessness behind her mask and a shroud of shadow. Pale moonlight peered in through the boards on the windows, leaving rays of faint blue light across the walls of the Zero Hour.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Bleak and Bleary

choices: A long struggle for the plant but they succeed. Oracle makes base amongst sweets
There's something strange going on either on Watchtower or in Anonymous HQ
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Sitting in a building that once held such violent, rowdy people in the hustle and bustle of their lives didn't quite make Renee Montoya feel any better about their faring against the conglomorate business. A lot like the League, Renee knew for a fact that this building had been a local hotspot torn down by Anonymous. Like the League, it was now an empty skeleton of what it had been before. Unlike the League, the denizens of this bar would find another place to fill their needs. For most capes, the League is all they had...

"You know if they don't show, it means that they've won, right?" Question said to the poster of pre-Anonymous Harley Quinn hanging behind the bar, "It means that they've got everybody... except us."

"No, it doesn't." Oracle wheeled herself to face Question's bulging butt, "Even if Batgirl doesn't show, which she will, all that means is that we're stronger. And that it's up to us to save all of the League -and the Watchtower- from failing."

"How can you be so sure that Batgirl will--"

Katoom!

"Shh." Oracle hushed, "Did you hear that?"

Of course she had, how could she not have?

The roof had obviously heard it, judging by the two sizable imprints left on the ceiling.

Slow, meathodic movements beat heavily above two bloated Capes as it slowly inched towards the front door. Finally, a drop from atop the building sounded by an 'Oof!' was the key of arrival. There, mostly visible through the breaks in the wood, hunched a large black shape, golden hair draping across its broad shape. Both women's ears, trained and honed for detection, picked up on its heavy panting, along with the sound of fabric brushing against fabric. At once the shape released it's black shadowy cape and slowly tottered to its feet, revealing quite the generously padded form.

Slowly it hobbled, with its golden mane bobbing in the cold night air along with the rest of its bulging physique, and started towards the bar.

"Your heart moniter's going nuts." Oracle said lightheartedly as she turned herself to face the front door, the plump shape waddling in. "You're really out of shape, Miss Brown."

It was, on cue, Stephanie Brown. Batgirl. However Robin's darkly humourous jest of calling her "Fat Girl" wasn't far off anymore.

Grown quite plump in the Anonymous takeover sweeping the country, Stephanie Brown's flawless physique had bloated outwards in favor of one much more inclined to that of your typical tubby teen. Her body, still rather thin when compared to her peers, kept a certain shape of hourglass. Albeit with much more sand than usual. A proudly seductive swelling of her breasts and thighs was taken a little too far as the yellow bat insignia was distorted along the contours of her bulging breasts; its tail end bulging upwards as it rested atop her puffy middle.

"Oh stuff it." Stephanie said, blushing beneath her bat-mask, "Like you can run and jump rooftops half as good as me."

"How's the new suit treating you?"

"Like a glove. Literally." she jest, "But it's comfortable, I'll give you credit."

"It's gonna have to be." Oracle said seriously, "What with your new curves, you've slowed down quite a bit. The suit's muscle stimulants should help you out, but try to control yourself."

Question rolled her eyes underneath her mask.

"So this is it?" she spat venomously, "This is our backup?" she pointed harshly at the swollen Brown before her, "Dios Mio, she's not that much better than anyone on the Watchtower! Come on Oracle!"

"Actually, I thought she handled the rooftops quite well."

A foreign shape, one of slick and lithe contours, wriggled it's way into the bar. A thin frame was almost a suspicious sight for the two flabby heroes. As it reached the moonlight, Oracle and Question recognized a familiar, sleek leather costume that filled them with anxiety.

"S-Selina?" Gordon asked quietly, "Q-Q, you said that--"

"Close: Holly Robinson." she answered quietly, "I ran into Batgirl and she filled me in."

"I don't think we would have called for you, Gato Pequeño." Question barked, "At least... O, tell me you didn't call for her!"

"I didn't."

"She didn't." Holly answered venomously, "I'm only here because... I've seen what's happened to Selina. Hanging around Ivy all this time... or whatever's become of Ivy... she's changed. I don't know if its something that Ivy put into the air or whatever, but she's changed. Selina used to be my hero when I was... well, I guess she still is kinda my hero. Its up to me to help her get back to normal. And I since I know what you're doing, I thought that this would be the perfect opportunity to help you. Help Selina... Catwoman."

"Touching." Question snapped, "Tell us why you're thin."

"I work out." she answered vaguely

***


The rest of Oracle's reserves would arrive shortly after.

Standing left to right, lined up in all of their individually flabby forms, was the last hope in the fight against global obesity... at least organized global obesity.

The first would be Dawn Granger, Dove. Left relatively thin due to her hardened sense of self-control and the whole "inner peace" thing, Dawn was in relatively good shape. However a big, disproportionate middle bulged outwards to make one hell of a muffin top. Out of costume, as she wasn't in danger, her white hair was pulled into a ponytail and allowed to hang loosely onto the back of her blue coat. Should the situation arise, she would play mediator. And most definitely, the situation would arise.

Namely because next to Dawn stood her sister, Holly, or Hawk. Whereas Dawn was the avatar of peace and well being, Holly took up the mantle of a much more violent justice. Brash and rather arrogant, she was much less pleasant to be around. However she seemed to have sported a much better set of breasts than her sister these days- something that she loved to hold over her head as much as possible with as much sneering as could be done. Also out of costume due to no immediate danger, she would most definitely be of help in many situations, from someone with a lead pipe or a candlestick approached them or a deadly spore released into the air. For now though, she was Holly. And that was abrasive enough.

Next to the Granger sisters stood a very different type of bird. No flight, nor much agility at all anymore, would aid this grounded canary as she sung her way into the bleeding ears of her opponents with her Canary Cry. However, in an interesting development, her alto had become much lower in her swelling. Her belly hung uselessly between her swollen fishnetted thighs. Nearly busting out of her leather jacket, Black Canary's choker was absolutely hidden beneath her abundant neckfat.

And finally stood a massive hill of fat once known as Supergirl. Bigger than even Oracle, Kara's superhuman appetite had been amplified once introduced to Anonymous, and she had practically not stopped eating since. Swelling out, weighing in at probably about four-hundred, the only thing that kept her as mobile as ever was her super strength. Her large middle squished outwards from underneath her top, clapping heavily against her equally tubby thighs. She was simply here in case of heavy lifting or super-strengthed minions were to show up. She was just hungry a lot now, and it was in agreement that no matter how heavy the boxes or crates they were to unload, Super-Hungry Supergirl was not to touch a single one of them.

And with that, the night still young, the onslaught would begin...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: the Reserves

choices: Holly does so and starts putting on some pounds later on.
Holly doesn't, stammering about not wanting to get fat. Renee is concerned.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Many waddling, a couple striding forward, the heroines made their way to the location of the plant.

It took a lot of time, especially when the heavier members had to stop looking owing to exhaustion, but they finally found it.

Renee had been expecting a huge mass of a plant, especially considering that this plant was supposedly the master plant from which all the other were copied, but in the end, the insidious plant looked just like a common variety weed.

Picking it up gingerly, Renee and her squad made their way out, returning to Oracle, who had decided to hunker down in a bakery.

Oracle's bulging cheeks did nothing to diminish her glare as she saw her comrades return laden with not only the plant but crate after crate of Anonymous sweets. Swallowing her latest donut, Oracle demanded an explanation.

"Look at us O, we're all fat, or at least chubby. Except for Cat whatever. We need to eat sometime."

Oracle sighed but nodded, Renee plopping a box of Anon sweets right by her and in easy reach.

"Now, after we eat, we'll go over the next plant in Metropolis," Oracle announced.

But the rest weren't listening, already digging into the sweets, all except for Holly.

Kara, her mouth crammed full of food, held out a cookie towards her.

"C'mon Holly, dig in!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: A long struggle for the plant but they succeed....

choices: Metropolis, one week later. Holly is proving trustworthy enough. Little progress
Metropolis, 13 days later, Holly's actions arouse suspicion. Strange development
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Holly's initial refusal didn't arouse much suspicion.

No one could really blame her, given that she was cornered by a sea of feminine blubber that that brand of particular sweets had indirectly caused. It was only in human nature to want to preserve themselves in pique fighting conditions, so the whole thing was dropped.

However, if it was a person's job to find suspicion in even the simplest of acts, it was the Question's. Renee Montoya's.

There were many subtle hints that could give away someone's ruse, most of which are involuntary. Most Capes and Villains are trained not to give away these secrets by identifying and then suppressing the urges that create them; especially those who tend to skulk around Gotham City, practically a modern-day Gomorrah. That being said, Renee was always the best, save for maybe Vic, at finding just about anything when most would have just given up.

Of course, Vic was crazy.

And this life had led her more than just a little off the deep end when it comes to unfounded suspicion and downright grasping methods at conspiracies.

But, like Ralph Dibney, she had a real nose for it.

Question watched as the solitary lean member of Oracle's Reserves sat around with the rest of her bloated companions, making comfortable usage of the floors of Anonymous' Bakery within their production plant. Her tight toned rear barely mussed from the act of squatting down... it had been a while since she'd seen such a marvel of the human form. And when compared amongst the others, flabby untoned and downright massive in some respects, she had to admit that having someone who could get through tight areas would definitely be beneficial...

Apparantly Renee wasn't as subtle as she might have thought herself to be; even behind her mask Dinah Lance was still able to deduce that the bottom heavy detective was staring daggers at the would-be Catwoman.

She cocked her head subtly to the right, indicating that she wished for a word with her.

Fantastic.

Both huffing hiefers rose to their feet, weighed down by their individual jiggly parts as the remaining members of the Reserves were left to ponder the gravity of the situation. However things were soon forgotten; as Hawk made a crude remark about the size of Renee's posterior, to which Dove pointed out that "she would definitely know about being a giant ass", to which Holly and Supergirl concured as the latter stuffed three donuts into her mouth, once again offering but meeting refusal at the hands of Holly.

All in all, things were going pretty good except for Question's initial distrust of their newest member. But that was to be expected. Vic would have insisted on a full-body cavity search for small cameras, voice recorders, and certain breeds of electron-transmitting animals that would generally serve the same purpose. The fact that she failed to perform these searches made Renee either a better Question than Vic Sage, or a better one.

***


Working directly in the bakery of the Anonymous' Gotham City branch had a lot of technological advances that working almost anywhere else within the factory would not have provided. Talia had ensured mass production through her vast wealth and deeply rooted connections, meaning that a lot of ovens were to be plugged in and grounded so as to ensure optimum production. All Oracle had to do was get someone to unplug and remove an oven or two (that was a job for Supergirl) and set up what would be her very own Batcave of sorts. Seven monitors sat a front, each with a different screen that held pertinent information- one being Stephanie's bodily statistics as she stood watch outside and another showing results from the plant harvested from the cracks in the tiles.

Being trained by Batman had it's advantages. From a relatively young age, Barbara Gordon had learned how to take in large amounts of information and sort it out accordingly. This, combined with her photographic memory, would eventually lead her to becoming the Oracle that so many superheroes today depended on. However training under the wings of a Bat often led to bouts of insomnia, a nasty side-effect of working so many late nights.

Barbara was, also, well versed in the grooming of plants and horticulture- as were all mentors of Bruce Wayne. She was well aware that the sample harvested from the main room was far from the only source of the viral spores Ivy had grown, however it provided just enough information to give her a little insight on the plant's strain.

Unfortunately for Barbara, one of the many things that she failed to emulate in Bruce would be his incredible self-control.

"Alright... time to get to work."

She wheeled herself over to the conveyer belt as she awaited the results of her scanning, taking in potential aid and assistance of her surroundings and how things could have been used to her advantage. An extra outlet here and there, preferably one that wasn't too out of the way. Just the usual stuff. However she noticed that, with the flick of a simple switch, the assembly line came to life with a quiet hum. Four rows of black rubber and ovens, complete with big red metal mouths for everything to tumble out of, suddenly began sliding once again, back from the dead.

Oracle couldn't help but watch with interest as the first of the newest batch of sweets came out wrapped and pretty not even two minutes later.

When they had invaded the base, things had been shut down for the night. The "powered" members of their team took it upon themselves to take out as many of Talia's culinary-converted assassians themselves as the others stuck to destroying machinery... apparently they had missed this one.

Oracle wheeled herself over to the end of the line, normally where cardboard boxes were to be placed and collect the shipment of... what looked to be muffins. Though there were no boxes to await the packaged delights. Just a cold, tiled floor where they weren't to be eaten...

She reached out and grabbed one before it touched the floor. Still warm. Plastic and package, still warm from the processing plant. She'd never had one of Anonymous' sweet hot off the line before... and she had forgone eating with her comrades to set up her new office. Perhaps she could...?

It wouldn't be long before she forgot her work for the night entirely. Not a single muffin touching the floor from the first line. The gluttonous Oracle would see to it that no treat would fall behind as she eagerly led them to their pearly-white demise.

***


"I don't want to hear a word of it, Question."

"Look, you seem like a really smart lady, despite the whole "biker chick" thing you've got going on." Montoya responded harshly, "Let me spell it out for you, 'That little bitch is working with Catwoman.', now tell me it doesn't make sense."

"It doesn't make sense." Canary said flatly as she crossed her puffy arms over her belly, "Why help us if she's on Ivy's side? She said it herself, she doesn't like Ivy's grip on Catwoman. What makes you so sure that she's against us."

"She's thin."

"And? So were all of us this time last year."

"Things were different then."

"Look, just because she's not a hobbling fatass like the rest of you--

"Rest of us."

--right, us, doesn't mean that there's anything sinister or suspicious going on with Holly. She's just here to help. And honestly, I'm a little glad that a girl like that can show such self-control when confronted with these things. It gives me hope, and it makes me proud. Can you say the same?"

"Of course not." Question responded, "It makes me suspicious."

"If it weren't for her, it'd been you unplugging Oracle's computers. And judging by how big your ass is getting, you'd have gotten stuck quicker than Wally can down a sandwich."

"I don't trust her." Montoya spat, "And I'm not going to. I'm the Question, God dammit. It's my job."

"Well then I'm reassigning you." Canary hissed back, "Get your ass in gear or go back to the Watchtower. We don't need to be ripping at each-other's throats right now."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Suspicions and Shirking

choices: The Sirens/Anon find out about the stall and celebrate by stuffing one another.
Renee manages to discover evidence regarding Holly's loyalties.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
"A little help?" Oracle asked from the doorway of their newest base, yet another factory Anonymous had owned. That said doorway was considerably wide enough for most of the fat heroes to get through okay, minus a few minutes of jiggling and jostling along with pushing from behind by the others in Supergirl's case, was a surprise for Renee.

Looking at Oracle's chair, The Question noticed that it could easily fit through the door. The quivering gobs of fat Oracle now called her lovehandles, on the other hand, was the problem.

"Alright, O, I'm going to push and you had better suck it in for all your worth, got it?"

"Mmmmhmmmmm...." Oracle replied, eating a box of Anonymous deepfried Twinkies.

Grunting, heaving with all her might, Renee managed to get the team leader through, both women panting, Renee on her back, her butt lifting her a foot off the ground, and Oracle hunched over as far as she could, trying to grab the box that had slipped from her fat digits.

Black Canary sighed as she watched them, but that didn't stop her from helping Renee up, grabbing the box for Oracle, and nabbing a few of those Twinkies for herself.

///

Holly was still resisting food but had been a huge help in getting them this base, clearing out the gang that had claimed it for their own turf with ease and working together with Supergirl to ensure that they wouldn't try a reprisal.

She was so trustworthy that Renee had lowered her suspicions from definitely a traitor to might be a traitor.

Holly mostly hung out with Dove, enjoying her laid back, content nature, outright ignoring Dove's light pleading to try just one of the donuts or kruellers or one of the myraid of other sweets Anon had concocted. She also aided Dove in getting her costume on, as the serene heroine was indulging a bit more these days, owing to Hawk's peer pressure.

///
In fact all of the women were indulging more, whether because of Oracle's lack of self control or the refreshing of the Anon concoctions in the sweets, costumes were starting to rip, to say nothing of the clothing.

Canary had gone through a few pairs of underwear thanks to her now ballooning rump, figuring this specific gain was karma for pointing out how huge Renee's butt was.

Hawk's gain was all over, Dove's in her face, thighs, and rear.

Renee's was her gut, the fleshy singular mass now starting to become two huge rolls of fat.

Supergirl's was in her arms and thighs, reducing her effectiveness even more but she could still lift and fly.

Oracle's butt at first took the brunt of her onslaught of Anon treats, but now the weight was going everywhere, even her cankles.

Needless to say, the group was losing steam.

Oracle realized this, and had managed to obtain the precise location of the next plant, but hadn't yet shared it with her comrades, too focused on setting up her own personal conveyor belt of Anon sweets much like the setup she'd had by accident in Gotham.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Metropolis, one week later. Holly is proving tr...

choices: And neither are Oracle and Zatanna as they glut themselves into enormity...
And certainly neither are the women of Anonymous...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
"O, don't you think that you're taking this whole 'research' thing a little far?" Question pressed a gloved finger into the hammer of her ear, leaning into her own cheek slightly as she spoke to her currently absent team leader, "You could have at least come to Nevada with us."

"Mmmmno." came her response, staticky over long distance.

In the five weeks it had taken to systematically go piecing information together from base to base across the country, Oracle had been absent for four of them. And they weren't even done yet. Rather than hang around with the team she led, she had decided that a more stable base was more suited to her situation. By which of course she meant her obvious handicap of being chair-bound. It made sense when one looked at it logically. It certainly wasn't that she would hold the team back in their efforts to halt the crippling obesity that had gripped the greater part of the nation, though due to her inability to walk it certainly seemed that way. No, Oracle was just more of a behind the scenes person. Not one really accustomed to life outside the curtains anymore. She was in constant communication, even. So what's to worry about?

She must have really taken to the Plant in Metropolis...

"You've got B there, don't you?" Barbara Gordon's voice came in over the earpiece

"Yeah, but it's not the same." Montoya answered brashly, "We need as many eyes and ears on the field as we can get if we're going to be looking for information on how to take down Ivy."

"I've got a camera in her cowl and a piece in her ear. I can hear and see everything she does right here from Metropolis."

"Doesn't that seem a little lazy, O?"

"Welcome to the glories of modern technology. I'll give you the tour some time later."

Question lightly kicked a discarded magazine as she cut off communications, leaving Oracle to her own devices as she continued searching. Things hadn't been going nearly as well as she'd initially hoped; in the time that she and her begrudgingly titled "partners" had spent scouring every nook and cranny that these stupid factories had to offer, it seemed that nothing had gone right.

For starters, Holly Robinson was still a factor to be unaccounted for. While Oracle had done a background check and filled her in with whatever files were to be found in the League's article (that's rather generous, more of a footnote really) she had remained a bit of a wild card within their contained little community. She was an off one, always a little quiet. Her figure remained unchanged in the past few weeks, which only served to stir up some feelings of what was an admittedly petty jealousy within Renee. However she did her job, and that was only reason enough to suspect her even more. Especially when she practically had to put some of the others' faces to the grindstone to get a lick from any of them.

Supergirl had officially been reduced to just-past useless in Renee's book. Her appetite was bigger than her entire circumferential form, and that was saying something. If she didn't have Canary or Question breathing down her neck, it was no doubt that she could have eaten the entire factory clean enough to eat off of the floor. She was sweet, yes. But it was a heavy nuisance having to keep reminding her that they were trying to put a stop to the widespread takeover of the stupid factories. And while Kara eating all the treats would certainly accomplish that, it would definitely make things look suspicious enough to warrant an investigation on Anonymous' part.

Hawk and Stephanie were always fighting, the result of two headstrong personalities thrown together, and Dove was always trying to play mediator. The two girls would butt heads constantly, occasionally bellies if they actually got close enough, and have been known lately to spend the entire day getting so distracted by their bickering that they let an important ticket of information slip by when they went through the computers' database. And what's worse? Dove was a comfort eater. So when she felt particularly stressed about those two going at it like two overstuffed rams, she would console herself with eating the very treats that everyone was trying so hard to find what made them so dangerous to ingest (and that Canary had to work so hard to keep Kara from eating herself.)

Dinah was constantly challenging Renee's authority, too. That made things pretty hard on the team as a whole. It seemed that lately Canary just seemed to pick whatever Question stood against and played the Devil's Advocate just to get a rise out of her. That stupid fat stomach of hers was no match for all the stupid fat in her head, if you asked Question.

Oh, and they'd had to stop for new civilian clothes and costume modifications since their departure.

Three times.

Granted, most of them were for Supergirl, but point remained: Renee's ass wasn't getting any smaller, nor were any of the other miscellaneous bulgy parts that the Reserves held to themselves. It was looking more and more hopeless as their diets began to consist more and more of the very beast they were trying to slay. Hell, Supergirl was having to break down doorways just to get anywhere anymore! Something had to be done, and fast, or they were all going to be large lardy hills of naked blubber.

Skulking about as a woman her size could do, Renee cautiously avoided the piercing eyes of Canary as she watched Dove literally get between the feuding girths that were Batgirl and Hawk. They were certainly getting heavier these days. Hawk's outfit was magical and Batgirl's commissary to her size thanks to science. At least for now, they could hold up. But Canary had obviously given up on fishnets or anything constricting. Renee could only chuckle as she took in the sight of Lance's badonkadonk, remembering with wicked glee how she liked to constantly poke verbal barbs towards her own admittedly generous amounts of butt blubber.

Her search had led her to Holly Robinson, probably the only one taking her work seriously around here anymore. Renee watched quietly as the young woman, their own Catwoman if you will, clacked diligently on the computer screen, making up for absent Oracle in the best way she could

"Any progress?" Montoya asked

"No, not yet." Not even a jump. This girl was either really good or being honest.

"What's that?"

"An order form for double-wide lingerie." Holly said plainly, "Judging by the amount of leather pertaining to it and the whip, I'd say it's Selina's."

"Why... why in the world would you have that up?"

"To remind me of what I'm doing here, Question." she spat, turning in her chair, "I'm here to help Selina get back to her old self again, no matter what. I can't stand the thought of her living it up as a raunchy, sex-crazed ball of flesh with Poison Ivy." she said, turning back to her screen, "And I'm going to put a stop to it. Even if I have to make an antidote myself."

"You... you really look up to Selina, don't you?"

Holly turned back, removing her goggles as she did so. "Yeah... I do. She used to take care of this gang I was in when I was a kid... and she was, like, my hero. And I would... I still would do anything to help her."

If she hadn't been an emotionally hardened crime fighter, who'd suffered from divorce heartbreak, addiction, death, and the strain of being ousted from her family, Renee might have shed a tear. However, the notion was still sweet.

"Good work." Montoya answered flatly, patting her on the back, "Why don't you take a break, go make sure Kara isn't taking a five-finger discount. I'll take over from here."

"Oh, no, I don't think you should--" Holly admonished as she was forced from the chair

CRACK!!

It split down the middle, the central podium of the poor thing snapped like a twig underneath the weight of the Question's mighty bottom half.

Renee's ass certainly wasn't getting any smaller...

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Zatanna smiled as she took a second to observe all the women in the Justice League Cafeteria. The replicators were singing, the food was flying to their mouths, aided by a bit of Zatanna's magic. Wonder Woman had been the first to ask her for magical aid in getting food to her mouth, Starfire and Wondergirl having long stopped being capable of feeding her. The rest followed like dominoes and now Zatanna had all of them gorging, worshiping the almighty food in all of it's many facets.

Zatanna herself was the largest, the high priestess of this cult of culinary treats. All of her was of equal size, which meant that there was a singular blob of fat that encompassed over seventy five percent of the Watchtower cafeteria, the rest of the smaller blobs which made up the female Justice League forced to orbit around her fat like moons.

Belching mightily as she finished off nine trays of burgers at once, Zatanna felt like a goddess.

A goddess that needed more of herself.

///

Oracle grunted as she lifted the huge "slice" of cake to her mouth, which in actuality was over half of the cake itself. She panted, wheezed, and started to whine when she couldn't get the morsel up to her mouth.

"Damn...hgn...hnn...ugh...stupid...orf...cake!"

Okay, it wasn't the cake's fault for being so delicious, just like it hadn't been the fifty hot dogs, six triple sundaes, and twenty donuts she had eaten forty minutes ago who were to blame.

She was getting fat.

Alright, she admitted as her near-useless fat arms sagged down onto her obese love handles, she was more than fat.

Still, the problem now was getting more of that awesome food into her mouth.

Wheeling herself around, she soon found a solution.

It took an hour, but she manged, with a lot of breaks, to get her mouth positioned so that the food would just fall in.

She could jerry-rig a funnel later, she decided.

Now it was time to see how fast she could get the Anon factory's production line going and how much she could really eat in one sitting.

///

Holly lay awake, a hand searching her middle.

No, she decided, no, no, no, it was impossible for that tiny, oh so tiny, bit of fat to be there on her stomach.

She hadn't eaten any of those treats, had stuck to black bread and water.

So why?

Why was it there?

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Elsewhere, clear across the country, said former Catwoman had planned quite the extraordinary evening with those equally extraordinary clothes. For, what the online order form failed to mention, it had been an exact replica of the Catsuit most recently used by Selina Kyle; one to her exact specifications. Though while she had put on some weight, as she seemed to do a lot, before it arrived Selina was certain that she could squeeze her massive body into the tight leather bodice. With some help, of course. And who better to help her than the no-necked doormat formerly known as Harley Quinn?

"Thanks for helping me into this thing, Harl."

"No problem, Kitty." she answered with a grunt as she forced the zipper past a particularly stubborn bulge of Selina Kyle's blubber, "Anythin' for a friend, right?"

"Right..." she huffed back, winded from the simple exertion it took to stand on her own two feet and lean against the wall. Her lethargic lifestyle had atrophied those perfectly sculpted muscles and replaced them, and then some, with pound upon pound of useless jiggly flesh. Tipping the scales at just about six hundred pounds, she was a far cry from the lithe and limber claim to fame she had prided herself on for so long.

Finally closing the cold metal teeth shut, Harley smiled and slapped Selina's wide bottom, watching with not-so-subtle amusement as the fleshy mass that was her buttcheek wobble inside the second skin of her outfit. Maybe just another, this time the other one. The same chill of arousal rushed throughout the horny harlequin as she watched both cheeks reverberate violently with her simple slapping.

"Watch it, Harl... I don't think I'll be able to get back into this thing if you pop me out of it."

Harley couldn't help but lick her lips. That would definitely be something she'd like to see. However she would control herself; pissing off a woman of Selina's size wasn't exactly the brightest thing to do.

"Sure, sure." she answered, trailing slightly, "Ya need any help down the hallway?"

Selina exhaled heavily as she pushed herself from the wall, tottering slightly as her unstable weight nearly toppled her. "No, I... I think I got it." she puffed as she lifted the cowl and goggles; her chubby cheeks bursting out of the mouth's line. Slowly Selina attempted towards the doorway, only to feel her fleshy hips press uncomfortably against the wood.

"Um... a little help with the door would be appreciated though." she said meekly, growing bright red beneath her mask.

Joy, now Harley had an excuse to touch those glorious thunderbuns!

"Right away." Harley answered with a sense of duty about her, hardly hiding the sinful glee that she anticipated from manhandling those killer jiggly buns of Selina's. With one doughy hand she pushed into the pliable flesh, more groping than pushing at this point. She giggled, feeling herself grow unusually flushed as she put her own considerable weight into Selina's back.

"Ow ow ow!!" Selina whined, "Harley, what are you doing back there?!"

"Just messin'." she grinned, "Don' worry Kitty-Cat I'll get you out."

The bubblebutted blonde then grinned like so much the cat she was resembled as she kneed the glorious ass-flesh that spread before her. Unlike Ivy, who got her jollies from force feeding everyone else until they were bigger than her, or Talia, who was simply just a histrionic glutton for attention, Harley was much more into kinetic relationships. With these newfound appetites of hers, Harley got more pleasure out of anything than getting to play with jelly-bellies or to just squish someone's extra rolls.

"Harleeeey!" Selina moaned as the addressed girl proceeded to play her massive asscheeks like a bongo drum, "Knock it off! I told Ivy to wait for me--

The clown princess of crime cut off the vastly overfed cat with a tug in the opposite direction. Miraculously, Selina's stuckfast middle was released from the wooden grip of the doorway. Selina panted, receiving quite a fright from the sudden pull. "Great job, Harl, but that's kinda not the way I need to go." she huffed as she turned back to the still-grinning pigtailed girl, "Ivy's just down the hallway, if I can get just two steps out I can lean on the wall and hobble over. You think you can help me out--

Again she was pushed, this time down to the couch. Selina grunted as she made impact with the re-reinforced sofa. "Harley!" she hollered, "Knock it off! You know I can't get up when I'm down here." Harley waddled over to Selina with a hungry glimmer in her bright baby blue eyes, a painted black smile across her face as her chubby cheeks dimpled with giddy glee. She giggled, sending her belly aquiver, and took one step forward towards the now pinned Selina Kyle.

She knelled, onto her tree-trunk knees, and began caressing the leathery dome that was Selina's lowest roll.

"Harley!" Selina fought back, shifting fruitlessly in her seat, "I'd imagine you've probably heard this before, but you're crazy!" she hollered, "Talia and Ivy are right down the hall, they can hear us--

"Puh-lease, Kitty Kitty." Harley said with a provocative tone, "They're doped outta their gourds on sweets. Besides... I don't think they're wriggin' their way outta their rooms any time soon."

It was then that Harley pounced. Literally, the woman jumped onto Selina's sizable stomach and grabbed her big puffy cheeks, pulling her in for a rough session of tongue. A woman possessed, Harley began pawing at Selina's many spare folds, particularly stretching her little fingers across her sizable lovehandles and going to town. Her big butt high in the air, Harley pressed herself against Selina as she mouthlested her.

And, much to her own surprise, Selina did little to fight back.

"Harley, I--

"Shh... Nuh-uh-uh Miss Kyle." she said seductively, "Now I have three big ladies aaaaaall to myself. And you don't find anything wrong with that, now do ya?"

"Well, actually I--

Harley dove back in for another long kiss as she slammed herself into Selina passionately

"How 'bout now?"

"A little less wrong."

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Oracle blinked.

The last few weeks had been a blur of eating, funnel sucking, and minimal computer work.

However, it appeared that her voice activated commands, her fingers now being useless for even typing, had bore fruit.

For there, on the computer before her, was a boon to their investigation.

She spoke into the communicator linked to Stephanie's cowl.

"O to Reserves, O to Reserves!"

///

Renee had despaired in the days that followed her chair breaking incident. Oracle couldn't be bothered to communicate with them, Dinah was still butting heads with her, and the rest of her team, sans Holly, was eating themselves to oblivion.

She had tried to resist but found herself pigging out more and more as the days turned into weeks.

Currently, she was struggling to pull up the zipper on her custom made XXXXXXXL jeans, when she heard Oracle's voice come from the stuffed Batgirl's cowl.

"O to Reserves, I've got something!"

Renee, despite the constriction of her clothes, replied.

"What is it? Is it a cure? Are we going to be skinny again?"

RRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPP!

Normally Renee would have groaned at the thought of ruining yet another pair of custom made clothes, but ignored that outburst, focusing on Oracle's reply.
