1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
"O? God dammit O, do you hear me?!"

"Loud and clear, Q." came the deep slur of a stuffed oracle on the other end, "Just gimme a sec... Put me on speaker, B? God the floor's really uncomfortable here..."

Stephanie obliged her absent mentor, stretching her fat forearm over her swollen bicep to press a small button in the earpiece. At once, the sounds of rumbling and shuffling filled the Anonymous' Louisiana branch as the massive redhead on the other end situated herself. "You alright over there, O?" Dinah asked from her seated position across from Question, "They haven't found you out, have they?"

"Oh, no. Nothing like that." Oracle's answer was a little too lighthearted, "Just... just, ughhh... there we go." she let out a heavy sigh of relaxation on the other end, resulting in heavy static right in Stephanie's ear. "Sorry 'bout that... mrpm... Now, where to begin?"

"How about the damn news?" Hawk barked

"Right, that." the cowl answered, "Alright, so I've been... working... on getting synthesizing a cure to Ivy's spores that all seem to come from these plants. The problem is, every spore has its own strand of DNA. It can have anywhere from five different kinds, all from five different plants. I've been working on picking apart the DNA from each of the samples you've sent back to me, and I think I might finally have a solution."

"So you've got a cure?" Holly asked hopefully

"Not exactly." came the cowl again, "Or I would have used it on myself. Believe me."

"So, what's the problem?" Canary asked throatily, "O, we're not getting any thinner... and you've got us all going cross-country fighting temptation with no food supply other than what we can find in these Plants. Its a wonder we can even move at this rate!"

"I know, I know." Oracle's deep voice came across as genuinely sympathetic to her team mates' plight, "Look, it's not exactly easy, do you have any idea how dangerous it is for me to be around all of these plants you keep sending me? I've been working pretty hard myself lately and--

"You used to do this kind of shit for Batman all the time!" Question barked

"and" she continued, not very perturbed by Montoya's outburst, "I think I've finally got something that I can work with. It won't help anyone lose any weight, at least I don't think so, but it should at least kill the withdrawals and possibly clear everyone's heads of those spores Ivy's packed into us. The good news is that it should be ready for delivery, and I've got ten vials of the stuff."

"And the bad news?"

"It takes a while for it to synthesize; I had to leave what I have on the pot for two days. You've got to wait for it to cool down or it doesn't work. It's extremely volatile, so if you get it too hot it'll explode, but if you get it too cold it'll kill the poison."

***


"So, what do we do?" Dove asked as she sat on her heavy hiney next to her bloated sister, "We can't all make it back to Gotham City, I mean just look at us."

She was, of course, referring to the immobilized seniors of the group. Question's derriere kept her completely pinned to the ground as her bulging stomach demanded that she kept it fed. Canary's was no better, though much larger than Montoya's. The two of them exchanged guilty glances, knowing that they had weighed their team down in both the literal and figurative sense.

Of course the juniors were just as bad lately. Hawk and Dove had bloated into twin tubs of imposingly built blubber. Dawn's incredible muffin top only exploded downwards as her lower half expanded every passing day, where Holly's bloated bust line only yielded back pain as she let her stomach swell and churn with sweets daily. Though, as an unforeseen added bonus, the constant threat of bodily failure had yielded them the ability to transform into their respective forms at will. So, yeah, there was that...

Supergirl's titanic tonnage was only movable by her super strength, but that was starting to get a little far-fetched as she started huffing and puffing from even the slightest of steps. More often than not, she would hover anywhere she needed to go, but she was starting to sink lower to the ground now. Batgirl was no better than Hawk, who despite general protests regarding her usefulness, had been labeled as the Oracle Oracle. Since all she seemed to do was sit down and channel Oracle's commands and stuff her face.

The only one unaffected remained to be Holly Robinson.

Question didn't like it. She would frown, but her face was getting too fat to stuff into her mask anymore. She knew that there was no hope for her and Dinah, at least not yet.

"Look... I think you girls should leave me and Dinah here."

Looks aghast were shared amongst them, audibly questioning their leader's decision. Of course they were all against the idea, having little to no leading skills themselves. Hell, Dove could barely keep Holly out of trouble, let alone an entire squad. Supergirl was in no shape to lead, and Hawk's leadership would only send them into disaster. That left one, one unwilling, but one.

"Holly, you have to go." Renee said softly in her accented slur, "Take these girls and lead them to victory."

"Q... I, I can't!"

"If you want to save Selina, then you'll go." she said softly as she leaned to her side and gripped Holly's hands between her own portly peelers, "Be quick, be sneaky, and be subtle."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: A Change in Leadership

choices: Holly and the team chows down, while Renee, Dinah, and Oracle do the same.
Ivy's plan has another unexpected, but horrible, effect on the Reserves.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Renee and Dinah took the cure immediately after receiving it from Holly, grateful that they wouldn't become immobile.

As it was, both women were nearing the seven hundred pound mark and had enough trouble getting around as it was.

So they decided to stay behind again, serving as the strategic planners for Holly's assault with the team on Anon's apartment.

Things had gone well so far.

Holly had had Supergirl bust in with her flab, surprising the pair. Batgirl, Hawk, and Dove dove in next, securing the abode though they hadn't completely covered every part of thet complex.

Holly emerged once things were relatively secure, and both Renee and Dinah could hear her over their communicators.

"It's over Ivy, your fat girl's club is finished!"

But what no one was suspecting, aside from Selina, Talia, and Harley, was the sound of Ivy's chortle that followed.

"So you've gotten the plants, destroyed our factories, and managed to manufacture a cure have you? Tell me, did you all take it?"

Renee, Dinah, and Oracle all felt chills run down their spines at her tone.

It had been one giant gambit all along, to get them to take the "cure" Barbara had made.

As if on cue, every member of the Reserve's stomach rumbled, Holly's included as she hunched over, having taken the cure as a precaution.

"Hungry girls? Because you're about to do nothing but stuff your faces for the rest of your big, fat, lives!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: One week, arrival of cure. Holly leads team bac...

choices: Holly confronts the Sirens with her team, cocky and headstrong.
Holly tries to be more covert and get Selina out. Selina gets her eating instead
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Renee Montoya and Dinah Lance were now immobile, reduced so by the very bodies they had once been so proud of.

Holly hadn't returned for them.

O still had her vials, but hadn't used them on herself yet, feeling that she owed it to everyone on the team to be the last to cure herself, considering her lapse in leadership. She was still pigging out and occasionally Dinah or Renee could hear her slurping or belching over the communicator.

But other than that, the only thing they had to keep them occupied was the food they feasted on and the teasing they did of one another.

"I've got one," Canary said, her voice a bit deeper thanks to all of her new chin fat. "Your butt is so big not even Superman could lift it."

Renee only grunted as she munched on her fortieth burger.

Both women were naked, their clothes having given up the ghost a week ago.

Renee was thinking as she ate.

She was thinking of Holly, how Holly had abandoned them, how much Holly cared for Selina, and heard the tracker she'd managed to plant on the slim young woman just before she'd handed over leadership of the group to her.

"O...O, do you have Holly's location?"

A belch and a sigh. "Yeah but you're not going to like where she is."

"Let me guess, Anon's apartment?"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Two weeks, no arrival. Getting antsy. Holly hea...

choices: Vixen's message is a trap sprung by Zatanna to fatten up the wayward heroes.
Vixen's message is very real. Can the Reserves save the day?
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Despite the near constant radio silence from Oracle, their own fattening bodies, and the difficulty of their task, the Reserves had managed to solider on.

They had destroyed two more plants and, in Renee's estimation, that was an amazing accomplishment. Still, they weren't out of the woods yet. Knocking on the door of Black Canary's room, Renee was just in time to see Canary's modified clothes give up the ghost, shredding under the onslaught of weight she had gained in the last month.

While the sight did bring her a tiny amount of joy, she ignored the impulse to pick on her antagonistic teammate.

"Ready to move out? The rest are in the van."

"Obviously not," Dinah replied.

"I'll loan you some of my old clothes. They're from my last gain so they should fit you okay."

"Thanks."

Renee was about to reply when the JLA warning signal flared from their communicators.

Vixen's blobby face appeared on the tiny communicator.

"To all available heroes, this is the Watchtower, we're going down! I repeat, the Watchtower is going down!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: The Reserves are getting along until a troublin...

choices: Send a small group of the reserves to the station(Cant detour from the mission!)
Send everyone up. (More people faster fix, right....?)
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
The reserves quickly gathered in the main hall to listen to the dire message from Vixen; who was busily devouring a rather large looking cake.

"What do you mean the watchtower is going down, that shouldn't be possible. Shouldn't it take some kind of massive force to knock it out of the planet's orbit," exclaimed Batgirl.

"Well i certainly can see the mass," whispered Renee to Dinah. Vixen certainly seemed a lot bigger then either of them last remembered when they last were on the station. The two only could wonder how the rest of the league was fairing up there or how they would look if they were still on the station.

"Well it's no secret that we may have gained a few pounds. The watchtower seems to not be able to -munch- handle all this excess weight and is starting to fall into the earth's atmosphere. We need you -munch- help us fix up the watchtower and give it the extra power it needs to keep us afloat. We would do it ourselves if.... -munch- , well if we could." Vixen without shame, devoured the rest of the cake she had been munching on. "Please hurry, we don't know how long the station has left."

"We understand, we will be up as soon as possible," replied Dinah.

On that note the screen turned off leaving the gang to ponder on what to do next.

***


Meanwhile on the station, Vixen started to grin as a giant train of snacks appeared to trail towards her. Her reward for a job well done from Zatanna. What the girls below hadn't realized is whatever Ivy did to Zatanna was dramatically changing their friend. Her desire to eat was only matched by her desire make others around her grow. She had started to subtly change the league members, either erasing and altering memories or enticing their appetites into following her. But she desired more, that is why she had Vixen lie to the leaguers below. She had already fixed the problem of the extra stress of station with her powerful magic a while ago. She just needed an excuse to lead the unsuspecting girls into her trap, one of which they would never leave from.

***


Back down at the reserves headquarters the girls were discussing on how to approach the situation. While most of the group was munching down on snacks, Dinah and Holly were being very vocal on their opinions of this matter.

"We should all go back, I'm not willing to endanger my friends lives just to get a 1-up on Anon. The factories aren't going anywhere and the more of us that go the faster we can ensure their safety and get back to the mission," Dinah stated.

"Yeah, because they are going to completely ignore all the damage we have caused them already and just wait for us when we are ready. We can't give them time to recuperate. We have to keep hitting bases. Just send a small group of us up to deal with it I'm sure they will be fine."

"Come on Holly, you saw Vixen. How long to do you think the station is gonna have with them eating like that," replied Renee.

"Ugh, we are just going in circles," a frustrated Batgirl stated. "Lets vote on the matter and be done with it."
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Vixen's message is a trap sprung by Zatanna...

choices: Reserves answer- Vixen manages shuttle pod. Team splits, half staying on Earth
Reserves answer- Send Supergirl. She's the only one who can breathe in space...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Time is usually irrelevant when one considers space travel. No matter what country one is from or what time it is there, those hurdling through the inky black abyss of space over time find it rather easy to forget that, in their home back on whichever planet they may be from, there are those who may be sound asleep as they wake or who ritualistically go about their day while those up above slumber. This being said, it was no shock to find that no one really seemed to notice when what must have been days have passed by like mere seconds.

Seconds filled with debaucherous, sinful indulgence.

"Hey Bea?" came the deep Norwegian drawl of Tora Olafsdotter, Ice, as she floated around uselessly in Zatanna's field. Her muscular body gone long before, the zero-gravity habitat that the spell slinging glutton had introduced had only served to further atrophy her underwhelming physique and bloat it into overwhelming properties.

"Yeah?"

"Don't you think we're taking this a little far?"

"What are you talking about?" came the equally throaty Brazilian accent of Beatriz da Costa, Fire, as she floated by the neighboring body of Olafsdotter, "Taking what too far?" she reitterated as a turkey club floated its way into her mouth. Like her best friend, Fire had bloated up to resemble a floating mass of blubber, though one of considerably more mocha-colored quality.

"This whole eating thing..." Ice said solemnly, "I think we might have a--"

At once, something scrumptious was forced past Tora's full fat lips. Her instincts formed over her extended period of gluttony kicked in, and she was left as she was seconds ago; chewing and gleefully enjoying the great gift from Zatanna's magical conjuration skills. She hummed lightly to herself and closed her big blue eyes, enjoying the wonderful food that she had been blessed with. Her hands, wrists still covered in the remains of her furry gloves, traveled to her globular expanse, rubbing herself contentedly.

Fire nodded half-heartedly, only half listening to her in the first place, but now having completely forgotten whatever it was that Tora was yammering on about. She, too, had been given a new treat for indulgence. After all, she had asked Zatanna if she could hook her up with a magical food orbit, not unlike the one she had claimed for herself. The least she could do was indulge in it. Or so she rationed until becoming giddy at the sight of yet another triple-chocolate cake.

"Keep it down up there!" came the heavy barking of Huntress, floating underneath the pair by maybe a few yards or so, "I can't get any sleep with you two yammering on!"

Helena Bertelini had become a bit of a sourpuss, moreso of a sourpuss than usual anyway, as she continued to expand and bloat outwards. Weighing a toppling half-ton, the Huntress was all but useless in her pledge to fight crime, seeming to be one of the few who realized this simple fact. However, while she may have been more than a little grumpy towards her situation, Fire and Ice were far from the only things keeping her up. The constant onslaught of food didn't aid her lack of slumber, or anyone else's really. However it didn't really matter whether or not they felt like eating anyway. Their appetites were so large now that all of them had begun eating in their sleep, which their new protector Zatanna was more than happy to oblige...

Before she got too fat to talk.

For months, they had just been floating there, getting rounder like so much the miniature planets they resembled now. Their orbiting bodies unable to defy Zatanna's magic, while Zatanna herself was far too fat to even call of what she had done...

As if she wanted to.

***


"Oh no... I don't like this."

Earth. Christy Street, Greenwich Village. Hokus & Pokus Occult Curiouso.

In the dark sits an obscene bulk of a woman, weighing at a heavyset and nearly immobile eight hundred pounds. She plops down on her rear all day and stares into her own inky abyss- blindness. Though while she may be blind, she manages to find a way to get herself to the fridge or wherever other food may be hiding from her lack of sight.

Inbetwixt two of her fat fingers is a tarot card. Her clairvoyance does the rest for her.

Fire, burning flesh, ruined goodies of all flavors, and a world without heroes. All of these horrible, horrible articles are part of her forecast. Madame Xanadu's future is still being shaped, of course. There's nothing saying that something or someone or some team can't halt the imminent crashing of the Watchtower...

Especially not her, now that her mouth was full of crisps.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Capes in Space

choices: Superman and the male JLA members have returned from their off planet duties.
It's just Superman. The rest of the male JLA are heading towards Earth.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Not one of the Reserves had the necessary might, technical means, or super strength necessary to halt the sinking Watchtower, save one.

Said one was munching on the extra large bucket of chicken left over from the Reserves last lunch, a lunch that ended up closing the local KFC once they had gone.

"Supergirl, you're the only one who can possibly halt the Watchtower. The fate of a large chunk of the world and our fellow comrades lies in your hands," Renee said in the best leader voice she could manage. Oracle and Dinah were currently pigging out on meals of their own and Renee, being the only one currently sated, was the only leader available. "So go, save the day, and get back here when you're done. We're with you in spirit, if not in body, alright?"

Supergirl nodded, her gut wobbling as she let loose a super belch.

Renee ignored the stench of chewed chicken and pointed a tubby finger towards the stars.

Supergirl took off, Renee amazed at her superspeed and strength.

///

Supergirl gulped as she stared at the mass of technology that was the JLA Watchtower.

It dominated her vision.

Still, she flew onwards after that initial doubt, slamming into it and bracing herself for the full weight.

Incredibly, it stopped.

Now Kara was strong, not quite as strong as Kal but still strong. The Watchtower, however, was just a bit out of her weight class.

She would have chalked it up to a miracle if she didn't hear a voice a few moments later.

"You're doing wonderfully Kara."

Her blue eyes widened as she took in the figure holding up the Watchtower with her.

"K-Kal?!"
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Reserves answer- Send Supergirl. She's the ...

choices: Back to Oracle and Batman's investigation.
Continue on the Watchtower.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
As the two Kryptonians reunited, the rest of the male JLA pulled into the Watchtower's hangar. Kara was both relieved they finally had some backup that wasn't stuffing it's face 24/7, and embarassed with how much she and the other League members had grown. Superman merely gave an understanding nod to his cousin as the two flew inside the Watchtower.

Once the two were inside, Kara quickly began to explain what happened in the other member's abscence. They all took it well, as well as they could, the exclusion being Batman. He felt angry with good reason, it all started in his city, with his enemies, in his abscence. He immediatley started a call back down to earth with Oracle to understand the situation.

Meanwhile, Supergirl led the other members up to the dining hall, in hopes they could somehow break the spell of gluttony over their fellow members. In the center of the dining hall stood, or rather floated, Zatanna, the conductor of the Watchtower's orchestra of obesity. Around her floated the other members, Huntress, Fire, and Ice, all nearly spherical. Clearly, there were a lot of problems on the newly reunited JLA's hands.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Things have certainly changed...

choices: They find the plant but are assailed by insanely large samples of food.
They search but can't find the plant.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Talia's cellphone vibrated, causing another, larger vibration, on her stomach, where the device was currently resting.

Managing to raise an arm, she belched, and grabbed the phone, checking the message and smiling.

Her informant was paying off wonderfully and all it cost her was a few crates of food a week.

"They're looking for the plants and apparently have discovered their locations," Talia reported, munching on a roll while she did so.

Ivy chuckled at the news, lounging with Selina and enjoying a belly rub from the fat cat burglar. "Well they can certainly try. We've prepared our defenses well." Ivy then looked over at Harley, who was busy in the kitchen. The other Sirens hadn't been upset about her screw up with their two prisoners but decided not to trust her with their most intimate plans, making it up to Harley by refusing nothing, even if they were stuffed.

Naturally this led to many days and nights bloated and uncomfortable to say nothing of their near immobility. Still, they were fine with this, knowing that what they had set in motion would be quite difficult to stop, even for fit heroes. For that bloated mass of a Justice League? Impossible.

Ivy's musings were cut off then by Harley coming into the room, Selina, Ivy, and Talia all licking their lips as the smell of freshly baked goodies came to their nostrils.

"Hope you girls are hungry, cause I just got a new recipe for donuts and cookies from a friend!"

Needless to say, they didn't get much else done that day.

///

Oracle decided that Gotham would be the first location to hit, sending a symbol to their enemies that they wouldn't be cowed by their dark desires.

Still, even her stomach rumbled when she pinpointed the exact location of the plant.

"The Gotham Greenhouse/Food Festival Headquarters?" Question asked.

"Yes, we'll have to find the exact type of plant or else we won't have an antidote."

"I've got that but do you know how many different kinds they have there?"

"Over a million but we have to do this Question, or else no one can stop them from fattening up the entire world!"

Renee nodded at that and groaned as her stomach roared for more food.

"First let's get some lunch though, okay?"

Oracle nodded, patting her wide gut.

They couldn't start to save the world on an empty stomach after all.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Talia has thought ahead, trading info for food ...

choices: But before the plot can occur, Zatanna and Renee escape!
Ivy concocts the potion...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Three days since Renee and Zatanna's capture had passed. Zatanna had continued to try and speak, but alas, her bindings were a little looser then first thought, and Harley a little too motivated and alert for any attempts at escape. Renee, after realizing that Zatanna was getting nowhere, decided to join in. She and Zatanna opened there mouths to speak, but were stuffed with the nearest pastry by Harley. Again. And again. And again. Whenever the insomniac Harley thought she was going to fall asleep, she would put funnels into the pair's respective mouths, hook it up to a keg of beer for each of them, then lie on the couch and nap while Zatanna and Renee became too drunk to even think straight and their stomachs bloated uncomfortably full. Meanwhile...

***

Talia got up heavily from her couch and waddled towards Ivy's room. She passed The Question and Zatanna and noticed Harley sleeping peacefully while the 2 were chugging beer at an alarming rate. Nodding in approval, Talia continued huffing and puffing to Ivy's doorway. Upon entering, she let out a groan of exhaustion and sat down onto a reinforced chair. Unusually, Selina wasn't in Ivy's room for once, and was actually passed out on one of the other couches in the living room. Ivy, who had been in the middle of a box of doughnuts, looked up lazily at Talia. "What do you want?" Ivy asked.

"I have an idea about what to do with our captives..." purred Talia."You know how Zatanna is a powerful spell caster, correct? Do you have anything that will, say, wipe her mind? Make it a blank slate that we can manipulate? Imagine us using the girl's magic to make our pastries even more fattening... Business would boom, and the heroes wouldn't have the slightest idea what to do." Ivy glanced at Talia. Slowly a grin spreads across her face.

"I have just the thing..." Ivy said coyly.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Zatanna can't do it by herself, Renee joins...

choices: Fatten The Question and wipe her memory of Ivy and Harley
Fatten residents of the apartment by 50 pounds.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Ivy spent the greater part of the day working over the ingredients. She added massive amounts of specially crafted plants to wipe Zatanna's brain. Talia worked with her to input how they would control her. Ivy managed to create the drug that would wipe Zatanna's brain as clean as a slate. Next, Talia told Ivy that they would need a way to control Zatanna as well. Ivy and Talia both pondered the problem, before Talia had a stroke of genius. "Ivy, I've got it!" she hollered, then blushed at her un-ladylike manners. Ivy glanced up.

"What is your bright idea?"

Talia smirked. "How about we call up the Mad Hatter... for a "custom fit" hat."

Ivy soaked up this information, then slowly, ever so slowly, a grin crossed her face. "I do believe you're right."

Talia called up the Mad Hatter and made the necessary arrangements, and said to Ivy, "It will be here by morning."

Little did Ivy realize the true motivations of Talia's plot...

***

3 hours later, one of Talia's assassins delivered the hat to the apartment. It was the middle of the night, and only Talia was awake. Talia had made sure everyone in the apartment was asleep- Harley was finally getting a good nights rest, now that Zatanna was simply an empty box and The Question was properly bound. Talia grabbed the hat and waddled as fast as her legs would carry her to Zatanna. Placing the hat upon her head, Talia was delighted at the touch screen that popped out of the top of the hat. "Insert commands for subject." appeared on the hat. "All input commands will be verbally spoken backwards by the subject." Grinning, Talia typed...
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Ivy concocts the potion...

choices: With the help their new "associate", Anonymous Co. expands like never before!
It becomes increasingly obvious that SOMEONE is misusing Z's powers.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Renee Montoya suddenly snapped to attention, the loud whirring of the various machines around the factory and the familiar scent of uncooked pastries filled her nostrils. A distinct feeling of unease whisked her away from her fantasy world. She’d been doing that a lot lately, zoning out on the job. It wasn’t an ideal situation, but it got pretty boring staring at pies and donuts and all that confectionary crap all day and not being able to eat them. Whatever paid the rent, right?

She shook her head beneath her stupid hairnet—damn thing always gave her hat hair—and shifted her attention back to the production line. Everything seemed normal enough, yeah. But for some reason Renee felt on edge—like she had just gotten into another fight with her girlfriend or something. She’d check her phone, but Ms. Duffy didn’t like her checking her phone on the clock…

“Montoya!” came the familiar cry of her boss, Jenna Duffy.

The immense brunette waddled over slowly, kicking her legs out in wide stretches as her pendulous gut swung low over her crotch. She looked like a walrus, with big fat cheeks and that big belly of hers. Her tits were pretty big, and Renee might have made a move if she weren’t such a bitch. Always loitering the whole “dirty cop, off the street, nowhere to go” business over her head, telling her what an “honor” it was to work for Anonymous Bakeries. Such a bitch. Still, nice tits.

“Yeah Montoya…hff… I’m talkin’ to you!” the spherical brunette ranted as she called Renee out in front of the other workers, “You’ve been… you’ve been sneaking off the line again, haven’t you?”

“Pssh, no.” Renee rolled her eyes, “It’s uncooked, Ms. Duffy. How would I—“

“Don’t you lie to me, Montoya!” Ms. Duffy sputtered, jabbing a fat finger knuckle-deep into Renee’s flabby stomach, “Yer uniform’s been lookin’ pretty tight lately! You think the Big Boss is gonna like it when I tell ‘er that you’ve been gettin’ fat off of her product?”

“No, Ms. Duffy.” Renee sighed

“You’re damn right she won’t.” Ms. Duffy punctuated her point with another jab into Renee’s big belly, “Keep your grubby mitts off the product line and I’ll keep you on the payroll, got it?”

Renee’s boss began the arduous process of turning, her incredible immensity causing her to totter on her big fat legs. She leaned backward when she walked, sandwiching her backfat with her ass as she leaned backwards like a pregnant woman. Renee turned back around herself, looking over her shoulder as she saw her boss casually glance around before stealing a snack for herself off the line with one pillowy arm. She popped it into her mouth and chuckled huskily before plodding back up to her office, where she mumbled something about needing to see someone about a Carpenter…

***


Talia al Ghul sat in the living room, dressed in the finest lounging attire that she could find in her size. She was seated upright, her breasts splaying lazily over either side of her stomach as it swelled to fit her expansive lap. Her tanned cinnamon complexion had paled slightly since she’d begun sequestering herself within the walls of the apartment, overindulging to the nth degree every day, and she’d found that some time sitting at the large bay window helped keep her complexion dark and alluring.

The Demon’s Daughter popped a bite-sized brownie past her lips, letting out a little purr as she savored its sweet delicious flavor, Ivy’s special spores making her heart soar. Her chubby toes curled—she was hopelessly addicted to this stuff, the very sweets that she and the rest of her “corporation” were peddling throughout Gotham City. Her size may not have been a desired outcome, but what could she have expected after living months and months of only the most hedonistic lifestyle? So long as it meant more of the very craze gripping the nation, Talia was more than happy to lay back and bask in the spoils of success.

One such spoil sat beside her, sitting as stiff and as ladylike a position as her obstructive obesity would allow. Zatanna Zatara, freshly mind-wiped (oh, the irony!) and ready for servitude. Thanks to a combination of a potent mind-altering fungus carefully groomed and grown by Poison Ivy in her many hours of spare time and a custom-fit top hat ‘donated’ by Jarvis Tetch, the formidably powerful (but incurably gluttonous) Zatanna Zatara was now a tool to by used by Talia and her titanic teammates!

Talia traced over the outline of her newest conquest’s distended stomach with her chubby fingers, Zatanna’s big blue eyes unblinking and unresponsive. The drug kept her mind sedated while the hat allowed anyone access to her powerful magic through the touchscreen mechanism. So for all intents and purposes, Zatanna was now just one big reality-altering machine for Talia to use as she saw fit. It had worked with the Question—who’s to say that Zatanna couldn’t be used for other things?

“Open wide, darling.” Talia said with a smile as she popped one of the brownies past Zatanna’s lips, entering the command ‘eat’ onto the touch screen. To her delight Zatanna began chewing, “There’s a girl.”

Talia smirked, satisfied with her new toy.

Conquering the corporate world just became a whole lot easier.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Magic, Memory, and Mindwipe

choices: More and more heroes turned up as Anonymous employees, mindwiped and hooked!
Everyone except Harley started to double in size...
Free Choice
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
With an Ace up their sleeve, the Anonymous Baking Company was expanding like never before.

Ivy's toxin gave them the unique advantage of being absolutely addictive to anyone who so much as gave them a try. Men and women alike flocked to supermarkets, grocery stores, and anywhere else that they could get their fix all across the country. As their business expanded from Gotham, to Metropolis to Keystone and Central City, then into Star City, it seemed that there was no stopping their growing market on the snack food industry. Many tried and failed to duplicate the spores that Ivy produced on a daily basis through the use of special plants, but there was simply no one who could challenge their stranglehold on the market.

And that was before they mindwiped a magician.

Zatanna Zatara was yet another card up their sleeves, and one that could be played over and over and over...

It started out small. Once they realized that they could manipulate reality around them, any unfortunate heroes who found themselves on the trail of the mysterious conglomerate taking the country by storm would find themselves... well, Talia had coined the term "reassigned."

Rather than let the Question—their first "test subject"—get hot on their collectively corpulent tails, everyone had agreed that she was better off hooked to the stuff, and in a position where she couldn't do any damage. With Jenna Duffy watching over her, the faceless woman and former cop was sure to serve them dutifully as a line worker. And if she caused any trouble then... well, Talia knew plenty of people capable of taking out an out-of-shape saddlebag of a cop and a former vigilante.

But, among the corporate heads and many chins that made up Anonymous' leadership, their efficient "disposal" of Renee Montoya had shown them that the sky was truly the limit.

So of course, being a bunch of ill-balanced former supervillains, this new commodity was abused.

Granted, it started slowly at first. It was agreed that they were to move out of Wayne Towers post-haste, and into their corporate office. Then it was agreed that the top floor of their corporate office building, as it pierced the skyline of Gotham City, was to be magically refurnished and rebuilt into the perfect living space for the four super-sized supervillainesses. With Ivy and Selina's lack of mobility, no spell had been spared in ensuring them the luxury that (they felt) had been deserved.

"Cozy." Selina purred as she nestled into her meaty shoulders, her hands resting pleasantly on her gut, "I could get used to this."

"Mmm..." Ivy stretched her pillowy arms upwards in a thick lazy yawn, "Why not cut to the chase and make ourselves queens? We certainly live like queens. Why not make it official?"

"And have every magic user on our tail? No thank you." Talia lounged next to Zatanna, tracing small circles in the bulges of her fishnet stockings, "No, we've got to do this subtley. Anything less and we risk blowing our entire operation."

"Yeah, Red, dontcha listen?" Harley bounced, her fat rear flopping up and down, "Subtlety's my middle name! Ain't that right, Tallie?"

"Somehow I find that hard to believe." Talia cut her eyes at the fat-bottomed clown, "As the resident expert in magic, I feel like it would be best if I—"

Talia's suggestion was met with groans of displeasure.

"—Yes, I, watched over our little friend here." Talia curled a lock of Zatanna's black hair around her chubby middle finger, "It's in all of our best interests to keep our little operation going, yes?"

And, yes, she was right. Over the course of the next few weeks, Zatanna was kept well taken care of by the colossal corporate titans.

However, it slowly became apparent that someone was misusing Zatanna's powers without anyone's input.

There wasn't a search feature on that hat that Jervis had made for them, but it didn't take the World's Greatest Detective to know that something was up when...

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Waddling into Anonymous Factories was the last thing Renee wanted to do, but she had to make a living somehow. One of the workers, a blonde girl barely out of school, waved as she came in. She was new; in fact, Renee trained her herself (even if she couldn't remember her name). She was pretty chubby herself, though she was somewhere in the mid 200s as opposed to Renee, who was actually hiding from scales at the and needed an extra string to tie her apron. A tubby belly spilled over her waistline, but unlike her bigger coworker, her apron managed to hug it enough to keep it in check.

Punching in and waddling to her station, the obese ex-officer muttered: "I really hope it's a quiet day."

"M-Montoya...!" So much for that.

Jenna Duffy tottered down the production line with a clipboard held tight in her chubby fist, a far cry from the confident stride she was probably going for, but then she was a far cry from the size to be able to do it. Her big belly peaked out from under her custom-fit Anonymous uniform, slyly untucking it from her bobbing waistline. Employees less than half her size tried to look busy as she waddled by, but she just beelined to the end of the production line, even if she could barely manage a wheeze by then.

Renee sighed. It was ridiculous, she hadn't even done anything! Well, she never did anything whenever her bloated boss came waddling after her, but this time she barely clocked in. Her boss was puffing up a storm by the time she reached her (a rather impressive display as far as her chest went, as Renee noted) and would've probably doubled over if she could manage with that gut of hers. She settled for leaning on one of the conveyor belts with an alarming creak, leaving the lardy latina to wait until she caught her breath.

"Think... ya can... hide from me?" Duffy eventually sneered.

"Ms. Duffy, this is my position-"

"Well forget it!" Duffy interrupted, "You've got the fattest ass in the building, Montoya, think I can't see ya?"

"Second fattest," Renee seethed. Behind her, the chubby new blonde, (Brown! That's what her name was!) snickered at her, making her even angrier. Deep breaths... No point in going off on this bitch first thing in the morning...

"Anyway, I've got somethin' for ya," the blubbery brunette huffed, "The Big Boss is sending down some more fresh blood. And guess who's gonna train 'em."

Renee gaped, "What?? I've already trained two people, and I'm almost brand new here!"

"You got Lance tomorrow," Duffy continued as if Renee hadn't spoken, "Oh, and don't think this means I don't want you doing yer job," She hungrily eyed some of the products, "I'm tired of seein' bad products from over here."

The ex cop gritted. Two guesses where the "bad products" would go. "Is that all?" Renee asked through clenched teeth.

Ms. Duffy eyed her and simply poked one of her exposed love handles. Lately her red Anonymous polo started to creep up her back, "Maybe keep the muffintops on the line," Duffy grunted, "I don't want any newbies pickin' up after you."

Brown snickered again and Renee flushed red. She really, really hated that woman.

A low rumbling rolled over the floor and Renee blinked. "Er..." Her belly-heavy boss cleared her throat, "Th-that's enough lollygaggin'! I'm late for an appointment, so everybody, back to work! And, someone make sure Montoya doesn't eat off the line again." With that, the doughy Duffy awkwardly turned and waddled hurriedly back to her office, her own muffin top spilling out in the process.

Renee snarled, but she held her tongue and got to work. After all, as her boss was so quick to remind her, there weren't many places for an ex-cop. She wasn't going back to the force especially now that she let herself get so big; she couldn't even fit her polo, much less her old uniform. Too fat to be an officer, too fat for private security, she might have more options if only she hadn't dived into headfirst into boxes of sugary delights after losing her badge!

Renee stopped. No, wait. Was that right? Something didn't sound right about that. She remembered more... booze than comfort food... She shook her head to clear out the fog before. Whatever, right? In the end it didn't matter how her ass got so big or how she grew a gut bigger than Bullock's. The former cop let herself get fat, plain and simple, and all that weight wasn't going anywhere anytime soon.

"She really laid into you," Brown giggled, her cute double chin wobbling as she popped one of the finished cookies from her side into her mouth. Renee glared, "What? I'm supposed to watch you, remember? Not the other way around."

She could only hope that the next workers were a bit better than this one.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Quitting time came and the Anonymous workers went. One by one, men and women eagerly piled out of the front door, each notably chubbier than the day they started. None were chubbier though than Renee Montoya, the boss's favorite victim. None of the factory workers seemed well equipped for a standing job but Renee in particular was ready to collapse by the end of her shift.

"Why on Earth did I choose a job on my feet?" she groaned, gratefully pulling off her ridiculous hairnet and letting her long black locks flow down her back. She straightened her shirt back over her love handles.

"Quittin' time, eh Renee?" The new girl Brown was leaning against a conveyor belt with a box of Anonymous cookies in hand, eagerly stuffing handfuls of sweets into her fast mouth, just like she'd been doing all day, even with Renee's "supervision". Without her apron, her pale belly's expansion was clear and bulge of fat about an two inches thick bulged from underneath the work shirt that fit her just that morning.

"Wanna bite big girl?" Brown asked, "Seriously these things are awesome."

"Addictive, more like," Renee rolled her eyes, "Do I even have to ask if you bought those, Brown?"

The blonde grinned, "Call me Stephanie. And you can report me if you want, but I think the boss would just start yelling at you again." Both girls bellies growled. Renee blushed in embarrassment but Stephanie just went back to snacking, "Oh man, I can't get enough of these."

"Clearly," Renee snarked, "Didn't your mother ever warn you about spoiling your dinner?"

Brown shook her head unsteadily but it was only a moment before the feeling passed, "Spoiling...? No, but she did tell me about never wasting food," "Seriously, have some! Don't think I didn't hear that tummy rumbling. What's the matter, you on a diet or something?"

Renee bristled, "As a matter of fact, yes," she said proudly, hands on hips nearly twice as wide as Stephanie's.

Stephanie's face broke into a wide grin, "Oh reeeally? Because all everyone could talk about in the break room was how much you keep gaining. When did this diet start, an hour ago?" Renee sputtered indignantly. They were talking about her?? Damn her stupid coworkers and damn her fucking metabolism. She cut out all unhealthy foods a month ago and she was still gaining weight!

The tubby new girl looked satisfied that her senior was so annoyed and went back to eating. But when Renee opened her mouth, she lost her retort noticing a clipboard poking out behind Stephanie's ponderous posterior.

"Hey," Renee muttered, waddling up to her coworker. Brown tensed up a bit, but it was for nothing as Renee wobbled right past her, grabbing the clipboard she was unknowingly sitting on, "This is Duffy's."

Brown tilted her head quizzically, "So?"

"This morning, she said she had an appointment, right?" Renee asked slowly, "But, we haven't seen her all day. It's after 5, shouldn't that be done by now?"

"It probably is, so what?" Stephanie asked.

"Then where's Duffy?" Renee wondered aloud, "She couldn't have left, there's no way we'd miss her."

"Maybe she went out the back then?" Stephanie suggested. Something about her bigger coworker's tone made her uneasy, so the girl went back to stuffing her face, this time to soothe her nerves instead of her stomach.

"The only way out of Duffy's office leads back here..." the ex cop murmured suspiciously, "Hmm... Duffy sure was in a hurry to get to that meeting..."

"Renee," Stephanie said uneasily, "You're really making me nervous." Renee started waddling for the back office, more purpose in her stride it'd had in months, "So what if Duffy's still here? What's it matter?"

"Because Jenna Duffy doesn't do overtime. And because my gut's been telling me something was wrong ever since I started working here. Stephanie," she said over her shoulder, "Go home. I'm gonna see if the boss's 'meeting' ever finished."

Reaching door, she heard a voice, quiet and pained, flavored with hiccups and burps every few words, "Am... I done yet ma'am...?"

Duffy! But who was she talking to?

"I dunno..." a second voice said. The second voice was female, with an accent Renee couldn't quite place. It sounded odd in contrast to Duffy's. Duffy sounded slow and labored. This second voice was fast and playful, "Lemme think. Do ya think yer full yet?"

There came a belch; so loud that even through the door, Renee had no problem hearing it, "I'm... full... ma'am..."

There was a few excited claps, "Great!" The accented woman sounded elated, "Now we can start on dessert!" Duffy let out another belch and a defeated groan.

Renee reached out hesitated with her hand on the door knob. The whole situation stunk and nagged at her like an itch she wouldn't scratch. But, she wasn't a cop anymore. And even if she was, everything in her "investigation" was circumstantial at best. Brown was right. Why was she doing this? Why did it bother her so much whether or not Duffy was still there? Why did it matter who was in the office with her? Did she know for sure if something was even wrong? Did she even know if Duffy was crooked?

"Maybe not," a small voice said, "But, it's still a good question."

And before she could think again, Renee opened the door.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Sitting inside, Duffy looked even more stuffed than she sounded. The spherical brunnette must've doubled in size since she waddled out onto the floor that morning. Her shirt had been taken off, laying limply across the table and her entire naked torso exploded outward in an avalanche of stuffed flab.

And next to her stood a voluptuous bubbly bottomed blonde. Her hair was in pigtails and she wore a tight, form fitting pencil skirt. She wore glasses and with a light smile, the woman held a cookie out under Duffy's nose. Hands on her belly, Renee's bitchy boss miserably accepted, letting out a moan as the blonde was forced to lean against her mountainous middle in order to reach her mouth.

"Looks like got a visitor," the woman smiled. Another cookie went into Duffy, "Don't mind us, this is just a little... dinner date."

Renee didn't know what to make of any of this. She didn't expect to see her boss shirtless, and she certainly didn't expect to see what might just be foreplay. And that woman... Her voice had the same semi cacophonous tone as the one Renee overheard, but she certainly wasn't talking like her.All she could do was numbly hold up Duffy's clipboard and stutter, "Y-you... um... forgot this..."

"Montoya..." Duffy groaned before cupcake was stuffed in her mouth.

"Ah ah ah," The blonde tutted her accent returning as she said, "If yer mouth's busy talkin', that means you ain't eating." She turned her attention back to the ample Anonymous employee, and her unaccented tone returned, "Now then. You're alone aren't you?"

"Ms...Q..." Jenna Duffy was so stuffed she could barely speak, "What do we do?"

"The usual," the strange woman asnwered simply, "I was getting bored with just you anyway."

Switching accents, stuffing her boss, this woman was nuts! "L-look," Renee said, "I'm just gonna... walk out of here and forget I ever saw any of this. Okay?" That might've been a lie. Even if she wasn't going to report this to... "I dunno, someone? Who do I even go to?" Renee had a feeling that Duffy's bare, watermelon breasts was going to be in her head for awhile.

But, the curvy blonde just grinned, "Now, why would I letcha do that?" she asked as she started going towards the ex cop. Renee wanted to put her guard up, but something about how the woman's massive hips rolled and swayed had her stunned. The blonde stood in front of her, easing towards the large latina while delicately placing her hands on Renee's big brown belly.

"You should eat first..." she said holding a cookie up to Renee. Renee's mouth watered. Against all her best wishes, the former officer's soft lips parted, accepting the sugary treat. "Good girl..." the strange woman cooed, squeezing her soft gut. She fed her the rest of the box while Renee tried futilely to stop herself.

"Now, I'm guessing you're alone, which means I don't hafta pretend." The blonde took off her glasses and her smile got a lot wider.

"I need to leave," Renee huffed trying to turn for the door. The woman's hands tightened on her meaty middle, spinning her back around.

"But you just got here," she said excitedly, offering Renee another box. No! Not the thin mints! So... good... The blonde drew closer, letting her ample bosom press into Renee's fatter chest. The cookies additives took effect and Renee was eating as fast as she could.

"What am I gonna do with ya, Renee?" "Ms. Q" asked. Renee wasn't listening, she was too busy mowing through the cookies.

She started nibbling on the latina's earlobe and Renee bit back a moan while stuffing her face with more cookies. Her mind was clouded with the drugs in the cookies and simple lust.The blonde took back over feeding while Renee's hands tentatively reached for the other woman's perfect bubble of an ass.

The blonde grinned as she felt Renee's fingers sink into one bulbous cheek, "No no. Not yet." Renee whined. It'd been so long since she'd been with someone! Months since Kate broke up with her and seeming increasingly impossible as she continued to pile on pounds.

"Sit back and relax, first" she said, pushing Renee back towards the side of the office and the ex cop felt her massive ass sinking into what felt like a giant marshmallowy swamp.

"What the hell am I sitting on?" Renee wondered for a moment before Ms. Q was on top of her, handing her a cupcake.

"Aren'tcha gonna eat?" she asked. Renee barely stiffled a cry as she tore into the delicious dessert. Ms. Q unwrapped another one and the ex cop devoured it too. And another. And another...

Renee's belly grew. Her polo shirt, previously snug, was rising high on the curve of her fat, caramel gut. Renee's deep belly button was completely bare, and Ms. Q found it inviting enough to dip a finger into its depths.

"Yer makin' good progress this time," she said, leaning her significant mass atop Renee's larger form, "Who knew all I had to do was shake my ass to make yours bigger?"

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Renee moaned as the strange woman's lips nearly brushed hers before something made her stop.

"Yer makin' good progress this time."

"W-wait," she wheezed, "What do you mean, this time?"

"Huh? Don't worry about it. Here." And she stuffed another handful of cookies in Renee's mouth.

"Have we met before?" Renee huffed once her mouth was empty. Ms. Q looked annoyed as she reached for another handful.

"Eat up," she snapped. Renee opened her mouth to eat, but didn't stop her questioning.

"You... ugh... you look familiar..."

"You ask a lotta questions," Ms. Q stuffed another handful of cookies into her captive's mouth, "Wouldn't ya rather just enjoy the moment?"

"It's not right," the ex cop insisted. One hand went behind her, squishing deeply into whatever was behind her. It felt warm... and was it breathing?? "Wha?" Renee sputtered with cookies bulging in her cheeks.

When Renee entered the room, her super-sized boss was naked from the waist up and a stranger was feeding her to the point of popping. So Renee almost forgave herself for not noticing the even bigger woman sitting at right of the room. Literally right beneath her was a massively fat woman, big enough that Renee mistook her for a seat. Her blob like breasts bulged out of a white corset while the enormous belly Renee made contact with swelled out from beneath it, nearly touching the ground while seated. Fishnet stockings gaped as they attempted to contain her fleshy thighs that were as big as barrels. Renee never saw so much flesh bulging out of one place! Her cheeks were the size of apples and a triple chin adorned her neck. She wore a magician's top hat of all things and beneath that black top hat were blue eyes that were blank and unmoving.

Ms. Q sighed, "Guess that's over with. Congrats, Question," she sneered, "This is the fourth time you've caught me. Yer a lot smarter than Tallie gave ya credit for, I'll tell ya that."

"You bitch!" Renee snarled, struggling to rise from the behemoth magician. Sinking into the quagmire of flesh, Renee couldn't get up, no matter how she struggled. She was just too big and there was nothing to grab onto!

"That never gets old!" Ms. Q laughed, "To be fair, Big Z here, is a lot bigger than the last time you forgot seeing her." She patted the ocean of flab and giggled as it shook like gelatin, "Even with my not so girlish figure, I'm thinkin little Zatanna weighs more than me n' Duffy combined!"

Then, she pressed a button on the magician's hat and a small screen popped out. She tapped away for a few moments before the previously silent magician uttered: "Noitseuq Stae."

Renee stared in horror as she grabbed another box of thin mints and began gobbling them down. Unable to control her own arm, she polished off the box and immediately took another that this "Ms. Q" was holding out for her "Who the hell are you?" Renee demanded, still choking down thin mints, much to her dismay.

"Who am I?" the blonde's face twisted into a sick grin before she parroted, "I'm yer boss's boss. And I'm tellin ya to take the day off tomorrow."

***

Renee woke up in her apartment feeling like she had a bad dream. Somehow she knew she piled on more weight in spite of her diet and she really had no idea how. Her belly towered to the ceiling, and she already knew there was no way she was making it to work that day.

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Renee did her best not to hang onto the "glory days" of her time on the force.

They seemed like so long ago, but it felt like she had been a tight, toned member of Gotham's finest yesterday. Her life since signing on to work at the Factory was so fluid, every day was so similar, it was no surprise to the large Latina lineman that it all sort've bled together. Ever since Commissioner Loeb had asked her to turn in her badge two years ago. Three? Had it been three years since she had squeezed herself into that tight little uniform?

Trying to match the dates up, making them work... something in the back of her mind told her to just let it go. Why bring up painful memories on her big day, right?

"Attention, all Anonymous Personnel—can we have a little quiet on the floor, please?"

Early on morning shift, a curvaceous blonde tapped on the microphone with small, dainty finger. Her nails clicked against the head, catching the attention of all those below them. From high above on the porch of the foreman's office, Renee could see everyone on shift. Bulky bodies meant for lifting and sorting, tired eyes from working late shifts, and fat bellies from years of standing around and eating on a lineman's salary. She recognized most of them, she'd trained a lot of them. Brown and Drake she could pick out of the crowd. Their chubby cheeks were parted in pleasant smiles, looking up. They knew what was going to happen, Montoya couldn't have kept a secret if she tried. She'd broke down and told them at the Zero Hour a few days ago, and they'd had about five rounds of hot wings to celebrate. Bertelini must have been in the john again, fucking around on her phone like normal. Renee figured it was her loss; she'd miss the big announcement.

"Now, we all know that we're going to miss Jenna Duffy." Dr. Quinzelle said with a certain amount of tongue in cheek, "Regardless of how everything went down, Ms. Duffy was a large asset to our company, and no one will ever truly fill her place in our hearts."

A couple of snickers went through the crowd below. This was far more professionalism than that walrus deserved. She'd finally been canned for sneaking enough food to feed a small army every shift, something that should have happened well before Dr. Quinzelle started prowling the factory like a mallet looking for a mole. She'd blown up so much that she could barely fit through the door to the foreman's office, so why Renee had to blow the whistle was anyone's best guess.

"That being said, I'd like all of you to welcome our newest factory Foreman, the Que—I mean Renee Montoya!"

Polite claps filled the air as Brown stuck both fingers in her mouth and whistled. Renee lumbered forward, the flooring beneath her protesting ever so slightly. She waved to her former peers, her pillowy mounds of arm fat wobbling excitedly as her chunky cheeks dimpled in pride. This was so worth having to get a new suit.

Just two—three?—years ago, Renee had been a dirty cop on the take. Loeb had taken her badge and made her feel worthless. She'd lost Kate. She'd gained more than two hundred pounds. She'd put up with Jenna Duffy of all people, poking her and prodding her. Making her feel useless. She couldn't even remember all of the humiliation that she'd been through. But now... it was all worth it.

But something... something didn't feel right.

"Thank you, thank you." Renee continued along anyway, ignoring the sick feeling in her stomach as she addressed the crowd of what were now to be her employees, rather than her friends and coworkers, "I... I look forward to working with all of you as your foreman. I know how things are on the line. My only wish was that Vic were here—"

Who the hell was Vic?

"I mean... excuse me." Renee coughed, "I mean my mother. My only wish was that my mother were here to witness the excitement and pride that I feel today, moving forward in our great company... and then I could tell her to get back to work!"

Bellies wobbled in jest as Renee's quick save kept the crowd from turning awkward. Who the hell was Vic? She'd never met anyone named Victor. Madre de dios, sometimes she felt like she was going crazy...

"In celebration of our new foreman's democratic election, I've taken the effort to provide plenty of pizza, donuts, and a sundae bar for the next few days." Dr. Quinzelle's announcement was met with far much more candor than Renee's promotion across the board, "I have no doubt in my mind that Renee will serve me dutifully as I personally ensure the productivity rates of this plant remain on the rise..."

Dr. Quinzelle's baby blue eyes looked Renee up and down. She gnawed a bit on her black bottom lip, just subtle enough to go undetected by the crowd below. She could dress it up all she wanted, try to pretend that she had gotten her promotion honestly. But Renee knew the real reason why this blonde bruja had filled Jenna's space so quickly...

As the floor slowly returned to normal below them, Renee turned tail into the foreman's office. Over the sound of the machinery, no one would hear the sharp SLAP of Dr. Quinnzelle's hand against Foreman Montoya's acres of caramel colored ass cheek.

***


It had all happened so fast.

As soon as the door shut and Dr. Q was confident that no one would hear them, she pressed the massive latina woman against the wall, forcing her into a deep kiss. The smaller woman sunk into Renee's expanse, her vast body folding around her boss's as she made her way forcefully to the overfed forman's lips. Something about the way this woman kissed, Renee had never felt anything like it. It was like everything else melted away, except for Dr. Quinzelle—"Call me Harley, sweet cheeks", her boss had told her with a sly wink just days before Duffy's termination. She said it was home made by a friend of hers. Made it with plants from the rainforest.

The kissing was good. It had been so long since Kate. So long since Renee had known the pleasures of anything other than extra helpings at Big Belly Burger. The fact that such a hot woman was coming onto her so strongly was downright intoxicating. Even though her ass was enormous. Even though her belly was so big she couldn't see her feet. Renee loved the attention.

But more importantly, she loved what came next most of all.

"You can't be full yet." Harley had a way of talking when they were together that was so different from the professionalism she portrayed on the floor. It was so much more manic, and exuberant. It was almost like she was two different people! "I know there's some room in there."

Renee hadn't felt so fulfilled in years. Even Kate hadn't been able to get her going like Harley could. She felt like such a shit for doing this. Harley was her boss. She should have gotten promoted on her own merits.

That was what they did—they always did what was right. Who the fuck was they?

But the allure and attraction between them was undeniable. Harley had made that very clear the first time she'd grabbed her ass on the floor. And that after Duffy had been canned, Harley had called her into her office and told her that if she wanted the job she'd have to earn it and... and...

Dios Mio, it was time to stop thinking.

"Get outta yer head." Harley said in a low sort of voice, "Keep eating."

Renee looked like a beach whale. For every pie that they'd ordered into the break room, Harley must have gotten just as much for Renee. All for Renee. Everything was for Renee. Harley said so. Her caramel colored corpulence domed out in front of her, shiny with sweat and taut like a drum. She leaned back in her office chair as far as it would go, looking so much worse for wear. God, how much had she eaten?

How much was she going to keep eating?

"That's my girl." Harley cupped the swell of Renee's hanging gut as it sagged towards the floor of her new office, "You just keep eatin' what mama tells ya to."

"Aye.." Renee panted weakly, "But Dr. Q..."

"Harley." her boss corrected, "Call me Harley."

"Right... Harley..." Renee burped, "I can't eat anymore..."

"Goodie!" the blonde woman lit up like a lightbulb, "Then it's time for dessert!"

Renee got another one of those weird tingles in the back of her head again, but she was too full to fully explore it. How could she think on a full stomach? How could she possibly think with all of the food and sex that Dr. Quinzelle had been filling her up with? How long had it been since she'd felt so satisfied on every level? Food, sex, food, sex, food, food, sex, food, food, food...more food...

Renee shook her head. No, no she couldn't. She felt like she was going to explode as it was. Where were these thoughts coming from, and why did she keep having them? Why did she only seem to have them around Harley? Was she one of those Metas that were on the news? Some kind of mind controlling power?

No, that was stupid. Renee was just fat. And greedy. And really, really horny.

For once in her life, why Question things?

Suddenly, her phone buzzed—it was a text from Stephanie. They were all going to go out for celebratory dinner at the Zero Hour, how could she have forgotten?

Was it 5 'o' clock already?

"Buh... Brown..." Renee burbled as Harley picked up her phone and read the message.

She frowned.

"Forget it." Harley locked her phone and tossed it aside, far from the humongous heifer's reach, "You've got plans."

"But..."

"The only fraternizing I want you to do is with me. Got it?" Harley sneered, before correcting herself, "And maybe with the product line. One of the many perks of staying in line in your new job... capiche?"

Renee's mouth was soon too full of cupcake to protest. Stephanie's text went unanswered.
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.title: Reassignment

Someone catches wise to what's up, and sets out to stop it...
Wait a minute, I want to see Catwoman and Talia's fattening fantasies!
1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
This new world that had been created for them, the heads of the Anonymous Corporation, couldn't have been designed more perfectly. With the power of a reality-altering, mind-wiping magician, there was almost no limit to what they could accomplish. In their heyday as Gotham's criminals, nothing short of B-list in any villain's rogues gallery, the world might have been painted into a very different picture.

The childish trimmings of Harley's insanity might have twisted the world into a Saturday morning cartoon show just as easily as it could have been warped into a mundane life free of clowns and crime. Poison Ivy's frightening favoritism and despotic protection of the Green that she communed with would have surely meant the enslavement (if not annihilation altogether) of mankind. Selina's taste for riches and wealth might have made her into the most well-to-do member of Gotham high society. Their goals were so different from one another that a communal living space within a shared, if altered, reality would have been almost impossible.

But now, after succumbing to their innermost desires as the gluttons that they had become, the "ideal world" that Zatanna's magic had created for them was much easier to manage. Between them, there were only three desires:

1.) To not be disturbed
2.) Comfort
and above all else
3.) Pleasure.

To some, like Harley, that meant a steady herd of cattle that she could fatten up as she saw fit. With Renee Montoya filling the (expansive) space of former foreman Jenna Duffy, she would surely be occupied for some time. And then she could move onto the next one. And then the next. Harley Quinn had taken to her position as Efficiency Manager so very well, getting to use her psychology degree to its fullest. It wasn't as fun as swinging around a mallet and busting ATMs, but watching her playthings squirm beneath her was a different, familiar sort of thrill that she enjoyed immensely...

For others, pleasure took on a different connotation...

***


An entire warehouse was devoted to caring for and ensuring the wellbeing of Anonymous' most precious resource—Dr. Pamela Isely.

Once upon a time, after her accident, she had renamed herself Poison Ivy, the green-skinned Gaia who worked tirelessly to defend plant life. But that was the name of a terrorist and, in a sense, she had gone straight. She no longer wanted to consume the world in flora, rather she was contented merely to consume. Endlessly.

Her mutation had been a curious thing in this new reality. After a certain point, she had stopped requiring the rare and exotic flower that she had derived the mind-expanding and highly addictive additive that laced any and all of her company's products. Her unique nature as a human empowered by the Green meant that, the more time she spent around her precious buds, the more like them she became. And these were very curious flowers indeed. Parasitic in nature and highly destructive, in another lifetime, they would have gone extinct. But thanks to the timely intervention of a woman so bent on saving plant-life and looking to get rich quick, they were saved of that fate. And Ivy had been sealed to hers.

Swollen to complete immobility, the great green glutton was helpless to watch as an entire staff buzzed and whirred around her. Swabbing her, wiping her down, and collecting her various fluids for use in the company that she had helped found. All while keeping her fed rather comfortably round the clock of course. Not only was her chemical output firmly rooted in her caloric input, it was a requirement of her further mutation. As she'd grown larger and more like her precious babies, her body had begun metabolizing sugars and fats so differently that, for all intents and purposes, she really was more plant than woman now. And consider just how much woman she was now, that was really saying something.

And while she may not have liked her helpless state, there were a few perks to being viewed as a mindless eating machine...

Margaret Pye couldn't figure out why she kept gaining weight. Lab personnel were prohibited from sampling from what they collected from their source. Even as a lowly janitor, she had been given the same prohibition. The rest of Gotham City might have been blowing up like a bunch of balloons, but Maggie figured that she ought to have been safe!

She had figured wrong.

In the six months that she had been assigned here, busted for another petty larceny and desperate for a job, she'd put on nearly eighty pounds. That was insane. She had been so slender beforehand, so birdy and svelte. To see herself covered in all this... fat made her wretch. No way she was going to go out flying as Magpie any time soon...

"Feeding time, Boss." Maggie managed to say as the hermetical doors shut and sealed behind her, "Same time, same channel."

Though, looking at what had become Pam Isely, the plump pheasant didn't figure that she had much room to complain.

Ivy's green greatness trembled as she squirmed in place. She had grown far too fat to stand or move on her own, but the movements that she made would reverberate for some time in the vastness of her folds. To think that this great big ball of green glob had once been a woman. Maggie shuddered at the thought of ever getting that fat. So big and round that she couldn't fit through the door to her apartment. So fat that all she wanted to do was eat, eat, eat all day...

Her stomach rumbled.

Ivy's forest-green lips slipped into a struggling smirk, her cheeks so swollen that her expression was almost illegible. Beneath her chins and her layers of facial fat, Ivy still very much had a mind. One that was focused on food, yes, but she wasn't so far gone that she had forgotten about her powers. Pheromone control had been one of the first tricks she'd learned after the Accident that had turned her into Poison Ivy the Eco Terrorist, and it had carried her well into her life as Poison Ivy, the living breathing source of Anonymous Industries' most addictive products.

Though more than a ton in weight, Ivy's intellect was by far the most striking thing about her. A pity that people seemed to forget that when faced with her magnanimous massiveness.

"Yum." Isely said in her pretty voice, "Come... come closer..."

She had grown far too fat to feed herself.

And like a sapling quivering in the presence of a mighty oak, Magpie hesitated. Who wouldn't? Ivy was this enormous green... thing. She didn't even look like a woman anymore. Just a giant leaf-colored marshmallow, positively swollen with fat.

Swollen with soft, jiggly, fat...

For someone so bent on the destruction of mankind at one point in her life, Ivy had come to appreciate the touch of a man. Or a woman. Anyone. To feel their fingers against her acres of expanse, to feel them squeeze her incredible girth between their hands. She shook like a leaf, deep within her own hundreds of pounds, and quivered like a lady in waiting. She adored the sensations that only a being of her size could experience.

Ivy watched as Margaret's fear slowly gave way to appreciation—no, adoration for her size. Her beauty. Her eyes glazed and her muscles slacked. One hand extended to trace one stray roll of Ivy's enormous gut as it rose and fell like a great viridian empire.

"Y-Yes boss..." the former criminal gulped as Ivy twisted the chemicals in her brain to that of obedience, "Are you... are you hungry?"

"Always." Ivy purred, watching her prey grow more and more docile. The spores from Ivy's hot breath made their way towards the expanding former criminal's lungs...

Oh she'd have so much fun with this one. Her babies would have a nice time inside little Magpie. Making her grow and grow like a chubby little flower, sending her out into the world full of her spores so she could spread them even further. Just like she'd done with the last girl they'd put on feeding duty. And the one before that, and the one before that...

It may have only been one plant at a time, but Ivy had certainly enjoyed bringing this species back to the world...
