Kent stood strongly, not affected at all by Ivy's hollow advances. For underneath his simple disguise, Clark Kent was really a certain blue-and-red clad battletank of a superhero who had long assisted his cowled counterpart in foiling the plots of these criminal sirens. As such, he was completely aware of the eccentricities that made up Ivy's personality. His eyes travelled over to the latter fatties in the room, a whopper of a Selina Kyle wiggled her plump fingers at him innocently and a super stuffed Talia al Ghul rubbed her stomach and gave a pained smile in his direction. "I don't think so, Ms. Isely, would you mind?" he repeated himself in a little more personal manner. "Oh fine, you're no fun." she pouted, "Girls, Harley and I are going to go have some fun with the paper boy, don't wait up." she teased. Selina giggled, "Like you can get up by yourself."

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
Clark held out a hand and gently helped Ivy to her feet, the first time she had been off her butt for weeks.

"Pretty strong, aren't you handsome?" Ivy said with a grin.

Ignoring Ivy yet again, Clark focused on the pudgy jester to his left.

"Ms. Quinn don't you think it's odd that nearly all the citizens of Gotham are becoming obese?"

"Um...not really. People get hungry, right?"

Inwardly, Kal El sighed.

It was going to take some work to get answers from these bloated criminals. Maybe Superman would have better luck if he returned that night.

But for now Clark resumed questioning both Ivy and Harley.

Roughly an hour or so later Clark Kent left the apartment building, a few pages of hurried notes in his right hand. Taking out his cell phone, he dialed his wife's number. She was currently at one of Gotham's nicer hotel's while they investigated this story.

"Mmmmm....GULP Hello?"

"Lois...are you eating right now?"

Another swallow and several loud smacks followed before Lois answered him.

"Sure am Smallville. The food here is so good!"

"I'm heading over there now, try not to eat anything else."

If what Bruce told him was true then his wife was about to join the ranks of a ballooning Gotham City.

Lois Lane hung up and looked around. Her belly was already hanging over the waistband of her pants and she was sure her rear end would split her pajama bottoms in half if she bent over. Chocolate smears were around her face as she surveyed the empty plates all around her.

Clark's warning was the farthest thing from her mind at the moment, as she picked up the hotel phone.

"Hello room service, I'd like to order another breakfast cart please. And add some eclairs if you don't mind."

Back at the Siren's apartment....

Ivy lowered her bulbous rear onto the couch next to Selina, the fat thief purring as she laid her head on Ivy's big gut.

"Hungry?" Ivy asked.

Selina nodded.

"Me too," Ivy replied.

Harley, having immediately undressed after Clark Kent took his leave, bounced back into the room; her bottomless resevoir of enthusiasm allowing her to quickly dismiss the nerve-wracking interview that had preceded as nothing. She sighed, completely at peace back in her skimpy pajamas and her bulbous bulk clammoring for an audience. "Well, that was an ordeal!" she stretched, bringing one thick leg up in the air and wrapping her hand around a soft arm, "I'm headin' to bed, it's late and I can't miss those late night cartoons~!!"

Talia's eyes narrowed sharply, watching closely as Harley's chub spilled over her ensamble. She knew how to take a hint, Harley obviously wanted a piece of her for tonight and wanted to be polite about going about it. "Love, would you like me to join you as you watch your... er, 'cartoons'?" the enormous brunette lifted her swollen stomach up slightly to signal that she clearly recieved her lover's message, "Is it the one about the cat and mouse?" Harley answered innocently, while Talia usually had Harley wrapped tightly around her little finger, no one came between her and Blossom Bubbles and Buttercup. "But yeah, sure, I'll help you up."

"If she spent a month in a bakery maybe." Selina quipped. "You hush, Kitty." Harley snapped back lightly, "So, want some chips or something while we're in there?" Harley asked as she turned back to Talia, who purred slightly as she considered the question. "Now that I think about it, yes, I would love those barbecue flavored ones." she gave Harley the reacharound and pinched her plump tush

Ivy felt herself blush as she watched Harley's plush bottom is squeezed between Talia's own undefined fingers. For some reason, Harley swatted her hand away innocently, "Oh, Tallie!" she squeaked, "I really just wanna watch cartoons; honest!" Talia waddled ahead of her, putting out her cigarette in an ashtray along the way. While Talia's bum looked really huge in those jeans, it did nothing for Ivy- it seemed like only Harley could make her blush like that. "We'll see how the evening plays out." Talia winked seductively at Harley, who eeked yet again as she watched Talia's massive hips sway. "I love that girl." Harley practically floated out of the living room after her girlfriend, clutching the desired baggie of Lay's in her chubby hands.

Ivy shook her head, attention returning to the television as it had before that ever-so attractive distraction diverted it. Her green eyes locked on the screen, though they were somehow unable to comprehend the documentary in front of them. She was still distracted, still thinking about the swirling emotions inside of her. And perhaps by the smell of a lovely roast that occassionally wafted up from the air ducts. Selina, who's head had still not left the excellent cushion of her girlfriend's belly, seemed aware of Ivy's inner conflict. "Staring problem?" Selina asked, breaking Ivy's silence, "I know it's big, but you don't have to stare at it all the time."

Ivy started to sweat, "Wh-What do you mean?" she feigned innocence, "I thought we were watching television together?" she pointed at the wide tv across from the couch. "I meant Harley's ass." Selina raised an eyebrow, "It's okay, no need to be ashamed." she said calmly, pathetically trying to lift from her lax position to grab at the remote, "It's big, it's perky, it's cute." she kept going on, pawing at the clicker, "I just thought... that mine was, well, I thought that you were attracted to me." she huffed. Selina smiled devilishly, "Well, if you really love me, then get someone to break into Ms. Katrowskie's apartment and grab that roast, it's driving me crazy." she licked her full lips hungrilly. Ivy grabbed a coffeecake from a box on the end table and substituted it for the roast. "Mmmmm..." Catwoman purred, closing her eyes in her passion, "There's the love." she shifted herself into laying on the couch instead of lounging.

And as she fed her girlfriend, Ivy couldn't help herself from listening in on the giggling coming from Harley's room. And how she suddenly regretted what she said about loving Selina....

"What's going on out here?!" Harley's plump form emerged from her doorway in her nighties, hands resting on her killer hips, "Tallie and I are- oh." she quickly identified the elephant in the room, the elephant being Superman rather than Selina this time. "Hiya." she meekly wiggled her fingers at the do-gooder. "Yeah, hiya." Superman dryly parroted, "A little birdy told me about Anonymous Goods, and the plump little girls behind the scenes."

Ivy wretched, "girls", it was so demeaning to be called that. "Yeah, well, we're just as clueless as the rest of Gotham." Ivy struggled to her feet and rest Selina's head on the firmly indented sofa, "So why don't you go jump a tall building or outrun a speeding train or something?" "Really?" she asked, suprised that the big blue boyscout had come onto her.

"Oh." Ivy's expression instantly drooped, she knew what this was...

1553311111111211122121121122221111111121.content:
A swirling torrent of shame and humiliation washed around Renee's head as she stumbled out of bed the next morning, the feeling of defeat still weighing heavily on her as she tried not to recall the events of the night that preceded. Taken advantage of by a gaggle of fattened supervillains, what a new low. The only upside was that poor Vic wasn't alive to see her descent into gluttony, lord knows what words he would have had for her if he had seen this disaster. For weeks now Renee had been futilely struggling to keep her weight and her appetite under control, to no avail. Renee was spiraling out of control, and she knew if she didn't crack this case soon she would be just as far gone Roxy Rocket or the Sirens, a fat glutton too obsessed with filling her gullet to focus on anything else.

Renee knew she was't too far off. She gave herself a quick look over in the full body mirror situated over her closet door. She had long passed the threshold into fatdom, but her recent experiences with Kate Kane and the Sirens had begun to amplify it. Her enormous behind had been the first part of her to experience her onslaught of weight gain and soon grew to be her most prominent feature. Many a pair of jeans had fallen prey to her behemoth backside in the past few weeks, and it's outward journey didn't show any signs of stopping. The rest of her lower body was also no stranger to her massive gain, her legs and thighs keeping in lock-step with the expansion of her sizable rear. Renee feared that it would only be a few more weeks before wearing denim jeans and slacks would no longer be feasible and she would have to make the permanent transition into sweats. Her belly had also begun to see some emergence, as the pendulous gut made itself known. Where once she had only a beer gut, it had grown into a bonfide apron, one that had begun to pour down past her nether bits. 1553311111111211122121122.content:
Tuesday was always such a bland day for most people. A workday that fell in-between the anxiousness of Monday and the feeling of slighted optimism that came with Wednesday, 'Hump Day' as was its blue collar monicker. Along with the insipid feeling of this dreaded day, the sweltering Summer sun that loomed overhead the gothic city of Gotham made it all the more unbearable as denizens slowly baked in their own apartments; the pleasant breezes of Spring fondly missed in wake of their harsh unforgiving cousin Dry Heat. To put it shortly, no one could quite beat the heat.

Even in Wayne Towers, famous for its posh accommodations and luxurious handling of tenants, was experiencing a slight overheating problem that had blown out the circuits its highly overtaxed air conditioning unit. The maintenance men claimed that only a few hours of blistering heat would have to be endured, though no one was entirely reassured by the simple logistics of it. They wanted cold now; anything short of instantly would just be an insult to their blue blood. And though the underpaid specialists worked their fingers to the bone to satisfy, they simply could not produce results fast enough. However, there seemed to be one tenant who rather enjoyed the blisteringly hot environment that Gotham found itself plunged into; this being of course the only truly solar-powered woman in the city: Pamela "Poison Ivy" Isely.

Much like the Man of Steel, Poison Ivy seemed to be filled with energy today on this first "true" day of Summer. Whereas most women dreaded the sweat that drip from their brow and the matting of their hair, Ivy seemed to relish in the experience; she seemed to flourish as the perspiration from her own brow ran smoothly down her rounded cheeks, and her vibrant red hair gaining a lustrous sheen as it absorbed precious energy from the blaring yellow sun. Her mood was upbeat, swaying her full hips as she hummed lightly to her precious children taking residence in the botanical garden Wayne Towers had provided. Dressed keenly in a yellow sundress, Ivy's bubbly form shook and shimmied with each upbeat movement of her heavyset shape. She paused for a moment to gaze upwards lovingly at the sun, wiping the sweat from her forehead graciously and going right back to work; egging her plants to grow bigger and faster with the tender love and care she provided for them.

Amidst the clicks and low hums, Ivy discerned a pleasant thanks towards their mother for the gracious luncheon they had been provided with. She bid them farewell for the evening as she stepped out onto the roof of the building. Her tight juane attire began clinging to her every bulge, hugging her every curve as she grew damper and damper in perspiration. Her green skin glistened in the bright sunlight as the thin layer of sweat ran down her over ripened form. In the sweltering heat Ivy's tummy bulged out and about, jutting slightly and folding to lap her belt line. But she didn't seem to mind, lately she didn't seem to have a care in the world.

Funny how a little weather could change a person.

Stepping inside the elevator, Ivy expertly punched in the number for her floor, the seventh, and waited for the metal box to carry her down what could easily have been several flights of arduous steps. Finally a slight jerking motion in the container signaled that the elevator had started moving, her hands immediately falling down to ease the slightest pressure put on her stomach by gravity. The supervillain stepped out as the doors opened with a hushed 'ding', waddling down the hallway until reaching the Isely-Quinn residence; craving for its glorious view of the skyline and the bright weather she had been blessed with. She should have bailed after the milk truck and the flaming hula hoop, and indeed she tried after Harley took a honey-baked ham to the face, but thanks to her compulsive habit of shoving junk food into her face, she started choking on a Twinkie when she attempted to escape, and was rewarded with a crowbar and a nasty dark green shadow across the bridge of her nose. If she survived this, she was going on a hard, HARD diet.

"Man, I can't believe we caught these two!" one of the goons said, nudging Harley with the toe of his boot.

"I know, right?" another of the guys said excitedly. "Wait'll I tell the boys down at Goonies, I'll be drinkin' free for months!"

"Whaddaya think we can get for turnin them in?" a mustachioed brute asked, poking Ivy's fleshy tummy with the barrel of his rifle, not noticing Ivy trying to bite at his ankles. "I bet we get a cool mil just for the clown!"

"Aww, we can't keep em?" a fourth goon said, grinning lecherously. "I'd love to get my hands on-"

"You won't, pendejos."

The goon looked behind him and was immediately launched across the room by a powerful kick, landing in a crumpled heap on the far side of the warehouse. None of the other guys flinched at this display. After all, they knew who they were working for.

From her vantage point, Ivy saw the crowd of legs part and a pair of heavy boots approaching her. Glancing down, or rather up, she caught sight of the towering, hulking figure in the black and white wrestling mask.

"Buenos dias, Bane," Ivy said coolly.

"Pamela Isley, isn't it?" Bane asked, crouching down to get a better look at her. "I barely recognized you, because of...well, I'm sure you know." He chuckled darkly as Ivy's face flushed. "That was an impressive display out front, I didn't expect that move from you."

"It was my idea!" Harley piped in.

"Ah, the clown's...squeeze, I think is the term," Bane said, turning to Harley. "That, I did expect from you. Let me guess, you thought stealing from me was a better idea then repeating your little ATM heist?"

"Brilliant idea, wasn't it?" Harley asked brightly. "Well, except for this bit with the ankles upside down, I mean..."

"Oh, flawless," Bane chuckled, deeply amused by this deluded jester. "You'll have to tell me all about it."

"Oh, well you start with the giant rubber chicken and about twelve pounds of Wow, It's Not Actually Butter-"

"Hey, boss!" Bane looked up and Ivy looked down at the overhead balcony where a door had opened up. "The guys in the back haven't checked in yet. Want us to go check it out?"

"No need. It's the Batman." Bane cracked his knuckles menacingly. "He is right where we want him. Draw him towards the assembly room, I will confront him there, and then...I will break him."

"You really need a new catchphrase," Ivy said coolly.

"Leave these two here," Bane ordered his men, ignoring the verbal barb. "Carrion for whomever finds them, not worth the irritation."

"Hey, no we aren't!" Harley shouted after the retreating men and their hulking boss. "I am VERY irritating!"

Too easy, Ivy decided.

"Red, I'm scared, what are we gonna do to get out of here?" Harley gulped, her chipper attitude vanishing rather quickly. Ivy smirked as the small vine crawling up her ankle finished slowly dripping acid onto the steel bar holding them up. "Whoah, what's that?" Harley yelped as the bar suddenly bowed under their weight. "I don't -GUK"

"GAK!"

The bar suddenly snapped, and both girls faceplanted on the grimey floor, their bodies flopping down afterwards in a very undignified manner. Ivy pushed herself up, tugging her leaf shirt back over her stomach and dusting herself off.

"Red...pffft..." Harley cheered, spitting hair out of her mouth. "You SAVED me!"

"Only because I couldn't save myself without freeing you too," Ivy snapped bitterly. She immediately regretted it after seeing Harley's best sad puppy eyes. "L-look lets just get out of here before Batman shows up," Ivy grumbled, wondering if she was going soft.

"Fine, but if you keep being rude, I won't share the goods with ya!" Harley said with a knowing wink as the two dashed for an exit, keeping eyes peeled for sudden looming shadows overhead.

"What goods? We didn't get a damn thing! This night was a total waste!"

"Oh, was it?" With a very cocky smile, Harley reached into her pants (yuck) and pulled out...
1553311111111212.title: Harley's Great Plan

choices: The flower increased Ivy's appetite immensely.
It did something else to her.
15533111111112123.content:
"OK, I appreciate you doing your best to save the green." Ivy had to give Harley points for that, it was the one good thing that Harley had done this entire botched mission.

"No, don't you see, Red'?" Harley held the flower up towards Ivy, it was a flower that not even the plant mad Pamela knew, it was different and didn't look like it was from Gotham, or anywhere for that matter.

"I see a strange looking flower, look, no offence." Ivy put her hands on her slightly pudgy hips as she raised her eyebrow at her jaded jester 'friend' (and Ivy would use massive quotation marks around the word 'friend' in regards to Harley.) "but if I don't know what that is, then I highly doubt that you know what that thing is, either."

"Oh, I don't know what it is." Harley said chipperly. "But, it must be something rare and expensive if you don't even know what it is, who knows, it could be worth millions of dollars!" Harley continued to ramble on as Ivy just rolled her eyes before getting in closer to take a closer look; trying to find if there was anything that could give her a hint on the flower.

But, as Ivy leaned in, the flower suddenly blasted her in the face with something, causing Ivy to scream in shock and stagger back in a clumsy fashion; she was usually more graceful, but it did catch her off guard. "What the hell!?" Ivy yelled out, her face looking even more green than usual as the flower started to shrink slightly, as if it was scared of the angry Ivy.

However, as Ivy was ranting and raving, she had no idea that the blast from the flower was starting to change her and it was working on changing the redhead in ways that not even Harley could've predicted if you gave her 100 years to think of an answer.

How did the flower change Ivy?
15533111111112123.title: ...a flower?

choices: Eat Up, Ivy!
Big Girls In A Big City
Something else?
155331111111121232.content:
"Omigosh, you okay Red?"

Ivy braced herself against the crate, breathing heavily as the surprise of getting blasted in the face by a strange flower passed, her shock melting away into anger.

"Why the hell..." she started to say. "Did you stick that in my face?"

"I-I...flowers liked you, I didn't think-" Harley muttered, quivering under her furious gaze.

"I'd have been better off hanging from the steel bar by my toes!" Ivy shouted, snatching the flower out of her hand. "And for a flower? I...I ought to..." Ivy lost her balance, slipping and catching herself on a nearby storage crate. "Ugh...ought to..."

"You okay, Pam?"

"I...of course..." Ivy muttered, blinking as she tried to focus on Harley's face. Her temples were throbbing, and she could feel the blood pulsing in her ears. "My head....room's spinning..." Ivy felt her ankles give out and she smacked down face first on the ground.

"PAM!"

Harley dashed forward, lifting her off the ground and slapping her face lightly. "Come on Pam, wake up! I-it's just a silly flower, bit of pollen!" Ivy remained unresponsive, her breathing light and shallow as the flower fell out of her hand. In her panic, Harley didn't notice that the flower was fake, or that she pulled them out of a whole box full of them, stolen from the evidence lab at the GCPD years ago. And if she read the label on them, she'd notice that they were confiscated upon the arrest of one of her old colleagues back at Arkham; a certain doctor by the name of Jonathan Crane.

It was a good thing Ivy was knocked out and didn't have to worry about escaping Bane, since she was about to have a nice lengthy hallucination fueled by her own anxieties. And thanks to recent events, the anxiety foremost in her mind was about her eating habits. But what sort of hallucination was that going to be?

Eat Up, Ivy!: Ivy wakes up in a world where everyone's offering her something to eat, and they won't take no for an answer!

Big Girls In a Big City: Ivy awakens to find herself, and every other girl in Gotham, enormously overweight!
155331111111121232.title: Who's Afraid of a Flower?

choices: Ivy and Harley killed Batman and now rule Gotham, leaving female heroes.
Something else caused their heavyweight and high society living.
1553311111111212322.content:
The hallucination was already starting to work as Ivy's eyes slowly opened as she heard Harley's call for her to wake up, it started off faint, but as Ivy's eyes got more open, she heard it clearer and clearer.

"Pam?

"Pam?"

"Yo! Earth to Ivy!!"

As Ivy opened her eyes, her jaw nearly hit the floor when she saw Harley, or at least saw the size of Harley, her jaded jester was now more of a 'Jumbo Jester', a big second chin that eclipsed her neck, big, meaty arms that barely had any strength in them, a massive stomach that protruded outwards, legs like tree trunks and a massive ass.

"Jesus Christ! Harl', what the hell happened to you?!" Ivy called out, but she felt something different...had her voice always been that deep and husky? However, the annoyed expression on the hugely overweight Harley showed that she was quite annoyed.

"What? You spend your time bragging how we're the biggest and baddest bitches in Gotham and all of a sudden you're fat shaming me? This coming from the woman who bragged about being Immense Ivy?!"

"What the hell are you talking about!?" Ivy grunted out, but it was like even talking was getting her out of breath and, when she tried to stand up, she was unable to, like a big weight was weighing her down.

But, as she looked down, she saw that the 'weight' was her own obesity, Ivy was even fatter than Harley, her belly was like a planet of fat that wobbled from Ivy's heavy breathing, which was a side effect of her ample bulk, it was to the point where she had a double belly and, when Ivy turned her head and caught a glimpse of her reflection in a window; it hit home.

She had three chins that eclipsed her neck and wobbled with every word, Ivy must've tipped the scales at 600lbs as she blabbered and started to sweat due to her mind not being able to process what was going on. However, Ivy looked around and saw that they were in more plush surroundings than usual, a massive apartment with all the finest features that the duo could've only dreamed of.

"Harl'." Ivy grunted out as she sat there, unable to process what was going on, or heave herself up thanks to her own obesity. "What's going on??" as Harley just folded her fat, massive arms and snorted.

"God, Red, that 25 course cheat day must've done a number on you; OK, let me explain how we got here." Harley panted out, and what she said suddenly made the hallucination feel more like Ivy's idea of paradise.
1553311111111212322.title: Big Girls In A Big City

choices: It seems that the two have a visitor, perhaps a newly fattened friend?
Harley begins to feed her...rather aggressively too.
Scarecrow's spores mutate, and Ivy finds herself flung forward in this timeline.
15533111111112123221.content:
Ding!

"Ooh, my grilled cheese is done!" Harley said, clapping her hands together before waddling off into the other room, leaving a very confused Ivy behind.

"Harley, wait!" she called out, trying to stand up again but shifting herself only a couple inches before flopping back down again. Grumbling, she braced her pudgy hands on her seat and heaved once again, using her weight to her advantage and swinging her bulk off the sofa. The floor let out a pathetic groan as her heavy double-belly slapped down against her thighs, hanging lower then her sunken knees. Instinctively, she reached up to pull her shirt down before realizing she wasn't wearing one; instead, she appeared to be naked save for the leaves that covered her breasts and nether regions. Because she had nothing to wear in this size, or because she didn't care enough to put anything on? Ivy couldn't say.

She took a step towards the kitchen and immediately found herself winded, panting heavily and sweating from the exertion of moving her immense body. Pushing herself onward was even more agonizing as she felt her whole body wobble and shake, and she had to pause to catch her breath, leaning against the window. She took a moment to glance outside and removed her hand upon seeing how high up she was. Was this even still Gotham? She could see the clock tower in the distance, no building in the city this tall was within sight of it! Looking closer revealed something else; green. Greenery flowed through the distant streets below, climbing up the buildings and overtaking the ugly concrete with vibrant flowering bods and twisted winding vines. Ivy was surprised she didn't notice, since the window she looked out appeared to be partially surrounded with flowering vines.

Her desire to understand what the hell was going on pushed Ivy forward, and she eventually entered upon a rather massive kitchen, nearly as big as the previous living room. Harley had busied herself in front of an uncomfortably large microwave, bent over and sticking her massive rear end towards Ivy, and while she wasn't in the nude, Harley looked like she was a few meals away from bursting out of the panties stretched across her shelf-like buttocks.

"Harl!" Ivy gasped, bracing herself on the counter. Harley turned around, revealing a massive platter of grilled cheese sandwiches.

"I made them with the special cheese from that one plant, honest! Totally vegan!" Harley insisted, a little too eagerly. "Y-you didn't need to check on me to make sure!"

"No, it's not that, I-" Ivy started to say before her eye caught something hanging off the back of a chair...something with pointed ears. "What the hell is THAT doing here?" she demanded, pointing a pudgy finger at it. Harley, confused, waddled over to pick up what indeed turned out to be a rather familiar cowl, unceremoniously pitched over a chair like an old coat.

"It's Ol' Bat's cowl, silly!" Harley giggled. "Remember, we got it off of the Bat's body!"

Ivy blinked. "...body?"

"Sheesh Red you get slow when you're hungry," Harley said, waddling back over and picking up one of the sandwiches. "Here ya go!" Ivy felt her gluttonous stomach lurch, and she instinctively opened her mouth to let Harley stick the sandwich in, chewing it up happily before realizing what she did. Something to deal with later, Ivy supposed.

"Yeah it does feel like yesterday, don't it?" Harley continued, picking up the whole platter this time and moving it to the center counter. "Could you believe Bats was Wynea Ercub the whole time?" The name came out differently then the rest of what Harley was saying, almost like it was played backwards, though the jester didn't seem to notice as she dug into the platter. Ivy blinked, her head swimming as she tried to take this all in. Eating seemed to help her focus though, so Ivy somewhat reluctantly joined in the grilled cheese feast.

"So...Batman's dead, right?" Ivy confirmed warily.

"Yup! Gone and goner, hasn't been seen since Demon Guy took over!"

"Demon guy?" Ivy asked.

"Yeah, the head demon guy, what's his name...Rashal Gool?"

'Ra's al Ghul?' Ivy thought to herself. She knew him well, even shared some of the same goals too. What was his involvement here?

"Can't believe we didn't ask for his help takin' down Bats sooner!" Harley giggled. "No Venom or anythin', just wrapped him up in your vines, take my mallet and...whack!" Harley mimed swinging her hammer, though her bingo wings swung more then she did at this point.

"We made a good alliance, then," Ivy remarked.

"I'll say! He even let you control Gotham city without having to answer to President Lex!" Harley said. "No interference or nothin', just you growin' Gaia-sized!"

Ivy raised an eyebrow. "Growing...?"

"Yeah, I didn't buy into this eco thing at first, all "Mother Earth is big and bountiful so all girls have gotta be in her image" but uh...I gotta say, this is kinda fun!" Harley giggled again, slapping the side of her stomach to let it wobble. "With all this comfy fat I'm like a big stuffed plushie!"

Ivy was too shocked at this point to think much about Harley's interest in her own blubber. Batman was dead, and she won? Not only that but she was in control and the first thing she did...was fatten herself and Harley up? Probably more women too, if what Harley said was true. She did want to be the avatar of Gaia of course, but...was being a lardball really part of that?

Before Ivy could ponder more on that front, however...
15533111111112123221.title: Mother Earth

choices: Selina has a drug to make Ivy even fatter; thus increasing her power.
Something else.
155331111111121232211.content:
"Well, Well...it seems like I'm not the only one enjoying life without the Bat."

The two obese young women heard a voice from above, a deeper, huskier voice than before, but it was still obvious who it was as the two looked up and saw Selina Kyle, better known as Catwoman and it was obvious that she was less a 'Catwoman' and more like a 'Whale' considering she was also obese.

Selina grunted as she, somehow, jumped down from her perch, which was somehow able to hold her fat ass and, as Selina dropped down in front of the two; it felt like the ground was shaking underneath them, like the Colossal Cat's fat registered on the richter scale. Then, Ivy got a good look at how supersized Selina was.

She wasn't as fat as Harley or Ivy, but Selina must've tipped the scales at 350+lbs, her bulbous belly was crammed into her skintight catsuit as it looked like it was one meal away from bursting off of Selina's obese body. The side rolls could be seen bunching up, it was honestly like the catsuit was painted on Selina's heaving, sweaty fat.

"I have to say, girls...you look good." Selina complimented, her face looking rounder with a firm second chin on her pretty face as Harley couldn't help but blush at the compliment. "Geee, thanks, Fat Cat; you look great, too."

"Oh, please, I look purrrr-fect." Selina purred as Ivy rolled her eyes in annoyance, she was still confused what was going on, but she was now annoyed at Selina's insistance on going all out with the 'feline' quirks.

"I see some things never change." Ivy snorted and rolled her eyes, folding her fat, flabby arms in dismissive irritation as Selina just pouted in a taunting way to Ivy and responded to that remark with a simple.

"Well, good to see you too, Ivy...listen, I supposed you want to know why I'm here?" Selina asked, causing Harley to bounce up and down, her fat quaking wildly with even the simplest of movements.

"Yeah, why're you here, Kitty-Fat?" Harley gave Selina another nickname that caused Ivy to rudely scoff and give Selina a condescending look up and down before she responded with a snarky. "Yeah, or did you just come all this way to get a look at a real woman??"

Ivy had no idea that the toxins from the plant were causing her to almost embrace her hallucinationary obesity as Ivy started to slowly rub her massive, fat flesh as if to show Selina what she'd never look like.


Why is Selina there?
155331111111121232211.title: It seems that the two have a visitor, perhaps a...

choices: "Alright, give me that stuff."
"Can we see it on Harley again?"
"Actually, let's see it on YOU!"
1553311111111212322111.content:
Catwoman glanced in Harley's direction before leaning towards Ivy. "She's...in on this, right?" she asked quietly.

"In om whut?" Harley asked through a mouthful of sandwich. Ivy drew a complete blank, glancing between the two girls and deciding to gamble a bit.

"Er...yes, she can be trusted," Ivy said, trying to sound like she wasn't frantically improvising.

"I figured she wouldn't be after what Lex did, but I wanted to be sure," Selina purred.

"Wait are you two going after Lex?" Harley said excitedly. "Ooh, tell me more! I wanna see him get what's coming to him, after what he did to...Mr. J..." Harley's voice quivered slightly as her eyes teared up slightly, but she repressed the sudden emotion with another sandwich stuffed whole into her mouth.

"Don't worry, once Ivy takes her medicine Luthor won't know what hit 'em," Selina smirked. The super-sized burglar pulled what Ivy just realized was a back rucksack off her shoulder and opened it up. Glass tubes clanked together inside, and an unearthly green-blue color shined onto the underside of Catwoman's flabby breasts. "Couple shots of these and you'll be powerful enough to take over the entire country with your green, and every mind inside of it too," Catwoman said, pulling out one of the vials. For the first time since this mess started, Ivy found herself intrigued by this opportunity.

"Is al Ghul okay with this?" Ivy found herself saying. "He has enough trouble dealing with Vandal Savage over in Eastern Europe, he might not want us starting a war with Lex Luthor." Ivy blinked, surprised at the words coming out of her mouth. Did she just say something that the version of her in this timeline knew? Or...something that she knew? Ugh, this was confusing.

"What he doesn't know won't hurt him," Selina pointed out. "And besides, if this works Luthor won't be able to do a thing about it." This did make sense, Ivy thought to herself. In the end Lex was only in such a position of power because he was a useful asset in the takeover of the planet, he wouldn't mind if someone more equitable to his views were in Lex's place. Someone like Poison Ivy.

Okay, between teasing Selena about her size and knowing all this information from an alternate universe, this was getting weird. Unless...this was always the real world? Funny, she had a distant memory of a warehouse, and a flower...

"So what does this stuff do?" Harley asked, looking over the vial curiously. "Gives you super strength or somethin? Or is it like Plant-Gro stuff?"

Selina gave an appropriately cat-like grin. "Why don't you try some for yourself, Harl? It might...suit you."

"Selina!"

"Don't worry Pam, there's plenty extra, and I can always steal more of this stuff from Bane's labs," Selina reassured Ivy as Harley squealed in delight and popped the top off a vial. Ivy blinked, feeling a little numb. Bane...warehouse...flower...was...was that even real? Did anything like that happen?

Ivy's questioning of her own reality took a backseat to ongoing events however as Harley quaffed the vial of chemicals in a few gulps, briefly pausing before dropping the delicate glassware in disgust.

"Blech, it's icky!" Harley told the girls. "I can't believe I....oh....oh!"

The jester's cheeks flushed as Harley's mouth fell open in shock. Ivy wondered if she'd been poisoned by the chemical before her cheeks suddenly started to swell before her eyes.

"I feel....really weird..." Harley gulped, her double chin widening and sinking lower on her face, a third growing just beneath it. Reaching up to feel her face, she watched in amazement as her fingers thickened before her eyes, the fat spreading down her wrists, swallowing her elbows and stretching the sleeves of her t-shirt. She barely had time to comprehend her ham-like arms before her belly suddenly wobbled and started to swell, sinking towards her knees.

Ivy and Selina took two heavy steps backwards as Harley kneaded her growing gut, feeling the fat collect beneath her fingers. The sound of rending fabric filled the air as the sides of her shirt split open, then a rubber snap was heard and Harley's voluminous panties fell to the ground, torn neatly in two. Harley yelped and covered her rear end with her hands, though she needn't have bothered since her gut hung low enough to cover anything inappropriate. Her billowing thighs were starting to tear rips and holes in her knee-high socks, and even the floor seemed to creak underneath her. At long last though, the growing seemed to slow down and desist, punctuated by a tremendously loud belch from the Jester.

"Wh-whoa..." Harley said, her voice throaty and thick. "I'm...huge!"

"I think she's even bigger then you now, Ivy," Selina quipped at Ivy, and the plant lady felt, of all things, a twinge of jealousy.

"I'm so big and plush!" Harley giggled, taking a cautious step forward and nearly losing her balance. "Woof, it's hard to move with all of this. Why didn't you say anything Red?"

"You never asked," Ivy pointed out as Harley kept attempting to walk, taking a few waddling steps at a time and inadvertently revealing her shelf of a rear end to the other girls, as well as the huge tear in her shirt. "Well, these are the right ones, then..."

"See, I told you that you could trust me," Selina said with a wink, lifting up a pair of vials in her hands. "Now...you read to take over the world, Red?" Judging by the hungry expression on Selina's face, Ivy figured that the cat burglar had an ulterior motive besides helping her take over the States. Ivy thought for a moment on this, without so much as a sliver of her old memories coming through, before deciding...
1553311111111212322111.title: That Delightful Nectar

choices: To Ivy as an immobile, power drunk ruler of earth.
To Ivy as the ruler of several planets after defeating the Green Lanterns.
15533111111112123221111.content:
"Alright, gimme it!" Ivy decided, her brain was slowly losing it's grip on what was real and what was a hallucination as Ivy snatched the vial out of Selina's chubby hands and gave her a glare. If Selina tried anything, then Ivy would make her suffer the same fate as Batman, or anyone else who got in her way.

"Time for you two to see what real power is" Ivy boasted, a smug smirk on her fat, beautiful face as the ruler of Gotham decided that she wanted more, she wanted to rule the entire world; to take it back to the days of plant life reigning supreme, with Ivy as it's obese, all mighty Goddess. Ivy's fat fingers managed to unscrew the top of the vial before she simply opened her maw as wide as she could and poured the entire thing into her mouth.

The chemicals took effect almost instantly as Ivy groaned and moaned in a feeling of surprising discomfort and pain, she clutched onto her massive belly and shook violently. She tried to block out the pain, which was getting more and more noticeable as Ivy started to grow even more, her belly ballooning up to the point where it slammed onto the floor, Ivy's fat face got another chin of fat that covered her neck as Ivy was hurtling towards immobility.

"Red?? Are you OK!?" Harley called out with genuine concern in her voice as Ivy's transformation was complete, letting out a massive, building shaking belch that nearly caused both Harley and Catwoman to lose their balance and fall on their fat asses; Ivy just sat there, breathing heavily as it seemed like she wouldn't be moving anytime soon.

"I'm *huff*...better than OK...I'm invincible!" Ivy grunted out, her neck fat giving her a deeper, throatier voice, even more so than Harley, the serum was already messing with Ivy's head, inflating her ego, which was already massive and now it gave Ivy a borderline God Complex.

"So, did it work, do you feel more powerful?" Selina asked with a smirk on her fat face, which caused Ivy to smirk back at her as she struggled to get her breath back and simply snapped her fat, sausage like fingers.

With that one gesture, several vines burst through the windows, with the building itself being covered in vines and other plants; Catwoman and Harley looked on it genuine shock as a throne made of plants started to form around Ivy's immobile body; despite Ivy's even more titanic body, the throne was able to hold her girth.

Ivy just sat there, smirking with pride and arrogance as she casually, flippantly responded to Selina "Does that answer your question, Selina?" Ivy slouched back, massaging her planet sized belly that weighed Ivy down and would've rendered her unable to move, but her new control over plants solved that problem.

Ivy honestly felt like she could conquer the world, she didn't know if it was real or a hallucination, but the power she was feeling was intoxicating, but things got more interesting when the hallucination jumped forward yet again; but to what point?
15533111111112123221111.title: "Alright, give me that stuff."

choices: ...she was just picking up the bag. False alarm.
...an empty vial in her hand!
...an empty BAG in her hand! She drank all of them!
15533111111112123221113.content:
Something had been bothering Ivy since Selina had showed up, something that stuck in the back of her head like an unpleasant memory. She may have been thrown a bit by that strange dream she had about being a thin, common criminal, but her thoughts were coming back to her more clearly now, and there was one major red flag. Poison Ivy may be the size of an elephant, but under that blubber she was still Poison Ivy, and Poison Ivy...well, she could count the number of people she'd be willing to work with on one hand. Harley, Swamp Thing, Ra's apparently, maybe Floronic Man on a good day.

But never, never, Selina Kyle.

The two had a long history together, and far too much of that involved Catwoman betraying her or her allies and flipping over to Batman's side, or whichever vigilante was in town that day. The woman was, appropriately enough, as indecisive as an ill-tempered housecat, and Ivy would not have trusted her to deliver a sandwich, much less a chemical that would let her take over the world from under the nose of one of the smartest men left in the world. This meant one of two things, really. The first, treason, Ivy ruled out right away. Selina was always on the winning side, and judging by that belly she wasn't too broken up about being part of Ivy's new vision for womankind, or whatever Harley had mentioned. That of course, meant option two; Ivy wanted this stuff for another reason, one that Selina wasn't in on.

"Well, what are we waiting for?" Selina said expectently. "Let's get this-YEOUCH!"

Ivy jumped as Selina recoiled, slapping a hand onto the back of her neck. Slowly, Catwoman turned to face a vine floating delicately down from the ceiling, its beautiful purple petals hiding a potent sedative in its barbs. Ivy knew this because she immediately became aware that she was the one who sent it. Selina turned back to glare at Ivy with fire in her eyes, even as her face began to droop and sag.

"Y-you...backstabbing...bi....ugh..."

"Sorry, Selena. This is for your own good," Ivy found herself saying, retrieving one of the vials from the satchel Catwoman brought.

"N-no...I can...barely..." Selina mumbled, only to be cut off by Ivy dumping the vial into her mouth, her senses too muted to do anything but obediently swallow. "Don't wanna...hic....be a blob!"

"Don't knock it until ya tried it," Harley giggled as Selina's body began to shudder. Catwoman's face, like Harley's, immediately started to swell, her chins doubling and widening out, but the rest seemed slower, somehow. Ivy wondered if it was working or not when the sound of straining leather became audible, followed by gaps and tears forming up and down Selina's tight leather outfit. She desperately tried to contain herself, covering the gaps with hands that were filling out her gloves until...

*Shriip!*

A huge tear opened up right in the front and a creamy plush belly erupted from her outfit, pouring over her waist. Catwoman yelped and tried to grab at it but it quickly grew past her reach and towards the ground, and she was left whimpering as the same thing happened behind her, her plush rear end bursting out the back as her thighs tore apart her leggings like banana peels. With a final snap as her fat neck popped her collar off, Selina's growth subsided, leaving her the same size as Ivy and Harley, give or take, with her decency just barely preserved by the shreds of her outfit still sitting on her shoulders and the incredibly tight undergarments she had underneath.

"What did you...do to me?" Selina mewled pathetically.

"Made you into a real woman," Ivy cooed, running a delicate hand under Selina's thick chins, pleased that her plan had gone well, a plan that was only now coming back to her. The whole idea of overthrowing Lex was a farce, a false flag designed to root out traitors, since Lex had long ago been brainwashed with the help of Mad Hatter's mind manipulation tech to willingly perform Ra's Al Ghul's bidding. Catwoman had proved to be too mercurial to be trusted, and Ra's had ordered Ivy to ensure she wouldn't turn traitor again and work with some of the Bat Family rumored to still be active in Gotham.

Ivy hadn't wanted to kill her though. Sure she didn't trust Selina, but on a good day she did rather like her, and the cat's free-wheeling attitude was something that the plant-powered supervillain found oddly endearing in spite of herself. So she decided to kill two birds with one stone, acquiring the means to grow into Gaia's proper guardian and putting a leash on the cat, a leash in the form of an obscene amount of body fat, but a leash nonetheless. It was actually the same plan she made for Harley, and would have gone through with it if the Jester wasn't so eager to grow in Mother Earth's image already.

"Time to finish your transformation!" Ivy declared, clapping Selina on her meaty shoulder. "Harley, let's get to our room." Ivy turned to see Harley's enormous read end and the clown bent over the bag full of the chemicals.

"Harley?" Ivy asked again, feeling a touch suspicious about her actions.

"Mmph...yeah?" Harley huffed, turning around and revealing...
15533111111112123221113.title: Backstab Fat Cat

choices: Ivy gets the bag of vials and drinks them all, her power rising like her weight.
Harley gets the vials & decides that she wants to take over as Ruler Of Gotham.
155331111111121232211132.content:
Harley's mouth was covered in small splotches from the contents of the vial that she chugged as the Jumbo Jester casually patted her stomach and let out a loud, thunderous belch that sent all the obese girls' bodies into fits of wild wobbling as Harley's belch that could register on the richter scale finished, without a care in the world, Harley, almost smugly remarked.

"That hit the spot; get ready to see a real Heavyweight Harley...Ooooh...this is awesome!" Harley moaned as she felt the twinge of pain that meant the vial was doing its work as Harley's already obese body swelled up, she got bigger and bigger as her belly was getting so enormous that it was reaching the floor, Harley's face was getting an extra chin as her arms were blimping up to the point where they were almost useless.

"How dare she do this to me?!" Ivy thought, she wasn't sure why she was overcome with jealousy at the idea of Harley being fatter, but, as far as Ivy was concerned, she was the one who deserved to be the biggest, she was the closest thing to Gaia and, as a result, nobody should be fatter than Poison Ivy.

Harley's growing finally stopped as she actually almost seemed too big to fit in the room, although that was only because Immense Ivy and Supersized Selina took up most of the room.

"Well -BWOOOOOORRPPP!!!-" Harley got cut off as she blasted out another jowl wobbling belch, before giggling and continuing like nothing happened, her voice seeming even deeper, like talking and breathing at the same time was a struggle for her. "How do I look?"

"Not bad" Selina grunted out, as she was playing with her own belly fat in the same way that a cat played with string, but Ivy was becoming overcome with a feeling of jealousy and anger at the idea that Harley thought she could be fatter than her. Ivy looked over and saw the bag of vials and Ivy tried to get her flowers to take the bag of vials nearer to her.

But Harley noticed the bag too as the two obese land whales narrowed their eyes at each-other as they both said in unison.

"Those are mine!"

Who got the bag of vials first?
155331111111121232211132.title: ...an empty vial in her hand!

choices: Time to show Harley who the REAL boss is.
Time to neutralize Harley.
...oh crap, now what's happening? (Free choice)
1553311111111212322111322.content:
Despite her powers, Ivy never stood a chance.

Oh sure, she had a (pardon the pun) huge advantage with the mobility and utility that her plants gave her, but she grew soft and saggy in that time while Harley, forced to move around under her own power, built some muscle underneath that blubber, and with her size and strength advantage the jester easily knocked Ivy's plants around with her massive keister before they could ensnare her and even chomping down on one of the vines as she lumbered towards the vials. Seeing a pod spring up to snatch the prize, Harley threw herself at the bag, smashing the flower underneath her belly with a room-shaking bang and a sickening squelch.

"Harley, no!" Ivy pleaded. "You can't...I need...!"

"Oh, it's all about you, ain't it?" Harley snapped, slowly getting to her feet with bag in hand. "It's always about you!"

Ivy was so shocked by the sudden venom Harley was spitting at her that she didn't react to try and snatch the vials back, instead simply staring in disbelief. "Harley...what...?"

"Ever since we beat Bats, you've always been puttin' on airs, making yourself out like a big fat queen on your throne, making me your big fat court jester!" Harley practically growled, reaching into the satchel and taking out one of the vials of formula.

"...H-harley..."

"I thought we had somethin', Red," Harley continued, her face falling. "I thought we was friends, maybe even more then friends, but all you've cared about is sitting around all fat an' happy, treating me like some lackey." She made a sound that could have been a small sob before popping off the cap of the formula and taking it in one swallow, dropping it and reaching for a second. Ivy's eyes widened with shock and she tried to step forward and stop her, but her wobbling, weak gait left her practically frozen in place.

"Well if you think that's okay to treat your friends that way, I'm gonna see how YOU like it!" Harley said before guzzling down another vial of formula, picking up two with the other hand. Ivy could hardly believe what she was seeing, like a surreal nightmare playing out in real time in front of her.

A nightmare...

"Nobody's gonna boss me around anymore!" Harley declared between great mouthfuls of the formula. "Not you...gulp....not Mistah J...ulp....not Rashagool...blorp...not NO ONE!" At long last, the bag lay empty at her feet, Harley wiping the last remaining drops of the formula from her lips before she doubled over in pain. "Ooooh...hehe...you're gonna need a crane to move me around!" Harley taunted as her body started to shake.

Crane...nightmare...

Ivy's eyes widened with shock as she realized what was happening. Crane's fear toxin! She could feel it now, overriding her senses, keeping her in this surreal dreamscape. Reaching out with her green empathy, she could feel something different about it too; a natural ingredient, maybe to increase its potency. If she could reach out and take control of the formula using that sliver of biological matter, she might be able to seize control of the illusion and break free.

As Ivy returned to the scene, a plan formulating in her head, she looked up just in time to see Harley's massive apron of a gut start to grow anew. With one final snap, what was left of her t-shirt popped off, exposing her jiggling breasts as they swelled beyond capacity for any bra sized for humans, leaving her in just the stockings rolling down her thunderous thighs. The illusion commanded Ivy to lumber backwards in fear, and she did so as Harley took great, ponderous steps toward her, her rapid growth outpacing her elephantine footsteps. Instead of recoiling in pain, the jumbo-sized Jester giggled, her tone growing deeper as her face widened and her chins deepened, swelling together into a mass of neck fat between her bloated jowls. Ivy stumbled backwards, squeezing through the double-wide doors back to her lounge, and Harley's overflowing love-handles shattered the doorframe as she barged right on through, unleashing a seismic belch that felt like it did as much damage as her destruction of the door.

And in the moment where Ivy should have been scared for her life, rendered helpless by the scenario playing out in her head, she was instead triumphant. She found the biological component in the toxin, worming her way into the compound like a parasitic invader. The skies seemed to darken and the room shivered as the vision began to bend to her will. She'd be free soon, but first?
1553311111111212322111322.title: Big Bad Harley

choices: Ivy becomes obsessed with getting as big in real life as she was in the illusion
Ivy decides that she needs to take Harley out for a dinner.
15533111111112123221113221.content:
Ivy had now finally put two and two together as she had not only found out that it was an illusion, but she had also found the biological component that would require her to get out of there; but Ivy looked up to the towering monster of obesity that was Harley Quinn, the Jumbo Jester was breathing heavily, like every breath was hard due to her mammoth bulk, but a big smile was still on Harley's multi-chinned face.

"It's been fun...but nature always wins" Ivy boasted, her fat face contorting into a smug smirk as she continued to taunt the enraged and unhinged Harley with her boasting and bragging. "You're all size and no smarts, darling...I've got both." Ivy wobbled her own gut to enrage Harley and keep her distracted, so that it wasn't clear to the distracted blonde that Ivy was getting out of this hallucination.

"Well, Red...*oomph*" Harley wheezed out, her voice heavier and deeper thanks to her neck fat as her jowls quaked, it almost seemed that it was a struggle for the titanic Harley to even speak, but she continued to blubber her threat out "You've always said that bigger is better and nobody is bigger or badder than Heavyweight Harley."

Ivy then realised that she wasn't exactly getting out of the hallucination as quickly as she thought, even though things were changing around her, Harley slowly lumbered towards the less obese, but still gargantuan redhead, with the idea to sit on her, squashing her like a bug and cementing herself as the new Queen of Gotham.

"It's time that you learned who the real Queen is, Harley Queenzell has a ring, don't ya' think?" Harley huffed out as her colossal girth eclipsed Ivy like the moon was eclipsing the sun, but Ivy remained defiant, knowing that she needed to stall Harley long enough. Even if Harley's words had genuinely hit home, Ivy wondered if the real Harley felt the same? Ivy knew that she needed to make it up to her best friend.

However, right as Harley was going to put her planet sized asscheeks to good use, squashing Ivy like a particularly large bug, Ivy's eyes widened as she felt a stinging and painful sensation as, finally, she was getting pulled out of the dreamscape. She could even hear Harley's voice, but it was not only faint, but it wasn't as deep or heavy as this monstrous Harley that loomed before her.

Suddenly, as quick as a flash, Ivy's eyes shot open, looking up, she saw Harley Quinn...the real Harley Quinn from their botched heist, as she stood over Ivy with a concerned look on her face; "Yo! Red, god, I'm glad you're up, you've been out for hours, I was gettin' worried!" Harley cooed as Ivy realised that Harley had taken her back to their hide-out.

"Guess that flower really knocked you for six, huh?" Ivy looked around as she breathed a sigh of relief, she was her regular self again as the normally restrained and composed villainess got a wide, beaming smile, almost Harley Quinn esque as she jumped up and threw her arms around Harley in a huge hug.

"Oh my god, Harl'! I'm so glad to see you, I mean, you wouldn't believe what I've seen." Ivy started to ramble in a way that was oddly similar to Harley, even catching the blonde jester off guard, who was still being hugged tightly by Ivy. However, Ivy couldn't help but feel that there was a part of it that she liked, the idea of her and Harley being the Queens of Gotham was really appealing to her.

But, what surprised the green fingered young woman the most was that, deep down, there was a part that enjoyed the obese size that she was in the dream, it gave her a sense of power and, Ivy'd be lying if she didn't think that she and Harley looked good with the fat.

But, now that Ivy is back in the real world, how does she celebrate being out of that hallucination? Does she yearn for the size that she was in the illusion, or does she just want to let Harley know how much Ivy appreciates her by taking her out for a meal?
15533111111112123221113221.title: Time to show Harley who the REAL boss is.

choices: Harley and Ivy make steady gains.
Harley and Ivy have trouble putting on excess pounds.
Harley and Ivy are gaining weight suspiciously fast...
155331111111121232211132211.content:
"Oh my gooood! You won't BELIEVE what I just heard 'bout Condiment King and...Pam?"

Harley stopped halfway back from her trounce back from the ladies' room, her battered smartphone hanging limply in one hand as her friend froze, midway through devouring her greasy cheeseburger. Ivy, nonplussed, kept chewing, ketchup and mustard stains dripping down her chin from her sloppy eating.

"Wh...what happened to Condiment *huurk*-" Ivy's eyes widened as she clapped a hand over her mouth, her stomach threatening to expel the contents of her lunch in protest as she, somehow, turned greener. Harley's eyes traveled down to the table where her own unfinished burger was sitting across from two empty plates that Ivy quickly, and pointlessly, attempted to shove off to the side.

"Red...did you seriously order a THIRD burger?" Harley asked. When she got a guilty whimper from her plantlike pal, she stomped over and wrenched the burger from her hands. Ivy let out a yelp and tried to take it back, but was stopped by a second wave of nausea. "No, you've had enough Pam!" Harley said sternly, tossing the burger onto her own side and sliding back into the booth to finish her own meal. There was a painfully awkward silence as the patrons of Zero Hour stopped watching the commotion and returned to their own business, bringing back the usual ambience of the room as Ivy sat there, watching Harley in shameful silence before slumping down in her seat, cradling the taut sphere of a belly poking out from underneath her t-shirt.

It was, in every sense of the word, a painfully inadequate reminder of what she lost. Now that it was over, she recognized the illusion from the other day as an illusion, one of Crane's more inane experiments most likely, but she still remembered how it felt. The warm plushness coating her arms, wreathing her neck, hugging her thighs. The heavy weight to her footsteps, her gait rocking the foundations and the furnishings. The sheer SIZE.. Thinking back on it, it was an intoxicating feeling, even if it turned against her at the end. It made the real world Ivy feel like she just recovered from a plague; she felt so bony, so fragile, like a strong breeze could come along and whisk her away. And by her old standards, she was overweight! But now, merely being overweight wasn't enough for her. She wanted to be big. She wanted to be huge. She wanted to be enormous.

And that wasn't even the most shocking thing to come out of this little revelation.

"Sorry about me getting...overexcited," Ivy said after finally mulling over her emotions.

"Hey, totes understandable," Harley said with a smile. "I get your excited, but you gotta take it slow, build up to it. You'll lose those calories if ya puke up your lunch afterwards. Just stick with two, and if you still feel hungry then we'll talk about going for three, mkay?

So...yeah, turns out that after Pamela confessed her newfound desire for 'bigness', not only was Harley totally cool with it, but she happened to know a bit about gaining herself and was willing to go along with her on the journey, per say. Sure the jester had been a little evasive as to how she knew this ("It was a crazy idea of Mr. J's from way back when" was literally the only explanation she got), but so long as Ivy got bigger, Quinn could get gaining tips from Trigon for all she cared. And she did feel bigger, if you counted 'bloated' as a big feeling, and Ivy knew that after the bloating would come the plushness she loved so much.

It was enough to make her feel just a little peckish as she reached to sneak some fries into her overstuffed gut.
155331111111121232211132211.title: Dreaming Big Dreams

choices: Ivy creates a drug to increase her appetite and her size.
Ivy decides to gain weight the old fashioned way, with Harley.
1553311111111212322111322111.content:
A month had gone by and Ivy was starting to get slightly bigger, it was a start, but it wasn't fast enough for the increasingly bulbous green fingered glutton, who was addicted to the feeling over over-eating, thanks to Harley's help, Ivy was able to put away more food without feeling like she was going to throw it up mere seconds later.

Her gut was getting rounder, her face was getting plumper and a slight second chin was starting to show, her legs were getting bigger and thicker and even her arms were getting doughier; Harley was looking on as Ivy wolfed down 4 burgers with piggish gusto, her face stained with the grease from the juicy burger as Ivy leaned back, breathed heavily from how bloated she was becoming and flashed a slight smile. Her increasing weight didn't make Ivy look any less beautiful; she wore the size really well.

However, Ivy felt a dissatisfied with this pace, while it was good that she was clearing getting somewhat bigger, Ivy was an addict for that monstrous obesity that she felt in her hallucination, her obsession with being so big that she felt heavy and lumbering. It was all Ivy thought about, being that massive and overweight, she felt more frustration rising at the fact that her weight wasn't coming fast enough and she had to remind herself not to take it out on Harley. But, as she looked around, she saw that there were a few things that she had at her disposal to accelerate her appetite.

'I could probably make something to make this go a bit faster?' Ivy thought to herself, of course, she knew that Harley wouldn't approve of that, and there was a part of Ivy that didn't want to resort to that, but it was like everything in her mind was telling her that she needed to get bigger and she needed to increase her appetite. Ivy wanted that size and that girth and she wasn't exactly very patient at this point; but she also couldn't help feel that it would feel much more rewarding if she got as fat with Harley.

The increasingly piggish Pamela is at a cross-roads, which route does she take?
1553311111111212322111322111.title: Harley and Ivy make steady gains.

choices: ...a plump feeder intent on keeping Ivy fed and happy.
...an equally voracious eater rivaling Ivy in size.
...an enormous, food-obsessed glutton who's leaving Ivy in the dust!
15533111111112123221113221112.content:
As much as Ivy craved that feeling of enormity she experienced in that bizarre illusion, it just wasn't enough to convince her to cheat on her gains. She told herself that it would upset Harley if she drugged her, or it'd be more fun to get to that size the classic way, or even that it'd be too risky and she could do something bad to herself. All of that may have been correct, but the truth was that Pam just didn't want to put the work into it.

Pam didn't notice because of her being so focused on size, but as she and her appetite got bigger, so did her laziness. Besides some successful repeats of the ATM smash and grabs, Ivy really hadn't done much outside of tending to her plants, sleeping, and eating. Her old criminal ways just didn't have the same appeal to her as stuffing burgers into her mouth for an hour or two. Even the ever excitable Harley was starting to slow down and complain about the work that went into keeping the pair cash-solvent, even going so far as to suggest Ivy breed some plant people to do all the robberies for them, knowing that the promise of more time spent eating would get Ivy to actually get off her slowly growing butt to do something.

And maybe she would, Ivy considered. She had plenty of time; Batman was off hunting down Bane after the warehouse incident, the Legion of Doom pulled away a lot of the heavy hitters in Gotham, and the worst the city saw in the past six months was Kite Man knocking over a jewelry store. Things were well on track, Ivy convinced herself. Why complicate things with a silly chemical? Her desire to be huge would be enough to drive her on.

And sure enough, it was. As a cool spring turned into a balmy summer, Pamela Isley blossomed like she never blossomed before. Alternating between glutting herself and sleeping it off before the next chance to go to town on another buffet, the supervillain's odd appetite started turning some heads. Some people thought it was part of some scheme, an unorthodox way to boost her plant powers. Others thought she may have been going through a rough patch and had turned to comfort food to fill the void. Still others were just relieved that she was content with gorging herself rather then sending a massive carnivorous plant to gorge on their brand new Lexcorp hybrid vehicle they just put the down payment on. And as Ivy raced towards her first milestone, she practically relished in the conversation surrounding her weight, the whispered comments at Zero Hour, even the trashy tabloid stories that popped up every now and then. They'd REALLY have something to gossip on soon.

That first milestone came on a balmy late summer morning. Sprawled out on her bed, Ivy woke to the sizzle of a saucepan somewhere beyond her door.

"Wakey wakey!" Harley trilled from the kitchen. "Time for breakfaaaaast!"

"M'comin," Ivy mumbled, rolling to her feet as she rubbed the sleep from her eyes. She let out a soft moan as she felt her belly plop heavily down into her lap. It had been the first part of her to feel that familiar sensation of heaviness, and after last night's burger buffet, it felt particularly huge today. Peeling off her greasy t-shirt, leaving her in just the usual leafy bikini top and bottoms, Pamela went into the corner of the room, where she had set up a small "gaining lab" to mark her progress. It wasn't much, just a chart and a pair of mirrors meeting in the corner surrounding a high tolerance bathroom scale. With halted breath, she stepped onto the scale, planting her bare feet back enough so that she could just barely see over the curve of her stomach.

"Two...three...THREE! Three hundred and five!" Ivy clapped her hands together excitedly. Finally, after so many months, she'd reached the first goalpost. Sure it was a drop of water in the bucket that she wanted to be, but it was monumental nonetheless, officially becoming a big and beautiful fat girl. Not chubby, not curvy, just out and out FAT.

Flushed with excitement, Ivy took her sweet time getting dressed, enjoying all the curves and rolls of her body in the process. Much to her delight, she seemed to gain all over and stay fairly balanced size-wize. She was pleased to find her breasts had become big and heavy F cups, still perky but sitting atop a great big belly that stayed round and heavy no matter how much food was stuffed inside it these days. Luckily she could still waddle around without tipping over, thanks to the nice thick thighs that she couldn't pull her jeans up over. She happily tossed the old clothes aside, taking out a new pair of shorts 40 inches around at the waist that fit quite snugly over her thunder thighs and a butt that would spill over into the next seat. She matched it with a black t-shirt adorned with a green heart, a gift from Harley that had been far too large months ago but now just barely fit her, pinching her dough arms at the sleeves and riding up to show a hint of belly. Ivy struck a pose, admiring her body in the mirror, but let out a small gasp as the button on her shorts suddenly pinged off, hitting the mirror with a sharp snap. The big plant lady couldn't help but laugh, her fully formed double chin hinting at a third when she moved her head just the right way, before she caught the scents flowing through the house from the kitchen.

Drawn like a woman possessed, Ivy waddled out of her room, not even changing out of the broken shorts or putting on anything else besides the T-Shirt, and caught sight of the table adorned with a truly monumental breakfast feast. Bacon, eggs, sausage, waffles, pancakes, french toast, and with buckets of butter and syrup to go with it. Ivy's mouth watered; she could practically FEEL herself growing fatter just by being near this spread. And to think, Harley used to be a bad cook!

She definitely got better though, and as Ivy went to thank Harley for such a wonderful job on breakfast, she became aware of how Harley had changed as well, going from the skinny girl who helped her realize a dream to...
15533111111112123221113221112.title: Good Things Come to Those Who Weight

choices: "That Food Should Be Mine, Harley!" - Ivy admits her jealousy at Harley's bulk.
"You look fantastic, Harley!" - Ivy decides to encourage Harley's weight.
155331111111121232211132211122.content:
Ivy didn't know how she hadn't realised it before, honestly? Maybe she was too focused on her own bulk and obesity to really notice how big Harley had been getting, but, if anything, Harley didn't look that much smaller than Ivy. Ivy noticed Harley's weight stick around her lower-half, as opposed to Ivy's, which focused around her massive, orb of a belly.

Harley's legs were like tree trunks, or maybe steel girders was more appropriate, her gut, while not on the same level as Ivy's own massive planet of a gut, it was still overhanging and in danger of knocking Ivy's breakfast off the table, her face was round and she had a second chin on her face and that eclipsed her presumably thick neck.

Ivy was busy engorging herself, but she couldn't help but notice that Harley had also been wolfing down a huge feast, the gargantuan, green gluttonous goddess noticed the empty plates that had been piled high and were ready to be washed. Ivy couldn't help but feel a bit of jealousy hit her, as far as she was concerned, that was food that belonged to her! She need that food to be as fat as she was in her hallucination; she needed that more than Harley did!

"So...I notice that you were eating a bit there." Ivy choked out, her mouth full of food as her voice, thanks to her massive bulk, sounded quite a bit deeper and huskier than before. She tried to hide a slight glare of jealousy as she looked at Harley, she couldn't help but think that all the bulk that Harley had on her frame, it should belong on Ivy's body.

The obese Ivy knew that it was wrong to be jealous of her best friend for eating, and Ivy couldn't help but admit that Harley looked amazing with her new girth, her body was a thing of beauty, almost of the level of Ivy's herself. Slowly, but surely, the jealousy and spite became replaced by a feeling of genuine pride for Harley's weight gain.

"Yo, Red" Harley's own deeper, heavier voice called out, her jowls jiggling with every word that came from the Jumbo Jester's mouth; she noticed Ivy not eating her massive feast as ravenously as Harley was expecting. Ivy took a deep breath and then decided to say something about Harley's new bulk as both jealousy and pride were battling it out to be the first thing that Ivy said.

What does Ivy say about Harley's new, entrancing bulk?
155331111111121232211132211122.title: ...an equally voracious eater rivaling Ivy in s...

choices: ...an enormous Poison Ivy.
...an incredibly blubbery Harley Quinn.
...a servant?
1553311111111212322111322111222.content:
"You look fantastic, Harley!"

"Braaap-..." Harley belched, wiping her lips clean with the back of her hand. "M'sorry, you said something?"

Ivy gave a strained smile, her patience somewhat tested by the Jester's sloppy behavior. "I said...that you look utterly stunning today."

Harley's round cheeks, already pink from the exertion of indulging herself at high speed, turned a deeper shade as she let out a giggle. "Aw, shucks Red...that's sweet, but you don't gotta lie to me."

"Hm?"

Harley scooted her chair back, pressing her finger into her sizeable gut, unrestrained by the tight sports bra and tiny shorts she squeezed herself into. "C'mon Pam, you don't gotta be coy...I'm a total tubster, a butterball even..."

"And that means you can't be gorgeous and beautiful like this?" Ivy said, throwing her hands out despite the hint of a jiggle on her arms. Watching Harley bite her lip and avert her eyes, the Eco-friendly villain heaved herself out of the chair and sauntered over to Harley's side, leaning in close and placing a hand on her shoulder. She could practically FEEL the heat of attraction coming off the jester as she tried to look away. "Harl, your size is nothing to be ashamed of. You're utterly ravishing like this."

"M'fat..." Harley squeaked out, trying not to grin.

"And you know what? That just means there's more of you to love." Ivy finished by planting a delicate kiss on Harley's chubby cheek, eliciting a delighted squee. With a knowing smile, Pamela picked up a pastry and pressed it towards the clown's mouth. "Now...eat up. You're a growing girl now."

The pair of them giggled, then Harley took a handful of bacon (tofu bacon of course) and shoved it into Ivy's mouth forcefully enough that she automatically chewed and swallowed.

"We both are, Red," Harley said with a devious smile.

---

While Harley and Ivy began to expand their waistlines with renewed vigor, the world kept turning. Soon the heat waves were a distant memory and the leaves in Gotham Central Park began to fall from the trees, hinting at a cold winter to come. The Legion had, of course, been soundly defeated, and soon the usual suspects were beginning to trickle back into Gotham, followed of course by Batman himself. For better or for worse, the good and evil of Gotham were slowly getting back to business, and with a team-up between the Riddler and Two-Face taking up headlines, the conspicuous absence of the green-skinned Eco-terrorist and the Clown's main squeeze remained largely under-reported, and even then only to gossip about their strange activities in the summer, and the unusually large food orders being delivered to a certain address in Gotham.

That last one came not from the tabloids but from the Calculator's information network on the Unternet. It was the only hint at where Poison Ivy may have been holed up since she went off the radar the last few months, which was pretty inconvenient when you were trying to breed an invasive species of carnivorous plant to seed Themyscira with and while the two villains who arrived in Gotham well past sunset were both doctors of some intellect themselves, their botany knowledge didn't hold a candle to Poison Ivy's.

"Heeeey, good lookin'," slurred a drunkard stumbling out of an alleyway as the two women walked by, the shorter of the two hidden underneath a hoodie. "Got 'ny dough? Ahm thirsty, need a dhrink..." The drunkard grinned as the shorter lady stopped to look at him, only to turn pale as his bloodshot eyes were met by catlike slits.

"Oh look..." the woman purred. "...a {meal." She opened her mouth to bare her fangs and the drunk let out a panicked warble and dashed back into the alley. The catlike woman almost darted after him before her companion grabbed her by the tail.

"Don't eat the locals Barb, you don't know where they've been," the taller woman reminded her forcefully.

"I wasn't really going to eat him," mewled Barbara Ann Minerva, better known as the Cheetah, as she adjusted her hoodie to reveal the black cheetah patterns across her fuzzy face. "...not all of him anyway."

"The last thing we need is Batman to catch us sneaking around his town," the other woman pointed out. "For once could you TRY to keep a low profile?"

"I can keep a lower profile then you Dory," Cheetah said playfully, sticking out her tongue. Doris Zuel, significantly shorter then her usual hundreds of feet tall as Giganta, rolled her eyes. In fairness, she may have had a point, since her size-changing jumpsuit in black and orange did stand out a fair bit, even at her usual six foot one. Still, the two rogues made their way towards the address they purchased from Calculator without too much trouble from the locals despite their appearance, the tidy unassuming apartment block turned into a home and a base.

"Not a bad place to hole up," Cheetah considered. "I'd have expected it to be covered with plants or something,"

"Pamela, are you in there?" Giganta called, knocking hard on the door. "It's Dr. Zuel, I've been trying to find you for weeks!" There was a shuffling sound from behind the door, the sound of several latches opening up before it slid open to reveal...
1553311111111212322111322111222.title: Big Girls And a Cat

choices: Ivy demonstrates how she's even more powerful, now that she's fatter.
Harley shows up and she's even more obese than Ivy!
15533111111112123221113221112221.content:
Pamela was indeed in there, but to say that she had 'let herself go' was a grave understatement, the obese redhead must have tipped the scales at nearly 500lbs or there abouts, she had a permanent second chin on her face that was starting to wreath her neck in the way that Ivy had become obsessed with from her hallucinations. But she was still determined to be so much more massive than she already was; but the fact that she was getting closer and closer to her goal was showing, considering the grin on her gorgeous, round and fat face.
