Her huge belly was jutting out at such a level that it was pretty much squashing up against both Cheetah and Giganta as it heaved with every noticeably heavy breath that Ivy took, her new girth was what she was wanting; but it was also taking a toll on her ability to do the simplest of tasks without being wheezing and out of breath. However, Ivy believed these to be well worth it if she could feel the feeling of being so morbidly obese and heavy, she was wearing a black t-shirt that barely fit her and was looking more like a crop top due to how much her monstrous belly was forcing it up.

She also wore some of the biggest pair of jeans that looked like they were practically painted on, as those jeans covered her gargantuan globes of ass flesh that left two huge imprints whenever Ivy sat down and, appropriately for the plant obsessed piglet, her legs were like two huge tree trunks, which both fought for space and left Ivy waddling around as her massive legs scrapped together.

"Pam?!" both Cheetah and Giganta called out in unison, both of their jaws practically hitting the floor at the newly obese Ivy as Ivy flashed an arrogant smirk, showing her second chin as if she was proud of her new girth; her voice was noticeably huskier and deeper due to her new neck fat, but Ivy found that it made her sound even hotter.

"Damn right, girls...enjoying the view?" Ivy smirked teasingly as her entire bulk was filling the wide door-frame of her hideout, like a solar eclipse of pure fat and blubber, Cheetah and Giganta were both completely caught off guard by the immense Ivy, but they managed to stammer out the reason for why they were there.

"Look, we've been trying to find you" Giganta started, trying not to be caught staring at the sheer fat covered green goddess that was Poison Ivy, she could feel the heaviness of Ivy's globular gut squash up against them and it was really distracting her, but she pressed on, no matter how invasive the Immense Ivy was to their personal space.

"Come on, let's talk inside." Ivy suddenly cut her off, turning around and waddling into her unassuming domain as both Cheetah and Giganta caught the view of her jean covered, planet sized ass-cheeks wobbling like two orbs of jelly caught in an earthquake, Ivy's entire obese body was hynotising to them, as they tried to avert their eyes from the fat assed redhead as she lumbered into her home.

"I think you know what we want, Pamela!" Cheetah called out in frustration at how coy Ivy was being, she wasn't the best with her people skills and she couldn't help imagine that this new, obese Ivy tasted good due to the sheer amount of heavy, quaking fat that was layering the beautiful eco-terrorist. Ivy just turned on her heel, back to Cheetah as she cockily and almost seductively waddled over, placing her fat, sausage like fingers on Cheetah's feline features.

"Oooh, you're so cute, kitty kat." Ivy teased, almost daring for Cheetah to do something and things weren't helped when Cheetah was already about to get her claws out and start devouring the morbidly obese Ivy, but, before she could, something happened that caught both Cheetah and Giganta off guard...

What happened next?
15533111111112123221113221112221.title: ...an enormous Poison Ivy.

choices: The Villainesses hatch their scheme...
Giganta goes off to enact the plan, but Cheetah sticks around with Harley...
Ivy decides to show Giganta and Cheetah what size truly feels like first...
155331111111121232211132211122212.content:
For a brief moment, Giganta and Cheetah wondered if they were the only ones coming when they saw the massive banquet table set up in the room beyond the entrance. It certainly made them feel welcome; Cheetah found her attention drawn to the pile of German sausages coiled up like a tiny mountain, and while Giganta wasn't so easily distracted, she caught the whiff of homemade banana bread that briefly tempted her. Instead, Giganta took note of how green the room was, and not because of the paint. This was definitely where Ivy had been hiding long term; vines crawled up the walls, hiding the water damage with vibrant greens and floral patterns. Artificial sunlight shone through a canopy of leaves, turning what would have been a stuffy Gotham blockhouse into a comfortable indoor grove. Nimble vines even crawled up the side of the banquet table, helping to ferry different varieties of food across the table for those seated at it. The two didn't know this at the time, but Ivy's deep desire to fatten herself up had unconsciously influenced the plant life under her control, turning her home into a feeder's paradise perfect for fattening up anyone to tremendous size.

Of course that had been a double-edged sword since the Green influenced her back, and skewed her priorities towards feeding others instead of herself. And there had only been one person around to receive Ivy's generous treatment. Cheetah's eyes dilated at the even more succulent mass of meat across the way, and Giganta nearly choked when she realized what got her catlike companion so riled up.

"H-HARLEY?"

"Oh!" huffed the mass of fat from the other side of the table. "Barb! Dory! I didn't know....huff...ya were in town!"

The two rogues could do nothing but stare blankly, or hungrily, at the utterly unrecognizable whale that was once the infamous ditz of a clown Harley Quinn. The slender face that once adorned wanted posters was squished between two bulging cheeks and a broad chin, all sitting atop a ring of neck fat that could have served as a passable bib. A nightshirt that should have been tossed several sizes ago was squeezed around her broad shoulders, leading to hefty arms that swallowed up her elbows and made a cuff of fat around her chubby hands, both of which gently rubbed the absolute barrel of a belly that pushed her a few feet away from the table while the vines carried food to her eager maw, past the floppy breasts the size of watermelons flopping to either side of her belly. Giganta craned her neck and saw the backs of not one, not two, but three chairs over her meaty shoulders, holding up her immense weight.

"Wow!" Cheetah said in hushed tones. "Harley, you're so....delectable!" The enormous jester giggled, sending a wave of movement through her flabby body. The cat villainess couldn't help herself and approached Harley, trying not to drool as she saw Harley's barrel sized thighs with knee-high striped socks desperately tugged upwards towards a dent that may have been her knee at one point.

"Please tell me this is some bizzare eco-terrorist thing, Ivy," Giganta said to Poison Ivy as the plant villainess munched down on a pastry.

"What's bizzarre?" Ivy said coolly. "I'm just...taking GOOD care of my friends..." They wouldn't understand, Ivy thought to herself. That feeling, that sense of pleasure and power that came from enormity. Words couldn't describe how such a thing felt to mere mortals. If she wanted to share the experience, well...she'd show them exactly how big and powerful it'd make them feel.

"You know, forget I even asked," Giganta conceded, throwing her hands up in the air. "We're not here to ogle or judge-"

"Speak for yourself," Cheetah mumbled as she gently stroked Harley's meaty arm.

"-we just need your help for a bioweapon against the Amazons. Something of a virulent plant strain to eat them all, and it's-"

Harley chose that moment to let out a massive belch that thoroughly derailed the conversation. Doris would have been annoyed, but instead, she had a bit of an epiphany. What if, instead of killing the Amazons, the bioweapon merely...incapacitated them? Kept them tied up for a long time? Looking at what Ivy was doing to Harley...maybe that'd be a much smarter idea to take care of Wonder Woman and her friends...

"How'd you like to work your magic here on some Amazons?" Giganta asked.

"You have my attention," Ivy said coolly.
155331111111121232211132211122212.title: High Fat Harley

choices: Cheetah tries to feast on Harley, but Ivy's plants stop her.
Something else.
1553311111111212322111322111222122.content:
After a bit of discussion about how to incapacitate the Amazons, the quartet decided that it would be best if the Amazons were all fattened up, plus it would be sheer humiliation for the proud and strong warrior race to be reduced to obese, unfit blobs; it was originally thought that Ivy and Giganta would go and do the plan, but Ivy insisted on staying behind with Cheetah and Harley. It wasn't because Ivy's obsession with her own obesity this time, it was genuine concern for Harley and Ivy didn't want to leave her alone with Cheetah to become the feline/human's cheat day.

Giganta had left and went to enact the plan, with some of Ivy's plants going along to silently help the size-shifter, Ivy was keeping a close eye on Cheetah, but she didn't want to make it too obvious; so the immense plant lover started to go back to increasing her own mammoth bulk, this was like an addiction for Ivy, the need to get fatter and heavier; if this was wrong, then Ivy didn't want to be right. She massaged her massive stomach and felt her breathing quickening as she started to casually play with her own fat as she kept eating with gusto, her plants acting as waiters and bringing the food to their 'mother'.

Harley, however, didn't seem to realise why Cheetah was taking such an interest in her and just thought that it was a feline thing, Harley was so fat that she made Ivy look borderline 'plump' (which was an insult as far as Ivy was concerned) but part of Ivy felt a desire to be the size of Harley; but the selfish feelings melted away as Ivy continued to watch as the planet sized blonde patted and cooed over Cheetah like she was a house cat and not a dangerous super-villain.

"Here kitty, kitty." Harley giggled out, the slightest movement sending her fat into a fit of wild wobbles and, with each wobble of her monstrously obese body, Cheetah felt her mouth water as everything was telling her to just start gorging on this feast of fat; but she glanced over to Ivy, who was clearly ready to start using her plants to have Cheetah's head mounted on their wall as a trophy if the Wonder Woman villain ever harmed a hair on Harley's head.

Even if Ivy's obesity had hindered her mobility, she didn't need that to be dangerous, she could've had her plants destroy Cheetah without Ivy even needing to heave her huge ass from her enlarged seat; Ivy however was starting to get distracted by eating, she just couldn't help herself and, even though she tried to keep focused on keeping an eye on Harley; Ivy's gluttonous need to get fatter and fatter was starting to take over.

This would be the perfect chance for Cheetah to make her move as she felt Harley's quaking body against her own, Cheetah was starting to lose it, she needed to start tucking in on this Huge Harley buffet.

However...
1553311111111212322111322111222122.title: Giganta goes off to enact the plan, but Cheetah...

choices: Giganta returns surprisingly quickly and sees Ivy about to kill Cheetah.
Harley stops Ivy from killing Cheetah.
15533111111112123221113221112221221.content:
Cheetah looked over to Ivy and saw that the gargantuan green goddess was busy gorging herself on what must've been her 5th large steak of the day, she noted how fat and obese Ivy herself was and she was wondering if she could feast on both of the titanic Gotham City Sirens; for Barbara this would be like the ultimate cheat day. While the Immense Ivy was in the middle of feasting on her steak and was starting to seem like in a gluttonous haze, getting tunnel vision as she felt herself getting more and more of that glorious fat that Ivy loved so much.

But, Cheetah hadn't counted on the plants, they weren't just Ivy's waiters and there to bring the rotund redhead even more food, they acted like cameras or guard dogs, there to not only protect Ivy, but protect people she cared about and that was pretty much only Harley (maybe Selina at a stretch.) so the plants noticed that Cheetah was looking more ravenous, almost as ravenous as the Jumbo Jester herself. Harley was busy rubbing her fat fingers across Cheetah as if she was a house cat.

Harley's huge stomach was swinging right in front of Cheetah, the belly hang swaying almost hypnotically as Cheetah just couldn't resist her urges anymore, she was going to feast on this huge buffet of fat that Harley's heavy, quaking body would have provided her; as Barbara went in for the attack, she was suddenly tripped up by a big vine, that caught both Harley and Cheetah off guard. Cheetah was sent kissing the ground before she was dragged by her legs and held upside down in front of a glaring Ivy; this wasn't the usually confident, arrogant or smug Ivy, this was a one that was genuinely enraged as her fat, gorgeous face was glaring right at Cheetah.

"You didn't really think that my babies wouldn't see what you were doing, house cat?" Ivy's obesity meant that her powers over the plants had increased, it was no longer as easy to break their grip; it was a compensation for Ivy's lack of mobility and Ivy thought that the trade off was more than worth it, moving was so overrated whereas her new power meant that she never had to move a muscle to be treated like the Colossal Queen that she believed she was.

"What were you doin', Barb?!" Harley called out, struggling to catch her breath, not only because of her insane fat levels, but because of how shocked she was that Cheetah was about to chow down on her; Ivy's plants were currently consoling Harley with belly rubs and such as Ivy's scowl of rage turned into one of pure contempt; normally, she would've just thrown this pathetic creature out of her door, she wasn't worth killing.

But Ivy wasn't going to let this ingrate think that she could just expect Ivy's help with her and Giganta's evil scheme only to try and feast on Ivy's best (and only) friend. "Time for a goodnight kiss" Ivy said with a look of distain as she leaned forward, about to give Cheetah a Kiss of Death; but, before she had the chance to kill Barbara in cold blood, the gargantuan goddess of the green was cut off.

But who stopped Ivy from killing Cheetah?
15533111111112123221113221112221221.title: Cheetah tries to feast on Harley, but Ivy's...

choices: Ivy places the Orange Lantern ring on her fat finger, increasing her greed.
Ivy is snapped out of the hallucination and back to reality.
155331111111121232213.content:
Suddenly, a sensation of discomfort and pain hit Ivy, she clutched at her head as she felt her body pulsate and shake as her vision got hazier and hazier; but as her eyes grew more unfocused, she was able to make out that Harley wasn't even reacting to her painful surge as the spores mutated and messed with Ivy's already confused head even more.

Before Ivy knew what was going on, she had been flung forward to an even further point in time, groggily looking around as she started to come back to her senses; Ivy was sitting in some unfamiliar room as she started to notice that various individuals were running around and trying to get everything set for something.

"Ugh...hey...what's going on?" Ivy grunted, she heard herself speak and something clicked...did she really sound as deep and throaty before? Her mind started to slowly put two and two together as she looked down and nearly screamed in shock when she saw that she was even fatter than before, her formerly ample double belly that hit her knees was now pinning her on some large and expansive throne.

She had four chins that gave her a deeper, heavier voice and wobbled with every word she grunted out through wheezing breathes as it started to click for Ivy that she wasn't just fat, she was downright immobile.

The hallucination had jumped forward into the future as Ivy was approached by a fairly handsome young man, who was holding something in his hand as the immobile Ivy tried to get her bearings, the young man said something that caught her off guard.

"Queen Ivy; your conquest of the Lantern Corps has been complete and-"

"What??" Ivy's eyes went wide as she wasn't sure if she heard the young man correctly "What did you just call me?!" her four chins wobbled as she demanded that the man repeat himself.

"Erm, Queen Ivy, your highness...the invasion of the Lantern Corps you ordered has been a success and, as you commanded, we brought back all of the Lantern Corps' rings."

"Yo-...You what?" Ivy dumbly repeated, sounding hazy and unfocused as the man opened the palm of his hand to reveal one of each of the Lantern's rings, it seemed like, with this jump, not only was Ivy the ruler of Gotham, it now started to dawn on her that she was the Ruler of the world. The immobile redhead looked over and saw that, not only was there Batman's cowl, but there was Wonder Woman's tiara, The Flash's mask, Green Arrow's quiver and, the one that shocked her the most...the Superman symbol.

"How did those get there??" Ivy again barked out as the fearful young man stammered out "That was from your conquest of the Justice League, your highness, after you disposed of Batman, you overthrew President Luthor and wiped out the entire Justice League on your own."

Ivy suddenly felt an urge, an urge that she could get used to this, she ran everything, she was now the ruler of the world and there was nobody to stop her, Ivy was becoming more comfortable in the fantasy land that the flower's toxin had created for her; she wasn't even sure if this was too far off from the truth.

What happens next?
155331111111121232213.title: Scarecrow's spores mutate, and Ivy finds he...

choices: "...Batwoman!"
"...Raven!"
"...Supergirl!"
1553311111111212322131.content:
Ivy smiled, though with the flabbiness of her face it was hard to notice. Acclimatizing to the changes taking place around her, the room became more familiar; overgrown with plant life and gnarled vines to render the old structure unrecognizable beneath the foliage. She didn't have a prayer of turning around to see where she was sitting, but she recognized the feeling of a moss and leaf throne underneath her enormous rear end. She actually wondered what she was doing surrounded by so many male thralls considering her previous views, but upon a second look, she noticed the glazed look in their eyes and the vines crawling up their necks. Reduced to mindless thralls, as is their proper place.

"Well done, those can be added to my collection," Ivy said thickly to the minion. "But I'll be taking the...urgh..."

She tried to lift her arm to get the ring on instinct before realizing that would be impossible. Even if she could have moved close enough to pick it up, her arm felt like it had a trash bag full of water hanging off of it with no muscle to speak of. Gasping at the sudden exertion, she dropped her arm onto her belly with a heavy flop, panting and sweating.

"Whew...silly me...I forgot," Ivy huffed, letting out a heavy-sounding chuckle.

"An understandable mistake, ma'am," the thrall holding the rings said brightly and vacantly. One of the vines making up her throne extended outward with a mere thought from the immobile plant woman, curling around the Orange ring and bringing it up to its master.

"I think you and I were meant to be together, hm?" Ivy playfully said to the ring as lifted her hand slightly, letting the vine place the ring on her. "An entire Lantern corp's power, at my fingertips!" Ivy winced as the ring bumped against said fingertip and went no further; her fingers being much too thick and heavy to wear it normally. The arcane device hummed softly however and grew in size within seconds, easily sliding onto her sausage-width finger.

"Pamela Isley of Earth," an otherworldly voice said from somewhere inside her head. "You want it all.

"Mine," Ivy said breathlessly, her eyes glowing orange. A tingling sensation spread across her body, from her hands all the way to her feet, the decorative leaves adorning her wrists and ankles turning a fall-like orange-green, her green coloration darkening, her red hair brightening to red-orange, and her eyes altering to orange-colored irises. Power coursing through her, she felt herself raising off of her throne and for the first time in months standing on her own two feet, her cankles drooping over them as her belly brushed the mossy ground. She struggled to take a step forward still, but only because of her sheer size and not because of any weakness or lack of muscle. Laughing gleefully, Ivy floated into the air with the grace of a blue whale, the plant life lining the walls glowing with life as she indulged in her new powers, looking down on her obedient thralls.

"Well, what are you waiting for?" Ivy demanded. "Food! Go!" Her minions scurried off as Ivy landed again, just in time to feel the rumble of heavy footsteps approaching, and saw a massive round stomach walk into room before...

"Food?" Harley Quinn said thickly, her voice booming even in this vine covered royal chamber. Ivy found herself stunned into silence at the sight of the Jester towering over her, dressed in what appeared to be a bikini that matched her harlequinn outfit's color scheme. Her piggy eyes sunken into her puffy cheeks that fused into a huge second chin that swallowed the others into one big mass of neck fat, sitting atop her basketball-sized breasts, while her elbows had long ago sunken into the silky masses of arm fat that swallowed them, and while her huge double-belly drooped low enough to cover them, her knees had been swallowed by her enormous thighs, thicker then trees, that draped over her puffy feet below. Adding in the flowing rolls of back-fat and the utterly immense shelf of a rear end hanging behind her and it was a miracle Harley could even still walk.

"I...was about to have some food, Harl," Ivy said, still trying to take in the woman standing in front of her.

"Yaaaay, food!" Harley cheered, bouncing on her heels and causing the whole chamber to shake. "Ooh, and you have ring too! Wish I could have ring."

Ivy smiled, shaking her head as Harley looked at her own hands, a dull look behind her eyes. She'd been a little slow ever since Ivy had made the jester into her right-hand lady, pumping her up with Venom to make sure she could still walk and serve as her muscle, at the expense of Harley's intellect. She didn't seem to mind as long as she was well-fed, and Ivy suspected she liked being so big, standing several feet taller then most people, with a lot of muscle hiding in her bloated arms and hands and feet the size of manhole covers.

All thoughts regarding Harley quickly flew to the back of her mind as the doors opened and a procession of her thralls entered, bearing a feast of desserts and sweets that could serve dozens, if not hundreds. Harley squealed and thundered towards a massive tiered cake, tearing off chunks to shove into her greedy mouth. Ivy chuckled lightly as she created a plantlike tendril of orange light, wrapping around a container of chocolate sauce in a ten gallon drum. She was about to pour the whole thing into her mouth when a crash came from overhead, the plants reeling from the shower of glass. Harley looked up stupidly, her mouth full of cake.

Ivy narrowed her eyes, recognizing the intruder at once; a loathsome superheroine who had long resisted her rule and had dared to impede on her claims as the greediest, most gluttonous woman in the universe, nearly rivaling her in size!

"You!" Ivy shouted, her eyes glowing with orange power. "How DARE you intrude on my sanctum...
1553311111111212322131.title: Unrepentent Greed

choices: Using the Orange Lantern ring; Ivy defeats Supergirl.
Ivy is about to attack Supergirl, but the spores mutate again.
15533111111112123221313.content:
Ivy grumbled as she narrowed her eyes at the sight of Supergirl flying over her, who instantly took notice of the glowing orange Ivy, there were rumors that the unstable, immobile tyrant had gotten even more powerful, but Supergirl didn't believe it until now.

"Well, just when I thought you couldn't get any more power drunk!" Supergirl snapped out as she was determined to put an end to Ivy's reign of terror, but Ivy's already immense arrogance was at an all time high as she just smirked towards Supergirl as the gargantuan, orange lantern powered plant vixen just lazily and flippantly responded in her heavy, throaty voice.

"Oh, no, I'm not drunk on power, I can never have enough, soon...I will have all the power in the universe." Ivy breathed out as she dismissively called out "Oh Harley, be a good girl and squash Supergirl like the bug that she is!" as Ivy lazily rested back and watched the action as the gargantuan Harley looked at Supergirl and smiled widely.

"Harley Kill!" Harley's venom addicted brain remarked as she lumbered towards Supergirl, the ground shaking underneath the sheer obesity of Harley as Ivy continued to eat the food; she was seemingly feeling hungrier and hungrier; like the Orange Lantern ring was making her bottomless pit of a belly even more demanding for food.

Supergirl wasn't a slouch, either as she was able to easily move out of the way of the obese Harley, who was so fat and obese that Harley was gasping for air and breath due to how out of shape she was. "Ugh, stay...still." Harley breathed out, already caked in sweat, however, the Venom that Ivy had been juicing Harley up on was paying off as the jumbo jester caught Supergirl's leg and hurled her into a wall with a thud.

"Oooh, you're doing amazing *burp* Harl'" Ivy called out, with her mouth full of food as she casually pigged out while watching the fight, it was like the more she ate, the more powerful she felt; part of Ivy wanted to call Harley off so she could take on Supergirl herself and, if Ivy wasn't busy eating with a ravenous gusto, she would've done that.

But, Supergirl wasn't going to give up so easily, she had a chance to overthrow the power mad plant porker and she wasn't going to let anyone get in her way of doing that as she nailed Harley with a huge punch that rocked the gigantic mountain of fat and super strength. Glaring in frustration, Ivy was about to get involved; she wanted to put her new powers to the test as she called out.

"Harley!...Let the Queen have some fun." Ivy called off Harley as Ivy's eyes glowed, she had a malicious, almost psychopathic smile on her fat face as she was ready to put her new powers to use.

What happens next?
15533111111112123221313.title: "...Supergirl!"

choices: Supergirl returns to the fight, bigger and better than ever!
But first, another superheroine springs into action!
Or maybe another idea?
155331111111121232213131.content:
"This is for Clark you bloated green bitch!"

Drawing her fist back, Supergirl charged towards Ivy with such intense speed that a crack echoed through the room. In any other situation, Ivy would have been dead to rights, a fist with the force of a cannon blast slamming into her cheek before she could even blink, but Supergirl found her blow intercepted as a thorny vine constructed from orange light shot from the ring on Ivy's bloated finger. She missed the spiky tendril by inches, shattering it with a powerful blow before two more joined it, darting back and forth to knock her from the air.

"This is almost too easy..." Ivy huffed, lifting her ring hand a couple inches as she popped donuts into her mouth with the other, smacking her lips to taunt the Kryptonian fighting off her constructs. She lifted a second donut to her mouth when she felt a powerful tug on her hand; Supergirl had used her distraction and grabbed the tentacles all at once, and while Ivy was well over a ton at this point she could still be moved easily by someone with her strength. Ivy let out a yell as her massive rear end slid off the leaf surface off her throne, landing on the ground with a colossal boom and knocking the food out of her hand.

"No!" Ivy cried as she watched her donut bounce a few inches away, well out of the reach of her bloated fingers. "You.......*braaaaaaaaaaap*.....you skinny little brat!" Her eyes practically ignited orange as a massive construct burst forth from the ring, vines flowing outward from her hand as a great massive flower bulb grew and swelled. Supergirl raised her fist, ready to fight as the bulb grew to the size of a small car and blossomed, not into a beautiful flower but into a gaping maw of teeth and thorns.

"Tropidorian Carnivore Vine...of course..." Supergirl said to herself as two more burst from Ivy's ring, nearly filling what was left of the room with the vicious plantlike monsters. Undeterred, she flew into battle, liberally using her heat vision and fists for some aggressive weeding while Ivy unsteadily got up, propped up by helpful plant life until she was standing on her on two feet again, with the help of her stomach drooping onto the ground. As she watched Supergirl get eaten by one of the carnivore vines only to burst free and go on the attack, she got a rather sinister idea, waving her hand to create more energy tendrils, lifting her up into the air.

Supergirl meanwhile was nearing the end of her rope, bruised and battered by the vicious plants, but spurned on by spite and a desire for justice she kept going, punching the last of the vines to death as she struggled to catch her breath.

"Got any...more?" she demanded, her voice cracking from the strain. "I can do this...all night. Where are you, Poison Ivy?"

"Right here."

This time it was Supergirl's turn to respond to an impossibly sudden attack, and she was not nearly as successful with her countering. Frankly you wouldn't be either if you looked up and saw a mass of green flesh coming at you at high speed. The Kryptonian let out a terrified, confused sound as Poison Ivy smashed down on top of her, squashing her underneath what had to literally be a ton of ass and landing with a tremendous bang that could have been heard from Metropolis. She shimmied back and forth to make sure her full weight was applied, jiggling even more as Harley waddled over to help her to her feet.

"Another Kryptonian dealt with," Ivy chuckled, looking at the Supergirl-shaped hole in the floor that was less then a third the size of her keister. "I say this calls for another victory feast!"

Several floors down, however, the pile of rebar and plywood stirred, and a battered, bleeding Supergirl extracted herself, shaking loose the dirt caked to her hair. She felt a pang of shame at her failure, blinking back tears as she limped away from the pile.

"I'm sorry, Kal," she whispered quietly. "I wish I could do more, but...she's too strong...too fat..."

Batman was unfazed. "It's over, Catwoman," he growled. "Just come along quietly."

Selina pouted. "Really, Bruce? Is that all I am, now? 'Catwoman'?"

Selina tried to give Batman the slip, but the Caped Crusader was too fast. He grabbed her arm and had her in a gentle (but firm) headlock in less time than it took Selina to polish off a cupcake.

"Yes, really," he retorted. "It's over."

With his free hand, Batman pulled out a pair of Bat-Cuffs and locked them onto Selina's wrists. Normally, Selina would immediately start planning a way to get out of Batman's custody, but she was far too tired and out of shape for anything other following Batman as he led her away.

"Batmobile," Batman growled into his cowl comm. "To my location."

There was a rumble and hum of machinery, and moments later a large, sleek black car drove up into the alleyway below where Batman and Selina stood.

"Y'know, you're gonna get nodules if you keep doing that ridiculous voice," Selina commented. "You should consider getting a vocal modulator or something."

Batman pressed a button on his cowl. "Best in the line," he said in a husky tenor.

"... Huh. Alright, then."

Batman grappled with Selina down to the Batmobile. He leapt into the driver's seat, turned the ignition, and they were off.

The car ride was mostly silent. Selina would like to have imagined that she was planning a way out of the car, but the reality was that she was tired and just wanted to curl up on the couch with a carton of Ben and Jerry's and the new season of New Girl on Netflix.

Batman stopped the car. Selina looked around and was surprised to see not the police station, but her apartment.

"What--"

Batman cut her off. "Technically, I found you on the roof of a museum. You hadn't broken any laws yet."

"Then why the cuffs?"

"I have my kinks," Batman said. There was what appeared to be the tiniest hint of a smile as he said those words.

"Did you just make a joke?" Selina teased. "Or is that you asking to come inside?"

Batman's smile remained, but an alert on the Batmobile's digital display caused it to vanish.

"I'd love to. But crime doesn't rest--"

"--'and neither do I.' Geeze, Bruce, SUPERMAN isn't that corny."

Batman reactivated his modulator. "Stay out of trouble, Selina," he growled. And with that, he drove off.

Selina turned to face her apartment. "Well. Looks like I'll be having that Ben and Jerry's tonight after all," she mused to herself.

"You failed, once again. Why I am not surprised?", Circe said looking down on me from her throne.

"Hey, killing Wonder Woman isn't an easy thing to do", I shot back in defense of myself. I knew I failed, I always did. I've been trying to kill Diana for years, yet always seem to come up short. But I really didn't need some wizard bitch rubbing it in. My sore muscles and possibly broken bones were enough of a reminder.

"Clearly. Yet I figured you'd find a way with your freedom on the line. Guess you really are as inept as they say", she rebutted with her signature condescension.

"Hey, who you calling inept Harry Potter!? Last time I checked, you couldn't kill Wonder Woman either. And what the hell do you mean by 'with my freedom on the line'", I snarled out through gritted teeth.

"I'm calling you inept, Cheetah!", she stood up from her chair, walking down the steps to face me head on. I never realized just how tall she was, especially in heels. I was eye to eye with her breasts, as they sat mere millimeters from my nose. She looked down on me from the high ground and I couldn't help but feel small. "And true, I haven't beaten Diana yet, but I've never been humiliated by her like you are on a constant basis. I'm not a loser like you Minerva."

I started to lose control, growling at every critical work that shot from her purple-painted lips. When she called me a loser, I snapped and sprang at her, claws and teeth ready to tear her to shreds. Yet before I could touch her, I was caught in a field of purple magic, frozen in place like a statue.

"Only weak minds are inflamed by insults Barbara. And you are by far the weakest I've ever know; and I've been around for a long time", I could feel my blood boiling, unable to respond in my current state. "But you needn't worry about that for much longer. My new job for you doesn't require much brain power"

She released me from my lunging position and I feel to the floor beneath her. "New job? You must be out your bloody mind if you think I'll work for you again.", I said as I pulled myself up, feeling as if all the pains from my fight with Diana had been amplified.

"Well I'm afraid you don't have much of a choice. Remember the magic contract I had you sign? I would break you out of Belle Reve and you would kill Wonder Woman for me. Then I would grant you your freedom. I held up my end of the bargain. But you're still short on payment"

"Fine, then I'll kill Wonder Woman. I just need time to recover and I'll try again", I said dismissively as started making my way to the door.

"No Barbara, you don't get to try again. This was a one-time offer, which you would have known if you actually read the contract. You really are a ditz, aren't you?"

"So what? You send me back to Belle Reve? See if I care.", I kept walking until I reached the door at the far end of the hall.

"Not exactly. You see, I'm not going to send you back to prison. What would be the fun in that?", she said with a twisted smile as two axes dropped in front of the door to block my exit. The two large minotaur statues turn out to be real monsters. They looked down at me and I was forced to back away. "The contract states that if you are unsuccessful in your attempt to kill Diana, which I assumed you would be, your custody turns over from Belle Reve to me. And considering you still have 36 consecutive life sentences to serve, I now own you; forever."

"So I'm your slave now?", I said with shove and worry.

"If I wanted another slave, I could make one. Being a magical dictator of an island of monsters is lonely work. I recently read somewhere that having a companion can do wonders for the psyche. So I decided to get a pet. And you, Kitty Kat, are purrfect for the role"

"Like hell I am! If you think I'm gonna roll over and be your little plaything, you've got another thing coming witch", I said with as much fury as I could muster. I started to charge at her, but I was instantly frozen again.

"Bad kitty. It's important for you to know you don't have much choice in the matter. However, I promise I will make your stay comfortable. Most people would kill to be pampered by a goddess for the rest of eternity. But it seems you may need some convincing", and with the wave of her hand, a magical collar strapped itself around my neck. Once it fastened, I experienced the worst pain of my life. It felt like I was being choked, shocked, and squashed all at once. The pain was indescribable as I shouted out and crumbled to the floor. Yet with another wave of her hand, it stopped.

"Aw, did that hurt?", she said with mock sympathy. "I hope so. This spell was designed to keep slaves in place. Any time you act out, disobey, or do anything unbefitting of a royal pet; you get to feel that pain again for a random amount of time. Could last a second, an hour, for five years. However long it takes for you to get in line. Do I make myself clear?"

I tried to respond, but all that came out was a defeated meow.

"Yes, another side effect of the spell is the loss of speech. I tweaked it change your words with cat sounds. A stroke of genius if I may say. Now get down on your hands and knees. Cats don't stand up, especially not dumb cheetahs like yourself.

I rolled out of my heap and stood on my hands and knees. I had never felt so humiliated in my life. But I had to do what she said. The pain of disobeying was far too great.

"Welcome to the rest of your life Kitty Kat"

I never thought I could miss pizza this much, Amaya thought, taking a bite out of her deep dish.

John Constantine had pulled the young princess from Nilaa a day or so ago to assist in a battle against a necromanced army. Before Amaya returned home, though, she wanted to satisfy a craving for pizza. And where better to go than Chicago?

When she finished, Amaya pushed back her chair, gently cradling the tiny bulge of her bloated belly as she savored the last of her pizza.

What if this is the last pizza I ever have? That would suck so much. But I have to go back. Slowly, Amaya got out of her chair, leaving a $20 bill on the table. Before she left, though, she had a realization.

$11 is a bit much for a tip, isn't it? With a devious little smirk, Amaya went up to the front counter and ordered a second deep-dish pizza. A few minutes later, it was delivered to her table.

"Bon appétit," she said to herself before digging in.

It seemed, to Amaya, that this pizza tasted even better than the one she had only a few minutes ago. Her appetite surged with a new voraciousness, and soon, Amaya had finished her second pizza. She leaned back in her chair, unbuttoning her jeans to provide room for her massive food baby. With a quick and subtle bit of magic, Amaya expanded her clothes to better accommodate her new bulge, and left the pizzeria.

1553322222211.content:
Dr. Satanna, an insane animal themed surgeon supervillain, was a bit put out and not just from being in a body cast.

Having sworn herself to avenge her temporary disarming by Power Girl, the good or rather Evil Doctor, had put a great deal of time, money and energy into getting a hold of some kryptonite to defeat her nemesis once and for all. Unfortunately, this led only to the discovery that the dimensional displaced Kryptonian was totally immune to this universe's kryptonite, which had led to another humiliating defeat and eight months of jail. Another half a year had passed before Satanna could get her hands on some out of universe alien space rock, which was difficult to find even on the blackest of black markets. Maybe she should have asked more questions, specifically why the kryptonite was red instead of the familiar green and what exactly it was supposed to do, but anger had clouded her judgement.

Building the red rock into a laser cannon and then robbing a bank in Power Girl's home town of New York had been the perfect way to get the blonde bombshell in her sights. A burst of red energy had slammed into the flying brick of a heroine and for a bare second Satanna had exulted in the thought that Power Girl would be crippled by pain and weakened, perhaps permanently reduced to a pathetic human pining for her powers. Instead she'd had the gun ripped out of her hands and dashed against the wall, shattering the priceless kryptonite, and then been knocked through the wall by a still very much super powered PG.

Still, Satanna thought as the EMTs wheeled her into the ambulance, it had to have been done something?

...

'So doc, what's the damage?' Karen asked, the tall, tan, muscular and busty blonde perched atop a medical exam table in the Justice Society's HQ.

'Well, tests show that the Red Kryptonite was from Earth 2, meaning that it had to have had an effect on you, I'm just having trouble figuring it out,' replied Dr. Midnight, blinded crimefighter and medical genius.

'Yeah, I don't like thinking about home much, but it could do some weird stuff there, give you new powers, shrink you to the size of a pea, de-age you,' Power Girl shivered at the last one as she floated effortlessly off the table, 'still the flight seems to work and given you couldn't draw blood I've got the durability still and I can still hear everything, use the X-ray vision, freeze breath and everything else.'

'All true, but it could have a delayed effect,' Dr. Midnight replied thoughtfully, 'I'd take it easy for the next few days at least, don't say fly out over the ocean in case your powers suddenly cut out. In a week we'll do a test of your powers to see if anything's changed.'

'Thanks for the tip, I'll be sure not to do anything too strenuous,' Karen said with a wink, both knowing she'd leap into danger at a moments notice powers or not.

....

Karen felt hungry as she shot out of the JLA headquarters, did a quick aerial lap to spy out any serious crimes and finding none swung smoothly into her apartment where she ordered a pizza. Hunger wasn't unusual for her, the Kryptonian's powers and energy might come from the yellow sun but her stomach still gurgled after a few hours of being empty. And her tummy gurgled a lot, often downing a half dozen brats at a regular lunch or a couple large pizzas for dinner. She was a very large woman, 6'1 in stocking feet and a hundred eighty pounds soaking wet, but not as big as her appetite should have suggested. In truth she didn't deserve her statusque appearance, bar the superhuman exertions she often did, given the amount of calories, grease and saturated fat she consumed every day. But her supercharged metabolism meant her arms and shoulders bulged with tightly defined muscle, her abs were completely ripped and her long legs and full rear end looked like she did a hundred squats every morning. Her flawless bronzed skin actually did glow at a low level when she utilized her powers, all her totally straight teeth were completely white and her perfect bangs were never disheveled. Indeed, the only excess weight was in Karen's massive mammaries, a pair of pert, perfect Fs that absorbed every stray calorie her body didn't decide to just burn off.

Or that's how it usually went, but from now on things were going to be increasingly different. Had Karen known that as she padded to her ringing door wearing only a tight white tee and booty shorts she wouldn't have touched anything but salad ever again, but she was too painfully hungry to even consider that the red kryptonite might have set her metabolism from super powered to super size.

'Keep the change,' PG told the delivery boy as she handed him a twenty, seizing the two pizza and breadstick boxes from his arms.

'Um, its thirty five,' the teen answered, tearing his eyes off the practically see through T shirt and the large nipples poking up through it.

'Since when has a large and bread been more than twelve?' Karen demanded, moving her hand to her hip and making her boobs bounce.

'Since you ordered two large meatlovers with stuffed crust and double extra cheese, cheezy bread, iced desert bread and a two liter of mountain dew,' the boy answered struggling to make eye contact and hide his erection.

'Huh, I don't remember that...but it sounds right,' the ravenously hungry woman said as she turned around to fetch her wallet, 'and don't look at my ass when I walk away.'

By the time she'd fetched another twenty and a five, Karen was too hungry to think about how the kid's eyes had been riveted to her curvy caboose. Instead she practically slammed the door in his face and started eating, using super speed to lay out the feast atop her counter. Each slice of greasy, meaty, extra cheesy pizza had eight hundred kilocalories in it and she devored sixteen of them as fast as she could chew, barely stopping to breathe. Sauce splashed across her white tee and grease got on her lips, but she could only think about the sweet taste of soda to release the saltiness of the meat. Twisting off the cap she chugged the entire two liters in a few seconds flat, before following it up with devouring the cheesy bread and its cinnamon sugar coated friend.

A meal that would have been unhealthy for four people to share had just entered Karen's stomach, nearly twenty thousand calories or eight pounds of fat once digested and distributed. Her stomach, wash board flat and capable of reflecting missile fire, bulged outwards so far she looked several months pregnant. It was a big meal even for Kara, who did oft make a pig of herself, but while it usually filled her to capacity, today she felt a curious sense of unfulfillment. She wanted something sweet...

15533222222111.content:
The blare of her 6 am alarm awoke Karen from her very deep slumber.

Bleary blue eyes opened and she pawed out blindly for the button, finding it just as she noticed her hand was sticky. Sitting up with a grunt, the Kryptonian noticed most of her body was in fact sticky. She was wearing the white T from the night before, but its cotton surface was covered in pink stains, as were her hands and as she licked her lips face. Only that her tongue tasted strawberry prevented her from fully panicking, but she was more than a bit alarmed.

'Ugh, is this what being hung over feels like?' the super heroine asked herself, dragging herself out of bed.

Mornings were often difficult for someone who spent all night crime fighting, mentally if not physically. But this morning Kara truly felt like shit, it was a real effort to pull herself from between the cozy sheets and get up. She'd no memory of last night beyond the first bite of pizza, yet it was clear as she glimpsed the tower of empty ice cream cartons and pizza boxes that her initial gorge hadn't been enough for her appetite.

'Might have overdone it just a bit...,' she admitted gingerly, stepping into the bathroom, 'Okay, maybe a bit more than that...'

Staring back at the super heroine in the mirror was a wreck. Her eyes were bleary and her normally clear face was greasy looking in a way that threatened acme, while there were ice cream stains around her lips and cheeks. Further stains covered her night shirt and panties, clearly showing she'd chowed down with out any decorum the last night at all. Her stomach was sore and tender to the touch, stuffed with food it bulged outwards noticeably to the point that there were red lines on her lower abdomen from her snug shorts.

To most of 21st century America, thick wasted and triple chinned as it was, being a bit bloated wasn't anything unusual, especially after a feast that could bench a professional athlete for a season through the fat content alone. But to PG this was a first, no matter how much she'd eaten her stomach had stayed flat as a board and hard as a rock. Now it wasn't just sore, but notably sticking out from the food it was digesting.

'Jeez Kara,' the busty blonde said to herself, 'you're lucky you've got your super metabolism or else you'd have to worry about getting fat...'

She trailed off in mid sentence, scanning herself with an exacting and merciless eye. X-ray vision meant she'd no need to disrobe but she did so anyway, casting aside the booty shorts and t in a flash of super speed. Power Girl twisted and flexed, going into poses to show herself from every angle: she stretched out her belly, stuck out her booty and jiggled her breasts. From her calves to her neck she ran her fingers over her body, non to gentle caresses and pinches everywhere.

'Shit, shit, shit,' the head of StarCorp swore to herself, clearly unpleased by what she saw and felt.

All of her life Karen had been as fit as a fiddle. Her belly flat, her limbs slim and firm, her huge breasts high and her butt taught as a drum. She'd been voted as the hottest superheroine alive more than once and while she didn't like being fapped over, it could have been worse. Now, she'd admit that she still had a body that most women would envy, but there were some changes.

First off she'd clearly lost a good deal of muscle tone. Her abs weren't visible anymore and wouldn't be even without the bulge, indeed the bulge might be a new feature. Her shredded calves and rock hard thighs had lost much of their muscular contours, instead of the legs of a sprinter or power runner they looked like those of an athlete who had spent the off season at the buffet table instead of in the weight room. There was a slight layer of fat over the usually fit limbs and her thighs had started to bulge a bit at the tops. Nor had her ripped arms been spared. PG had long ago come to like her bulging biceps and cut triceps, but they no longer naturally bulged. Even when flexing they were clearly smaller and softer, nor did she like the look of the soft deposit of fat under her forearm.

A bigger change was her ass. Gone were the pert, perfect, badly under appreciated cheeks of a hyper fit woman, one who did lunges like they were second nature. Overnight they'd gotten softer, lower, flabbier, resembling the ass of a woman who ate like a pig with no thought of her figure. She could indeed pinch an inch all over her rear end and felt it jiggle as well.

She thanked Rao that her tits seem unaffected. An odd thought perhaps, but the blonde bombshell didn't want them getting any bigger if she could help it. She cupped the heavy F cups, glad to see at least one thing unchanged, then before her eyes they bulged out. Fat rapidly accumulated in her chest, the already giant Fs going to full on Gs. Her aereola's stretched out, the nipples lost a bit of their upright point, thin stretch marks appeared at their corners and with horror she felt her rack sag just a bit, gravity pulling them straight down. Just as they did, a painful spasm of hunger struck her belly, strong as a punch by Bizarro.

'Oh, oh hell no!' the Kryptonian gasped, horrified at seeing her figure bulge before her eyes.

She turned, pressing her legs for a jump that would launch her into flight. She'd dash into some clothes, and jet out of her apartment and back to the Society's headquarters. Or that was the plan.

Instead of the familiar rush of flight, Kara felt only the pull of gravity. She flat on her stomach, the cold bathroom floor driving the wind from her and sending an unfamiliar jolt of pain through her naked body. She groaned, pushing herself up and surprised by the amount of effort that took.

'No flight, ugh, no strength, uff,' she said, resting her hands on her slightly wider hips, 'and no powers. Not a good day. I've gotta get some help.'

15533222222222211.content:
The smell of pancakes wafted into the bedroom, where Lois Lane lay curled under the blankets. The sun had risen a few short hours ago, but only now had the intrepid reporter for the Daily Planet begun to rise out of bed. She stepped into a pair of slippers and made her way to the kitchen. Standing over the oven was her husband, Clark Kent, dressed in a blue T-shirt and khakis.

"Good morning, Lois," he greeted her cheerfully.

"Mornin'," she yawned.

"Breakfast's almost ready. Just need a few more minutes."

Lois nodded, still groggy. She shuffled over to the counter and poured herself a cup of coffee. It had been a long night at work, and unlike her husband, the light of the sun was not enough to assuage her need for sleep.

"You're home early," she said. Lois sat down at the breakfast table. "What's the occasion?"

Clark hovered over to Lois with a plate stacked high with pancakes. He set the plate down in front of her and kissed her on the head.

"I just thought you'd enjoy a Kent-style breakfast." Clark smiled. "It also helped that I wanted you to have a happy Valentine's Day."

Lois almost on her coffee. Clark's face twisted with concern, but Lois raised a hand to stop him from trying to help her.

"Is that what today is?" Lois asked, dazed.

"You didn't forget, did you?" Clark teased.

"No, no, of course I didn't," Lois began, which earned her a quizzical look from Clark. "... Maybe a little bit."

Clark smiled sympathetically. "Well, you've been pretty swamped with work, lately. All those op-ed pieces on the election..."

"Ugh, tell me about it. I haven't been able to leave the office in weeks. Just as soon as I finish one piece about one candidate saying something sexist, another candidate shows up and says something racist. It's ridiculous!"

Clark reached over and gave her a hug. "I know. I can hear them right now. It's not much better."

"I'm just glad I finally got time off. The primaries were killer..."

"I know. I've had to carry you home from the office for three nights straight."

"That is not true."

"I think what matters," Clark said, "is that you get something to eat and ignore politics for today." He grabbed a knife and fork from the drawer and handed them to Lois. "Don't you think?"

Lois looked at the plate of pancakes before her. They looked delicious—fluffy and streaming, with drizzled in syrup and with a dollop of whipped cream on top—and Lois could not wait to dig in. Seeing Clark's pancake breakfast in front of her was enough to wake her from her reverie and make her stomach grumble.

"I'll say," Lois agreed, and tucked in.

Clark chuckled. "Someone's hungry."

That was an understatement. She hadn't had a proper meal in a week—just a cup of coffee in the morning and a couple of snacks in between. Lois was starving, and she had every intention of licking the platter clean.

However, in the back of her mind, Lois knew that her poor eating habits had taken a toll on her figure. Her lower calorie intake had meant that her body would store more calories than it would use, and when she did eat, she would have a tendency to overeat. The result was that Lois had put on a bit of weight over the past few weeks. It wasn't very noticeable in her flannel pajamas and one of Clark's old Superman shirts, but Lois could tell that her belly was much softer than it had been.

Still, it did little to keep her from devouring the large plate of pancakes Clark had made for her. A plate that might've been a bit too large.

"Mm..." Lois moaned. She leaned back in her chair and cradled her belly, which had bloated up a bit from having 10 pancakes stuffed into her stomach. "That was heavenly." She craned her neck towards her husband. "But now I feel bad about not getting you anything."

Clark beamed. "Just the fact that you liked my cooking is enough for me," he said earnestly. Suddenly, his face turned grim. "There's trouble in Suicide Slum," he said. He took off his glasses. "I have to go." Clark kissed Lois goodbye as he took off his shirt.

"Stay safe, alright?" she said, wishing him farewell.

Clark grinned. "Always." And with that, Clark ran to the balcony and jumped into the sky.

Lois sat in her chair for a few minutes, waiting for the bloating to subside. When Clark still hadn't returned, she made her way to the couch and turned on the news.

"--Metallo seems to have gotten the upper hand on Super--This just in, it looks like John Henry Irons, AKA Steel, has just entered the fray," Jimmy Olsen, news anchor, reported. Lois's fears were assuaged now that she knew Clark had some help.

He's Superman. Of course he's fine, she reassured herself.

After listening to the report a bit longer, Lois switched off the TV. By now, her belly was far less bloated. It was still larger than it had been before the primaries began, though.

"I need to get this under control," she mused to herself, patting the tiny bulge. She made her way to the bathroom, pulled out the scale, and stepped on.
15533222222222211.title: Lois and Clark Forever!

choices: Lois spends the rest of her time off relaxing and indulging.
Two months later, the election's taken quite a toll on Lois's waistline.
155332222222222112.content:
"145" was the number on the scale.

Wow, Lois thought, pinching her newfound belly fat in her hands. I've really let this get out of control.. She gave her belly a curious shake. It wobbled in return.

Lois was not wholly unfamiliar with fluctuations in her weight. If an assignment was engrossing enough, she'd end up gaining or losing a few pounds, depending on how active it required her to be. But combined with another arduous assignment last month shortly before she started covering the election, and the result was that Lois was now at her all-time highest weight.

I suppose I should get changed...

Lois went into the closet and pulled out a few clothes to try on. The top she picked out-—a powder-blue T-shirt—fit well enough (even if it was a bit tight and rode up her belly a little), but the first few pairs of pants she tried on were too tight to button. Sighing, Lois dug deeper into her closet and pulled out a pair of black leggings—her fat pants. She slipped into them without much of a struggle, although they felt a bit more snug than she remembered. Still, they were comfortable, and Lois was satisfied. She glanced over at the pairs of pants left lying on the floor.

"Lois Lane, you've got to get back in those pants someday," she resolved to herself as she put the pants away.

She heard a familiar gust of wind come from the balcony. She made went back to the living room to find that her husband had returned—a little scratched up, but still smiling. His hands were behind his cape.

"I got you something," Clark said. He brought his hands forward to reveal an orchid and a 5-pound box of chocolate.

"Happy Valentine's Day, Lois," Clark said, beaming.

Lois couldn't help but smile in return. She bound over to her husband and kissed him. She eyed the box of chocolates in Clark's hand. Her thoughts briefly drifted to her growing belly, but she pushed them away.

I'll worry about fitting into my jeans after the holidays.
155332222222222112.title: She's DEFINITELY getting pudgy...

choices: ... had gained another 10 pounds.

1553322222222221121.content:
Lois had every intention to get back in shape after the holidays. She really did. But, even though she was one of the most strong-willed women in the world, the funny thing about basic human psychology is that if you put something off for later, "later" has a tendency to delay itself further, especially when you want something else a little more than what you want to do "later."

So even though having that extra slice of cake may have been counterintuitive to any weight-loss initiatives she may have had in mind, Lois would just shrug, resolve to worry about it "later," and help herself to seconds. And while staying sedentary on the couch and watching Netflix shows may not be the most conducive way to burn calories, Lois would remind herself that she was on holiday and would worry about that "later," opening another bag of chips.

The result was, of course, that Lois's belly grew. Not by a lot, but inch-by-inch, pound-by-pound, hey waistline outgrew those pants which had given her so much trouble on Valentine's Day.

Clark had managed to convince Lois to take a two-week vacation, and she made the most of every bit of that time to laze and indulge. By the end of that time, Lois...

Near the end of the two weeks Lois went to the bathroom and accidentally step on the bathroom scale which said 195 pounds. The shear size of the number made her fall down on her chubbier butt.

"Wait what I couldn't have gotten so big it's only been a few weeks" Lois told herself but when she look in the mirror she could sat it was true.

Her boobs had gotten bigger now looking juicy watermelons compared to how they looked before and they were resting on bloated, definitely fatter belly that hung little more forward than before.

Her thighs were like two huge tree trunks and her ass could bearly be contain be the underwear she was wearing looking that two oversized beach balls that jiggly and shake whenever she would move the slightest.

She went to her closet to find if there was anything that could but that just led to a lot of rips, tears and buttons flying. In the end she had nothing to wear but the stretchy underwear she was wearing right now and even that felt a little.

"Hi honey I see that we will have to get you a new wardrobe" Giggled Clark as he walked into the bed with some food for her.

"It's not funny how could you let this happen to me how am I going to report if I have nothing to wear" said Lois.

"You know that you don't have to report I make enough money on my own for us to live on." explained Clark

choices: With Mera, who is starting to feel the mutagen's effects...

155332222222222223212.content:
Black Manta had to chuckle to himself. He hadn't known why he'd never thought of something like this before.

Manta had tried many things against Aquaman. But truly, it always boiled down to trying to kill the monarch and destroy Atlantis. But he'd been too straightforward and too simplistic. So Manta had gone for a more...insidious and subtle approach.

He'd become aware of the Trench, a branch of Atlanteans who were far different than the norm. Savage, primal and predatory, the Trench required to eat twenty to thirty times their own weight to survive. Their hunger drove them to eat just about anything they could get their webbed hands on, even going as far to attack on the surface world just to get enough to food to sate them. That had interested him and with painstaking effort, Manta had tracked some of them down and captured one. He'd then taken the creature to several geneticists that owed him a few favors. He had them use the captured Trench to create a customized mutagen. Anything that was subjected to it would develop an intense need to feed, much like the Trench but even worse.

Manta's first thought was to infect Aquaman himself but he decided against it. Too easy. He wanted Aquaman to truly suffer. Turning him into a crazed creature devouring everything in sight was simply not enough. Instead, he targeted the king's wife, Mera. The reasoning was simple: with Mera becoming a creature of ravenous hunger he'd ultimately for Aquaman's hand, making him choose between the safety of his kingdom or his wife. The ravenous hunger that would claw at Mera would force her to feed and would thus have to be sated constantly. Naturally, he'd expect Aquaman to try and find a cure but that situation would quickly become unsustainable as Mera would require more and more and Atlantis would have to devote many resources just keep her contained and satisfied as they searched for a cure. Given Mera's own highly destructive capabilities, should she go on a hunger induced rampage, she'd would utterly devastate the undersea kingdom and maybe even the surface world.

Manta gave a dark chuckle. Aquaman would be forced to watch as his wife devolved into a hungry, unstable predator. Now, Manta didn't know exactly how much the situation would escalate or what Aquaman would do in the end, but he was confident that the sea king would be forced into some sort of unwinnable situation.

One he did know, was that he'd have fun watching it all play out. He'd already tagged Mera with mutagen some time ago while she was alone and a small ways away from Atlantis. It should be taking effect any time now...

info.brief_description: Big changes in the DC Universe are starting to happen, as the heroes fatten up.
info.description:
This is an interactive story in which you can fatten up any girl from the DC Universe, but first a few ground rules.

- Female WG Only.

- This is a straight up WG story. No other fetishes please.

- Weight gain does not have to realistic, but it does have to be reasonable. No "Wonder Woman gained 50,000 pounds in one day" stories.

- Nudity is allowed, but try and keep it tasteful. No sex though, it just brings about bad things and bad writing.

- Profanity is also allowed, but keep it in moderation. Wonder Woman doesn't swear like a sailor in the comics, and she shouldn't here.

- Stick to the comic book versions of the characters. The DCAU and Teen Titans were both great, but I think we've all seen enough WG Fiction about the both of them for one life time.

- Write your characters in character. I cannot stress this enough.

- At least one full paragraph per entry.

Other than that, have fun.
